column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#130435#130446#TD4035E.TXT.r_958;TD4035E.TXT.r_959;TD4035E.TXT.r_960# de nas rlung rnams 'dus nas kun du 'thas pa dang sra bar byed de / / +de ni steng dang 'og chu'i 'khrug pa thub pa'i phyir gser gyi sa gzhi zhes bya'o // /

column3: nyi ma ni 'od zer rnams 'jug pa la bdag gir bya ba med de / / +lhun gyis grub pa 'jug pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#130447#130460#TD4035E.TXT.r_960;TD4035E.TXT.r_961;TD4035E.TXT.r_962;TD4035E.TXT.r_963# de chags nas de'i steng du yang de dag gi las kyi dbang nyid kyis     // /

column3: nyi ma ni 'di snyam du bdag ni bsreg pa dang skem pa la sogs pa'i las la zhugs pa yin pas bdag gis bsreg par bya'o snyam du mi sems mod kyi / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#130460#130470#TD4035E.TXT.r_962;TD4035E.TXT.r_963;TD4035E.TXT.r_964;TD4035E.TXT.r_965# de las char 'bab par 'gyur ro // / +chu de dag kyang gser gyi sa gzhi la gnas par 'gyur te / /

column3: 'on kyang rnam par mi     // / +rtog pa bzhin du bdag gir bya ba med par 'od zer 'gyed par 'gyur ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#130471#130478#TD4035E.TXT.r_964;TD4035E.TXT.r_965;TD4035E.TXT.r_966# de bzhin du yang rlung rnams kyis kun tu 'bras shing sra bar byed do // / +der yang khams  bzang po mchog dang gtso bo dang  gya nom pa gang yin pa de las / /

column3: de bzhin du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chos kyi sku la gnas pa nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa bag chags dang bcas te spangs pa ngar 'dzin pa dang nga yir 'dzin pa spangs pa rnams kyi ye  shes me long lta bu la sogs pa gang dag yin pa de dag 'jug pa la yang bdag gir 'dzin pa mi mnga'i / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#130479#130495#TD4035E.TXT.r_965;TD4035E.TXT.r_966;TD4035E.TXT.r_967# der yang khams  bzang po mchog dang gtso bo dang  gya nom pa GANG YIN PA DE LAS / / +rlung gis bsgrubs pa'i dbang gis ni ri rab 'byung bar 'gyur te / /
column5: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#130495#130505#TD4035E.TXT.r_967;TD4035E.TXT.r_968;TD4035E.TXT.r_969# rin po che sna bzhi po gser gyi rang bzhin dang  dngul gyi rang bzhin dang  shel gyi rang bzhin dang  bee d'urya'i rang bzhin can yin no // /
column6: 0.007#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1762144#1762146#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_7906# gzhal yas khang brgyad khri bzhi stong gser gyi rang bzhin dang  dngul dang  bee d'urya dang  shel gyi rang bzhin bram ze rnams la spyan pa btang ngo // /
column7: 0.007#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1762164#1762165#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_7907# gdan  brgyad khri bzhi stong gdan rnam pa bzhi po gser gyi rang bzhin dang  dngul dang  bee d'urya dang  shel gyi rang bzhin te / /
column8: 0.009#TD4090.1E.TXT.r#1636357#1636361#TD4090.1E.TXT.r_6804;TD4090.1E.TXT.r_6805# lhun po rin chen bzhi'i rang bzhin / / +gser gyi rang bzhin dang  dngul gyi rang bzhin dang  beed'urya'i rang bzhin dang shel gyi rang bzhin te / /
column9: 0.023#TD4097E.TXT.r#2216808#2216808#TD4097E.TXT.r_1683;TD4097E.TXT.r_1684# de la ri rab ni rin po che sna bzhi'i rang bzhin te / / +gser dang dngul dang bee d'urya dang shel gyi rang bzhin te / /
column10: 0.024#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1762081#1762083#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_7903# gser gyi shing rta rnams dang  dngul dang  bee d'urya dang  shel gyi rang bzhin gyi shing rta rnams    te ; /

column3: nga yir 'dzin pa mi mnga' bar shes bya thams cad la 'jug go // / +snyigs ma lnga shas che ba zhes bya ba la / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#130504#130513#TD4035E.TXT.r_968;TD4035E.TXT.r_969# de la khams 'bring gang yin pa de las ni gser gyi ri bdun po 'di lta ste / /
column5: 0.016#TD4086E.TXT.r#1307729#1307732#TD4086E.TXT.r_3401;TD4086E.TXT.r_3402;TD4086E.TXT.r_3403;TD4086E.TXT.r_3404# mu khyud 'dzin dang rnam par 'dud // / +de bzhin rta rna ri dang ni // / +blta na sdug dang seng ldeng can // /

column3: snyigs ma lnga ni nyon mongs pa dang  lta ba dang  sems can dang   bskal ba dang  tshe'i snyigs ma dag yin te / / +snyigs ma zhes bya ba ni snyigs ma ngan pa dang tha shal yin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#130514#130527#TD4035E.TXT.r_969;TD4035E.TXT.r_970;TD4035E.TXT.r_971;TD4035E.TXT.r_972# gnya' shing 'dzin dang  rnam par 'dud dang  rta rna ri dang  blta na sdug dang  seng ldeng can dang  gshol mda' 'dzin dang  mu khyud 'dzin rnams mngon par 'grub par 'gyur te / /

column3: lhag ma rnams kyis ni phrin las zab pa'o zhes bya ba la / / +stobs sogs sangs rgyas chos rnams la // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#130526#130535#TD4035E.TXT.r_970;TD4035E.TXT.r_971;TD4035E.TXT.r_972;TD4035E.TXT.r_973;TD4035E.TXT.r_974# de dag kyang  rim par ri rab 'khor par 'dug go // / +ri rab kyi tshad ni 'phang du dpag tshad brgyad khri yod la / / +rgyar yang de dang 'dra ste / /

column3: byang chub rin chen 'byung gnas 'dra // / +zhes bya ba 'dis ni byang  chub kyi phyogs la sogs pa rin po che'i gnas nyid kyi phrin las bstan to // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#130534#130551#TD4035E.TXT.r_973;TD4035E.TXT.r_974;TD4035E.TXT.r_975;TD4035E.TXT.r_976# dpag tshad brgyad khri ni chu'i nang du nub po // / +gnya' shing 'dzin gyi tshad ni de'i phyed do // /

column3: 'gro ba'i dge ba'i lo thog la // / +sprin chen dang yang 'dra bar 'dod // / +ces bya ba phyed 'dis ni sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa'i phrin las bstan to // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#130550#130565#TD4035E.TXT.r_975;TD4035E.TXT.r_976;TD4035E.TXT.r_977;TD4035E.TXT.r_978;TD4035E.TXT.r_979# de las gzhan pa'i gser gyi ri rnam par 'dud la sogs pa  nas mu khyud 'dzin la thug pa rnams kyi tshad ni / / +phyi ma phyi ma de las phyed phyed 'bri ba'i tshad du rig par bya'o // /
column5: 0.0#TD4043E.TXT.r#365765#365770#TD4043E.TXT.r_1344;TD4043E.TXT.r_1345# 'og chu'i 'khrug pa thub pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni gser la sogs pa'i khams kyi chus rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi steng na gru bzhir bskor ba gang yin pa'o // / +ri de dag gi ming rnams ni de dag gi rtse mo'i rnam pa 'dra ba'i bye brag las blta bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni rtse mo nyi ma'i shing rta'i gnya' shing 'dzin  nus pa dang  rtse mo'i dbus btud pa dang  rtse mo rta'i rna ba 'dra ba dang  rtse mo blta na sdug pa dang  rtse mo'i shing seng ldeng gi 'dra ba dang  rtse mo shing rta'i mngal lta bu'i rta'i rgya yod pa dang  rtse mo ni mi dbyibs zhes bya ba'i dbyibs 'dra ba'i phyir go rims bzhin du ming gnya' shing  'dzin la sogs par btags so // /

column3: bsod nams ye shes rab rdzogs  phyir ; / / +zla ba nya ba lta bur 'dod // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#130566#130575#TD4035E.TXT.r_978;TD4035E.TXT.r_979# de dag rtse mo'i rnam pa 'dra ba'i bye brag las blta bar bya'o // / +khams ngan pa rnams las ni ri rab kyi ngos bzhi dang  gser gyi ri rnams  gyi phyi rol gyi gling bzhi dang  gling phran brgyad dang  ri khor yug 'byung bar 'gyur ro // /

column3: ces ba ba 'dis ni mthar thug par gshegs pa'i phrin las brjod do // / +ye shes snang ba byed pa'i phyir // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#130574#130584#TD4035E.TXT.r_979;TD4035E.TXT.r_980;TD4035E.TXT.r_981# khams ngan pa rnams las ni ri rab kyi ngos bzhi dang  gser gyi ri rnams  gyi phyi rol gyi gling bzhi dang  gling phran brgyad dang  ri khor yug 'byung bar 'gyur ro // /

column3: nyi ma chen po 'dra bar 'dod // / +ces bya ba 'dis ni chos ston pa'i phrin las brjod do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#130583#130592#TD4035E.TXT.r_980;TD4035E.TXT.r_981;TD4035E.TXT.r_982# khor yug gi tshad ni ri mu khyud 'dzin gyi phyed yin te / /

column3: ji ltar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi // / +'od zer dpag tu  med 'dres shing // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#130593#130601#TD4035E.TXT.r_982;TD4035E.TXT.r_983;TD4035E.TXT.r_984# lha ma yin gyi gnas rnams ni ri rab chu'i 'og tu nub pa'i nang na yod do // /

column3: zhes bya ba 'di dang  de bzhin zag med dbyings na yang // / +sangs rgyas dpag tu med 'dres shing // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#130600#130612#TD4035E.TXT.r_983;TD4035E.TXT.r_984;TD4035E.TXT.r_985# gangs  ri ni mtshom dros pa'i nye 'khor na yod do // / +de'i 'og na ni sems can dmyal ba chen po rnams kyi gnas / /

column3: zhes bya ba'i tshigs su bcad pa gnyis po 'di thams cad kyis ni sprul pa la sogs pa mdzad pa'i phrin las bstan to // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#130609#130622#TD4035E.TXT.r_984;TD4035E.TXT.r_985# de'i 'og na ni sems can dmyal ba chen po rnams kyi gnas / / +sems can dmyal ba brgyad dang  nyi tshe'i sems can dmyal ba rnams dang  grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba rnams dang  nyen kor gyi sems can dmyal ba    rnams dang  dud 'gro dang  yi dags kha cig gnas so // /
column5: 0.017#TD4035E.TXT.r#136716#136719#TD4035E.TXT.r_2064# sems  can dmyal ba chen po dag gi ji lta ba bzhin du grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba rnams dang  nyi tshe ba'i sems can dmyal ba rnams dang  nye 'khor gyi sems can dmyal ba rnams dang  dud 'gro dang yi dags rnams kyang de dang 'dra'o // /
column6: 0.020#TD4035E.TXT.r#136418#136422#TD4035E.TXT.r_2014# nyi tshe ba'i sems can dmyal ba rnams dang  nye 'khor gyi sems can dmyal ba rnams ni sems can dmyal ba chen po dang  grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba'i nye 'khor nyid de / /

column3: dper na nyi ma'i 'od zer gcig / / +ces  bya ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'dis ni ye shes 'jug pa'i phrin las bstan to // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#130621#130641#TD4035E.TXT.r_985;TD4035E.TXT.r_986;TD4035E.TXT.r_987;TD4035E.TXT.r_988;TD4035E.TXT.r_989;TD4035E.TXT.r_990# sems can dmyal ba brgyad dang  nyi tshe'i sems can dmyal ba rnams dang  grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba rnams dang  nyen kor gyi sems can dmyal ba    rnams dang  dud 'gro dang  yi dags kha cig gnas so // /
column5: 0.018#TD4098E.TXT.r#1393490#1393492#TD4098E.TXT.r_562;TD4098E.TXT.r_563# dud 'gro dang  yi dags dang  gling bzhi ste / / +'dzam bu gling dang  shar gyi lus 'phags dang  nub kyi ba lang spyod dang  byang gi sgra mi snyan no // /

column3: ji ltar nyi ma'i 'od zer dag / / +ces bya ba 'dis ni rnam par mi rtog pa'i phrin las brjod do // /
nyi ma'i 'od zer gcig btang bas // / +zhes bya ba 'dis ni ye shes rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i phrin las bstan to // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#130640#130657#TD4035E.TXT.r_988;TD4035E.TXT.r_989;TD4035E.TXT.r_990;TD4035E.TXT.r_991;TD4035E.TXT.r_992;TD4035E.TXT.r_993# de la 'dzam bu gling ni shing rta 'dra'o // / +shar gyi lus 'phags ni zla gam  'dra'o // / +nub ba lang spyod ni zlum pa'o // /

column3: ji ltar    nyi ma'i 'od zer rnams // / +zhes bya ba 'dis ni ye shes mi 'jug pa'i phrin las brjod do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#130657#130672#TD4035E.TXT.r_993;TD4035E.TXT.r_994;TD4035E.TXT.r_995;TD4035E.TXT.r_992# shar gyi lus 'phags kyi tshad ni dpag tshad bdun stong ngo // /

column3: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas 'ga' phrin las zab pa 'di bshad pa // / +mkha' la tshon gyis ri mo 'dri // /
column4: 0.021#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2364039#2364040#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6233;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6234# de'i tshad ni dpag tshad bdun  stong lnga brgya'o // /

column3: zhes bya ba ni dper na 'ga' nams so so rang gis rig 'jug go // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#130671#130681#TD4035E.TXT.r_995;TD4035E.TXT.r_996# byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi  tshad ni dpag tshad brgyad stong ngo // /

column3: dri med dbyings la sangs rgyas kyi // / +mtshan nyid dang ni gnas pa dang  phrin las zab pa 'di bshad pa // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#130679#130689#TD4035E.TXT.r_996;TD4035E.TXT.r_997;TD4035E.TXT.r_998;TD4035E.TXT.r_999# gser gyi ri bdun po de dag gi bar gyi chu gang yin pa de dag ni yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa ste / /

column3: mkha' la tshon gyis ri mo 'dri // / +zhes bya ba ni dper na 'ga' zhig nam mkha' la ni ri mo 'dri bar dka' ba byed pa de bzhin du / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#130690#130703#TD4035E.TXT.r_998;TD4035E.TXT.r_999;TD4035E.TXT.r_1000# de na klu rnams kyi gnas yod do // / +klu'i nang na klu chen po bskal par gnas shing sa 'dzin pa / /

column3: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams so so rang gis rig pa'i chos bsnyad pa'i rnam par stan  pa mdzad pa gang yin pa de ni dka' ba mdzad pa yin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#130704#130717#TD4035E.TXT.r_1000;TD4035E.TXT.r_1001;TD4035E.TXT.r_1002# dga' bo dang  nye  dga' dang  rta'i gzhi dang  btang bzung dang  gzi can dang  yul 'khor srung dang  nag po chen po dang  ae la'i 'dab dang brgyad po 'di dag 'khod do // /

column3: gos bkra ba nyid dang nam mkha' la ri mo 'dri ba nyid ni rgya mtsho'i blo gros kyi mdo'i rjes su 'brang bar khong du chud par bya'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#130716#130731#TD4035E.TXT.r_1002;TD4035E.TXT.r_1003# lha dang lha ma yin gyul 'gyed pa nyams su myong bar byed  cing so sor nyams su myong bar byed do // /

column3: 'byor pa rnam par dbye ba la zhes bya ba ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang sangs rgyas rnams kyi 'byor pa tha ma dang  'bring  dang ; /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#130726#130737#TD4035E.TXT.r_1003;TD4035E.TXT.r_1004;TD4035E.TXT.r_1005# klu'i rigs ni rnam pa bzhi yod de klu sgo nga las skye ba dang  mngal nas skye ba dang  drod gsher las skye ba dang  rdzus te skye pa'o // /
column5: 1.192#TD4049E.TXT.r#2297817#2297820#TD4049E.TXT.r_1854# skye gnas bzhi po sgo nga las skye ba dang  mngal nas skye ba dang  drod gsher las    skye ba dang  brdzus te skye bar dbang po mgon par 'grub bo // /
column6: 1.192#TD4086E.TXT.r#1281219#1281221#TD4086E.TXT.r_223# nam mkha' lding drod gsher las skye ba ni bza' ba'i phyir klu sgo nga las skye ba dang  mngal nas skye ba dang  drod gsher las skye ba 'byin par byed de / /
column7: 1.192#TD4086E.TXT.r#1281242#1281246#TD4086E.TXT.r_227# nam mkha' lding rdzus te skye ba ni bza' ba'i phyir klu sgo nga las skye ba dang  mngal nas skye ba dang  drod gsher las skye ba dang  rdzus te skye ba 'byin par byed do // /
column8: 1.788#TD4035E.TXT.r#131636#131638#TD4035E.TXT.r_1142# skye gnas bzhi po sgo nga las skye ba dang  mngal nas skye ba dang  drod gsher las skye ba dang  rdzus te skye ba dang  gzhi drug dang  dus rnam pa bcu ste / /
column9: 1.788#TD4052E.TXT.r#2852171#2852173#TD4052E.TXT.r_1311# yang na mngal nas skye ba dang sgo nga las skye ba dang drod gsher las skye ba dang  rdzus te skye ba'i skye gnas kyi dbang du mdzad nas tshig bzhi go rims bzhin no // /
column10: 2.384#TD4095E.TXT.r#68674#68678#TD4095E.TXT.r_1115# rdzus te skye ba bkag pas sgo nga las skye ba dang  mngal nas skye ba dang  drod gsher las skyes ba dag gis rnyed bar rig par bya'o // /
column11: 0.007#TD4091E.TXT.r#708644#708646#TD4091E.TXT.r_2611# sgo nga'i skye gnas las skye ba dang  mngal nas skye ba rnams dang  drod gsher las skye ba rnams dang  rdzus te skye ba rnams kyi gnas so // /
column12: 0.012#TD4035E.TXT.r#130742#130745#TD4035E.TXT.r_1005# sgo nga las skye ba dang  mngal nas skye ba dang  drod gsher las  skye ba dang  rdzus te skye ba'o // /
column13: 0.016#TD4054E.TXT.r#1014129#1014130#TD4054E.TXT.r_3908# de'i 'og tu rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba las ji ltar 'byung ba bzhin du skye gnas bzhi po sgo da las skye ba dang mngal nas skye ba dang  drod gsher las skye ba dang  rdzus te skye ba'i dbang po mngon bar 'grub po // /

column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#130958#130968#TD4035E.TXT.r_1039;TD4035E.TXT.r_1040;TD4035E.TXT.r_1041;TD4035E.TXT.r_1042# gzhan dag na ni lha de dag gi grong dang  grong rdal dang   ljongs rnams yod do // / +ri rab de'i phyogs bzhi na ni 'dzam bu gling la sogs pa / /

column3: mig gi rnam par shes pa la sogs pa'i mig la sogs pa lta bu'o // / +ji srid du nyon mongs can gyi yid de gzhan du ma gyur pa'i bar du 'jig tshogs la lta ba la sogs pa nyon mongs pa bzhi dang mtshungs par ldan par kun  gzhi rnam par shes pa la dmigs nas phyin ci log tu 'jug pa de srid du de la brten pa yid kyi rnam par shes pa yang gzugs la sogs pa'i yul la ci rigs par gzugs la sogs pa'i yul med bzhin du yod pa yang dag par bzung nas phyin ci log tu 'jug go // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#130969#130990#TD4035E.TXT.r_1041;TD4035E.TXT.r_1042;TD4035E.TXT.r_1043;TD4035E.TXT.r_1044;TD4035E.TXT.r_1045# gling bzhi po rnams yod do // / +de dag ni de'i phyogs bzhi yin no // / +'dzam bu'i gling du bltas pa'i ngos gang yin pa de ni bee d'urya'i rang bzhin yin no // /
column5: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#130990#130998#TD4035E.TXT.r_1045;TD4035E.TXT.r_1046;TD4035E.TXT.r_1047# nub kyi ba lang spyod du bltas pa'i ngos gang yin pa de ni shel gyi rang bzhin yin no // /
column6: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#130999#131014#TD4035E.TXT.r_1046;TD4035E.TXT.r_1047;TD4035E.TXT.r_1048# byang gi sgra mi snyan du bltas pa'i ngos gang yin pa de ni gser gyi rang bzhin can yin no // / +'dzam bu'i gling gi nye 'khor na 'khor los sgyur ba'i  lam gser gyi rang bzhin can yod de / /
column7: 0.026#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#883093#883093#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_18694;TD4093.1E.TXT.r_18695# ngos bzhi dag tu grangs bzhin no // / +zhes bya ba ni byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi ngos ni gser gyi rang bzhin no // /

column3: nyon mongs pa can gyi    yid de gzhan du gyur na de la brten pa rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes la 'byor ba 'thob ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#131015#131025#TD4035E.TXT.r_1048;TD4035E.TXT.r_1049# rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi sems can gyi pus mo'i tshad kyi pus nub tsam zhig rgya mtsho chen po na nub cing 'dug ste / /

column3: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'byor ba de la rag las pa dang  de'i rjes la 'thob pa'i ye shes la rag las pas ni de dang mthun par spyod pa yin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#131026#131034#TD4035E.TXT.r_1048;TD4035E.TXT.r_1049;TD4035E.TXT.r_1050# rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi sems can gyi pus mo'i tshad kyi pus nub tsam zhig rgya mtsho chen po na nub cing 'dug ste / / +'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po 'jig rten du 'byung ba na / / +rgya mtsho chen po chu pus nub tsam zhig skam par 'gyur ro // /

column3: don gzhan du gyur pa ni gzugs la  sogs pa yul lnga gzhan du gyur pa'o // / +'dzin pa gzhan du gyur pa ni mig gi rnam par shes pa la sogs pa lnga gzhan du gyur pa ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#131035#131050#TD4035E.TXT.r_1050;TD4035E.TXT.r_1051;TD4035E.TXT.r_1052;TD4035E.TXT.r_1053;TD4035E.TXT.r_1054# rgya mtsho chen po chu pus nub tsam zhig skam par 'gyur ro // / +mtshe ma dros pa'i gyas rol na / /

column3: ji ltar rnam par ma dag pa'i gnas skabs na yul lnga po sna tshogs su dmigs pa de bzhin du / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#131051#131058#TD4035E.TXT.r_1053;TD4035E.TXT.r_1054;TD4035E.TXT.r_1055;TD4035E.TXT.r_1056# de'i ming gis 'di 'dzam bu'i gling zhes bya bar gyur to // / +de'i byang logs na / /

column3: gzhan du gyur ba'i gnas skabs na bee d'u rya la sogs pa'i zhing  sna tshogs su snang ba rnam par dag pa yin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#131059#131070#TD4035E.TXT.r_1055;TD4035E.TXT.r_1056;TD4035E.TXT.r_1057# shing shal ma li rtse mo shin tu mtho ba yod de / / +de la nam mkha' lding rnam pa bzhi po dag gnas so // /

column3: rnam par rtog pa gzhan du gyur na zhes bya ba ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa gzhan du gyur pa ston to // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#131069#131092#TD4035E.TXT.r_1057;TD4035E.TXT.r_1058;TD4035E.TXT.r_1059;TD4035E.TXT.r_1060;TD4035E.TXT.r_1061;TD4035E.TXT.r_1062# gling bzhi po de dag las  gling re re la yang gling phran gnyis gnyis yod de / /

column3: ye shes thams cad ces bya ba ni / / +me long lta bu'i ye shes la sogs pa lta bu'o // /
phrin las thams cad la zhes bya ba ni sprul pa'i phrin las sogs  pa la ste / / +dus thams cad du thogs pa med pa la 'byor ba'i mchog thob par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba yin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#131092#131100#TD4035E.TXT.r_1061;TD4035E.TXT.r_1062# 'od gsal gyi lha'i ris nas sems can rnams shi 'phos nas 'dir  skye bar 'gyur ro // / +de yang 'dod pa na spyod pa'i las kyi nang na rab dang mchog dang  gtso bo yin te las de'i 'bras bu ni de nyid kyi tshe mngon par 'grub par 'gyur gyi / /

column3: rten ni gzhan du gyur pa na zhes bya ba la rten du gyur pa ni sa ste / / +de gzhan du gyur na mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa la 'byor ba thob par 'gyur ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#131099#131111#TD4035E.TXT.r_1062;TD4035E.TXT.r_1063;TD4035E.TXT.r_1064# de yang 'dod pa na spyod pa'i las kyi nang na rab dang mchog dang  gtso bo yin te las de'i 'bras bu ni de nyid kyi tshe mngon par 'grub par 'gyur gyi / /

column3: 'di ni kun gzhi rnam par shes  pa'i dmigs pa gzhan du gyur pa yin te / / +'di ltar / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#131112#131119#TD4035E.TXT.r_1064;TD4035E.TXT.r_1065;TD4035E.TXT.r_1066# de'i tshe sems can de dag ni bskal pa dang po pa zhes bya'o // /

column3: kun gzhi rnam par shes pa ni // / +de ni len pa dag dang gnas // / +rnam par rig pa mi rig pa // / +zhes bya ba 'byung ba yin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#131120#131127#TD4035E.TXT.r_1065;TD4035E.TXT.r_1066;TD4035E.TXT.r_1067# de dag kyang gzugs bzang  zhing yid las byung ba yin te / / +de ltar thams cad mdo nyid las byung ba bzhin no // /

column3: rten de gzhan du gyur pa ni gnas ngan len gyi rten gyi dmigs pa gzhan du gyur pa rnam par gzhag go // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#131128#131139#TD4035E.TXT.r_1067;TD4035E.TXT.r_1068;TD4035E.TXT.r_1069# de'i tshe khyim dang  khong pa dang grong gnas pa med de / /

column3: 'khrig pa gzhan du gyur ba ni lus kyi dbang po'i phyogs gcig go // / +de ltar sangs rgyas dri med pa'i // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#131140#131149#TD4035E.TXT.r_1069;TD4035E.TXT.r_1070# de'i 'og tu sems can de dag gi sa'i bcud byung ngo // / +de bzhin du rim gyis sa'i sa zhag  dang  ldum bu'i tshal dang  ma rmos ma btab pa'i 'bras s'a lu shun phrags med pa dang  phub ma med pa 'byung ngo // /

column3: gnas na gzhan gyur dpag med pas // / +zhes bya ba ni dbang po lnga gzhan du gyur pa la sogs pa ji skad bshad pa 'di ni sgo tsam du zad kyi / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#131150#131166#TD4035E.TXT.r_1070;TD4035E.TXT.r_1071;TD4035E.TXT.r_1072# de bzhin du rim gyis sa'i sa zhag  dang  ldum bu'i tshal dang  ma rmos ma btab pa'i 'bras s'a lu shun phrags med pa dang  phub ma med pa 'byung ngo // /

column3: rgyas par ni chos mang po gzhan du gyur pa  theg pa chen po'i mdo dag las khong du chud par bya'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#131165#131177#TD4035E.TXT.r_1071;TD4035E.TXT.r_1072;TD4035E.TXT.r_1073;TD4035E.TXT.r_1074;TD4035E.TXT.r_1075# de'i 'og tu 'bras kyi 'bru shun phrags dang  phub mas kun tu yogs par 'gyur ro // / +de'i 'og tu s'a lu tho rtser skye bar 'gyur ro // /

column3: 'byor ba'i skabs kyi 'og tu sangs rgyas nyid kyis sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa'i skabs yin te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#131174#131185#TD4035E.TXT.r_1074;TD4035E.TXT.r_1075;TD4035E.TXT.r_1076# de dag gis de yongs su 'dzin par snang ngo // / +de'i 'og tu sems can de dag gis sa'i bcud la sogs pa de dag longs spyod pas mdog ngan par 'gyur zhing / /

column3: 'di'i 'brel ba gang yin zhe na / / +de ltar 'byor ba brnyes pa rang gi don gyi mthar phyin pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan     // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#131183#131196#TD4035E.TXT.r_1075;TD4035E.TXT.r_1076;TD4035E.TXT.r_1077;TD4035E.TXT.r_1078# de'i 'og tu sems can de dag gis sa'i bcud la sogs pa de dag longs spyod pas mdog ngan par 'gyur zhing / / +mthu yang med par 'gyur te / /

column3: 'das rnams ni 'di ltar rtsol ba mi mnga' bar rnam par mi rtog pa bzhin du / / +sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pas 'di'i dbang du byas nas yongs su smin par mdzad pa'i skabs yin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#131197#131210#TD4035E.TXT.r_1077;TD4035E.TXT.r_1078;TD4035E.TXT.r_1079;TD4035E.TXT.r_1080;TD4035E.TXT.r_1081# gang gis shas cher zos pa de mdog cher ngan par 'gyur  zhing / / +lus ches lci bar 'gyur ro // / +de'i 'og tu sems can gyis sems can la brnyas par 'gyur te / /

column3: sngar ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la gnas pa'i yongs su smin pa yin no // / +da ni mthar phyin pa brnyes pa sangs rgyas kyi sa la bzhugs pa yin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#131211#131225#TD4035E.TXT.r_1080;TD4035E.TXT.r_1081;TD4035E.TXT.r_1082;TD4035E.TXT.r_1083# mi dge ba'i chos de dag kun tu spyad pa'i rgyus / / +snga ma snga ma sa'i bcud la sogs pa med par 'gyur te / /
column5: 0.025#TD4043E.TXT.r#366025#366026#TD4043E.TXT.r_1378;TD4043E.TXT.r_1379# de ltar thams cad mdo nyid las 'byung ba bzhin no zhes bya ba ni ma tshang ba med pa dang dbang po dman pa ma yin pa dang mdzes pa la sogs PA DAG GO // / +mdo las ji skad 'byung ba kho na bzhin du rgyas par bya'o zhes bya ba ni gnas 'jog pa'i steng chus gcig tu  khyab par gyur pa la rlung gis spris mar byas pa de ni sa'i bcud kha dog la sogs pa phun sum tshogs pa yin te / /

column3: ma smin pa ni smin par 'gro la / / +smin pa ni rnam par dag par 'gro ste / / +de ltar dus rtag tu 'gro yang zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten dang sbyar ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#131226#131241#TD4035E.TXT.r_1083;TD4035E.TXT.r_1084;TD4035E.TXT.r_1085;TD4035E.TXT.r_1086;TD4035E.TXT.r_1087# de'i 'og  tu phan tshun mig gis tshugs su blta'o // /

column3: de ltar thob dka' zhes bya ba ni tshegs chen pos 'thob pas na thob dka' ste / /
thob par dka'  ba de'o // / +la lar skye ba mi snang zhes bya ba ni skye ba dang mi snang ba ni skye ba mi snang ba'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#131242#131256#TD4035E.TXT.r_1086;TD4035E.TXT.r_1087;TD4035E.TXT.r_1088;TD4035E.TXT.r_1089;TD4035E.TXT.r_1090;TD4035E.TXT.r_1091# kha cig la ni mo mtshan 'byung bar 'gyur / / +kha cig la ni pho mtshan 'byung bar 'gyur ro // / +de'i 'og tu gnyis gnyis sprod pas nyal po  byed de // /

column3: yang na skye ba mi snang ba ni skye ba mi snang ba'o // / +ji ltar gang na gnas te sems can rnams 'dul ba'o zhes bya ba ni de ni cig car la lar sgo mang brgya nas chos kyi 'khor lo dang zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs pa'i rnam  pas 'dul ba ni ji ltar 'dul ba yin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#131257#131277#TD4035E.TXT.r_1090;TD4035E.TXT.r_1091;TD4035E.TXT.r_1092;TD4035E.TXT.r_1093# de nas de'i ched du khyim dag byed do // / +s'a lu yongs su gzung ba'i phyir yang zhing yongs su 'dzin par byed do // /

column3: chos kyi sku las ma gyos par 'dul ba ni / / +gang la gnas te 'dul ba zhes bya'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#131278#131287#TD4035E.TXT.r_1093;TD4035E.TXT.r_1094;TD4035E.TXT.r_1095# de nas de'i gzhi  las nan thur byed pa'i rgyal po bsgo bar byed de / /

column3: yongs su smin par mdzad pa'i 'og tu chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa'i skabs te / / +'di'i 'brel ba gang yin zhe na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#131288#131297#TD4035E.TXT.r_1095# de ltar rgyal rigs kyi rgyud de dang  gzhan yang mdo las ji skad 'byung ba bzhin du bram ze dang  rje'u rigs dang  dmangs rigs rnams kyi rgyud rnams 'jig rten du 'byung ngo // /
column5: 0.029#TD4043E.TXT.r#366132#366132#TD4043E.TXT.r_1388# gzhan yang mdo las ji skad 'byung ba bzhin du bram ze dang rje'i rigs dang dmangs rigs kyi rgyu rnams 'jig rten du 'byung ngo zhes bya ba ni gnas 'jig de nas sems can da dag kha cig gis yongs su 'dzin pa de ni nad do // /

column3: 'di ni byang chub kyi skabs yin no // / +sngar ni / / +ngal rgyas rmad byung dka' spyad dge kun bsags // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#131298#131310#TD4035E.TXT.r_1095;TD4035E.TXT.r_1096# de ltar rgyal rigs kyi rgyud de dang  gzhan yang mdo las ji skad 'byung ba bzhin du bram ze dang  rje'u rigs dang  dmangs rigs rnams kyi rgyud rnams 'jig rten du 'byung ngo // /

column3: bskal mchog dus ring 'gro ba sgrib kun zad // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#131311#131318#TD4035E.TXT.r_1096;TD4035E.TXT.r_1097;TD4035E.TXT.r_1098# de dag gi lus la yod pa'i 'od de yang med par gyur nas 'jig rten du mun pa 'byung ngo // /

column3: sar gtogs sgrib pa phra bcom sangs rgyas te // / +de ni mthu chen rin chen snod phye bzhin // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#131319#131333#TD4035E.TXT.r_1097;TD4035E.TXT.r_1098;TD4035E.TXT.r_1099# de'i 'og tu nyi ma dang zla ba dang rgyu skar rnams 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro // / +de la nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshad ni dpag tshad lnga bcu rtsa gcig go // /

column3: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni rnam pas byang chub spyir bsams so // / +de'i  'og tu ni sangs rgyas nyid brnyes pa'i gnas skabs na sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa bsams so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#131331#131347#TD4035E.TXT.r_1098;TD4035E.TXT.r_1099;TD4035E.TXT.r_1100;TD4035E.TXT.r_1101;TD4035E.TXT.r_1102# de la nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshad ni dpag tshad lnga bcu rtsa gcig go // / +zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshad ni dpag  tshad lnga bcu'o // /

column3: da ni ngo bo nyid dang  rgyu dang  'bras bu dang  phrin las dang ldan pa dang  'jug pa'i rab tu dbye bas bsam mo // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#131346#131356#TD4035E.TXT.r_1101;TD4035E.TXT.r_1102;TD4035E.TXT.r_1103# zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ni chu shel gyi rang bzhin yin no // / +de gnyis las kyang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ni ches mgyogs par 'gro ba dang  nges pa med par 'gro bar rig par bya'o // /

column3: yang na 'di ni byang chub kyi skabs yin no // / +sngar ni byang  chub sems dpa' dag gang la slob ce na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#131354#131366#TD4035E.TXT.r_1102;TD4035E.TXT.r_1103;TD4035E.TXT.r_1104;TD4035E.TXT.r_1105# de gnyis las kyang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ni ches mgyogs par 'gro ba dang  nges pa med par 'gro bar rig par bya'o // / +nyi ma'i dkyil    'khor gyis ni gling gnyis cig car snang bar byed la / /

column3: gnas bdun po rang dang gzhan gyi don nas bzung ste byang chub kyi bar la slob po zhes bshad do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#131367#131381#TD4035E.TXT.r_1104;TD4035E.TXT.r_1105;TD4035E.TXT.r_1106;TD4035E.TXT.r_1107# gling gnyis cig car mun par byed de / / +de bas na gcig tu ni nyi ma phyed la gcig tu ni 'char ro // /

column3: byang chub kyang mdo dag las rnam pa mang po zhig 'byung bas sngar byang chub bsams pa ni ji ltar mdo gzhan dang gzhan dag las 'byung ba de ltar    bsam mo // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#131382#131391#TD4035E.TXT.r_1107;TD4035E.TXT.r_1108# zla ba dang nyi ma dang rgyu skar thams cad ni ri rab kyi phyed nas 'gro zhing rgyu ste / /
column5: 0.0#TD4043E.TXT.r#366387#366390#TD4043E.TXT.r_1411# de dag gang gi tshe ri rab las thag ring du rgyu ba de'i  tshe ni dgun du mngon no zhes bya ba ni 'dzam bu'i gling nas lho phyogs logs su ring du song ba'i phyir te / /

column3: de bas na 'di'i dbang du byas nas chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa'i skabs yin te / / +'dir ni go rims 'di nyid legs so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#131392#131402#TD4035E.TXT.r_1108;TD4035E.TXT.r_1109# de yang gnya' shing 'dzin dang mnyam mo de dag gang gi tshe ri rab las thag ring du rgyu ba de'i tshe ni dgun du mngon no // /

column3: sangs rgyas kyi sa'i mdo las / / +sangs rgyas kyi sa ni chos lnga po chos kyi dbyings dang  me long lta bu'i ye shes dang  mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes  dang ; /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#131400#131414#TD4035E.TXT.r_1108;TD4035E.TXT.r_1109;TD4035E.TXT.r_1110;TD4035E.TXT.r_1111# de yang gnya' shing 'dzin dang mnyam mo de dag gang gi tshe ri rab las thag ring du rgyu ba de'i tshe ni dgun du mngon no // / +gang gi tshe nye bar rgyu ba de'i tshe ni tsha ba'i dus su mngon no // /

column3: so sor rtog pa'i ye shes dang  bya ba sgrub pa'i ye shes kyis bsdus par 'byung bas / / +sangs rgyas kyi sa'i dbang du byas nas / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#131415#131425#TD4035E.TXT.r_1110;TD4035E.TXT.r_1111;TD4035E.TXT.r_1112# de'i phyir myur du nub pa dang  ring zhig nas nub par 'gyur bar rig par bya'o // / +zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ni yid tsam  gyis steng du 'dzur ba na zla gam du snang ste / /
column5: 0.0#TD4043E.TXT.r#366441#366443#TD4043E.TXT.r_1414;TD4043E.TXT.r_1415# de bas na tsha zhing nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor yang yun ring du snang ngo // / +zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ni yid tsam gyis steng du 'dzur bas na zla gam du snang ste zhes bya ba la / /

column3: chos lnga po go rims bzhin du rnam par gtan la dbab po // / +de las kyang chos kyi dbyings dang por bstan pas de'i phyir dang por chos kyi dbyings rnam  par dag pa'i skabs so //// /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#131423#131441#TD4035E.TXT.r_1111;TD4035E.TXT.r_1112;TD4035E.TXT.r_1113;TD4035E.TXT.r_1114# zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ni yid tsam  gyis steng du 'dzur ba na zla gam du snang ste / / +des pha rol gyi ngos de tshu rol gyi ngos kyis bsgribs pa'i phyir mi snang ste / /

column3: de'i 'og tu ye shes bzhi sems par 'gyur ro // / +chos lnga po 'di dag gis rnam par gtan la dbab par rab tu dbye ba rgyas par ni theg pa chen po sangs rgyas kyi sa'i mdo kho na las blta bar bya'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#131442#131450#TD4035E.TXT.r_1114;TD4035E.TXT.r_1115# mar gyi ngo la ji lta ji ltar thur du 'dzur ba de lta de ltar bri bar snang ngo // / +rgya mtsho chen po na nya dang rus sbal la  sogs pa gnas pa'i gzugs brnyan byung ba'i phyir zla ba'i nang na ri ri po yod par snang ngo // /

column3: chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid nyon mongs pa dang   shes bya'i sgrib pa gnyis rnam par dag pa'i mtshan nyid ces bya ba ni nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa dag las rnam par dag pas na nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa rnam par dag pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#131468#131476#TD4035E.TXT.r_1117;TD4035E.TXT.r_1118;TD4035E.TXT.r_1119# 'bring rnams ni rgyang grags bcu'o // / +chung ngu rnams ni rgyang grags bzhi'o // / +rigs bzhi de byung ba na sdug pa dang mi sdug  pa'i 'gro ba lnga myong bar 'gyur ba'i las kun tu rtsom par 'gyur ro // /

column3: gang zhig rnam par dag ce na / / +chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid de / / +'dis ni de bzhin  nyid kyi gnas yongs su gyur pa bstan to // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#131477#131485#TD4035E.TXT.r_1119;TD4035E.TXT.r_1120;TD4035E.TXT.r_1121# rigs bzhi de byung ba na sdug pa dang mi sdug  pa'i 'gro ba lnga myong bar 'gyur ba'i las kun tu rtsom par 'gyur ro // /

column3: dngos po shes pa ni rjes la thob pa'i ye shes so // / +dngos po zhes bya ba'i sgras ni kun gzhi rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba gzhan gyi dbang gi ngo bo nyid bzung ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#131486#131501#TD4035E.TXT.r_1120;TD4035E.TXT.r_1121;TD4035E.TXT.r_1122;TD4035E.TXT.r_1123# de'i 'og tu sems can gang yang rung ba zhig / / +bdag por 'gyur ba'i las kun nas nyon mongs pa can gyi sems can dmyal ba rnams na gshin rje'i rgyal por skye bar 'gyur ro // /

column3: 'dis ni gnas ngan len gyi gnas yongs su gyur pa bstan to // / +gzhan gyi  dbang gi ngo bo nyid yongs su gyur na rnam par mi rtog pa'i rjes la thob pa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul du 'gyur gyi / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#131502#131509#TD4035E.TXT.r_1122;TD4035E.TXT.r_1123# de'i 'og tu sems can dmyal ba'i  srung ma rnams ni sprul pa lta bur 'byung bar 'gyur ro // / +gnod pa dang gnod byed lcags zangs la sogs pa rnams dang  sems can dmyal ba'i me yang 'byung bar 'gyur ro // /
column5: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#131510#131520#TD4035E.TXT.r_1123;TD4035E.TXT.r_1124# gnod pa dang gnod byed lcags zangs la sogs pa rnams dang  sems can dmyal ba'i me yang 'byung bar 'gyur ro // /

column3: gzhan gyi ni ma yin no // / +de la dmigs / / +dbang zad mi shes mtshan nyid do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#131521#131532#TD4035E.TXT.r_1124;TD4035E.TXT.r_1125# de'i 'og tu las kyis ji ltar 'gro ba bzhin du sems can de dag dang  de las gzhan pa'i 'gro ba  dag tu skye bar 'gyur ro // / +de lta bu'i tshul gyis gling bzhi pa ther 'bum dang  ri rab ther 'bum dang 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i ris drug po ther 'bum dang  tshangs pa'i 'jig rten ther 'bum gyi stong gsum pa ni / /

column3: zhes bya ba 'di ni lam gyi gnas yongs su gyur pa bstan to // / +de zhes bya ba'i sgra ni bshad ma thag pa chos  kyi dbyings bzung ngo // /

column3: dbang zad mi shes mtshan nyid do // / +zhes bya ba ni rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes ni de bzhin nyid la dbang zad mi shes pa 'thob ste / /

column3: bzhed dgur mnyam par 'jog pa'i phyir ro // / +de'i rjes la thob pa'i ye shes ni phyin ci ma log pa'i don gyis / /
gzhan gyi dbang gi ngo bo nyid     // / +la dbang zad mi shes pa thob po // / +de bzhin nyid shes thams cad nas // /

column5: 0.019#TD4010E.TXT.r#2242847#2242848#TD4010E.TXT.r_1521# shar dang lho dang nub dang byang dang  steng dang  'og dang  phyogs mtshams rnams kyi phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na rnam par bzhugs  pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mthong bar 'gyur zhing de dag la chos kyang nyan to // /
column6: 0.023#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3115426#3115428#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_3426# grong tshig dang  grong tshig brgya dang  de stong dang  de 'bum dang  rgya mtsho la thug pa'i sa dang  de brgya dang  de stong dang  de 'bum dang  'dzam bu'i gling dang  de brgya dang  de stong dang  de 'bum dang  gling  bzhi dang  de brgya dang  de stong dang  de 'bum dang  stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams dang  de brgya dang  de stong dang  de 'bum dang  stong gnyis pa bar ma'i 'jig rten gyi khams dang  de brgya dang  de stong dang  de 'bum dang  stong gsum gyi stong chen  po'i 'jig rten gyi khams dang  de brgya dang  de stong dang  de 'bum dang  de bye ba dang  de bye ba phrag brgya dang  de bye ba phrag stong dang  de bye ba phrag 'bum dang  de grangs med pa dang  de grangs med pa phar brgya dang  de grangs med pa phrag stong dang  de grangs  med pa phrag 'bum dang  phyogs bcu dag gi 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med pa grangs med pa / /

column10: 0.028#TD4094.2E.TXT.r#1895528#1895528#TD4094.2E.TXT.r_1438# dge slong  dag khyed cag gis rigs kyi bu gnag tshogs can gyi lus la du ba 'thul zhing rab rib dang mun pa lta bur shar phyogs dang  lho dang  nub dang  byang phyogs su khyab cing 'phros pa dag mthong ngam / /

column6: 0.025#TD4086E.TXT.r#1280094#1280094#TD4086E.TXT.r_52# gzhan chags shing gzhan 'chags par gnas pa dang  de bzhin du lho dang  nub dang  byang phyogs su de snyed kyi stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams mtha' med cing mu med la 'jig pa'am / /

column3: de'i stobs kyis sems can thams  cad la phan pa bskyed pa dang  bde ba bskyed pa dang  gnyis mdzad pa gang yin pa de ni de'i 'bras bu yin no // /

column6: 0.0#TD4086E.TXT.r#1281243#1281246#TD4086E.TXT.r_227# nam mkha' lding rdzus te skye ba ni bza' ba'i phyir klu sgo nga las skye ba dang  mngal nas skye ba dang  drod gsher las skye ba dang  rdzus te skye ba 'byin par byed do // /

column3: rnam pa gcig tu na gzhan gyi sems ji ltar gnas brtan rab 'byor la sogs pa theg pa chen po 'chad pa de ltar  sprul par mdzad de / /

column5: 0.016#TD4036E.TXT.r#23060#23060#TD4036E.TXT.r_3517# shin tu khyad par du  'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir nyin mo dang  mtshan mo dang  skad cig dang  thang cig dang  yud tsam de dang de dag 'da' bar mi byed pa gang yin pa ste / /

column3: de lta bu la sogs pa gzhan yang blta bar bya'o // / +sprul pa'i sbyor ba'i thabs kyi phrin las can te zhes bya ba ni sprul pa'i sbyor ba'i thabs gang yin pa ste / /

column5: 1.192#TD4035E.TXT.r#132564#132566#TD4035E.TXT.r_1282# sa dang  dbang po dang  yul dang     chos dang  gang zag dang  ngo bo nyid dang  bye brag rnams dang  bya ba dang  bdag dang  gzhan dang  dngos po dang  dngos po med pa dang  dri ba dang  lan glan pa dang  sbyin pa dang  blang ba dang  yang dag pa nyid dang  log pa nyid rnams dang  gnang ba dang   bkag pa dang  yon tan dang  skyon dang  rnyed pa dang  ma rnyed pa dang  snyan pa dang  mi snyan pa dang  bde ba dang  sdug bsngal ba dang  smad pa dang  bstod pa dang  snying po dang  mchog dang  shes pa dang  zhum pa dang  sgyid lug pa dang  de tsam dang  grogs  la yang dag par bstan pa dang  yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa dang  yang dag par gzengs bstod pa dang  yang dag par rab tu dga' bar bya ba rnams dang  brjod pa'i tshig bdun la de dag kyang rnam par dbye ba bdun po rnams yin te / /
column6: 0.028#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2745995#2745995#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_6325;TD4038.1E.TXT.r_6326# gsod par byed pa dang  mi rnyed pa dang  rnyed pa la ji lta ba de bzhin du mi snyan pa dang  snyan pa dang  smad pa dang     // / +bstod pa dang  sdug bsngal ba dang  bde ba la yang ci rigs par blta bar bya ste / /

column3: thabs de mkhyen pa'i phyir de'i phrin las can zhes bya'o // / +chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa de nyid sku  gsum gyi bye brag gis tha dad du 'jug pa yin no // /

column3: de'i phyir yang longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ni chos kyi sku dang 'brel ba zhes bya'o // /

column3: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ni rang gi don phun sum tshogs pa'i mtshan nyid do zhes bya ba ni byang chub  sems dpa' sar chud pa rnams dang thabs cig tu theg pa chen po'i chos thun mong ma yin pa'i longs spyod rdzogs par sku nyams su bstar ba'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#131859#131870#TD4035E.TXT.r_1177;TD4035E.TXT.r_1178;TD4035E.TXT.r_1179;TD4035E.TXT.r_1180# 'khor dang  chu'i dkyil 'khor dang  sa'i dkyil 'khor ni gzhi dang po ste / /

column6: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#131944#131948#TD4035E.TXT.r_1192;TD4035E.TXT.r_1191;TD4035E.TXT.r_1193# de ni lus gnas par byed pa dang  rton par byed pa'i rgyu yin pas de'i phyir gzhi zhes bya'o // /

column3: phun sum tshogs pa de ni chos kyi sku la brten pa yin no // / +gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa de ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku la brten pa  yang yin la / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#131882#131892#TD4035E.TXT.r_1181;TD4035E.TXT.r_1182;TD4035E.TXT.r_1183# de ni 'dzag gnod byed rnams kyis gnod par mi 'gyur ba'i rgyu yin pas de'i phyir gzhi zhes bya'o // /

column3: sprul pa'i sku la brten pa yang yin te / / +de dag ni sku gsum yin no // / +sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku gsum po de dag ni go rims bzhin du rnam pa gsum gyis khyad par med de zhes bya ba la 'jig rten gyis ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi sku tha mi dad do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#131893#131903#TD4035E.TXT.r_1182;TD4035E.TXT.r_1183;TD4035E.TXT.r_1184;TD4035E.TXT.r_1185# khang khyim dang yang thog la sogs ba de dag kyang mdor bsdu na ched du byas pa dang  ched du byas pa ma yin pa dang  gzhal med khang dang  sprul pa rnams so // / +lo legs pa ni  gzhi gsum pa ste / /
column5: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#131904#131915#TD4035E.TXT.r_1184;TD4035E.TXT.r_1185;TD4035E.TXT.r_1186# de ni kham gyi zas kyi rgyu yin pas de'i phyir gzhi zhes bya'o // / +bde ba ni gzhi bzhi pa ste / /

column3: ji ltar tha mi     // / +dad ce na ; / +de'i phyir smras pa / / +chos kyi dbyings tha mi dad pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#131916#131923#TD4035E.TXT.r_1186;TD4035E.TXT.r_1187;TD4035E.TXT.r_1188# de ni sems can rnams mtshon cha la sogs pas ma rung bar mi 'gyur ba'i rgyu min pas de'i phyir gzhi zhes bya'o // /

column3: dgongs pas ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'o // / +sangs rgyas kyi dgongs pa tha dad pa med pa'i phyir te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#131924#131931#TD4035E.TXT.r_1187;TD4035E.TXT.r_1188;TD4035E.TXT.r_1189;TD4035E.TXT.r_1190;TD4035E.TXT.r_1191# nyi ma dang zla ba ni gzhi lnga pa ste / / +de ni gzugs rnams snang ba'i  rgyu yin pas de'i phyir gzhi zhes bya'o // /

column3: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ni 'ga' la yang dgongs pa mthon dman gyi bye brag tha dad pa mi mnga'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#131932#131942#TD4035E.TXT.r_1189;TD4035E.TXT.r_1190;TD4035E.TXT.r_1191;TD4035E.TXT.r_1192# zas ni gzhi drug pa ste / / +de dag kyang zas rnam pa bzhi ste / / +kham gyi zas dang  reg pa dang  yid la sems pa dang  rnam par shes pa'i zas te / /
column5: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#11113#11116#TD4036E.TXT.r_1569;TD4036E.TXT.r_1570# kham gyi zas dang  reg pa dang  yid la sems pa dang  rnam par shes pa'i zas so // /
column6: 0.010#TD4050E.TXT.r#1102352#1102353#TD4050E.TXT.r_761;TD4050E.TXT.r_762# khams kyi zas dang  reg pa dang  yid la sems pa dang  rnam par shes pa'i'o // / +de la kham gyi zas ni zhu bar gyur pa na ste / /
column7: 0.019#TD4039E.TXT.r#1863228#1863228#TD4039E.TXT.r_5565# de ltar na des kham gyi zas dang  reg pa dang yid     // /
column8: 0.020#TD4090.1E.TXT.r#1634606#1634607#TD4090.1E.TXT.r_6520;TD4090.1E.TXT.r_6521;TD4090.1E.TXT.r_6522;TD4090.1E.TXT.r_6523# byis pa dang  drod gsher las skye ba la sogs pa'i'o // / +reg pa ni gnyis pa'o // / +yid la sems pa ni gsum pa'o // /
column9: 0.024#TD4035E.TXT.r#176143#176143#TD4035E.TXT.r_9037;TD4035E.TXT.r_9038# zas bzhi ste / / +kham gyi zas dang  reg pa dang  yid la sems pa dang  rnam par shes pa'i zas so // /
column10: 0.028#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#879809#879809#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_18198;TD4093.1E.TXT.r_18199;TD4093.1E.TXT.r_18200# kham gyi zas ni rags pa dang phra ba'o // / +reg pa ni gnyis pa'o // / +yid la sems pa ni gsum pa'o // /
column11: 0.029#TD4050E.TXT.r#1118497#1118497#TD4050E.TXT.r_3050# de dag ni kham gyi zas por ba reg pa dang  yid la sems pa dang  rnam par shes pa'i zas gsum gyis de'i rten gnas par byed par 'gyur te / /
column12: 0.029#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2734058#2734058#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_4885# zas bzhi ni kham dang reg pa dang yid la sems pa dang rnam par shes pa'i zas so // /

column3: phrin las kyis ni sprul pa'i sku'o // / +phrin las thun mong pa'i phyir te / / +ji ltar sprul pa'i sku gcig gi sprul pas phrin las mdzad pa de bzhin du gzhan dag kyang mdzad pas gcig gis mdzad pa gang yin pa de thun mong yin pa'i phyir gzhan gyis kyang mdzad pa kho na yin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#131949#131969#TD4035E.TXT.r_1192;TD4035E.TXT.r_1193;TD4035E.TXT.r_1194# de ni lus gnas par byed pa dang  rton par byed pa'i rgyu yin pas de'i phyir gzhi zhes bya'o // / +yongs su gzung ba'i dngos po bdun gang zhe na / /
column5: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#209972#209976#TD4035E.TXT.r_14639;TD4035E.TXT.r_14640# legs par gsungs  pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba'i tshul khrims yang dag par blang ba 'di ni mdor bsdu na dngos po rnam pa gnyis yongs su btang bas rab tu phye ba ste / / +pha ma dang  bu dang  chung ma dang  bran dang  bran mo dang  las byed pa dang  zho shas 'tsho ba dang  mdza' bshes dang   blon po dang  nye du dang  rgan rabs dang  nor dang  'bru dang  dbyig la sogs pa 'dod pa rnams yongs su gtang bas rab tu phye ba dang  gar dang  glu dang  rol mo'i sgra dang  bgad pa dang  rtses pa dang  dga' dgur spyad pa dang  dgod pa dang  'phyas  'dogs pa dang  lus bsgyur ba dang  kun du rtses pa dang  kun du ca co bton pa dang  rtsed mo'i dga' ba rnam pa sna tshogs yongs su btang bas rab tu phye ba'o // /
column6: 1.788#TD4035E.TXT.r#213438#213448#TD4035E.TXT.r_15080;TD4035E.TXT.r_15081;TD4035E.TXT.r_15082# yongs su gzung ba'i phung po gang zhe na / / +yongs su gzung ba'i dngos po bdun te / / +bdag dang  pha ma dang  bu dang  chung ma dang  zan dang  bran mo dang  las byed pa dang  zho shas 'tsho ba dang  mdza' bshes dang  grogs po dang  blon po dang  nye du dang   snag gi gnyen mtshams nas rgyas par yongs su gzung ba'i dngos po bdun po 'di lta ste / /
column7: 0.010#TD4035E.TXT.r#131881#131882#TD4035E.TXT.r_1181# de ni 'dzag gnod byed rnams kyis gnod par mi 'gyur ba'i rgyu yin pas de'i phyir gzhi zhes bya'o // /
column8: 0.012#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2792660#2792663#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_12749;TD4038.1E.TXT.r_12750# phan 'dogs pa yang lnga ste / / +pha ma dang   bu dang  chung ma dang  bran dang  bran mo dang  las byed pa dang  zho shas 'tsho ba dang  mdza' bshes dang  gros grogs dang  nye du dang snag gi gnyen mtshams su'o // /
column9: 0.015#TD4037E.TXT.r#1353381#1353382#TD4037E.TXT.r_5012# bdag nyid 'ba' zhig mi byed par pha ma gnyis kyang byed du 'jug pa dang  bu dang chung ma dang  bran dang    bran mo dang  las byed pa dang  zho shas 'tsho ba rnams dang  mdza' bshes dang  gros grogs dang  nye du dang  snag gi gnyen mtshams rnams dang  gzhan rgyal po rnams dang  blon po chen po rnams dang  bram ze rnams dang  khyim bdag rnams dang  grong rdal pa rnams dang   yul gyi mi rnams dang  phyug po rnams dang  tshong dpon rnams dang  ded dpon rnams dang  tha na skyes pa dang  bud med dang  khye'u dang  bu mo rnams dang  bkren pa rnams dang  sdug bsngal ba rnams dang  rigs ngan yan chad kyang byed du 'jug pa dang  de bzhin du mkhan po  dang ; /
column10: 0.016#TD4036E.TXT.r#53589#53591#TD4036E.TXT.r_7999# pha ma dang  bu dang  chung ma dang  bran pho dang  bran mo dang  las mi dang  zho shas 'tsho ba dang  mdza' bshes dang  blon po dang  nye du dang  snag gi gnyen mtshams rnams kyi phyi rol gyi yongs  su bzung ba'i dngos po rnams dang  nang gi lus gzugs can rags pa 'byung ba chen po'i rgyu las byung ba 'bras chan dang  zan dron gyis nye bar gsos pa rtag tu bsku ba dang  bkru ba dang  mnye bas nye bar brten pa dang  'bral ba dang  'thor ba dang  'jig pa'i chos can 'di byung  ngo cog ni sdug bsngal sel ba tsam du 'gyur ba ma zad / /
column11: 0.017#TD4043E.TXT.r#366649#366650#TD4043E.TXT.r_1438;TD4043E.TXT.r_1439# bu dang chung ma dang bran dang bran mo dang las byed pa dang zho shas 'tsho ba rnams la yang ma yin / / +mdza' bshes dang nye du dang blon po dang  snag gi gnyen mtshams la yang ma yin / /
column12: 0.018#TD4069E.TXT.r#640772#640774#TD4069E.TXT.r_2554# chos dang ldan zhing chos kyis thob pa de dag gis bdag nyid dang  pha ma dang  bu dang  chung ma dang  bran pho dang  bran mo dang  las byed pa dang  zho shas 'tsho ba dang  grogs  po dang  blon po dang  nye du dang  snag gi gnyen mtshams dag legs par bde bar tshim par byed pa dang dus dus su dge spyong dang bram ze rnams la yon tshe phyi ma la 'gro ba gong mar 'gyur ba dang  bskal ba bzang por 'gyur ba dang  rnam par smin pa bde bar 'gyur ba dang  mtho ris 'grub  par byed pa 'bul bar byed do zhes bya ba 'di ni mdo sde'i dum bu gnyis pa yin no // /
column13: 0.021#TD4037E.TXT.r#1337283#1337285#TD4037E.TXT.r_2960# yang na gzhan dag las bslangs nas sbyin par bya ba'i dngos po bdag gi tshal za dang  pha ma dang  bu dang  chung ma dang  bran pho dang  bran mo dang  las byed pa dang  zho shas 'tsho ba dang  mdza' bshes dang   gros grogs dang  nye du dang  rgan rabs rnams sam / /
column14: 0.023#TD4083E.TXT.r#685816#685816#TD4083E.TXT.r_200# gnyen  bshes kyi sdug bsngal las brtsams nas ma dang pha dang  bu dang  chung ma dang  spun zla dang  sring mo dang  bran pho dang  bran mo dang  las byed pa dang  zho shas 'tsho ba dang  mdza' bshes dang  nye du dang  snag gi gnyen mtshams she ba dang  slob dpon dang mkhan  po dang  bla ma lta bu shin na yang mya ngan sel bar byed do // /

column3: sku gsum  gyi skabs kyi 'og tu ye shes kyi skabs te / / +'di'i 'brel pa gang yin zhe na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#131968#131979#TD4035E.TXT.r_1194;TD4035E.TXT.r_1195# bdag dang  pha ma dang  bu dang  chung ma dang  bran dang  bran mo dang  las byed pa dang  zho shas 'tsho ba dang  mdza' bshes dang  blon po dang  nye du dang  snag gi gnyen mtshams rnams dang  zhing gi dngos po dang  khyim  gyi dngos po dang  zong dgram pa'i dngos po dang  bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang  las kyi mtha' la sbyor ba'i dngos po rnams dang  nor sogs pa'i dngos po dang bdun no // /

column3: 'di ni byang chub kyi skabs yin no // / +sangs rgyas kyi sa ni chos lnga po chos kyi dbyings dang  me long lta bu'i ye shes la sogs pa bzhis bsdus so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#131980#131993#TD4035E.TXT.r_1194;TD4035E.TXT.r_1195;TD4035E.TXT.r_1196# bdag dang  pha ma dang  bu dang  chung ma dang  bran dang  bran mo dang  las byed pa dang  zho shas 'tsho ba dang  mdza' bshes dang  blon po dang  nye du dang  snag gi gnyen mtshams rnams dang  zhing gi dngos po dang  khyim  gyi dngos po dang  zong dgram pa'i dngos po dang  bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang  las kyi mtha' la sbyor ba'i dngos po rnams dang  nor sogs pa'i dngos po dang bdun no // / +yo byad bcu gang zhe na / /
column5: 0.018#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2365739#2365744#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_6454# zas dang skom dang bzhon pa dang gos dang rgyan dang bzhad gang dang glu bro dang rol mo'i sgra dang spos dang me tog phreng ba dang byug pa  dang snod spyod dang snang ba dang skyes pa dang bud med dga' mgur spyod pa rnams so zhes bstan pa dag yin no // /

column3: de la chos kyi dbyings rtogs pa'i skabs kyi chos  kyi dbyings ni / / +rang bzhin chos rdzogs longs spyod dang / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#131992#132002#TD4035E.TXT.r_1196;TD4035E.TXT.r_1197# zas dang  skom dang  bzhon pa dang  gos dang  rgyan dang  bzhad  gad dang  glu bro dang  rol mo'i sgra dang  spos dang  me tog phreng dang  byug pa dang  snod spyad dang  snang ba dang  skyes pa dang  bud med dga' dgur spyod pa rnams so // /

column3: sprul pa dag gis tha dad 'jug / / +ces dbye ba'i dbang du byas nas chos kyi dbyings la sku gsum gsal ba byas so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#132003#132013#TD4035E.TXT.r_1196;TD4035E.TXT.r_1197;TD4035E.TXT.r_1198;TD4035E.TXT.r_1199;TD4035E.TXT.r_1200# zas dang  skom dang  bzhon pa dang  gos dang  rgyan dang  bzhad  gad dang  glu bro dang  rol mo'i sgra dang  spos dang  me tog phreng dang  byug pa dang  snod spyad dang  snang ba dang  skyes pa dang  bud med dga' dgur spyod pa rnams so // / +rgyun mi 'chad par rjes su spyad pa brgyad gang zhe na / /

column3: da ni ye shes kyi dbang du byas nas sangs rgyas kyi ye shes me long lta bu la sogs pa bzhi bsam mo // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#132014#132022#TD4035E.TXT.r_1199;TD4035E.TXT.r_1200# 'di lta ste / / +pa char gyis dkri ba dang  lus kyi bsnyen bkur bya ba dang  spyod lam gzhan la yongs su brtag pa dang  kha zas bza' ba dang  gnyid log pa dang  'khrig pa dang ldan pa'i brtsal ba dang  de dang ldan pa'i gtam rnams  so // /

column3: me  long ye shes nga yi med // / +yongs su ma chad ces bya ba ni ngar 'dzin pa dang  nga yir 'dzin pa dang  gzung ba dang 'dzin pa med pa'i phyir nga yi ba med pa yin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#132023#132039#TD4035E.TXT.r_1200;TD4035E.TXT.r_1201;TD4035E.TXT.r_1202;TD4035E.TXT.r_1203# pa char gyis dkri ba dang  lus kyi bsnyen bkur bya ba dang  spyod lam gzhan la yongs su brtag pa dang  kha zas bza' ba dang  gnyid log pa dang  'khrig pa dang ldan pa'i brtsal ba dang  de dang ldan pa'i gtam rnams  so // / +'jig rten gyi spyod pa rnam pa gsum gang zhe na / /

column3: yul gyi sgo nas yongs su ma chad pa zhes bya ba ni 'di la shar la sogs pa'i yul tha dad par yongs su chad pa med pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#132038#132052#TD4035E.TXT.r_1203;TD4035E.TXT.r_1204;TD4035E.TXT.r_1205# smra ba dang  gtam byed pa dang  so sor mgu bar byed pa dang  bag ma gtong ba dang  bag ma len pa dang  'bod pa dang  gyar 'dren pa dang  lhag par za ba dang  'dus shing za ba rnams  dang  rtsod pa byung ba rnams la gcig gis gcig gi grogs bya ba rnams so // /

column3: rtag  tu sgrib pa dang bral ba'i phyir shes bya thams cad la ma rmongs pa yang yin zhes bya ba ni 'di la 'di ltar de ni dus thams cad du nyon mongs pa dang  shes bya'i sgrib pa dang bral bas so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#132053#132064#TD4035E.TXT.r_1204;TD4035E.TXT.r_1205;TD4035E.TXT.r_1206;TD4035E.TXT.r_1207# gtam rnam pa gsum gang zhe na / / +chos dang ldan pa dang  chos dang ldan pa ma yin pa dang  de las gzhan pa ste / /

column3: rnam pa med pa'i phyir chos de dag la mngon du phyogs pa yang ma yin no zhes bya ba de ni shes bya dag la  gzugs la sogs pa la dmigs pa bzhin du dmigs pa'i bye brag gam / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#132065#132079#TD4035E.TXT.r_1207;TD4035E.TXT.r_1208;TD4035E.TXT.r_1209;TD4035E.TXT.r_1210# 'phags pa yo byad  bsnyungs pa can dang ldan pa dang  sems kyi sgrib pa bsal bar 'gyur ba'i gtam bya ba gang yin pa ste / /

column3: sngon po la sogs pa'i rnam pa'i bye brag gis 'jug pa ma yin pa'o // / +de ni dmigs par bya ba dang  dmigs par byed pa mnyam pas mnyam pa rnam par mi rtog pa de bzhin nyid la dmigs pa'i ngo bo nyid de / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#132080#132093#TD4035E.TXT.r_1209;TD4035E.TXT.r_1210;TD4035E.TXT.r_1211# chos dang mi ldan pa gang zhe na / / +gang nyon mongs pa can gyi sems kyis kha zas la sogs pa'i gtam byed pa'o // /

column3: de nyid kyi phyir mi gyo ba yin no // / +mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes la sogs pa de dag gi rnam pa thams cad kyi rgyu yin pa'i phyir ye shes thams cad kyi 'byung gnas lta bu'o zhes bya ba ni 'dir de bzhin gshegs pa skye ba 'byung ba bstan pa'i mdo las / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#132094#132103#TD4035E.TXT.r_1211;TD4035E.TXT.r_1212;TD4035E.TXT.r_1213# lung dum bstan  pa'i sems kyis byas pa rnams ni de las gzhan pa'i gtam zhes bya'o //// /
column5: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#132104#132114#TD4035E.TXT.r_1213;TD4035E.TXT.r_1214;TD4035E.TXT.r_1215# nyes rtsom rnam pa nyi shu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na / /
column6: 0.020#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1714279#1714280#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_2179;TD4094.1E.TXT.r_2180# bram ze dbang po nyi shu rtsa gnyis so // / +nyi shu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na / /

column3: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rnam pa  thams cad mkhyen pa'i rten gyi ye shes dang ldan pa'i phyir ye shes kyi 'byung gnas chen po'o zhes 'byung ba'i mdo'i dum bu 'di dang sbyar bar bya'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#132115#132133#TD4035E.TXT.r_1215# gzhal blugs la sgyu byed pa dang  srang la sgyu byed pa dang  gzhal ba la sgyu byed pa dang  log pa'i  las la sbyor ba dang  'thab pa dang  mtshang 'bru ba dang  rtsod pa dang  'gyed pa dang  gshe ba dang  khro ba dang  dam 'cha' ba dang  bsdigs pa dang  rdeg pa dang  gsod pa dang  'ching ba dang  go rar 'jug pa dang  gcod pa dang  spyugs pa dang  gyo  byed pa dang  'drid pa dang  drag shul dang  brdzun zer ba rnams so // /

column3: de ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang yin la zhes bya ba ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rgyu yin pa'i phyir / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#527236#527237#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10143;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_10144# de dag kyang gang zhe na 'di lta ste / / +sems can dmyal ba pa rnams dang  lha rnams dang  dud 'gro dang  yi dags dang  mi rnams las kha cig go zhes 'byung ste / /
column5: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#131838#131839#TD4035E.TXT.r_1171;TD4035E.TXT.r_1172;TD4035E.TXT.r_1173# de dag gang zhe na / / +'di lta ste / / +sems can dmyal ba pa rnams dang  lha rnams dang  dud 'gro dang  yi dags dang  mi rnams las kha cig go // /
column6: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#132134#132143#TD4035E.TXT.r_1215;TD4035E.TXT.r_1216;TD4035E.TXT.r_1217;TD4035E.TXT.r_1218# gzhal blugs la sgyu byed pa dang  srang la sgyu byed pa dang  gzhal ba la sgyu byed pa dang  log pa'i  las la sbyor ba dang  'thab pa dang  mtshang 'bru ba dang  rtsod pa dang  'gyed pa dang  gshe ba dang  khro ba dang  dam 'cha' ba dang  bsdigs pa dang  rdeg pa dang  gsod pa dang  'ching ba dang  go rar 'jug pa dang  gcod pa dang  spyugs pa dang  gyo  byed pa dang  'drid pa dang  drag shul dang  brdzun zer ba rnams so // / +sems can gyi ris drug cu rtsa bzhi gang zhe na / /

column3: longs spyod  rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes bya'o // / +ye shes kyi gzugs brnyan 'byung ba'i phyir de zhes bya ba la / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#132142#132151#TD4035E.TXT.r_1216;TD4035E.TXT.r_1217;TD4035E.TXT.r_1218;TD4035E.TXT.r_1219# sems can gyi ris drug cu rtsa bzhi gang zhe na / / +'di lta ste / / +sems can dmyal ba pa rnams dang  dud 'gro rnams dang  yi dags rnams dang  lha rnams dang  mi rnams dang  rgyal rigs rnams dang      // /
column5: 0.026#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1770361#1770362#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_9035;TD4094.1E.TXT.r_9036# 'on te bram ze dang rgyal rigs dang rje'u rigs kyang yin // / +btsun pa bram ze dang rje'u rigs dang dmangs rigs dag kyang lus kyis nyes par spyad pa sbyang / /
column6: 0.027#TD4087E.TXT.r#1570726#1570726#TD4087E.TXT.r_1870# de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag PAR RDZOGS PA'I SANGS RGYAS KYIS rigs bzhi rgyal rigs dang  bram ze dang  rje'u rigs dang  dmangs rigs kyang de dang 'dra bar blta bar bya ste / /

column8: 0.028#TD4088E.TXT.r#2830102#2830102#TD4088E.TXT.r_1114;TD4088E.TXT.r_1115# dper na bram ze dag 'di skad du bram ze'i chung ma ni bzhi ste / / +bram ze mo dang  rgyal rigs mo dang  rje'u rigs mo dang  dmangs rigs mo'o // /
column9: 0.029#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1770418#1770418#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_9039;TD4094.1E.TXT.r_9040# 'on te rje'u rigs dang dmangs rigs kyang yin / / +btsun pa bram ze dang rje'u rigs dang dmangs rigs rnams kyang lus  kyis legs par spyad pa spyad cing / /
column10: 0.029#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1770502#1770502#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_9047;TD4094.1E.TXT.r_9048# 'on te rje'u rigs dang dmangs rigs rnams kyang yin / / +btsun pa bram ze dang rje'u rigs dang dmangs rigs rnams kyang brnab sems med pa dang  gnod sems dang  rmugs pa dang  gnyid dang  rgod pa dang  'gyod pa dang  the tshom med pa dang ldan no // /

column3: de zhes bya ba'i sgra ni me long lta bu'i ye shes dang sbyar bar bya'o // / +dus thams cad du byams pa chen po dang  thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa zhes bya ba mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes 'di la  dpe ni mdo las / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#132152#132159#TD4035E.TXT.r_1219# bram ze rnams dang  rje'u rigs rnams dang  dmangs rigs rnams dang  skyes pa rnams dang  bud med rnams dang  ma ning rnams dang  ngan pa rnams dang  'bring rnams dang  bzang po rnams dang  khyim pa rnams dang  rab tu byung ba rnams  dang  dka' thub drag bo can rnams dang  dka' thub drag po can ma yin pa rnams dang  sdom pa can rnams dang  sdom pa can yang ma yin / /

column3: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mthong na sems can thams cad dga' ba'i phyir / / +ye shes chen po'i zla ba yin no zhes 'byung ba yin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#132169#132182#TD4035E.TXT.r_1219;TD4035E.TXT.r_1220# bram ze rnams dang  rje'u rigs rnams dang  dmangs rigs rnams dang  skyes pa rnams dang  bud med rnams dang  ma ning rnams dang  ngan pa rnams dang  'bring rnams dang  bzang po rnams dang  khyim pa rnams dang  rab tu byung ba rnams  dang  dka' thub drag bo can rnams dang  dka' thub drag po can ma yin pa rnams dang  sdom pa can rnams dang  sdom pa can yang ma yin / / +sdom pa can ma yin pa yang ma yin pa rnams dang  'dod chags dang bral ba rnams dang  'dod chags dang bral ba ma yin pa  rnams dang  log pa nyid du nges pa'i phung po rnams dang  yang dag pa nyid du nges pa'i phung po rnams dang  ma nges pa nyid du nges pa'i phung po rnams dang  dge slong rnams dang  dge slong ma rnams dang  dge slob ma rnams dang  dge tshul rnams dang  dge tshul ma rnams dang   dge bsnyen rnams dang  dge bsnyen ma rnams dang  spong ba pa rnams dang  kha ton pa rnams dang  zhal ta byed pa rnams dang  gnas brtan rnams dang  bar ma rnams dang  gsar bu rnams dang  slob dpon rnams dang  mkhan po rnams dang  lhan cig  gnas pa rnams dang  nye gnas pa rnams dang  glo bur du lhags pa rnams dang  dge 'dun gyi las byed pa rnams dang  rnyed pa 'dod pa rnams dang  bkur sti 'dod pa rnams dang  yo byad bsnyungs pa rnams dang  mang du thos pa rnams dang  mkhas shing bsod nams  dang ldan pa rnams dang  chos kyi rjes su mthun pa'i chos la zhugs pa rnams dang  mdo sde 'dzin pa rnams dang  'dul ba 'dzin pa rnams dang  ma mo 'dzin pa rnams dang  so so'i skye bo rnams dang  bden pa mthong ba rnams dang  slob pa rnams dang  mi slob pa  rnams dang  nyan thos rnams dang  rang sangs rgyas rnams dang  byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang  de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang  'khor los sgyur ba rnams so // /
column5: 0.029#TD4091E.TXT.r#713065#713065#TD4091E.TXT.r_3412;TD4091E.TXT.r_3413# phung po gsum ni yang dag pa nyid du nges pa'i phung po dang  log     // / +ba nyid du nges pa'i phung po dang  ma nges pa'i phung po'o // /

column5: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#18603#18606#TD4036E.TXT.r_2707# gang las sangs rgyas rnams dang  sangs rgyas kyi nyan thos dge slong rnams dang   dge slong ma rnams dang  dge slob ma rnams dang  dge tshul rnams dang  dge tshul ma rnams dang  dge bsnyen rnams dang  dge bsnyen ma rnams kyi thun mong dang thun mong ma yin pa dang  de las gzhan pa khyad par du 'phags pa'i yon tan khyad par can ngo mtshar rmad du byung  bar grags pa dag bstan pa gang yin pa de ni rmad du byung ba'i chos kyi sde rnams zhes bya'o // /
column6: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#23202#23207#TD4036E.TXT.r_3541;TD4036E.TXT.r_3542# de la sde pa'i rab tu dbye ba ni gang zag rnam pa bdun rnam par gzhag ste / / +dge slong dang  dge slong ma dang  dge slob ma dang  dge tshul dang  dge tshul ma dang  dge bsnyen dang  dge bsnyen ma rnams so // /
column7: 0.0#TD4095E.TXT.r#80786#80790#TD4095E.TXT.r_3548;TD4095E.TXT.r_3549;TD4095E.TXT.r_3550# so sor thar ces bya rnam brgyad // / +dge slong  dang ; / +dge slong ma dang  dge slob ma dang  dge tshul dang  dge tshul ma dang  dge bsnyen dang  dge bsnyen ma dang  bsnyen gnas pa'i sdom pa ste / /

column9: 0.013#TD4037E.TXT.r#1338180#1338182#TD4037E.TXT.r_3078# de la byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa'i tshul khrims ni so sor thar pa'i sdom pa yang dag par blangs pa ris bdun po dge slong dang  dge slong ma dang  dge tshul dang  dge tshul ma dang  dge bsnyen dang  dge bsnyen ma'i tshul khrims gang yin pa ste / /

column8: 0.014#TD4039E.TXT.r#1816621#1816622#TD4039E.TXT.r_152# mi 'dod pa gang yin pa de mngon par 'grub pa ni rga ba dang  na ba dang  'chi ba dang   mi sdug pa dang phrad pa dang sdug pa dang bral ba dang  'dod pas phongs pa dang  mya ngan dang  smre sngags 'don pa dang  sdug bsngal ba dang  yid mi bde ba dang  'khrug pa rnams ni mi 'dod la de 'du byed de rnams mngon par 'grub pa la mngon par mos shing skye ba'i rtsa ba    can gyi 'du byed rnams la mngon par dga' bas skye ba'i rtsa ba can gyi las rnams byas shing bsags pas skye bar 'gyur te / /

column10: 0.0#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1805311#1805317#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_13205# 'dod chags ji lta ba bzhin du    zhe sdang dang  gti mug dang  khro ba dang  khon du 'dzin pa dang  'chab pa dang  'tshig pa dang  phrag dog dang  ser sna dang  sgyu dang gyo dang  ngo tsha med pa dang  khrel med pa dang  nga rgyal dang  lhag pa'i nga rgyal dang  nga rgyal las kyang nga rgyal dang  mngon pa'i nga rgyal dang   nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal dang  log pa'i nga rgyal dang  cung zad snyam pa'i nga rgyal dang  bag med pa dang  nges pa dang  yang dag par rtsom pa dang  tshul 'chos pa dang  kha gsag dang  gzhogs slong dang  rnyed pa 'dod pa dang  rnyed pa rnyed pas sgrub pa dang  sdig pa 'dod  pa dang  chen po 'dod pa dang  'dod pas gces sbras byed pa dang  tshig dan dang  sdig pa'i grogs po dang  mi bzod pa dang  'dod pa dang  yongs su 'dod pa dang  'dod chags dang  chos ma yin pa la chags pa dang  mi 'phrod pa'i ser sna dang  'jig tshogs la  lta ba dang  dngos por lta ba dang  dngos po med par lta ba dang  'dod pa la 'dun pa dang  gnod sems dang  rmugs pa dang  gnyid dang  rgod pa dang  'gyod pa dang  the tshom dang  rmya ba dang  mi dga' ba dang  glal byed pa dang  zas kyi tshod mi 'dzin pa dang  sems zhum pa dang   'du shes sna tshogs yid la byed pa dang  lus kyi gnas ngan len dang  yang yang 'dod pa dang  mang du smra ba dang  mi drang ba dang  khro ba dang  rang bzhin ma yin pa'i rjes su 'jug pa dang  'dod pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang  gnod sems kyi rnam par rtog pa dang  rnam par 'tshe  pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang  gnyen 'dun gyi rnam par rtog pa dang  ljongs kyi rnam par rtog pa dang  mi 'chi ba'i rnam par rtog pa dang  ngan sems kyi rnam par rtog pa dang  rigs snyems pa dang yang dag par ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang  mya ngan dang smre sngags 'don  pa dang sdug bsngal ba dang yid mi bde ba dang 'khrug pa'o zhes gsungs so // /
column11: 0.007#TD4090.1E.TXT.r#1667972#1667973#TD4090.1E.TXT.r_11745# nga rgyal dang  lhag pa'i nga rgyal dang  nga rgyal las kyang nga rgyal dang  nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal dang  mngon pa'i  nga rgyal dang  cung zad snyam pa'i nga rgyal dang  log pa'i nga rgyal lo // /

column5: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#132548#132555#TD4035E.TXT.r_1282# sa dang  dbang po dang  yul dang     chos dang  gang zag dang  ngo bo nyid dang  bye brag rnams dang  bya ba dang  bdag dang  gzhan dang  dngos po dang  dngos po med pa dang  dri ba dang  lan glan pa dang  sbyin pa dang  blang ba dang  yang dag pa nyid dang  log pa nyid rnams dang  gnang ba dang   bkag pa dang  yon tan dang  skyon dang  rnyed pa dang  ma rnyed pa dang  snyan pa dang  mi snyan pa dang  bde ba dang  sdug bsngal ba dang  smad pa dang  bstod pa dang  snying po dang  mchog dang  shes pa dang  zhum pa dang  sgyid lug pa dang  de tsam dang  grogs  la yang dag par bstan pa dang  yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa dang  yang dag par gzengs bstod pa dang  yang dag par rab tu dga' bar bya ba rnams dang  brjod pa'i tshig bdun la de dag kyang rnam par dbye ba bdun po rnams yin te / /

column3: bslab pa'i dmigs pa'i khyad par bshad zin to // / +da ni ji ltar  bslab pa yin pa de brjod par bya'o // /

column7: 0.010#TD4054E.TXT.r#1048741#1048743#TD4054E.TXT.r_9095# rmongs pa med PA RNAMS LA YANG DAG par rab tu ston pa dang  bag med pa la chags pa dang  bdag dman par 'dzin pas zhum pa rnams las  yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa dang  yang dag par gzengs bstod pa dang yang dag par zhugs PA RNAMS LA YANG DAG par rab tu dga' bar byed pa dang  rang bzhin gyis chos la dga' bas so // /
column8: 0.012#TD4042E.TXT.r#1677934#1677937#TD4042E.TXT.r_195# 'dun pa bzlog pa dang  yang dag par ston pa dang  yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa dang  yang dag par gzengs pa bstod pa dang  yang dag par rab  tu dga' bar byed pa'o // /
column9: 0.020#TD4044E.TXT.r#384071#384073#TD4044E.TXT.r_456# dang po sems  bskyed pa'i mtshan nyid dang  khyad par gyi mtshan nyid dang  rgyun mi 'chad par sems bskyed pa'i rkyen bzhi dang  rgyu bzhi dang  rgyu dang stobs gang dag gis sems bskyed pa bstan pas de'i mi mthun pa las ldog pa dang  dang po sems bskyed par bsten pa'i ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i  chos dang  de'i phan yon ni rang gi mtshan nyid dang  khyad par gyi mtshan nyid dang  skye ba'i rgyu dang rkyen dang stobs dang  de la rmongs pa rnams la bstan pa dang  ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos la sogs pas rigs ma nges pa dang  nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi rigs la  zhugs pa rnams rnam par bzlog nas gzhug pa'i don dang  ma nges pa'i rigs can rnams sangs rgyas nyid la rab tu dgod cing nges par bzung ba dang  byang chub sems dpa'i rigs can bag med pa dang  zhum pa dang yang dag par rab tu zhugs pa rnams la go rims ji lta ba  bzhin du yang dag par bzung ba dang  yang dag par gzengs bstod pa dang  yang dag par mgu bar bya ba'o // /
column10: 0.022#TD4053E.TXT.r#3001162#3001165#TD4053E.TXT.r_4837# rmongs PA RNAMS LA YANG DAG par ston pa dang   bag med pa la chags pa dang  bdag dman par 'dzin pas zhum PA RNAMS LA YANG DAG par 'dzin du 'jug pa dang  yang dag par gzengs bstod pa dang  yang dag bar zhugs PA RNAMS LA YANG DAG par rab tu dga' bar byed ba dang  rang bzhin gyis chos la dga' bas so // /
column11: 0.027#TD4037E.TXT.r#1350495#1350495#TD4037E.TXT.r_4659# yang dag par 'dzin du gzhug pa dang  yang dag par gzengs bstod pa dang  yang dag par dga' bar bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab gang yin pa'o // /
column12: 0.027#TD4037E.TXT.r#1326974#1326974#TD4037E.TXT.r_1549# dge ba yang dag par blang ba dang  mi dge ba spang ba las brtsams nas yang dag par ston pa dang  yang dag par len du 'jug pa dang  yang dag par gzengs bstod pa dang  yang dag par dga' bar byed pa  rnams kyi gang dag yin pa'o // /

column3: bsam pa'i sgo nas ji ltar slob ce na / / +dam pa'i chos la mos pa rgyu dang 'bras bu 'tsham zhing phyin ci ma log par rang dang gzhan gyi don la sogs pa gzhi lngas bsdus pa mthong ba des dang po kho nar chos zab cing rgya che ba la nges par brtag pa lhur blang ba bya dgos  pas de'i phyir byang chub kyi 'og tu mos pa'i skabs so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#132596#132611#TD4035E.TXT.r_1284# skyes pas  zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang  gdags pa dang  gdags su med pa dang  brda sprod pa dang  nges par sems pa dang  rnam par rig par byed pa dang  gnas pa dang  gzhag pa dang  'dus pa dang  bsags pa dang  nges pa dang  bsgo ba dang  ya mtshan dang   thog ma dang  bar ma dang  tha ma rnams dang  rigs kyi 'du shes pa dang  dam bca' ba dang  tha snyad dang  nan tan dang  longs spyad pa dang  btsal ba dang  kun nas bsrung ba dang  'dzem pa dang  snying brtse ba dang  bzod pa dang  'jigs pa dang  so sor rtog  ba rnams dang  pha dang ma dang  bu la sogs pa yongs su bzung ba dang  yo byad thams cad kyang brjod par bya'o // /
column5: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#132612#132622#TD4035E.TXT.r_1284# skyes pas  zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang  gdags pa dang  gdags su med pa dang  brda sprod pa dang  nges par sems pa dang  rnam par rig par byed pa dang  gnas pa dang  gzhag pa dang  'dus pa dang  bsags pa dang  nges pa dang  bsgo ba dang  ya mtshan dang   thog ma dang  bar ma dang  tha ma rnams dang  rigs kyi 'du shes pa dang  dam bca' ba dang  tha snyad dang  nan tan dang  longs spyad pa dang  btsal ba dang  kun nas bsrung ba dang  'dzem pa dang  snying brtse ba dang  bzod pa dang  'jigs pa dang  so sor rtog  ba rnams dang  pha dang ma dang  bu la sogs pa yongs su bzung ba dang  yo byad thams cad kyang brjod par bya'o // /

column3: yang na byang chub sems dpa' dag gis gang la bslab par bya ba rang dang gzhan gyi don nas bzung ste / / +byang chub kyi bar gzhi bdun po de ni bshad zin to // /

column5: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#135588#135591#TD4035E.TXT.r_1874# sdom pa dang  sdom ba ma yin par bsdus pa'i gzugs dang  ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod yul gyi gzugs dang   thob pa dang  'du shes med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang  'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang  'du shes med pa dang  srog gi dbang po dang  ris mthun pa dang  so so'i skye bo nyid dang  skye ba dang  rga ba dang  gnas pa dang  mi rtag pa nyid dang  ming gi tshogs rnams dang   tshig gi tshogs rnams dang  yi ge'i tshogs rnams dang  'jug pa dang  so sor nges pa dang  'byor 'brel dang  mgyogs pa dang  go rims dang  dus dang  yul dang  grangs dang  tshogs pa dang  tshogs pa ma yin pa dang  'dus ma byas kyi dngos po brgyad de / /

column7: 0.021#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2765224#2765225#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_9090# gzugs la sogs pa'i ming can gyi dngos po kho na la phung po la sogs pa nye bar 'dogs pa dang  gzugs dang dri dang ro dang reg pa dag la bza' ba dang btung ba dang  bzhon pa dang  gos dang  rgyan dang  khang khyim dang  dmag dang  nags tshal la sogs  pa nye bar 'dogs pa dang  'dus byas kyi ming can gyi dngos po la skye ba dang  rga ba dang  gnas pa dang  mi rtag pa dang  sa bon dang  rnam par rig byed dang  rnam par rig byed ma yin pa dang  thob pa dang  'thob pa ma yin pa dang  srog gi dbang po dang  ris mthun pa dang   ming gi tshogs dang  tshig gi tshogs dang  yi ge'i tshogs rnams dang so so'i skye bo nyid dang  tshogs pa dang ma tshogs pa dang  'jug pa dang so sor nges pa dang  sbyor ba dang  mgyogs pa dang  go rims dang  dus dang yul dang grangs nye bar 'dogs pa dang  gzugs kyi  'dug pa med pa tsam la gnas te ltos shing brten nas nam mkha' zhes nye bar 'dogs te nam mkha' 'dus ma byas zhes gdags pa dang  de'i mjug thogs su ming gi 'jug pa tsam la gnas te ltos shing brten nas / /
