column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#136305#136315#TD4035E.TXT.r_2002;TD4035E.TXT.r_2003# grang ba'i sems can dmyal  ba'i gnas brgyad yod pa 'di lta ste / / +chu bur can dang  chu bur rdol ba dang  so thams thams pa dang  kyi hud zer ba dang  aa cu zer ba dang  autpal ltar gas pa dang  pad ma ltar gas pa dang  pad ma ltar gas pa chen po'o // /
column5: 0.014#TD4091E.TXT.r#714133#714139#TD4091E.TXT.r_3594;TD4091E.TXT.r_3595# gzhan na grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba brgyad la 'di lta ste / / +chu bur can    dang  chu bur rdol ba dang  so thams thams dang  aa chu zer ba dang  kyi hud zer ba dang  autpal ltar gas pa dang  padma ltar gas pa chen po ste / /
column6: 0.022#TD4067E.TXT.r#1094029#1094031#TD4067E.TXT.r_1275# chu bur can dang  chu bur rdol ba dang  so thams thams pa dang  kyi hud zer ba dang  aa chu zer ba dang  autpala ltar gas pa dang  padma lta rags pa  dang ; /
column7: 0.024#TD4090.1E.TXT.r#1637622#1637622#TD4090.1E.TXT.r_7018# chu bur can dang  chu bur rdol pa dang  so thams thams dang  aa chu zer ba dang  kyi hud zer ba dang  autpala ltar gas pa dang  padma ltar gas pa dang  padma ltar cher gas pa'o // /

column3: yang dag pa ma yin pa kun rtog pa nyid du yod pa'i phyir ro // / +med pa yod pa nyid ma yin // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#136314#136323#TD4035E.TXT.r_2003;TD4035E.TXT.r_2004# chu bur can dang  chu bur rdol ba dang  so thams thams pa dang  kyi hud zer ba dang  aa cu zer ba dang  autpal ltar gas pa dang  pad ma ltar gas pa dang  pad ma ltar gas pa chen po'o // /

column3: zhes bya ba ni byis pa rnams kyis yang dag pa nyid du kun brtags pa'i glang po che la sogs pa med pa gang yin pa de ni don dam par dpyad na yod pa nyid ma yin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#136324#136335#TD4035E.TXT.r_2003;TD4035E.TXT.r_2004;TD4035E.TXT.r_2005# chu bur can dang  chu bur rdol ba dang  so thams thams pa dang  kyi hud zer ba dang  aa cu zer ba dang  autpal ltar gas pa dang  pad ma ltar gas pa dang  pad ma ltar gas pa chen po'o // / +yang sos ni 'di nas dpag tshad sum khri nyis stong gi 'og na  yod do // /

column3: 'o na ci zhe na med pa yin no // / +sgyu ma dag la sogs pa la // / +yod med khyad par med  pa'ang brjod // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#136334#136345#TD4035E.TXT.r_2005;TD4035E.TXT.r_2006# de'i 'og na dpag tshad bzhi stong bzhi stong gis bcal ba na ni de las gzhan pa rnams yod do // /

column3: ces bya ba ni de la de lta bu yod pa ste / / +glang po che lta bu yod pa gang yin pa de nyid glang po che la sogs pa med pa yin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#136343#136356#TD4035E.TXT.r_2005;TD4035E.TXT.r_2006;TD4035E.TXT.r_2007# de'i 'og na dpag tshad bzhi stong bzhi stong gis bcal BA NA NI DE LAS gzhan pa rnams yod do // / +sems can dmyal ba chen po yang sos kyi gnas ji lta ba bzhin du grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba'i gnas dang po yang de dang 'dra'o // /

column3: de la 'dra ba tsam dang 'khrul pa tsam yod kyi / / +yang dag pa nyid du glang po che yod pa ni ma yin pas gang gi tshe de ltar shes pa de'i tshe glang po cher  'dzin pa ldog ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#136355#136373#TD4035E.TXT.r_2006;TD4035E.TXT.r_2007;TD4035E.TXT.r_2008;TD4035E.TXT.r_2009# sems can dmyal ba chen po yang sos kyi gnas ji lta ba bzhin du grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba'i gnas dang po yang de dang 'dra'o // / +de'i 'og tu dpag tshad nyis stong nyis stong gis bcal    ba na ni de las gzhan pa rnams yod pa blta bar bya'o // /

column3: glang po che lta bu tsam du snang ba gang yin pa de nyid glang po che med pa yin no // / +de ltar na 'di mnyam pa nyid du 'gyur te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#136374#136384#TD4035E.TXT.r_2008;TD4035E.TXT.r_2009;TD4035E.TXT.r_2010;TD4035E.TXT.r_2011# yi dags kyi gnas gzhan dang  lha ma yin gyi gnas gzhan dang  dud 'gro ni lha dang mi dang lhan cig rgyu ba nyid yin pas / / +de'i phyir de dag gi gnas gzhan logs shig tu rnam par mi gzhag go // /

column3: dbus dang mtha' rnam par 'byed pa las ji skad du / / +de yi phyir na dmigs pa dang / / +mi dmigs mnyam par shes par bya // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#136385#136396#TD4035E.TXT.r_2010;TD4035E.TXT.r_2011;TD4035E.TXT.r_2012# gling bzhi dang  gling  phran brgyad ni snga ma bzhin no // / +'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha rnam pa drug la / /
column5: 0.0#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3093679#3093684#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_104# gzugs rgyu mtshan dang  sems rgyu mtshan dang  sems las byung ba rgyu  mtshan dang  sems dang ldan pa ma yin pa rgyu mtshan dang  'dus ma byas rgyu mtshan dang  'dus byas rgyu mtshan dang  phung po rgyu mtshan dang  skye mched rgyu mtshan dang  khams rgyu mtshan dang  rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rgyu mtshan dang  gnas dang gnas ma yin pa rgyu  mtshan dang  dbang po rgyu mtshan dang  bden pa rgyu mtshan dang  dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rgyu mtshan dang  yang dag pa'i spong ba dang  rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang  dbang po dang  stobs dang  byang chub kyi yan lag dang  lam gyi yan lag rgyu mtshan dang  lam rgyu    mtshan dang  chos kyi gzhi rgyu mtshan dang  zhi gnas rgyu mtshan dang  lhag mthong rgyu mtshan dang  rab tu 'dzin pa rgyu mtshan dang  btang snyoms rgyu mtshan dang  rkyen rgyu mtshan dang  ston pa rgyu mtshan dang  sa rgyu mtshan dang  chu rgyu mtshan dang  me rgyu mtshan dang  rlung  rgyu mtshan dang  nam mkha' rgyu mtshan dang  rnam par shes pa rgyu mtshan dang  'jig rten 'di rgyu mtshan dang  'jig rten pha rol rgyu mtshan dang  nyi ma rgyu mtshan dang  zla ba rgyu mtshan dang  sems can dmyal ba rgyu mtshan dang  dud 'gro dang  yi dvags dang  lha dang   mi rgyu mtshan dang  rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i rgyu mtshan dang  sum cu rtsa gsum dang  'thab bral dang  dga' ldan dang  'phrul dga' dang  gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rgyu mtshan dang  bsam gtan dang po rgyu mtshan dang  bsam gtan gnyis pa dang  gsum pa dang  bzhi pa rgyu mtshan dang  nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched rgyu mtshan dang  rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang  ci yang med pa'i skye mched dang  'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched rgyu mtshan dang  'byung ba rgyu mtshan dang  'jig pa rgyu  mtshan dang  dngos po rgyu mtshan dang  dngos po med pa rgyu mtshan dang  kun nas nyon mongs pa rgyu mtshan dang  rnam par byang ba rgyu mtshan dang  mthong ba dang  thos pa dang  bye brag phyed pa dang  rnam par shes pa dang  thos pa dang  yongs su btsal ba rgyu mtshan  dang ; /
column6: 0.0#TD4049E.TXT.r#2296267#2296276#TD4049E.TXT.r_1608# sems can dmyal ba rnams dang  dud 'gro rnams dang  yi dags rnams dang  mi rnams dang   shar gyi lus 'phags dang  nub kyi ba lang spyod dang  'dzam bu gling dang  byang gi sgra mi snyan dang  rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang  sum cu rtsa gsum dang  'thab bral dang  dga' ldan dang  'phrul dga' dang  gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang   tshangs ris dang  tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don dang  tshangs chen dang  'od chung dang  tshad med 'od dang  'od gsal dang  dge chung dang  tshad med dge dang  dge rgyas dang  sprin med dang  bsod nams skyes dang  'bras bu che dang  'du shes med pa'i sems can  dang ; /
column7: 0.0#TD4054E.TXT.r#1011392#1011396#TD4054E.TXT.r_3446# rnams dang  sum chu rtsa gsum dang  'thab bral dang  dga' ldan dang  'phrul dga' dang  gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang  tshangs ris dang  tshangs ba mdun na 'dong dang  tshangs chen dang  'od chung dang  tshad med 'od dang  'od gsal dang  dge chung dang  tshad  med dge dang  dge rgyas dang  sprin med dang  bsod nams skyes dang  'bras bu che dang  'du shes med pa'i sems can dang  mi che ba dang  mi gdung ba dang  gya nom snang ba dang  shin tu mthong ba dang  'og min dang  nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang  rnam shes mtha' yas skye  mched dang  ci yang med pa'i skye mched dang  'du shes med 'du shes med min rnams su'o // /
column8: 0.0#TD4054E.TXT.r#1011559#1011569#TD4054E.TXT.r_3452# zla ba stong dang  nyi ma stong dang  ri'i  rgyal po ri rab stong dang  shar gyi lus 'phags stong dang  lho'i 'dzam bu gling stong dang  nub kyi ba gang spyod stong dang  byang gi sgra mi snyan stong dang  rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha dang  sum cu rtsa gsum dang  'thab bral dang  dga' ldan dang  'phrul dga' dang  gzhan 'phrul dbang    byed kyi lha rnams kyi gnas gzhan stong dang  tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi gnas gzhan stong po 'di ni / /
column9: 0.0#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1801479#1801483#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_12747# ji srid du nyi mas mun pa 'phrog cing phyogs snang bar byed pa de srid du  stong gi 'jig rten zhes bya ste nyi ma stong dang zla ba stong dang ri'i rgyal po ri rab stong dang  shar gyi lus 'phags stong dang  nub kyi ba lang spyod stong dang  byang gi sgra mi snyan stong dang  lho'i 'dzam bu gling stong dang  rgyal po chen po bzhi'i ris kyi lha stong dang  sum cu rtsa gsum dang  'thab bral dang  dga' ldan dang  'phrul dga' dang  gzhan 'phrul dbang byed stong rnams dang  tshangs pa'i 'jig rten stong rnams te / /
column10: 0.0#TD4094.2E.TXT.r#1894086#1894094#TD4094.2E.TXT.r_1275# sa bla pa'i gnod sbyin rnams las bar snang la gnas pa'i gnod sbyin rnams dang  rgyal chen ris bzhi dang  sum cu  rtsa gsum dang  'thab bral dang  dga' ldan dang  'phrul dga' dang  gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyis thos nas skad cig dang thang cig dang yud tsam gyis tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du sgra grags par gyur to // /
column11: 0.0#TD4095E.TXT.r#73497#73499#TD4095E.TXT.r_2095# rgyal chen bzhi pa rnams dang  sum cu rtsa gsum  pa rnams dang  'thab bral ba rnams dang  dga' ldan pa rnams dang  'phrul dga' ba rnams dang  gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams te / /
column12: 0.0#TD4098E.TXT.r#1393499#1393508#TD4098E.TXT.r_564;TD4098E.TXT.r_565;TD4098E.TXT.r_566# 'dod pa la spyod pa'i lha drug ste / / +rgyal chen bzhi'i ris dang  sum cu rtsa gsum dang  'thab bral dang  dga' ldan  dang ; /
column13: 1.788#TD4086E.TXT.r#1282266#1282273#TD4086E.TXT.r_350# shing las byung ba'i gos gyon pa bzhin du rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams dang  sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang  'thab bral ba rnams dang  dga' ldan pa rnams dang  'phrul dga' ba rnams dang  gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyang de bzhin no // /
column14: 1.788#TD4086E.TXT.r#1283161#1283167#TD4086E.TXT.r_471# ji ltar 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams la mtshan mo dang  nyin mo yod pa bzhin du shar gyi lus 'phags pa rnams dang  nub kyi ba lang spyod pa rnams dang  byang gi sgra  mi snyan pa rnams dang  rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams dang  sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang  'thab bral ba rnams dang  dga' ldan pa rnams dang  'phrul dga' ba rnams dang  gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams la yang yod do // /
column15: 1.788#TD4086E.TXT.r#1283219#1283225#TD4086E.TXT.r_475# ji lta ba  'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams la pha dang ma yod pa bzhin du shar gyi lus 'phags pa rnams dang  nub kyi ba lang spyod pa rnams dang  byang gi sgra mi snyan pa rnams dang  rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams dang  sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang  'thab bral ba rnams dang  dga' ldan ba  rnams dang  'phrul dga' ba rnams dang  gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams la yang yod do // /
column16: 0.009#TD4067E.TXT.r#1094129#1094139#TD4067E.TXT.r_1290# 'dod pa'i khams su skyes pa'i lha drug la rgyal chen bzhi'i ris rnams dang  sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang  'thab bral rnams dang  dga' ldan rnams dang  'phrul dga' rnams dang  gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams te / /
column17: 0.010#TD4086E.TXT.r#1281772#1281778#TD4086E.TXT.r_288# ji ltar 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams la bkres pa dang  skom pa yod pa bzhin du shar gyi lus 'phags po rnams dang  nub kyi ba  lang spyod pa rnams dang  byang gi sgra mi snyan pa rnams dang  rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang  sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang  'thab bral ba rnams dang  dga' ldan pa rnams dang  'phrul dga' ba rnams dang  gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams la yang yod do // /

column19: 0.012#TD4037E.TXT.r#1326012#1326015#TD4037E.TXT.r_1428;TD4037E.TXT.r_1429# rgyal rigs kyi 'khor la ji lta ba bzhin du bram ze dang  khyim bdag dang  dge sbyong gi 'khor dang  rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams  dang ; /
column20: 0.012#TD4049E.TXT.r#2296432#2296435#TD4049E.TXT.r_1617# zla ba stong dang  nyi ma stong dang   ri'i rgyal po ri rab stong dang  shar gyi lus 'phags stong dang  'dzam bu gling stong dang  nub kyi ba lang spyod stong dang  byang gi sgra mi snyan stong dang  rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha dang  sum cu rtsa gsum dang  'thab bral dang  dga' ldan dang  'phrul  dga' dang  gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi kha rnams kyi gnas gzhan stong dang  tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi gnas gzhan stong po 'di ni stong spyi phud kyi 'jig rten gyi khams zhes bya'o // /

column12: 0.010#TD4086E.TXT.r#1282889#1282889#TD4086E.TXT.r_443# rgyal chen bzhi pa lha rnams kyi ji lta ba bzhin du sum  cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang  'thab bral ba rnams dang  dga' ldan pa rnams dang  'phrul dga' ba rnams dang  gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams dang  tshangs ris pa rnams dang  tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang  tshangs pa chen po pa rnams dang  'od chung ba rnams  dang  tshad med 'od ba rnams dang  'od gsal ba rnams dang  dge chung ba rnams dang  tshad med dge ba rnams dang  dge rgyas pa rnams dang  sprin med pa rnams dang  bsod nams skyes pa rnams dang  'bras bu che ba rnams dang  mi che ba rnams dang  mi gdung ba rnams  dang  gya nom snang ba rnams dang  shin tu mthong ba rnams dang  'og min pa rnams kyi yang de bzhin no // /
column13: 0.010#TD4086E.TXT.r#1283295#1283295#TD4086E.TXT.r_481# rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams ji lta ba bzhin du sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang  'thab bral ba rnams dang  dga' ldan pa rnams dang  'phrul dga' ba rnams dang  gzhan    'phrul dbang byed pa rnams la yang de bzhin no // /
column14: 0.010#TD4086E.TXT.r#1283365#1283365#TD4086E.TXT.r_488# rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams ji lta ba bzhin du sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang  'thab bral ba rnams dang  dga' ldan ba rnams dang  'phrul dga' ba rnams dang  gzhan 'phrul  dbang byed pa rnams la yang de bzhin no // /
column15: 0.010#TD4086E.TXT.r#1283786#1283786#TD4086E.TXT.r_536# rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams ji lta ba  bzhin du sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang  'thab bral ba rnams dang  dga' ldan pa rnams dang  'phrul dga' ba rnams dang  gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams kyi yang de bzhin no // /
column16: 0.010#TD4086E.TXT.r#1299655#1299655#TD4086E.TXT.r_2425# rgyal chen bzhi pa'i lha    rnams ji lta ba bzhin du sum cu rtsa gsum pa dang  'thab bral ba dang  dga' ldan pa dang  'phrul dga' ba dang  gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams kyang de dang 'dra'o // /
column17: 0.010#TD4086E.TXT.r#1315331#1315331#TD4086E.TXT.r_4402# kha cig ni sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang  'thab bral ba rnams dang  dga' ldan pa rnams dang  'phrul dga' ba rnams dang  gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa'i lha rnams dang skal pa mnyam par skye bar 'gyur ro // /
column18: 0.010#TD4090.1E.TXT.r#1623282#1623282#TD4090.1E.TXT.r_4777# rgyal chen bzhi po rnams dang  sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang  'thab bral ba rnams dang  dga' ldan pa rnams dang  'phrul dga' ba rnams dang  gzhan  'phrul dbang byed pa rnams te / /

column20: 0.010#TD4090.1E.TXT.r#1638737#1638738#TD4090.1E.TXT.r_7196# de dag kyang 'thab bral rnams dang  dga' ldan rnams dang  'phrul dga' rnams dang  gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams dang  sngar bshad pa tshangs ris la sogs pa  gnas gzhan bcu drug tu gtogs pa rnams te / /

column3: dper na gang gi tshe kho na nye bar len pa'i phung po lngar ma mthong ba de kho na'i tshe bdag yod par lta ba la / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#136403#136415#TD4035E.TXT.r_2012;TD4035E.TXT.r_2013;TD4035E.TXT.r_2014# rgyal chen bzhi'i ris dang  sum cu rtsa gsum dang  'thab bral dang  dga' ldan dang  'phrul dga' dang  gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams so // / +bdud kyi gnas ni gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi  nang du gtogs pa'i gnas gzhan khyad par can yin no // /
column5: 0.025#TD4035E.TXT.r#136426#136426#TD4035E.TXT.r_2014# nyi tshe ba'i sems can dmyal ba rnams dang  nye 'khor gyi sems can dmyal ba rnams ni sems can dmyal ba chen po dang  grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba'i nye 'khor nyid de / /

column3: gang gi tshe kho na bdag med par mthong ba de'i tshe kho na phung po tsam du lta ba dang  'dra'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#136414#136426#TD4035E.TXT.r_2013;TD4035E.TXT.r_2014# bdud kyi gnas ni gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi  nang du gtogs pa'i gnas gzhan khyad par can yin no // / +nyi tshe ba'i sems can dmyal ba rnams dang  nye 'khor gyi sems can dmyal ba rnams ni sems can dmyal ba chen po dang  grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba'i nye 'khor nyid de / /
column5: 0.0#TD4037E.TXT.r#1340215#1340218#TD4037E.TXT.r_3322# yang byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis sems can rnams skrag par byed 'dod pa dang  'dun par byed 'dod pa ni  sems can nyes par spyad par spyod pa rnams la nyes par spyad par spyod pa'i rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu ngan song sems can dmyal ba rnams dang  sems can dmyal ba chen po rnams dang  grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba rnams dang  nyi tshe ba'i sems can dmyal ba rnams bsnyen  cing ston par byed de / /
column6: 1.192#TD4035E.TXT.r#136712#136718#TD4035E.TXT.r_2064# sems  can dmyal ba chen po dag gi ji lta ba bzhin du grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba rnams dang  nyi tshe ba'i sems can dmyal ba rnams dang  nye 'khor gyi sems can dmyal ba rnams dang  dud 'gro dang yi dags rnams kyang de dang 'dra'o // /
column7: 0.011#TD4039E.TXT.r#1841106#1841111#TD4039E.TXT.r_3176;TD4039E.TXT.r_3177# sems can dmyal ba'i gnas tha dad pa ni bzhi ste / / +sems can dmyal ba chen po rnams dang  nyi tshe ba'i sems can dmyal ba rnams dang  grang ba'i sems    can dmyal ba rnams dang  sems can dmyal ba'i 'khor rnams so // /
column8: 0.014#TD4083E.TXT.r#686603#686606#TD4083E.TXT.r_300# sems can nyes par spyad pa spyod par 'dod pa rnams la nyes par spyod pa'i rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu sems can dmyal ba rnams dang  sems can dmyal ba chen po rnams dang  grang ba'i dmyal ba dang  nyi tshe ba'i dmyal ba la sogs pa ngan song gi  'gro ba de dag bsten cing bsnyen la ston par byed cing mir gyur pa dag gis nyes par spyod pa byas shing bsags pa mi sdug pa'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa mi bzad cing mchog tu tsha ba so sor nyams su myong ba 'di lta bu 'di la khyod ltos shig ces bsgo nas / /
column9: 0.017#TD4049E.TXT.r#2296388#2296389#TD4049E.TXT.r_1616# gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang  gzugs na spyod pa rnams dang  lha ma yin gyi gnas gzhan dag dang  sems can dmyal ba pa rnams kyi gnas gzhan dag dang  tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba rnams dang  grang ba'i sems can  dmyal ba rnams dang  nyi tshe ba'i sems can dmyal ba rnams dang  dud 'gro dang  yi dags de dag kha cig gi gnas gzhan rnams dang  nyi ma rnam par snang byed kun tu rgyu zhing phyogs snang bar byed pa ji snyed pa de snyed ni stong gi 'jig rten na / /
column10: 0.017#TD4054E.TXT.r#1011511#1011512#TD4054E.TXT.r_3451# sa'i dkyil 'khor la ri rab dang   gser gyi ri bdun dang  gling bzhi dang  bar gyi gling brgyad dang  nang gi rgya mtsho dang  phyi'i rgya mtsho bzhi dang  ri rab kyi bang rim bzhin dang  rgyal chen bzhi'i ris dang  sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i gnas gzhan rnams dang  khor yug gi ri dang  nam mkha' la gzhal med khang dang   'thab bral dang  dga' ldan dang  'phrul dga' dang  gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang  gzugs na spyod pa rnams dang  lha ma yin rnams kyi gnas gzhan dag dang  sems can dmyal ba rnams kyi gnas gzhan dag dang  tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba rnams dang  grang ba'i  sems can dmyal ba rnams dang  nyi tshe ba'i sems can dmyal ba rnams dang  dud 'gro dang  yi dgas de dag kha cig gi gnas gzhan rnams dang  nyi ma rnam par snang byed kun du rgyu zhing phyogs snang bar byed pa ji snyed pa de snyed kyi stong gi 'jig rten na / /
column11: 0.018#TD4086E.TXT.r#1284424#1284425#TD4086E.TXT.r_631;TD4086E.TXT.r_632# zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig ste / / +sems can dmyal ba chen po tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba  pa'i sems can rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyi mtha' ni lo de lta bur brtsis pa'i sems can dmyal ba pa'i lo khri drug stong ste / /
column12: 0.020#TD4035E.TXT.r#130615#130615#TD4035E.TXT.r_985# sems can dmyal ba brgyad dang  nyi tshe'i sems can dmyal ba rnams dang  grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba rnams dang  nyen kor gyi sems can dmyal ba    rnams dang  dud 'gro dang  yi dags kha cig gnas so // /
column13: 0.025#TD4065E.TXT.r#430205#430205#TD4065E.TXT.r_460# sems can dmyal ba dag na yang sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can rnams kyi mig la sogs pa'i rnam par shes pa'i rgyu 'byung ba'i khyad par dag logs shig na yod par rtogs te / /

column3: de ltas gzugs la sogs pa la // / +yod dang med pa nyid du brjod // / +ces bya ba ni yang dag pa ma yin pa'i kun tu rtog pa'i ngo bo nyid la kun rdzob tu gzugs la sogs pa yod pa nyid du brjod par bya ste / /

column6: 0.025#TD4035E.TXT.r#136414#136414#TD4035E.TXT.r_2013;TD4035E.TXT.r_2014# bdud kyi gnas ni gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi  nang du gtogs pa'i gnas gzhan khyad par can yin no // / +nyi tshe ba'i sems can dmyal ba rnams dang  nye 'khor gyi sems can dmyal ba rnams ni sems can dmyal ba chen po dang  grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba'i nye 'khor nyid de / /

column3: dbus dang mtha' rnam par 'byed pa las ji skad du / / +yang dag  ma yin kun rtog yod // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#136444#136453#TD4035E.TXT.r_2017;TD4035E.TXT.r_2018# gnas brtan moong gal gyi BUS JI SKAD DU / /
column5: 0.0#TD4061E.TXT.r#1529354#1529357#TD4061E.TXT.r_2307# bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyang ring po nas shing gi sdong po chen po zhig 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la kun tu rab tu mched cing me lce gcig tu gyur te lam mer 'bar ba gzigs so zhes bya ba ni mdo sde'i dum bu'o // /
column6: 1.192#TD4043E.TXT.r#373064#373073#TD4043E.TXT.r_2321# gnas brtan mood gal gyi bus ji skad ngas sems can  'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la kun tu rab tu mched cing 'bar te me lce gcig tu gyur pa mthong ngo zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa lta bu'o zhes bya ba ni rgyal po'i khab kyi nam mkha' la mthong ba'i phyir ro zhes khungs bstan pa'o // /
column7: 0.016#TD4035E.TXT.r#137445#137446#TD4035E.TXT.r_2173;TD4035E.TXT.r_2174# des de dag kun tu 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la / / +kun tu rab tu mched nas bsreg par 'gyur ro // /
column8: 0.017#TD4035E.TXT.r#137711#137712#TD4035E.TXT.r_2211;TD4035E.TXT.r_2212# yang lcags zangs chen po 'gyur byed bskol bas gang ba kun tu 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la / / +kun tu rab tu mched cing 'bar ba'i nang du sems can de dag spyi'u  tshugs su 'jug go // /
column9: 0.017#TD4035E.TXT.r#137807#137809#TD4035E.TXT.r_2225;TD4035E.TXT.r_2226# sems can de  dag la shar phyogs na sa gzhi dpag tshad brgya phrag du ma yod pa kun tu 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la / / +kun tu rab tu mched cing 'bar ba las / /

column11: 0.017#TD4035E.TXT.r#137931#137932#TD4035E.TXT.r_2250;TD4035E.TXT.r_2251# lcags kyi thu lum kun tu 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la / / +kun tu rab tu mched cing 'bar ba bcug ste / /

column3: de la gnyis po yod pa ma yin // / +zhes bshad pa lta bu ste / / +de la ni gnyis po gzung ba dang 'dzin pa kun rdzob tu yod kyi / /

column5: 0.0#TD4043E.TXT.r#373071#373082#TD4043E.TXT.r_2321# gnas brtan mood gal gyi bus ji skad ngas sems can  'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la kun tu rab tu mched cing 'bar te me lce gcig tu gyur pa mthong ngo zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa lta bu'o zhes bya ba ni rgyal po'i khab kyi nam mkha' la mthong ba'i phyir ro zhes khungs bstan pa'o // /
column6: 1.192#TD4060E.TXT.r#683461#683463#TD4060E.TXT.r_397;TD4060E.TXT.r_398# de la bag med par yang ma byed cig ces bya ba dang  bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyang ring po nas shing gi phung po chen po zhig 'bar rab tu 'bar / / +kun tu rab tu mched cing me lce gcig tu gyur te / /

column13: 0.021#TD4086E.TXT.r#1313061#1313061#TD4086E.TXT.r_4127# lcags kyi sa gzhi la dong 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la kun tu rab tu 'bar te 'bar  ba gcig tu gyur pa'i nang du rab tu bsregs nas lcags kyi skam pas phyir phyung ste / /
column14: 0.021#TD4086E.TXT.r#1311207#1311207#TD4086E.TXT.r_3890# sdig pa mi dge ba'i las de'i rnam par smin pas  sems can dmyal ba'i srung ma dag gis sems can de dag lcags kyi sa gzhi 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la kun tu rab tu 'bar te / /
column15: 0.021#TD4086E.TXT.r#1311308#1311308#TD4086E.TXT.r_3899# gzhan yang sems can dmyal ba chen po thig nag tu sems can gang skyes pa dang  kun tu skyes pa dang  'thon par 'gyur ba'i bar dag gi sdig pa mi dge ba'i las de'i rnam bar smin  pas sems can dmyal ba'i srung ma dag gis sems can de dag lcags kyi rgyud 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la kun tu rab tu 'bar te 'bar ba gcig tu gyur pas mgo bo dkri bar byed do // /
column16: 0.021#TD4086E.TXT.r#1312488#1312488#TD4086E.TXT.r_4027# de nas sems can de dag 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la kun tu rab tu 'bar te 'bar ba gcig tu gyur nas ji ste shar phyogs su 'gro na yang me 'ba' zhig mthong ngo // /
column17: 0.021#TD4086E.TXT.r#1312730#1312730#TD4086E.TXT.r_4070# sems can de dag der 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar  la kun tu rab tu 'bar te / /
column18: 0.021#TD4086E.TXT.r#1313211#1313211#TD4086E.TXT.r_4138# de dag sems can dmyal ba'i srung ma rnams kyis bzung nas lcags kyi mdung rtse gsum ba'i stan 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la kun tu rab tu 'bar te / /
column19: 0.021#TD4086E.TXT.r#1313955#1313955#TD4086E.TXT.r_4252# de dag sems can dmyal ba'i srung ma dag gis bzung nas lcags kyi sa gzhi 'bar zhing  rab tu 'bar la kun tu rab tu 'bar te / /
column20: 0.021#TD4086E.TXT.r#1314029#1314029#TD4086E.TXT.r_4257# gzhan yang sems can  dmyal ba chen po mnar med par sems can gang skyes pa dang  kun tu skyes pa de dag sems can dmyal ba'i srung ma dag gis bzung nas lcags kyi sa gzhi 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la kun tu rab tu 'bar te 'bar ba gcig tu gyur pa la spyi'u tshugs su bzhag nas glo gnyis  nas pags pa bshus te / /
column21: 0.021#TD4086E.TXT.r#1314156#1314156#TD4086E.TXT.r_4264# gzhan yang sems  can dmyal ba chen po mnar med par sems can gang dag skyes pa nas 'thon par gyur pa'i bar de dag sems can dmyal ba'i srung ma dag gis bzung nas lcags kyi sa gzhi 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la kun tu rab tu 'bar te 'bar ba gcig tu gyur pa la bzhag nas / /
column22: 0.021#TD4086E.TXT.r#1314214#1314214#TD4086E.TXT.r_4268# de dag sems can dmyal ba'i srung ma dag gis bzung nas lcags kyi ri 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la kun tu rab tu 'bar te 'bar ba gcig tu gyur pa la 'dzeg tu 'jug cing phyir yang 'bab tu 'jug ste / /
column23: 0.021#TD4086E.TXT.r#1315107#1315107#TD4086E.TXT.r_4374# gzhan yang sems can dmyal ba chen po'i srung ma de dag gis sems can de dag mchil pas nya dbyung ba bzhin du phyung nas lcags kyi sa gzhi 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la kun tu rab tu 'bar te 'bar ba gcig tu gyur pa la gan rkyal du bzhag nas / /
column24: 0.021#TD4086E.TXT.r#1315144#1315144#TD4086E.TXT.r_4380# 'on kyang bdag cag skom mo zhes nas de dag sems can dmyal ba'i srung ma dag gis lcags kyi spyad kyis kha phye nas  zangs bskol ba 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la kun tu rab tu 'bar te 'bar ba gcig tu gyur pa khar ldugs te / /
column25: 0.024#TD4086E.TXT.r#1300316#1300317#TD4086E.TXT.r_2478;TD4086E.TXT.r_2480# me'i phung po chen po rab tu 'bar ba de bzhin du nyi ma bdun pa 'jig rten du byung bas sa chen po 'di dag ri'i rgyal po ri rab 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar     // / +kun tu rab tu 'bar nas me lce gcig tu gyur cing sreg go // /

column3: don dam par ni ma yin no // / +gang gi tshe rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes mi mthun pa'i phyogs bsal zhing spros pa thams cad dang bral  bas byis pas kun brtags pa'i gzugs la sogs pa chos su gzung ba med pa mthong ba de'i tshe med do zhes bya'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#136472#136488#TD4035E.TXT.r_2020;TD4035E.TXT.r_2021;TD4035E.TXT.r_2022;TD4035E.TXT.r_2023# gnas  gzhan sum cu rtsa drug po 'di dag ni 'di ni 'dod pa'i khams zhes bya'o // /

column3: med pa ni yod pa nyid ma yin te / / +gnyis kyi dngos po med pa nyid gang yin pa'o zhes bya ba ni gnyis kyi dngos po med pa gang yin pa de ni don dam par yod pa nyid ma yin     // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#136482#136497#TD4035E.TXT.r_2021;TD4035E.TXT.r_2022;TD4035E.TXT.r_2023;TD4035E.TXT.r_2024;TD4035E.TXT.r_2025# gzugs kyi khams ni gnas gzhan bco brgyad de / / +bsam gtan dang po chung ngu dang  'bring dang chen po yongs su bsgoms pas tshangs ris rnams dang  tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don rnams dang  tshangs pa  chen po rnams so // /

column3: 'o na ci zhe na / / +med pa ma yin no // / +gnyis po snang bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa de nyid gnyis kyi dngos por med pa yin pas so zhes bya ba la / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#136492#136506#TD4035E.TXT.r_2023;TD4035E.TXT.r_2024;TD4035E.TXT.r_2025;TD4035E.TXT.r_2026;TD4035E.TXT.r_2027# bsam gtan gnyis pa chung ngu dang  'bring dang  chen por yongs su bsgoms pas / / +'od chung rnams dang  tshad med 'od rnams dang  'od gsal rnams so // /
column5: 0.019#TD4036E.TXT.r#57167#57168#TD4036E.TXT.r_8512;TD4036E.TXT.r_8513# bsam gtan gsum pa chung ngu dang  'bring dang  chen por bsgoms na / /

column3: gnyis po snang ba ni yang dag pa ma yin pa'i kun tu rtog pa'i ngo bo nyid ma yin no // / +gang gi tshe yang dag pa  ma yin pa'i kun tu rtog pa ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#136507#136516#TD4035E.TXT.r_2026;TD4035E.TXT.r_2027;TD4035E.TXT.r_2028;TD4035E.TXT.r_2029# dge chung  rnams dang  tshad med dge rnams dang  dge rgyas rnams so // / +bsam gtan bzhi pa chung ngu dang  'bring dang  chen por yongs su bsgoms pas / /

column3: mig dang gzugs la sogs pa gnyis dang bral zhing sems dang sems las byung ba'i ngo bo nyid du shes pa de'i tshe 'di gnyis su 'dzin pa ldog cing / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#136517#136531#TD4035E.TXT.r_2028;TD4035E.TXT.r_2029;TD4035E.TXT.r_2030;TD4035E.TXT.r_2031;TD4035E.TXT.r_2032;TD4035E.TXT.r_2033# sprin med pa rnams dang  bsod nams skyes rnams dang  'bras bu che ba rnams so // / +'du shes med pa ni 'bras bu che ba'i nang     // /

column3: 'di la sems dang sems las byung bar snang ba nyid du 'gyur te / / +de ltar na gnyis po snang ba gang  yin pa de nyid gnyis kyis dngos po med pa yin pas yod pa dang med pa dag mnyam pa nyid du 'gyur ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#136532#136549#TD4035E.TXT.r_2032;TD4035E.TXT.r_2033;TD4035E.TXT.r_2034# bsam gtan bzhi pa spel mar bsgoms pas / / +chung ngu dang  'bring dang  chen po dang  ches che ba dang  mchog tu che bar yongs su bsgoms  pas / /
column5: 0.009#TD4067E.TXT.r#1094185#1094188#TD4067E.TXT.r_1296;TD4067E.TXT.r_1298;TD4067E.TXT.r_1297# sprin med dang bsod nams skyes dang  'bras bu che dang  gnas de rnams ni so so'i skye bo'i gnas so // / +gtsang ma lnga po mi che ba dang  mi gdung ba dang  gya nom snang ba dang  shin tu mthong dang  'og min zhes bya ba rnams ni bsam gtan bzhi pa ste / /
column6: 0.010#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#1481389#1481391#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_9488;TD4092.1E.TXT.r_9489# chen po de nyid zag pa med pa'i bsam gtan dang spel ba'i sgo nas chung ngu dang 'bring dang chen po dang   shin tu chen po dang  ches shin tu chen po tha dad pa'i bye brag gi gnas gzhan lnga ste / / +mi che ba rnams dang  mi gdung ba rnams dang  gya nom snang ba rnams dang  shin tu mthong rnams dang  'og min rnams so // /
column7: 0.012#TD4068E.TXT.r#590656#590658#TD4068E.TXT.r_2445;TD4068E.TXT.r_2447;TD4068E.TXT.r_2446# bsam gtan bzhi pa la gnas brgyad yod pa la sprin med dang  bsod nams 'phel dang  'bras bu che gsum ni / / +mi che ba dang  mi gdung ba dang  gya nom snang ba dang  shin tu mthong dang  'og min dang lnga ni 'phags pa'i sa  yin pa las bsam gtan bzhi pa so so'i skye bo'i gnas gsum pa'i mtha' ma 'bras bu che gnam zhes bya ba lha rnams gnas pa'i phyogs gcig na 'du shes med pa'i lha rnams gnas te / /
column8: 0.021#TD4037E.TXT.r#1326045#1326046#TD4037E.TXT.r_1429# sum cu rtsa gsum dang  'thab bral dang  dga' ldan dang  'phul dga' dang  gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang  de bzhin du tshangs ris dang  tshangs pa mdun na 'don dang  tshangs chen dang  'od chung dang  tshad med 'od dang  'od gsal dang  dge chung dang   tshad med dge dang  dge rgyas dang  sprin med dang  bsod nams skyes dang  'bras bu che ba dang  mi che ba dang  mi gdung ba dang  shin tu mthong dang  gya nom snang ba dang  'og min du yang de bzhin no // /
column9: 0.022#TD4090.1E.TXT.r#1623405#1623405#TD4090.1E.TXT.r_4800# bzhi pa ni sprin med rnams dang  bsod nams skyes rnams dang  'bras bu che ba rnams dang  mi che ba rnams dang  mi gdung ba rnams dang  gya nom snang ba rnams dang  shin tu mthong ba rnams dang  'og min rnams te / /
column10: 0.024#TD4086E.TXT.r#1282104#1282104#TD4086E.TXT.r_337# tshangs ris  kyi lha rnams ji lta ba bzhin du tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang  tshangs pa chen po pa rnams dang  'od chung ba rnams dang  tshad med 'od pa rnams dang  'od gsal ba rnams dang  dge chung ba rnams dang  tshad med dge ba rnams dang  dge rgyas pa rnams dang  sprin med pa rnams  dang  bsod nams skyes pa rnams dang  'bras bu che ba rnams dang  mi che ba rnams dang  mi gdung ba rnams dang  gya nom snang ba rnams dang  shin tu mthong ba rnams dang  'og min gyi lha rnams kyang de bzhin no // /
column11: 0.024#TD4086E.TXT.r#1282307#1282307#TD4086E.TXT.r_352# tshangs ris kyi lha rnams ji lta ba bzhin du tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang  tshangs pa chen po pa rnams dang  'od chung ba rnams dang  tshad med 'od pa rnams dang  'od gsal ba rnams dang  dge chung ba rnams dang  chad  med dge rnams dang  dge rgyas pa rnams dang  sprin med pa rnams dang  bsod nams skyes pa rnams dang  'bras bu che ba rnams dang  mi che ba rnams dang  mi gdung ba rnams dang  gya nom snang ba rnams dang  shin tu mthong ba rnams dang  'og min gyi lha rnams kyang de  gos gyon bzhin du skye'o // /
column12: 0.024#TD4086E.TXT.r#1282535#1282535#TD4086E.TXT.r_381# tshangs ris pa rnams kyi ji lta ba bzhin du tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang  tshangs pa chen po pa rnams dang  'od chung ba rnams dang  tshad med 'od pa rnams dang  'od gsal ba rnams dang  dge chung ba rnams dang  tshad med dge ba rnams dang  dge rgyas  pa rnams dang  sprin med pa rnams dang  bsod nams skyes pa rnams dang  'bras bu che ba rnams dang  mi che ba rnams dang  mi gdung ba rnams dang  gya nom snang ba rnams dang  shin tu mthong ba rnams dang  'og min gyi lha rnams kyi yang gzhal du med pa'i gos yin no // /
column13: 0.024#TD4086E.TXT.r#1282974#1282974#TD4086E.TXT.r_449# tshangs ris pa rnams ji lta ba bzhin du tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang  tshangs pa chen po rnams dang  'od chung ba rnams dang  tshad med 'od pa rnams dang  'od gsal ba  rnams dang  dge chung ba rnams dang  tshad med dge ba rnams dang  dge rgyas pa rnams dang  sprin med pa rnams dang  bsod nams skyes pa rnams dang  'bras bu che ba rnams dang  mi che ba rnams dang  mi gdung ba rnams dang  gya nom snang ba rnams dang  shin tu mthong ba  rnams dang  'og min gyi lha rnams kyang de bzhin no // /

column11: 0.029#TD4086E.TXT.r#1282307#1282307#TD4086E.TXT.r_352# tshangs ris kyi lha rnams ji lta ba bzhin du tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang  tshangs pa chen po pa rnams dang  'od chung ba rnams dang  tshad med 'od pa rnams dang  'od gsal ba rnams dang  dge chung ba rnams dang  chad  med dge rnams dang  dge rgyas pa rnams dang  sprin med pa rnams dang  bsod nams skyes pa rnams dang  'bras bu che ba rnams dang  mi che ba rnams dang  mi gdung ba rnams dang  gya nom snang ba rnams dang  shin tu mthong ba rnams dang  'og min gyi lha rnams kyang de  gos gyon bzhin du skye'o // /
column12: 0.029#TD4086E.TXT.r#1282535#1282535#TD4086E.TXT.r_381# tshangs ris pa rnams kyi ji lta ba bzhin du tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang  tshangs pa chen po pa rnams dang  'od chung ba rnams dang  tshad med 'od pa rnams dang  'od gsal ba rnams dang  dge chung ba rnams dang  tshad med dge ba rnams dang  dge rgyas  pa rnams dang  sprin med pa rnams dang  bsod nams skyes pa rnams dang  'bras bu che ba rnams dang  mi che ba rnams dang  mi gdung ba rnams dang  gya nom snang ba rnams dang  shin tu mthong ba rnams dang  'og min gyi lha rnams kyi yang gzhal du med pa'i gos yin no // /
column13: 0.029#TD4086E.TXT.r#1282974#1282974#TD4086E.TXT.r_449# tshangs ris pa rnams ji lta ba bzhin du tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang  tshangs pa chen po rnams dang  'od chung ba rnams dang  tshad med 'od pa rnams dang  'od gsal ba  rnams dang  dge chung ba rnams dang  tshad med dge ba rnams dang  dge rgyas pa rnams dang  sprin med pa rnams dang  bsod nams skyes pa rnams dang  'bras bu che ba rnams dang  mi che ba rnams dang  mi gdung ba rnams dang  gya nom snang ba rnams dang  shin tu mthong ba  rnams dang  'og min gyi lha rnams kyang de bzhin no // /
column14: 0.029#TD4086E.TXT.r#1283032#1283032#TD4086E.TXT.r_454# tshangs ris kyi lha rnams la ji lta ba bzhin du tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang  tshangs pa chen po pa rnams dang  'od chung ba rnams dang  tshad med 'od pa rnams dang  'od gsal ba rnams dang  dge chung ba rnams dang  tshad med dge rnams dang  dge rgyas pa rnams dang   sprin med pa rnams dang  bsod nams skyes pa rnams dang  'bras bu che ba rnams dang  mi che ba rnams dang  mi gdung ba rnams dang  gya nom snang ba rnams dang  shin tu mthong ba rnams dang  'og min gyi lha rnams la yang de bzhin no // /
column15: 0.029#TD4086E.TXT.r#1283139#1283139#TD4086E.TXT.r_470# tshangs ris kyi lha rnams la ji lta ba bzhin du changs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang  tshangs pa chen po rnams dang  'od  chung ba rnams dang  tshad med 'od pa rnams dang  'od gsal ba rnams dang  dge chung ba rnams dang  tshad med dge ba rnams dang  dge rgyas pa rnams dang  sprin med pa rnams dang  bsod nams skyes pa rnams dang  'bras bu che ba rnams dang  mi che ba rnams dang  mi gdung ba  rnams dang  gya nom snang ba rnams dang  shin tu mthong ba rnams dang  'og min gyi lha rnams la yang de bzhin no // /

column17: 0.029#TD4086E.TXT.r#1283328#1283328#TD4086E.TXT.r_483# tshangs ris pa rnams la ji lta ba bzhin du tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang  tshangs pa chen po pa rnams dang  'od chung ba rnams dang  tshad med 'od pa rnams  dang  'ong gsal ba rnams dang  dge chung ba rnams dang  tshad med dge ba rnams dang  dge rgyas pa rnams dang  sprin med pa rnams dang  bsod nams skyes pa rnams dang  'bras bu che ba rnams dang  mi che ba rnams dang  mi gdung ba rnams dang  gya nom snang ba  rnams dang  shin tu mthong ba rnams dang  'og min gyi lha rnams la yang de bzhin no // /
column18: 0.029#TD4086E.TXT.r#1283399#1283399#TD4086E.TXT.r_490# tshangs ris kyi lha ji lta ba bzhin du tshangs pa mdun na 'don pa rnams dang  tshangs pa chen po pa rnams dang  'od chung ba rnams dang  tshad med 'od pa rnams dang  'od  gsal ba rnams dang  dge chung ba rnams dang  tshad med dge ba rnams dang  dge rgyas pa rnams dang  sprin med pa rnams dang  bsod nams skyes pa rnams dang  'bras bu che ba rnams dang  mi che ba rnams dang  mi gdung ba rnams dang  gya nom snang ba rnams dang   shin tu mthong ba rnams dang  'og min gyi lha rnams la yang de bzhin no // /

column20: 0.029#TD4086E.TXT.r#1283752#1283752#TD4086E.TXT.r_533# tshangs ris pa rnams ji lta ba bzhin du tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang  tshangs pa chen po pa rnams dang  'od chung ba rnams dang  tshad med 'od pa rnams dang  'od gsal ba rnams dang  dge chung ba rnams dang  tshad med dge ba rnams  dang  dge rgyas par nams dang  sprin med pa rnams dang  bsod nams skyes pa rnams dang  'bras bu che ba rnams dang  mi che ba rnams dang  mi gdung ba rnams dang  gya nom snang ba rnams dang  shin tu mthong ba rnams dang  'og min gyi lha rnams kyang de bzhin no // /
column21: 0.029#TD4086E.TXT.r#1283817#1283817#TD4086E.TXT.r_538# tshangs ris pa rnams ji lta ba bzhin  du tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa rnams dang  tshangs pa chen po pa rnams dang  'od chung ba rnams dang  tshad med 'od pa rnams dang  'od gsal ba rnams dang  dge chung ba rnams dang  tshad med dge ba rnams dang  dge rgyas pa rnams dang  sprin med pa rnams dang   bsod nams skyes pa rnams dang  'bras bu che ba rnams dang  mi che ba rnams dang  mi gdung ba rnams dang  gya nom snang ba rnams dang  shin tu mthong ba rnams dang  'og min gyi lha rnams kyang de bzhin no // /

column3: theg pa dman pas 'gro ba de dgag pa'i phyir yod pa dang med  pa dag kyang khyad par med par bsgom pa yin te / /
yod pa dang med par khyad par med pa nyid du rig nas yod pas yid 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#136566#136575#TD4035E.TXT.r_2036;TD4035E.TXT.r_2037;TD4035E.TXT.r_2038;TD4035E.TXT.r_2039# byang chub sems dpa' sa bcu  la gnas pa rnams kyis sa bcu yongs su bsgoms nas gang du skye ba'o // / +gzugs med pa'i khams ni gnas gzhan bzhi po rnams so // /

column3: ji ltar na sgro 'dogs pa bkag pa yin / / +ji ltar na skur pa 'debs pa bkag pa yin no // / +ji ltar na yod pa dang med pa dag khyad par  med par bsgom pa yin te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#136574#136586#TD4035E.TXT.r_2038;TD4035E.TXT.r_2039;TD4035E.TXT.r_2040;TD4035E.TXT.r_2041;TD4035E.TXT.r_2042# yang na gnas gzhan ci yang med pa YANG YIN NO // / +de la sems can gyi tshad rnam par gzhag pa ni 'di yin te / /

column3: de la yod pa med pa yin zhes bya ba ni gnyis su snang ba gang yin pa ste / / +gnyis su snang ba yod pa gang yin pa de ni med pa ma yin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#136587#136602#TD4035E.TXT.r_2041;TD4035E.TXT.r_2042;TD4035E.TXT.r_2043;TD4035E.TXT.r_2044;TD4035E.TXT.r_2045# res 'ga' ni chen por 'gyur ro // / +res 'ga' ni chung ngur 'gyur te / /

column3: 'o na ci zhe na / / +de ni yod pa kho na'o // / +de ltar bzod pa'i gnas skabs na rnam par shes pa 'di nyid gnyis su  snang bar rab tu 'byung gi / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#136603#136610#TD4035E.TXT.r_2045;TD4035E.TXT.r_2046;TD4035E.TXT.r_2047# de dag kyang rang gi khru tshad phyed dang bzhi pa ste / / +lus shin tu che'o // /

column3: phyi rol gyi don ni med do zhes phyi rol gyi don rnam par rig pas sems tsam du rtogs par 'gyur te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#136611#136623#TD4035E.TXT.r_2047;TD4035E.TXT.r_2048;TD4035E.TXT.r_2049# shar gyi  lus 'phags pa ji lta ba bzhin du / / +nub kyi ba lang spyod pa rnams dang  byang gi sgra mi snyan pa rnams kyang lus shin tu che'o // /
column5: 0.025#TD4086E.TXT.r#1282046#1282046#TD4086E.TXT.r_331# ji ltar 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams kyi mdog nag po dang  dkar po dang  sngo bsangs dang  mdog skya snar rnam pa bzhi yod pa bzhin du shar gyi  lus 'phags pa rnams dang  nub kyi ba lang spyod pa rnams kyang de bzhin no // /

column3: de'i tshe yod pa la yod par rig nas skur pa 'debs par mi byed do // / +med pa yod pa nyid ma yin // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#136622#136639#TD4035E.TXT.r_2049;TD4035E.TXT.r_2050;TD4035E.TXT.r_2051# rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi tshad ni rgyang grags kyi bzhi cha gcig go // /
column5: 0.020#TD4086E.TXT.r#1282648#1282650#TD4086E.TXT.r_400;TD4086E.TXT.r_401# rgyal chen  bzhi'i lha rnams kyi lus thob pa ni rgyang grags kyi bzhi cha gcig go // / +sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams kyi ni rgyang grags kyi phyed do // /

column3: zhes bya ba ni kun brtags pa gnyis kyi dngos  po med pa nyid gang yin pa ste / / +med pa ni yod pa nyid ma yin no // /
column4: 0.020#TD4086E.TXT.r#1282648#1282650#TD4086E.TXT.r_400;TD4086E.TXT.r_401# rgyal chen  bzhi'i lha rnams kyi lus thob pa ni rgyang grags kyi bzhi cha gcig go // / +sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams kyi ni rgyang grags kyi phyed do // /

column3: 'o na ci zhe na / / +de ni rtag tu med pa kho na yin te / / +de ltar na med pa la med par rig nas sgro 'dogs par mi byed do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#136640#136649#TD4035E.TXT.r_2050;TD4035E.TXT.r_2051;TD4035E.TXT.r_2052;TD4035E.TXT.r_2053# sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams kyi tshad ni rgyang grags kyi bzhi cha gcig las lhag  go // / +lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi tshad ni rgyang grags phyed do // /

column3: ji ltar na de dag khyad par med pa yin zhe na / / +gzhan gyi dbang gi gnyis su snang ba gang yin    pa de nyid rnam par shes pa las ma gtogs pa'i phyi rol gyi gzugs la sogs pa yod pa nyid du kun brtags pa'i bdag nyid kyis med pa yin la / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#136650#136670#TD4035E.TXT.r_2053;TD4035E.TXT.r_2054;TD4035E.TXT.r_2055;TD4035E.TXT.r_2056;TD4035E.TXT.r_2057;TD4035E.TXT.r_2058# de yan chad de las gzhan pa'i lha'i ris thams cad ni bzhi cha re re lhag par blta bar bya'o // /
column5: 0.0#TD4086E.TXT.r#1282678#1282687#TD4086E.TXT.r_405;TD4086E.TXT.r_406;TD4086E.TXT.r_407;TD4086E.TXT.r_408;TD4086E.TXT.r_409# gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams kyi ni rgyang grags phyed dang gnyis so // / +tshangs ris pa rnams kyi ni dpag tshad phyed do // / +tshangs pa mdun na 'don pa rnams kyi ni dpag tshad gcig go // /
column6: 0.019#TD4090.1E.TXT.r#1639486#1639487#TD4090.1E.TXT.r_7331;TD4090.1E.TXT.r_7332;TD4090.1E.TXT.r_7333# gnas gsum dag na tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don rnams kyi dpag tshad gcig go // / +tshangs pa chen po'i ni phyed dang gnyis so // /

column3: phyi rol gyi gzugs la sogs pa kun brtags pa'i bdag nyid kyis med pa gang yin pa de nyid rnam par rig pa tsam yin te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#136671#136680#TD4035E.TXT.r_2057;TD4035E.TXT.r_2058;TD4035E.TXT.r_2059# 'od chung ba rnams kyi ni dpag tshad gnyis so // / +de yan chad de'i lhag ma'i lha'i ris rnams kyi lus kyi tshad ni de'i nyis 'gyur nyis 'gyur du blta bar bya'o // /

column3: de ltar na  mthong ba de ni byis pas kun brtags pa yod pa la mngon par zhen pa las yid 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#136681#136690#TD4035E.TXT.r_2058;TD4035E.TXT.r_2059;TD4035E.TXT.r_2060;TD4035E.TXT.r_2061# de yan chad de'i lhag ma'i lha'i ris rnams kyi lus kyi tshad ni de'i nyis 'gyur nyis 'gyur du blta bar bya'o // / +sprin med pa rnams kyi ni ma gtogs    te / / +de la ni dpag tshad gsum 'bri bar bya'o // /

column3: nyan thos ni gzugs la sogs pa la yod pa nyid du kun brtags nas / / +'di dag la skye ba dang 'jig pas sdug bsngal gyi rang bzhin yin par dmigs pa na 'khor ba'i ngo bo nyid  las yid 'byung bar 'gyur ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#136691#136699#TD4035E.TXT.r_2061;TD4035E.TXT.r_2062# sems can dmyal ba chen po dag gi tshad ni nges pa med do // /
column5: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#136699#136709#TD4035E.TXT.r_2062;TD4035E.TXT.r_2063;TD4035E.TXT.r_2064# gang gis sdig pa mi dge ba'i las shin tu drag po byas shing bsags pa de'i lus ni ches che bar 'grub par 'gyur la / /

column3: yid 'byung na 'dod chags dang bral bas de'i phyir nyan thos kyi theg pas nges par 'byung gi / / +byang chub sems dpa' ni ji skad bshad pa'i tshul 'dis yod pa dang med pa dag khyad par med par rig nas 'khor ba las yid 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#136710#136718#TD4035E.TXT.r_2064# sems  can dmyal ba chen po dag gi ji lta ba bzhin du grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba rnams dang  nyi tshe ba'i sems can dmyal ba rnams dang  nye 'khor gyi sems can dmyal ba rnams dang  dud 'gro dang yi dags rnams kyang de dang 'dra'o // /
column5: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#136718#136737#TD4035E.TXT.r_2064;TD4035E.TXT.r_2065;TD4035E.TXT.r_2066;TD4035E.TXT.r_2067# sems  can dmyal ba chen po dag gi ji lta ba bzhin du grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba rnams dang  nyi tshe ba'i sems can dmyal ba rnams dang  nye 'khor gyi sems can dmyal ba rnams dang  dud 'gro dang yi dags rnams kyang de dang 'dra'o // /
column6: 1.192#TD4035E.TXT.r#136417#136424#TD4035E.TXT.r_2013;TD4035E.TXT.r_2014# bdud kyi gnas ni gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi  nang du gtogs pa'i gnas gzhan khyad par can yin no // / +nyi tshe ba'i sems can dmyal ba rnams dang  nye 'khor gyi sems can dmyal ba rnams ni sems can dmyal ba chen po dang  grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba'i nye 'khor nyid de / /
column7: 0.017#TD4035E.TXT.r#130615#130618#TD4035E.TXT.r_985# sems can dmyal ba brgyad dang  nyi tshe'i sems can dmyal ba rnams dang  grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba rnams dang  nyen kor gyi sems can dmyal ba    rnams dang  dud 'gro dang  yi dags kha cig gnas so // /
column8: 0.018#TD4037E.TXT.r#1340216#1340218#TD4037E.TXT.r_3322# yang byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis sems can rnams skrag par byed 'dod pa dang  'dun par byed 'dod pa ni  sems can nyes par spyad par spyod pa rnams la nyes par spyad par spyod pa'i rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu ngan song sems can dmyal ba rnams dang  sems can dmyal ba chen po rnams dang  grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba rnams dang  nyi tshe ba'i sems can dmyal ba rnams bsnyen  cing ston par byed de / /
column9: 0.020#TD4039E.TXT.r#1841107#1841111#TD4039E.TXT.r_3177# sems can dmyal ba chen po rnams dang  nyi tshe ba'i sems can dmyal ba rnams dang  grang ba'i sems    can dmyal ba rnams dang  sems can dmyal ba'i 'khor rnams so // /
column10: 0.020#TD4035E.TXT.r#127734#127734#TD4035E.TXT.r_496;TD4035E.TXT.r_497;TD4035E.TXT.r_498# de'i phyir mi 'gro na yang skye BAR MI 'GYUR RO // / +sems can dmyal ba ji lta ba bzhin du / / +sems can dmyal ba dang 'dra ba'i yi dags lba ba can  la sogs pa dag tu skye ba yang de dang 'dra bar blta bar bya'o // /
column11: 0.022#TD4049E.TXT.r#2296388#2296388#TD4049E.TXT.r_1616# gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang  gzugs na spyod pa rnams dang  lha ma yin gyi gnas gzhan dag dang  sems can dmyal ba pa rnams kyi gnas gzhan dag dang  tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba rnams dang  grang ba'i sems can  dmyal ba rnams dang  nyi tshe ba'i sems can dmyal ba rnams dang  dud 'gro dang  yi dags de dag kha cig gi gnas gzhan rnams dang  nyi ma rnam par snang byed kun tu rgyu zhing phyogs snang bar byed pa ji snyed pa de snyed ni stong gi 'jig rten na / /
column12: 0.022#TD4054E.TXT.r#1011511#1011511#TD4054E.TXT.r_3451# sa'i dkyil 'khor la ri rab dang   gser gyi ri bdun dang  gling bzhi dang  bar gyi gling brgyad dang  nang gi rgya mtsho dang  phyi'i rgya mtsho bzhi dang  ri rab kyi bang rim bzhin dang  rgyal chen bzhi'i ris dang  sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i gnas gzhan rnams dang  khor yug gi ri dang  nam mkha' la gzhal med khang dang   'thab bral dang  dga' ldan dang  'phrul dga' dang  gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang  gzugs na spyod pa rnams dang  lha ma yin rnams kyi gnas gzhan dag dang  sems can dmyal ba rnams kyi gnas gzhan dag dang  tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba rnams dang  grang ba'i  sems can dmyal ba rnams dang  nyi tshe ba'i sems can dmyal ba rnams dang  dud 'gro dang  yi dgas de dag kha cig gi gnas gzhan rnams dang  nyi ma rnam par snang byed kun du rgyu zhing phyogs snang bar byed pa ji snyed pa de snyed kyi stong gi 'jig rten na / /
column13: 0.028#TD4083E.TXT.r#686606#686606#TD4083E.TXT.r_300# sems can nyes par spyad pa spyod par 'dod pa rnams la nyes par spyod pa'i rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu sems can dmyal ba rnams dang  sems can dmyal ba chen po rnams dang  grang ba'i dmyal ba dang  nyi tshe ba'i dmyal ba la sogs pa ngan song gi  'gro ba de dag bsten cing bsnyen la ston par byed cing mir gyur pa dag gis nyes par spyod pa byas shing bsags pa mi sdug pa'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa mi bzad cing mchog tu tsha ba so sor nyams su myong ba 'di lta bu 'di la khyod ltos shig ces bsgo nas / /

column3: yid mi 'byung na nyan thos mgo dang gos la me 'bar ba ltar byed pa bzhin du mya ngan las 'das pa la gzhol bar mi 'gyur bas de'i phyir nyan thos kyi theg pas nges par mi 'byung ngo // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#136738#136747#TD4035E.TXT.r_2066;TD4035E.TXT.r_2067;TD4035E.TXT.r_2068;TD4035E.TXT.r_2069;TD4035E.TXT.r_2070# gzugs med pa dag gi ni / / +gzugs med pa'i phyir tshad med do // / +de la tshe'i tshad rnam par gzhag pa ni 'di yin te / /

column3: 'khrul pa'i rgyu dang 'khrul pa ni // / +zhes bya ba ni byis pa rnams kyi rnam par rig pa 'di ni rnam pa gnyis  su 'byung ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#136748#136756#TD4035E.TXT.r_2069;TD4035E.TXT.r_2070;TD4035E.TXT.r_2071# 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams kyi ni zhag sum cu la zla ba gcig / / +zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig gi tshul  gyis tshe'i tshad nges pa med de // /

column3: 'di lta ste 'khrul pa'i rgyu dang  'khrul pa'o // / +de la 'khrul pa'i rgyu ni gzugs kyi rnam par rig pa yin par 'dod de / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#136757#136775#TD4035E.TXT.r_2070;TD4035E.TXT.r_2071;TD4035E.TXT.r_2072;TD4035E.TXT.r_2073;TD4035E.TXT.r_2074;TD4035E.TXT.r_2075;TD4035E.TXT.r_2076# zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig gi tshul  gyis tshe'i tshad nges pa med de // / +res 'ga' ni tshe dpag tu med par 'gyur ro // / +res 'ga' ni tshe lo brgyad khri par 'gyur ro // /

column3: gzugs zhes smos pas ni mig dang gzugs la sogs pa gzugs kyi phung po bsdu'o // / +'di lta ste byis pa rnams ni thog ma med pa'i  dus nas goms pas bdag med bzhin du gzugs la sogs pa nye bar len pa'i phung po rnams bdag nyid du snang ngo // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#136776#136783#TD4035E.TXT.r_2075;TD4035E.TXT.r_2076;TD4035E.TXT.r_2077# lo nyis brgya lnga bcu'o // / +nub kyi ba lang  spyod pa rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni lo lnga brgya'o // /
column5: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#136784#136801#TD4035E.TXT.r_2076;TD4035E.TXT.r_2077;TD4035E.TXT.r_2078;TD4035E.TXT.r_2079;TD4035E.TXT.r_2080# nub kyi ba lang  spyod pa rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni lo lnga brgya'o // / +byang gi sgra mi snyan pa rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni lo stong ngo // /
column6: 0.0#TD4043E.TXT.r#373501#373506#TD4043E.TXT.r_2374;TD4043E.TXT.r_2375# mdo'i khungs kyang gsal bar bstan pa 'di la yang gsal ba'i phyir gzhan drang ba yin grang / / +mi rnams kyi lo lnga bcu gang yin pa de ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi nyin zhag gcig go zhes bya ba ni rtsi sla bar bya ba'i phyir nyi ma'i 'gros las yongs su bgrang ba'o // /

column3: de ltar byis pas kun brtags pa mig dang gzugs la sogs pa'i don dag med bzhin du thog ma med pa'i dus nas goms pa'i dbang gis byis pa rnams la yang  dag pa ma yin pa'i kun tu rtog pa mig dang gzugs la sogs pa nyid du snang ba gzugs kyi rnam par rig pa 'di ni 'khrul pa'i rgyu yin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#136790#136801#TD4035E.TXT.r_2078;TD4035E.TXT.r_2079;TD4035E.TXT.r_2080# mi rnams kyi lo lnga bcu gang yin pa de ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi nyin zhag gcig go // /
column5: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#136801#136820#TD4035E.TXT.r_2079;TD4035E.TXT.r_2080;TD4035E.TXT.r_2081;TD4035E.TXT.r_2082# de lta bu'i nyin zhag sum cu la zla ba gcig / / +zla ba bcu gnyis la lor  brtsis pa'i lha'i lo brgya thub bo // /
column6: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#136859#136866#TD4035E.TXT.r_2088;TD4035E.TXT.r_2089;TD4035E.TXT.r_2090;TD4035E.TXT.r_2091;TD4035E.TXT.r_2087;TD4035E.TXT.r_2092# sems can dmyal ba chen po yang sos kyi nyin zhag gcig go // / +de lta bu'i nyin zhag sum cu la     // /
column7: 0.0#TD4090.1E.TXT.r#1639650#1639652#TD4090.1E.TXT.r_7368# mi rnams kyi lo lnga bcu gang yin pa de dag ni 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha rgyal chen  bzhi'i ris pa rnams kyi nyin zhag gcig go // /
column8: 0.0#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1762982#1762992#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_7970;TD4094.1E.TXT.r_7971# mi rnams  kyi lo brgya gang yin pa de sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi nyin zhag gcig yin la / /

column13: 0.011#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1766544#1766550#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_8387;TD4094.1E.TXT.r_8388;TD4094.1E.TXT.r_8389# dge slong dag gang mi rnams kyi nyin  zhag sum cu gang yin pa de yi dvags rnams kyi nyin zhag gcig yin la / / +nyin zhag de nyid kyis nyin zhag sum cu la zla ba gcig yin la / /
column14: 0.011#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1767928#1767933#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_8661;TD4094.1E.TXT.r_8662;TD4094.1E.TXT.r_8663# dge slong  dag gang mi rnams kyi lo stong drug brgya gang yin pa de ni gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams kyi nyin zhag gcig yin la / / +nyin zhag sum cu la zla ba gcig / /
column15: 0.012#TD4091E.TXT.r#716368#716368#TD4091E.TXT.r_3996;TD4091E.TXT.r_3997# nyin zhag sum cu la zla ba'o // / +zla ba bcu gnyis dag la ni // /
column16: 0.012#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1767712#1767715#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_8626;TD4094.1E.TXT.r_8627# de nyid dmyal ba chen po ngu 'bod kyi zhag gcig yin la des nyin zhag sum cu la zla ba gcig / /
column17: 0.012#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1767788#1767794#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_8639;TD4094.1E.TXT.r_8640;TD4094.1E.TXT.r_8641# dge slong dag mi rnams kyi lo brgyad brgya gang yin pa de 'phrul dga'i lha rnams kyi nyin zhag gcig yin la / / +des nyid zhag sum cu la zla ba gcig / /
column18: 0.012#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1767316#1767320#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_8557;TD4094.1E.TXT.r_8558# dge slong dag gang mi rnams kyi tshe lo lnga bcu gang yin pa de ni rgyal po chen po bzhi rnams kyi nyin zhag gcig yin la / / +des na nyin zhag sum cu la zla ba gcig zla ba  bcu gnyis la lo 'khor ba gcig yin la / /
column19: 0.012#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1767351#1767353#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_8562;TD4094.1E.TXT.r_8563# de ni dmyal ba chen po yang sos kyi nyin  zhag gcig yin la des na nyin zhag sum cu la zla ba gcig / /
column20: 0.014#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1767442#1767445#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_8579;TD4094.1E.TXT.r_8580;TD4094.1E.TXT.r_8581# dge slong dag yang mi rnams kyi tsha lo brgya gang yin  pa de ni sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams kyi nyin zhag gcig yin la / / +de nyid kyis brtsis pa'i nyin zhag sum cu la zla ba gcig / /
column21: 0.014#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1767477#1767478#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_8586;TD4094.1E.TXT.r_8587# des nyin zhag sum cu la zla ba gcig / / +zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig yin la / /
column22: 0.015#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#1507291#1507292#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_12494;TD4092.1E.TXT.r_12495# zhes bya ba'i bar du yin no zhes bya ba ni de dag gi tshe'i tshad de na yod pa'i nyin zhag des ni nyin zhag sum cu la zla ba / / +zla ba bcu gnyis la lor brtsis pas de na yod pa'i lo lnga brgya thub po zhes bya ba LA SOGS PA YIN NO // /
column23: 0.016#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1767674#1767679#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_8621;TD4094.1E.TXT.r_8622# dge slong dag mi rnams kyi lo bzhi brgya gang yin    pa de ni dga' ldan gyi lha rnams kyi nyin zhag gcig yin la // / +de nyid kyis brtsis pa'i nyin zhag sum cu la zla ba gcig zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig / /
column24: 0.016#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1767825#1767827#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_8644;TD4094.1E.TXT.r_8645;TD4094.1E.TXT.r_8646# de nyid sems can dmyal ba chen po ngu 'bod chen po rnams kyi nyin zhag gcig yin la / / +nyin zhag sum cu la zla ba  gcig / /

column29: 0.022#TD4086E.TXT.r#1284142#1284143#TD4086E.TXT.r_593;TD4086E.TXT.r_594# de ni sems can dmyal ba chen po bsdus gzhom gyi nyin zhag gcig go // / +nyin zhag de sum cu la zla ba gcig / /
column30: 0.022#TD4086E.TXT.r#1284228#1284228#TD4086E.TXT.r_605;TD4086E.TXT.r_606# de ni sems can dmyal ba chen po ngu 'bod kyi nyin zhag gcig go // / +nyin zhag de sum cu la zla ba gcig / /
column31: 0.022#TD4086E.TXT.r#1284275#1284276#TD4086E.TXT.r_611;TD4086E.TXT.r_612# mi rnams kyi lo brgyad brgya gang yin pa de ni 'phrul dga' lha  rnams kyi nyin zhag gcig go // / +nyin zhag de sum cu la zla ba gcig go // /
column32: 0.022#TD4086E.TXT.r#1284370#1284371#TD4086E.TXT.r_623;TD4086E.TXT.r_624# mi rnams kyi lo stong drug brgya gang yin pa de ni gzhan  'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi nyin zhag gcig go // / +nyin zhag de sum cu la zla ba gcig / /
column33: 0.022#TD4086E.TXT.r#1296734#1296734#TD4086E.TXT.r_2110;TD4086E.TXT.r_2111# yud tsam de lta bu sum cu la nyin zhag gcig go // / +nyin zhag de sum cu la zla ba gcig go // /
column34: 0.023#TD4086E.TXT.r#1283852#1283852#TD4086E.TXT.r_543;TD4086E.TXT.r_544# mi rnams kyi nyin zhag sum cu gang yin pa de ni yi dags rnams kyi nyin gcig ste / / +nyin zhag    de sum cu la zla ba gcig / /
column35: 0.024#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1767562#1767564#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_8602;TD4094.1E.TXT.r_8603# dge slong dag mi rnams kyi lo nyis brgya gang yin pa de ni lha 'thab bral ba rnams kyi nyin zhag gcig yin la de nyid kyis brtsis pa'i nyin zhag sum cu la zla ba gcig / / +zla  ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig ste / /
column36: 0.024#TD4086E.TXT.r#1284022#1284024#TD4086E.TXT.r_574;TD4086E.TXT.r_575;TD4086E.TXT.r_576# mi rnams kyi lo brgya gang yin pa de ni sum cu rtsa gsum gyi nyin zhag gcig go // / +nyin zhag de sum cu la zla ba gcig / /
column37: 0.025#TD4090.1E.TXT.r#1639668#1639668#TD4090.1E.TXT.r_7370;TD4090.1E.TXT.r_7371# de'i nyin zhag des na de rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni zhag sum cu la zla ba gcig go // / +zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig tu brtsis pa'i lha'i lo lnga brgya'o // /

column3: mig gi rnam par shes pa la sogs pa de ni 'di yin no zhes 'dzin pa'i rnam par 'jug pa gang yin pa gzugs can ma yin pa'i rnam par rig pa     // /

column8: 0.012#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1767788#1767791#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_8639;TD4094.1E.TXT.r_8640;TD4094.1E.TXT.r_8641# dge slong dag mi rnams kyi lo brgyad brgya gang yin pa de 'phrul dga'i lha rnams kyi nyin zhag gcig yin la / / +des nyid zhag sum cu la zla ba gcig / /
column9: 0.015#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1762987#1762992#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_7970;TD4094.1E.TXT.r_7971# mi rnams  kyi lo brgya gang yin pa de sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi nyin zhag gcig yin la / / +des nyin zhag sum cu la zla ba gcig yin zhing zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig yin te / /
column10: 0.017#TD4035E.TXT.r#136859#136860#TD4035E.TXT.r_2088;TD4035E.TXT.r_2089# sems can dmyal ba chen po yang sos kyi nyin zhag gcig go // / +de lta bu'i nyin zhag sum cu la     // /
