column3: 'di ni 'khrul pa'i ngo bo nyid yin no // / +'khrul pa'i rgyur gyur cing gzhir gyur pa gzugs su snang ba'i rnam par rig pa de med pa'i phyir cig shos mig gi rnam par shes pa la sogs pa gzugs can ma yin pa rnam par rig pa yang med par 'gyur ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#136829#136849#TD4035E.TXT.r_2083;TD4035E.TXT.r_2084;TD4035E.TXT.r_2085;TD4035E.TXT.r_2086;TD4035E.TXT.r_2087# snga ma bzhin du tshe lo stong thub bo // / +de las gzhan pa'i lha'i ris gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha  rnams kyi bar du / /
column5: 0.029#TD4091E.TXT.r#714836#714836#TD4091E.TXT.r_3709# rgyal chen bzhi pa nas gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi bar 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha ris drug na 'dod pa yongs su spyod kyi lhag ma rnams ni ma yin no // /

column3: rgyu med pa'i  phyir ro zhes bya ba la / / +rgyu ni ming dang gzugs la sogs pa ste / / +rgyu de med pa'i phyir 'bras bur gyur pa'i rnam par rig par mig gi rnam par shes pa la sogs pa yang med par 'gyur ro // /
column4: 0.011#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#243582#243586#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3787;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3788;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_3789# yud tsam sum cu la nyin zhag gcig go // / +nyin zhag sum cu la zla ba gcig go // /
column5: 0.011#TD4086E.TXT.r#1284190#1284193#TD4086E.TXT.r_599;TD4086E.TXT.r_600;TD4086E.TXT.r_601# mi rnams kyi lo bzhi  brgya gang yin pa de ni dga' ldan gyi lha rnams kyi nyin zhag gcig go // / +nyin zhag sum cu la zla ba gcig / /
column6: 0.011#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1767928#1767931#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_8661;TD4094.1E.TXT.r_8662;TD4094.1E.TXT.r_8663# dge slong  dag gang mi rnams kyi lo stong drug brgya gang yin pa de ni gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams kyi nyin zhag gcig yin la / / +nyin zhag sum cu la zla ba gcig / /
column7: 0.012#TD4091E.TXT.r#716368#716368#TD4091E.TXT.r_3996;TD4091E.TXT.r_3997# nyin zhag sum cu la zla ba'o // / +zla ba bcu gnyis dag la ni // /
column8: 0.012#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1767712#1767713#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_8626;TD4094.1E.TXT.r_8627# de nyid dmyal ba chen po ngu 'bod kyi zhag gcig yin la des nyin zhag sum cu la zla ba gcig / /
column9: 0.012#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1767316#1767320#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_8557;TD4094.1E.TXT.r_8558# dge slong dag gang mi rnams kyi tshe lo lnga bcu gang yin pa de ni rgyal po chen po bzhi rnams kyi nyin zhag gcig yin la / / +des na nyin zhag sum cu la zla ba gcig zla ba  bcu gnyis la lo 'khor ba gcig yin la / /
column10: 0.012#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1767348#1767353#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_8562;TD4094.1E.TXT.r_8563# de ni dmyal ba chen po yang sos kyi nyin  zhag gcig yin la des na nyin zhag sum cu la zla ba gcig / /
column11: 0.013#TD4035E.TXT.r#136818#136819#TD4035E.TXT.r_2081;TD4035E.TXT.r_2082# mi rnams kyi lo brgya gang yin pa de ni sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi nyin zhag gcig go // / +de lta bu'i nyin zhag sum cu la zla ba gcig ste / /
column12: 0.014#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1767442#1767445#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_8579;TD4094.1E.TXT.r_8580;TD4094.1E.TXT.r_8581# dge slong dag yang mi rnams kyi tsha lo brgya gang yin  pa de ni sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams kyi nyin zhag gcig yin la / / +de nyid kyis brtsis pa'i nyin zhag sum cu la zla ba gcig / /
column13: 0.014#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1767477#1767478#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_8586;TD4094.1E.TXT.r_8587# des nyin zhag sum cu la zla ba gcig / / +zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig yin la / /
column14: 0.016#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1767824#1767827#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_8644;TD4094.1E.TXT.r_8645;TD4094.1E.TXT.r_8646# de nyid sems can dmyal ba chen po ngu 'bod chen po rnams kyi nyin zhag gcig yin la / / +nyin zhag sum cu la zla ba  gcig / /
column15: 0.016#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1767676#1767679#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_8621;TD4094.1E.TXT.r_8622# dge slong dag mi rnams kyi lo bzhi brgya gang yin    pa de ni dga' ldan gyi lha rnams kyi nyin zhag gcig yin la // / +de nyid kyis brtsis pa'i nyin zhag sum cu la zla ba gcig zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig / /
column16: 0.018#TD4086E.TXT.r#1283976#1283980#TD4086E.TXT.r_567;TD4086E.TXT.r_568;TD4086E.TXT.r_569# de mi'i ltar brtsis na lo sa ya phrag dgu yod do // / +de ni sems can dmyal ba chen po yang sos kyi nyin zhag gcig  go // /
column17: 0.022#TD4086E.TXT.r#1283947#1283948#TD4086E.TXT.r_562;TD4086E.TXT.r_563# rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams kyi nyin zhag gcig go // / +nyin zhag de sum cu la zla ba gcig go // /
column18: 0.022#TD4086E.TXT.r#1284104#1284104#TD4086E.TXT.r_587;TD4086E.TXT.r_588# mi rnams kyi lo nyis brgya gang yin pa de ni 'thab bral gyi lha rnams kyi nyin zhag gcig go // / +nyin zhag de sum cu la zla ba gcig / /
column19: 0.022#TD4086E.TXT.r#1284142#1284143#TD4086E.TXT.r_593;TD4086E.TXT.r_594# de ni sems can dmyal ba chen po bsdus gzhom gyi nyin zhag gcig go // / +nyin zhag de sum cu la zla ba gcig / /
column20: 0.022#TD4086E.TXT.r#1284228#1284228#TD4086E.TXT.r_605;TD4086E.TXT.r_606# de ni sems can dmyal ba chen po ngu 'bod kyi nyin zhag gcig go // / +nyin zhag de sum cu la zla ba gcig / /
column21: 0.022#TD4086E.TXT.r#1284276#1284276#TD4086E.TXT.r_611;TD4086E.TXT.r_612# mi rnams kyi lo brgyad brgya gang yin pa de ni 'phrul dga' lha  rnams kyi nyin zhag gcig go // / +nyin zhag de sum cu la zla ba gcig go // /
column22: 0.022#TD4086E.TXT.r#1284371#1284371#TD4086E.TXT.r_623;TD4086E.TXT.r_624# mi rnams kyi lo stong drug brgya gang yin pa de ni gzhan  'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi nyin zhag gcig go // / +nyin zhag de sum cu la zla ba gcig / /
column23: 0.022#TD4086E.TXT.r#1296734#1296734#TD4086E.TXT.r_2110;TD4086E.TXT.r_2111# yud tsam de lta bu sum cu la nyin zhag gcig go // / +nyin zhag de sum cu la zla ba gcig go // /
column24: 0.023#TD4086E.TXT.r#1283852#1283852#TD4086E.TXT.r_543;TD4086E.TXT.r_544# mi rnams kyi nyin zhag sum cu gang yin pa de ni yi dags rnams kyi nyin gcig ste / / +nyin zhag    de sum cu la zla ba gcig / /
column25: 0.024#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1767564#1767564#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_8602;TD4094.1E.TXT.r_8603# dge slong dag mi rnams kyi lo nyis brgya gang yin pa de ni lha 'thab bral ba rnams kyi nyin zhag gcig yin la de nyid kyis brtsis pa'i nyin zhag sum cu la zla ba gcig / / +zla  ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig ste / /
column26: 0.024#TD4091E.TXT.r#715892#715894#TD4091E.TXT.r_3899;TD4091E.TXT.r_3900;TD4091E.TXT.r_3901# rgyal chen bzhi pa rnams kyi tshe'i tshad gang yin pa de ni / / +dmyal ba chen pa yang sos kyi nyin zhag gcig yin la / /
column27: 0.024#TD4090.1E.TXT.r#1639665#1639665#TD4090.1E.TXT.r_7370;TD4090.1E.TXT.r_7371# de'i nyin zhag des na de rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni zhag sum cu la zla ba gcig go // / +zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig tu brtsis pa'i lha'i lo lnga brgya'o // /
column28: 0.027#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#1507315#1507315#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_12496# de bzhin du gzhan dag la yang ci rigs par sbyar bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni 'thab bral ba rnams kyi tshe'i tshad gang yin pa de ni sems can dmyal ba chen po bsdus 'joms kyi nyin zhag gcig yin la / /

column3: de la gnyis po ji lta bar med kyang gnyis su yang dmigs so zhes bya ba ni sgyu ma'i glang po che'i  gzugs su 'khrul pa la yang dag pa nyid du glang po che la sogs pa gzung ba dang 'dzin pa med mod kyi / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#136867#136875#TD4035E.TXT.r_2091;TD4035E.TXT.r_2092;TD4035E.TXT.r_2093# zla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig ste / / +tshe'i tshad kyang sems can dmyal ba pa'i lo lnga brgya thub bo // /
column5: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#136875#136884#TD4035E.TXT.r_2092;TD4035E.TXT.r_2093;TD4035E.TXT.r_2094# tshe'i tshad kyang sems can dmyal ba pa'i lo lnga brgya thub bo // / +rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i tshe tshad kyis / /

column3: 'on kyang byis pa ma rig pas ldongs pa rnams glang po che'i gzugs su 'khrul pa'i sgo nas 'di dag ni glang po che la sogs pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#136883#136893#TD4035E.TXT.r_2093;TD4035E.TXT.r_2094;TD4035E.TXT.r_2095# rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i tshe tshad kyis / / +sems can dmyal ba chen po yang sos su skyes pa rnams kyi tshe'i tshad bsgre ba de bzhin du / /
column5: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#136893#136903#TD4035E.TXT.r_2095;TD4035E.TXT.r_2096;TD4035E.TXT.r_2097# sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyis thig nag tu skyes pa rnams kyi tshe'i tshad bsgre'o // /

column3: bdag ni 'di dag 'dzin pa'o zhes bya bar  gnyis su mngon par zhen to // / +keng rus kyi ni gzugs 'dzin pa // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#136903#136918#TD4035E.TXT.r_2096;TD4035E.TXT.r_2097;TD4035E.TXT.r_2098;TD4035E.TXT.r_2099# 'thab bral ba rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyis bsdus 'joms su skyes pa rnams kyi tshe'i tshad bsgre'o // / +dga' ldan pa rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyis du 'bod du skyes pa rnams kyi tshe'i tshad bsgre'o // /

column3: 'khrul phyir gnyis su brjod pa ste // / +zhes bya ba ni ting nge 'dzin gyi gnas skabs las dang po pa'i rnal 'byor can rus pa'i keng rus sgom par byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi me long la keng rus kyi gzugs brnyan snang la / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#136919#136933#TD4035E.TXT.r_2099;TD4035E.TXT.r_2100;TD4035E.TXT.r_2101# gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams kyi tshe'i tshad kyis tsha bar skyes pa rnams kyi tshe'i tshad bsgre bar rig par bya'o // /

column3: keng  rus kyi gzugs su 'khrul pa de las gzung ba dang 'dzin pa gnyis su brjod do // /
de la ni yang dag pa nyid du na rus pa'i keng rus kyang med la de med na 'dzin pa yang med mod kyi / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#136932#136941#TD4035E.TXT.r_2100;TD4035E.TXT.r_2101;TD4035E.TXT.r_2102;TD4035E.TXT.r_2103# rab tu tsha bar skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni bar gyi bskal pa'i bskal  pa phyed do // / +mnar med pa'i sems can rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni bar gyi bskal pa'i bskal pa gcig go // /

column3: 'on kyang de bzhin du yang snang ngo // / +yod pa dang med pa de dag kyang khyad par med pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#136940#136956#TD4035E.TXT.r_2101;TD4035E.TXT.r_2102;TD4035E.TXT.r_2103;TD4035E.TXT.r_2104# mnar med pa'i sems can rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni bar gyi bskal pa'i bskal pa gcig go // / +lha ma yin rnams kyi ni sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang 'dra'o // /

column3: yang yod  pa yang yin la med pa yang ma yin no // / +sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid kyang de dang 'dra ste / / +de lta bas na sgyu ma lta bu yin no zhes bya ba ni de la glang po che'i gzugs yod pa gang yin pa de nyid glang po che nyid la sogs par med pa yin la / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#136950#136962#TD4035E.TXT.r_2103;TD4035E.TXT.r_2104# dud 'gro dang yi dags rnams kyi tsha'i tshad ni nges pa med do // / +grang ba'i sems can dmyal bar skyes pa'i sems can  rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni sems can dmyal ba chen por skyes pa'i sems can rnams las phyi ma phyi ma phyed phyed zhugs par rig par bya'o // /
column5: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#136962#136972#TD4035E.TXT.r_2104;TD4035E.TXT.r_2105# grang ba'i sems can dmyal bar skyes pa'i sems can  rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni sems can dmyal ba chen por skyes pa'i sems can rnams las phyi ma phyi ma phyed phyed zhugs par rig par bya'o // /
column6: 0.027#TD4049E.TXT.r#2296388#2296388#TD4049E.TXT.r_1616# gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang  gzugs na spyod pa rnams dang  lha ma yin gyi gnas gzhan dag dang  sems can dmyal ba pa rnams kyi gnas gzhan dag dang  tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba rnams dang  grang ba'i sems can  dmyal ba rnams dang  nyi tshe ba'i sems can dmyal ba rnams dang  dud 'gro dang  yi dags de dag kha cig gi gnas gzhan rnams dang  nyi ma rnam par snang byed kun tu rgyu zhing phyogs snang bar byed pa ji snyed pa de snyed ni stong gi 'jig rten na / /
column7: 0.027#TD4054E.TXT.r#1011511#1011511#TD4054E.TXT.r_3451# sa'i dkyil 'khor la ri rab dang   gser gyi ri bdun dang  gling bzhi dang  bar gyi gling brgyad dang  nang gi rgya mtsho dang  phyi'i rgya mtsho bzhi dang  ri rab kyi bang rim bzhin dang  rgyal chen bzhi'i ris dang  sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i gnas gzhan rnams dang  khor yug gi ri dang  nam mkha' la gzhal med khang dang   'thab bral dang  dga' ldan dang  'phrul dga' dang  gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang  gzugs na spyod pa rnams dang  lha ma yin rnams kyi gnas gzhan dag dang  sems can dmyal ba rnams kyi gnas gzhan dag dang  tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba rnams dang  grang ba'i  sems can dmyal ba rnams dang  nyi tshe ba'i sems can dmyal ba rnams dang  dud 'gro dang  yi dgas de dag kha cig gi gnas gzhan rnams dang  nyi ma rnam par snang byed kun du rgyu zhing phyogs snang bar byed pa ji snyed pa de snyed kyi stong gi 'jig rten na / /

column3: glang po che nyid la sogs par med pa gang yin pa de nyid  glang po che'i gzugs su yod pa yin no // / +de lta bas na sgyu ma la yod pa dang med pa nyid du khyad par med de / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#136966#136987#TD4035E.TXT.r_2104;TD4035E.TXT.r_2105;TD4035E.TXT.r_2106;TD4035E.TXT.r_2107# grang ba'i sems can dmyal bar skyes pa'i sems can  rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni sems can dmyal ba chen por skyes pa'i sems can rnams las phyi ma phyi ma phyed phyed zhugs par rig par bya'o // / +nye 'khor gyi sems can dmyal ba dang  nyi tshe ba'i sems can dmyal bar skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni nges pa med do // /
column5: 0.027#TD4049E.TXT.r#2296388#2296388#TD4049E.TXT.r_1616# gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang  gzugs na spyod pa rnams dang  lha ma yin gyi gnas gzhan dag dang  sems can dmyal ba pa rnams kyi gnas gzhan dag dang  tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba rnams dang  grang ba'i sems can  dmyal ba rnams dang  nyi tshe ba'i sems can dmyal ba rnams dang  dud 'gro dang  yi dags de dag kha cig gi gnas gzhan rnams dang  nyi ma rnam par snang byed kun tu rgyu zhing phyogs snang bar byed pa ji snyed pa de snyed ni stong gi 'jig rten na / /
column6: 0.027#TD4054E.TXT.r#1011511#1011511#TD4054E.TXT.r_3451# sa'i dkyil 'khor la ri rab dang   gser gyi ri bdun dang  gling bzhi dang  bar gyi gling brgyad dang  nang gi rgya mtsho dang  phyi'i rgya mtsho bzhi dang  ri rab kyi bang rim bzhin dang  rgyal chen bzhi'i ris dang  sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i gnas gzhan rnams dang  khor yug gi ri dang  nam mkha' la gzhal med khang dang   'thab bral dang  dga' ldan dang  'phrul dga' dang  gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang  gzugs na spyod pa rnams dang  lha ma yin rnams kyi gnas gzhan dag dang  sems can dmyal ba rnams kyi gnas gzhan dag dang  tsha ba'i sems can dmyal ba rnams dang  grang ba'i  sems can dmyal ba rnams dang  nyi tshe ba'i sems can dmyal ba rnams dang  dud 'gro dang  yi dgas de dag kha cig gi gnas gzhan rnams dang  nyi ma rnam par snang byed kun du rgyu zhing phyogs snang bar byed pa ji snyed pa de snyed kyi stong gi 'jig rten na / /

column3: sgyu ma la yod pa nyid gang yin pa de ni kun rdzob du'o // / +med pa nyid gang yin pa de nyid don dam par ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#136979#136988#TD4035E.TXT.r_2105;TD4035E.TXT.r_2106;TD4035E.TXT.r_2107# nye 'khor gyi sems can dmyal ba dang  nyi tshe ba'i sems can dmyal bar skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni nges pa med do // / +tshangs ris  ba'i sems can rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni bar gyi bskal pa nyi shu la bskal pa gcig tu bgrang ba'i bskal pa gcig go // /
column5: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#136997#136998#TD4035E.TXT.r_2107;TD4035E.TXT.r_2108;TD4035E.TXT.r_2106# tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa'i sems can rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni bar gyi bskal pa bzhi bcu la bskal pa gcig tu bgrang ba'i bskal ba gcig go // / +tshangs chen pa  rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni bar gyi bskal pa drug cu la bskal pa gcig tu bgrang ba'i bskal pa gcig go // /
column6: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#137006#137011#TD4035E.TXT.r_2108;TD4035E.TXT.r_2109;TD4035E.TXT.r_2107# tshangs chen pa  rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni bar gyi bskal pa drug cu la bskal pa gcig tu bgrang ba'i bskal pa gcig go // / +'od chung ba rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni bar gyi bskal pa brgyad cu la bskal bar bgrang ba'i bskal ba gnyis so // /
column7: 0.011#TD4043E.TXT.r#373529#373531#TD4043E.TXT.r_2376# tshangs  ris pa'i sems can rnams kyi tshe tshad ni bar gyi bskal ba nyi shu la bskal pa gcig tu bgrang ba'i bskal pa gcig go zhes bya ba ni mnyam par bgrang ba'i phyir ro // /
column8: 0.025#TD4035E.TXT.r#129471#129471#TD4035E.TXT.r_797# bar gyi bskal pa nyi shu la bskal pa gcig tu btags pa ni tshangs ris rnams kyi tshe'i tshad du rnam par gzhag go // /

column3: sgyu ma la yod pa dang med pa dag khyad par med par bshad pa ji lta bar    gzugs la sogs pa'i chos rnams la yang de dang 'dra ste / /
column4: 0.017#TD4035E.TXT.r#136999#137006#TD4035E.TXT.r_2107;TD4035E.TXT.r_2108;TD4035E.TXT.r_2109# tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don pa'i sems can rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni bar gyi bskal pa bzhi bcu la bskal pa gcig tu bgrang ba'i bskal ba gcig go // / +tshangs chen pa  rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni bar gyi bskal pa drug cu la bskal pa gcig tu bgrang ba'i bskal pa gcig go // /

column3: ji skad du / / +de bzhin nyid snang de la yod // / +de yi dngos po yod ma yin // / +de ltas gzugs la sogs pa la // /

yod dang med pa nyid du brjod // / +ces bshad pa lta bu yin no // / +yang dag pa ma yin pa'i kun tu rtog  pa'i ngo bo nyid de la rnam par shes pa'i gnyis su snang ba gang yin pa de ni de la yod la / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#137011#137026#TD4035E.TXT.r_2109;TD4035E.TXT.r_2110;TD4035E.TXT.r_2111# 'od chung ba rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni bar gyi bskal pa brgyad cu la bskal bar bgrang ba'i bskal ba gnyis so // /

column3: rnam par shes pa snang ba gsal te yang dag pa nyid du gzugs la sogs pa'i don gyis gnyis kyi ngo bo gang yin pa de ni de la med do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#137025#137037#TD4035E.TXT.r_2110;TD4035E.TXT.r_2111;TD4035E.TXT.r_2112;TD4035E.TXT.r_2113# de yan chad de las gzhan pa'i gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i ris rnams    kyi tshe'i tshad ni bar gyi bskal pa brgyad cu po de'i nyis 'gyur nyis 'gyur ro // / +sprin med pa rnams ni ma gtogs te / /
column5: 0.023#TD4053E.TXT.r#2996071#2996072#TD4053E.TXT.r_4205# lhag ma ni rnam par thar pa bzhin du ji ltar mthun mthun du sbyar bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni zad par nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la sogs pa'o // /
column6: 0.026#TD4090.2E.TXT.r#1074714#1074714#TD4090.2E.TXT.r_3686;TD4090.2E.TXT.r_3687;TD4090.2E.TXT.r_3688# 'di ni rdzogs so //// / +'di brjod par bya ste / / +ci nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la sogs pa de dag nam mkha' la sogs pa kho na la dmigs pa  yin pas de'i phyir de skad ces bya'am zhe na / /
column7: 0.027#TD4092.2E.TXT.r#2641456#2641458#TD4092.2E.TXT.r_13193;TD4092.2E.TXT.r_13194# nam mkha' yang gcig yin no zhes bya bar brjod par bya ste / / +nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi dmigs pa yin no // /
column8: 0.028#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#1488599#1488599#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_10296# rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so snyam nas rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched rdzogs par byas te gnas pa de rnam pa de dag dang  zhes bya ba mdo bdun po nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched bzhin du brjod par bya'o // /

column3: yang dag pa ma yin pa'i kun tu rtog pa de la gnyis su  snang ba gang yin pa de nyid gnyis med pa yin la gnyis med pa gang yin pa de nyid gnyis su snang ba yin te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#137038#137051#TD4035E.TXT.r_2113;TD4035E.TXT.r_2114# nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched du skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni bskal ba nyi khri'o // /
column5: 0.0#TD4090.1E.TXT.r#1639825#1639835#TD4090.1E.TXT.r_7389;TD4090.1E.TXT.r_7390;TD4090.1E.TXT.r_7391# nyi shu lhag pas lhag pa yin // / +nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched na ni tshe'i tshad bskal pa nyi khri'o // /
column6: 0.0#TD4091E.TXT.r#715718#715721#TD4091E.TXT.r_3870;TD4091E.TXT.r_3871# nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched pa rnams kyi tshe'i tshed tshad ni bskal pa nyi khri'o // / +rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched pa rnams kyi ni de las nyi khris lhag go // /
column7: 0.025#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#1507127#1507127#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_12474# rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched na ni bzhi khri'o // /

column3: de ltar na yod pa dang med pa dag khyad par med pa yin no // / +de lta bas na chos 'di dag sgyu ma bzhin du yod pa nyid dang med pa nyid yin pas de'i phyir sgyu ma lta bu brjod do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#137052#137066#TD4035E.TXT.r_2114;TD4035E.TXT.r_2115;TD4035E.TXT.r_2116# rnam shes mtha'  yas skye mched du skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni bzhi khri'o // /
column5: 0.020#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1768729#1768730#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_8794# dge slong dag 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa brgyad khri ste / /

column3: kun  nas nyon mongs pa 'grub pa la dbang byed pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni kun nas nyon mongs pa'i chos rnams kun tu spyod pa dang ldan pa yin na kun nas nyon mongs pa rnams yang dang yang du 'grub par 'gyur bas so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#137067#137081#TD4035E.TXT.r_2116;TD4035E.TXT.r_2117;TD4035E.TXT.r_2118;TD4035E.TXT.r_2119# 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched du skyes pa rnams kyi tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa brgyad khri'o // /
column5: 0.025#TD4043E.TXT.r#373549#373550#TD4043E.TXT.r_2377;TD4043E.TXT.r_2378# bskal pa gcig go zhes bya ba'i tshig ni mdo sde las gsungs pa'i phyir ro // / +de la mi rnams dang dud 'gro dang yi dags rnams kyi lus  ni ror gyur te 'dug GO ZHES BYA BA NI SRID pa'i dbang du byas pa ste // /

column3: mig yor lta bu ni nang gi skye mched rnams kyi grib ma lta bu yin pa'i phyir phyi'i  skye mched drug kho na ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#137080#137091#TD4035E.TXT.r_2118;TD4035E.TXT.r_2119;TD4035E.TXT.r_2120# de la mi rnams dang  dud 'gro dang  yi dags rnams kyi lus ni ror gyur te 'dug go // /

column3: de'i dbang gis 'byung bas so zhes bya ba ni ji ltar gdugs la sogs pa'i dbang gis grib ma 'byung ba de bzhin du nang gi skye mched gdugs lta bu rnams kyi dbang gis phyi'i skye mched kyi grib ma lta bu rnams 'byung ngo // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#137090#137112#TD4035E.TXT.r_2119;TD4035E.TXT.r_2120;TD4035E.TXT.r_2121;TD4035E.TXT.r_2122;TD4035E.TXT.r_2123;TD4035E.TXT.r_2124# lha rnams dang sems can dmyal ba pa rnams kyi ni rnam par shes pa dang mgo mnyam du mi snang bar 'gyur te / / +lus ror gyur te 'dug  pa med do // /

column3: brag ca lta bu ni bshad pa'i chos rnams  so zhes bya ba ni ji ltar brag ca yod pa ma yin mod kyi / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#137113#137122#TD4035E.TXT.r_2124;TD4035E.TXT.r_2125# de la sems can dmyal ba dag na ni sems can rnams gnod pa'i sdug bsngal shas  cher nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro // /
column5: 0.018#TD4037E.TXT.r#1355057#1355058#TD4037E.TXT.r_5218# sdug bsngal rnam pa drug ni ngan song gi rgyu rten pa'i phyir rgyu'i sdug bsngal dang  ngan song du skyes pa'i phyir 'bras bu'i sdug bsngal dang  longs spyod las  brtsams te yongs su tshol ba'i sdug bsngal dang  bsrung ba'i sdug bsngal dang  chog mi shes pa'i sdug bsngal dang  med par 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal te / /
column6: 0.020#TD4061E.TXT.r#1545586#1545586#TD4061E.TXT.r_4458# nyon mongs pas yongs su gdungs pa'i sdug bsngal dang  kun du tshol  ba'i sdug bsngal dang  gnod pa'i sdug bsngal dang  'dod pas phongs pa'i sdug bsngal dang  dogs pa'i sdug bsngal dang  gleng ba'i sdug bsngal dang  kun du spong ba'i sdug bsngal dang  bkur sti med pa'i sdug bsngal dang  rnam par smad pa'i sdug bsngal  dang ; /
column7: 0.020#TD4037E.TXT.r#1355134#1355142#TD4037E.TXT.r_5225;TD4037E.TXT.r_5226# bdag nyid rgud pa'i sdug bsngal dang  gzhan rgud pa'i sdug bsngal dang  nye du rgud pa'i sdug bsngal dang  longs spyod nyams pa'i sdug bsngal dang  nad med  pa las nyams pa'i sdug bsngal dang  tshul khrims nyams pa'i sdug bsngal dang  lta ba nyams pa'i sdug bsngal dang  tshe 'di'i sdug bsngal dang  tshe phyi ma'i sdug bsngal lo // /
column8: 0.028#TD4036E.TXT.r#30492#30492#TD4036E.TXT.r_4675# na ba'i sdug bsngal dang  'chi ba'i sdug bsngal dang  mi sdug pa dang phrad pa'i sdug bsngal dang  sdug pa dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal dang  'dod pas phongs pa'i sdug bsngal dang  mdor na nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga sdug bsngal ba'o // /
column9: 0.029#TD4039E.TXT.r#1852095#1852095#TD4039E.TXT.r_4364;TD4039E.TXT.r_4365# nyon mongs pas bskyed pa'i sdug bsngal dang mi  rtag pa nyid kyis bskyed pa'i sdug bsngal lo // / +nyon mongs pas bskyed pa'i sdug bsngal gang zhe na / /

column3: 'on kyang grag pa ltar bshad pa'i chos rnams kyang de dang 'dra'o // / +'di dag la ma rig pa dang nyon mongs pa rnams dang lhan cig 'jug pa yod pas yod pas ni 'di dag ni ma rig pa dang nyon mongs pa dang lhan cig 'jug pa yin no zhes bya  ba la / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#137121#137130#TD4035E.TXT.r_2125# dud 'gro rnams gcig la gcig za ba'i sdug bsngal dang  yi dags rnams ni bkres shing skom pa'i sdug bsngal dang  mi rnams ni tshol khros nyon mongs pa'i sdug bsngal dang  lha rnams ni 'chi 'pho ba dang  ltung ba'i sdug bsngal nyams  su myong bar 'gyur ro // /
column5: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#137131#137143#TD4035E.TXT.r_2125;TD4035E.TXT.r_2126;TD4035E.TXT.r_2127;TD4035E.TXT.r_2128# dud 'gro rnams gcig la gcig za ba'i sdug bsngal dang  yi dags rnams ni bkres shing skom pa'i sdug bsngal dang  mi rnams ni tshol khros nyon mongs pa'i sdug bsngal dang  lha rnams ni 'chi 'pho ba dang  ltung ba'i sdug bsngal nyams  su myong bar 'gyur ro // / +de la sems can dmyal ba chen po yang sos na ni / /
column6: 0.025#TD4035E.TXT.r#137505#137505#TD4035E.TXT.r_2182;TD4035E.TXT.r_2183# de la sems can dmyal ba chen po tsha ba na ni / / +gnod pa'i sdug bsngal 'di lta bu shas cher nyams su myong  bar 'gyur te / /

column3: ma rig pa ni ma rig pa nyid do // / +nyon mongs pa ni 'dod chags la sogs pa ste drug gam bcu'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#137141#137148#TD4035E.TXT.r_2127;TD4035E.TXT.r_2128# gnod pa'i sdug bsngal ni 'di lta bu shas cher nyams su myong bar 'gyur te / / +de la sems can de dag phan tshun 'dus nas las kyi dbang gis byung ba'i mtshon cha rnam pa sna tshogs rim gyis 'byung ba dag  gis / /
column5: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#137270#137279#TD4035E.TXT.r_2148;TD4035E.TXT.r_2149;TD4035E.TXT.r_2147# gnod pa'i sdug bsngal 'di lta bu shas cher nyams su myong bar 'gyur te / / +de na sems can de dag gang gi tshe phan tshun nas gcig tu 'dus shing tshogs par gyur pa de'i tshe / /
column6: 0.015#TD4035E.TXT.r#137424#137424#TD4035E.TXT.r_2170;TD4035E.TXT.r_2171# gnod pa'i sdug bsngal 'di lta bu shas cher nyams su myong bar 'gyur te / / +de ni sems can de dag gnas tshol zhing  lcags kyi khang pa'i nang du 'jug par byed do // /

column3: ma rig pa longs shig tu smos pa ni dbang byed pa'i don te / / +ma rmongs pa la gzhan mi 'byung ba'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#137149#137158#TD4035E.TXT.r_2128;TD4035E.TXT.r_2129# de la sems can de dag phan tshun 'dus nas las kyi dbang gis byung ba'i mtshon cha rnam pa sna tshogs rim gyis 'byung ba dag  gis / /
column5: 0.0#TD4043E.TXT.r#373571#373574#TD4043E.TXT.r_2381# las kyi dbang gis skyes pa'i mtshon cha rnam pa sna tshogs  rim gyis 'byung ba dag gis gcig la gcig snun par byed do zhes bya ba la / /

column3: nyon mongs pa smos pas ni khro ba dang kho na du 'dzin pa     // / +la sogs pa nye ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams kyang bsdus par rig par bya'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#137159#137167#TD4035E.TXT.r_2128;TD4035E.TXT.r_2129;TD4035E.TXT.r_2130;TD4035E.TXT.r_2131# de la sems can de dag phan tshun 'dus nas las kyi dbang gis byung ba'i mtshon cha rnam pa sna tshogs rim gyis 'byung ba dag  gis / / +gcig la gcig snun par byed de / / +brgyal nas sa la 'gyel lo // /

column3: gzugs dang sgra la sogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa 'di dag la ma rig pa dang nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams dang lhan cig 'jug pa yod pas na 'di dag ni ma rig pa dang  nyon mongs pa dang  lhan cig 'jug pa yin te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#137168#137197#TD4035E.TXT.r_2131;TD4035E.TXT.r_2132;TD4035E.TXT.r_2133;TD4035E.TXT.r_2134;TD4035E.TXT.r_2135;TD4035E.TXT.r_2136;TD4035E.TXT.r_2137# de nas nam mkha' la sems can khyed rnams kyang sos par gyur cig ces sgra 'byung ngo // /

column3: rnam par rtog pa gang dang gang kun du 'byung ba na kun gzhi rnam par shes pa la bag chags 'jog pa'i bag chags de nyid rnam par rtog pa de dang de'i rgyur 'gyur ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#137184#137196#TD4035E.TXT.r_2133;TD4035E.TXT.r_2134;TD4035E.TXT.r_2135;TD4035E.TXT.r_2136;TD4035E.TXT.r_2137# de lta bu'i tshul du gcig la gcig snun par byed do // / +gzhi de     // / +las yun ring por sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar 'gyur te / /
column5: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#137246#137270#TD4035E.TXT.r_2144;TD4035E.TXT.r_2145;TD4035E.TXT.r_2146;TD4035E.TXT.r_2147;TD4035E.TXT.r_2148;TD4035E.TXT.r_2149# gzhi de las yun ring por sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar 'gyur te / /
column6: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#137399#137405#TD4035E.TXT.r_2166;TD4035E.TXT.r_2167;TD4035E.TXT.r_2165# gzhi de las yun ring por sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar 'gyur te / / +ji srid du sdig pa mi dge ba'i las thams cad kyi thams  cad du yongs su ma zad cing ma byang gi bar du ste / /
column7: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#137476#137481#TD4035E.TXT.r_2178;TD4035E.TXT.r_2179;TD4035E.TXT.r_2176;TD4035E.TXT.r_2177# de bas na sems can dmyal ba chen po du 'bod ces bya'o // / +de la sems can dmyal ba chen po du 'bod chen po na ni bye brag tu du 'bod kyi skabs su khang pa  bstan pa gang yin pa de / /
column8: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#137623#137637#TD4035E.TXT.r_2199;TD4035E.TXT.r_2200;TD4035E.TXT.r_2201;TD4035E.TXT.r_2202# gzhi de las yun ring por sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar 'gyur te / / +ji srid du sdig pa mi dge ba'i las thams cad kyi thams cad du yongs su ma zad  cing ma byang gi bar du ste / /
column9: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#137772#137780#TD4035E.TXT.r_2220;TD4035E.TXT.r_2221;TD4035E.TXT.r_2222# gzhi de las yun ring por sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar 'gyur te / / +ji srid du sdig pa mi dge ba'i las    thams cad kyi thams cad du yongs su ma zad cing ma byang gi bar du ste / /
column10: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#137978#137986#TD4035E.TXT.r_2258;TD4035E.TXT.r_2259;TD4035E.TXT.r_2260# gzhi de las yun ring por sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar 'gyur te / / +ji srid du sdig pa mi dge ba'i las thams cad yongs su ma zad cing ma byang gi bar du ste / /
column11: 1.788#TD4035E.TXT.r#137466#137471#TD4035E.TXT.r_2176;TD4035E.TXT.r_2177;TD4035E.TXT.r_2178# gzhi de las yun ring por sdug bsngal nyams su myong  bar 'gyur te / / +ji srid du sdig pa mi dge ba'i las thams cad kyi thams cad du yongs su ma zad cing ma byang gi bar du ste / /

column3: de ni sngar bshad zin to zhes bya ba ni thos pa la sogs pa'i  shes pa gsum gyis / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#137197#137212#TD4035E.TXT.r_2136;TD4035E.TXT.r_2137;TD4035E.TXT.r_2138;TD4035E.TXT.r_2139# ji srid du sdig pa mi dge ba'i las thams cad kyi thams cad du yongs su ma zad cing ma byang gi bar du ste / / +de bas na sems can dmyal ba de yang sos zhes bya'o // /

column3: chos kyi dmigs pa rnyed par 'gyur zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs pa'i gzhung gis so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#137418#137424#TD4035E.TXT.r_2168;TD4035E.TXT.r_2169;TD4035E.TXT.r_2170;TD4035E.TXT.r_2171# de bas na sems can dmyal ba de bsdus gzhom zhes bya'o // / +de la sems can dmyal ba chen po du 'bod na ni / /

column6: 0.020#TD4035E.TXT.r#137788#137788#TD4035E.TXT.r_2222;TD4035E.TXT.r_2223# de bas na sems can dmyal ba de rab tu tsha ba zhes bya'o // / +de la sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med pa na ni / /

column3: rang gi dbyings ni rnam par mi rtog pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid do zhes bya ba 'di ni rnam par byang ba'i skabs kyis 'ongs pa yin pas rang gi dbyings ni rnam par byang  ba tshul bzhin rnam par rtog pa rnams kyi chos kyi dbyings yin te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#137213#137222#TD4035E.TXT.r_2138;TD4035E.TXT.r_2139;TD4035E.TXT.r_2140# de la sems can dmyal ba  chen po thig nag na ni gnod pa'i sdug bsngal 'di lta bu cher nyams su myong bar 'gyur te / / +de nas sems can de dag der gtogs pa'i mi gnod par byed pa dag gis thig nag pos bcal te / /
column5: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#137223#137230#TD4035E.TXT.r_2139;TD4035E.TXT.r_2140;TD4035E.TXT.r_2141;TD4035E.TXT.r_2142# de nas sems can de dag der gtogs pa'i mi gnod par byed pa dag gis thig nag pos bcal te / / +zur bzhi 'am / / +zur brgyad dam / /
column6: 0.016#TD4010E.TXT.r#2270762#2270762#TD4010E.TXT.r_5196;TD4010E.TXT.r_5197# sdig pa'i las kyis sems can rnams dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur ro // / +der sha med par gyur nas yang las kyi dbang gis sha de slar  'byung bar 'gyur yang de dge ba'i las kyis ni ma yin no // /
column7: 0.020#TD4035E.TXT.r#141410#141412#TD4035E.TXT.r_2797;TD4035E.TXT.r_2798# de dag de ltar gnas pas dran pa brjed par 'gyur ro // / +dran pa brjed par gyur pas sems can de dag gnas de nas 'chi 'pho bar 'gyur ro // /

column3: 'di ni de bzhin nyid kyi rnam grangs kyi ming yin no // / +de bzhin nyid kyi phyir dbus dang mtha' rnam par 'byed pa dang  chos mngon par kun las btus pa la sogs pa las chos kyi dbyings kyi nges  pa'i tshig nyan thos dang  rang sangs rgyas dang  sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi rgyu mtshan nyid kyi phyir chos kyi dbyings zhes bya'o zhes 'byung ngo // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#137188#137196#TD4035E.TXT.r_2134;TD4035E.TXT.r_2135;TD4035E.TXT.r_2136;TD4035E.TXT.r_2137# gzhi de     // / +las yun ring por sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar 'gyur te / /
column5: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#137229#137240#TD4035E.TXT.r_2141;TD4035E.TXT.r_2142;TD4035E.TXT.r_2143# zur brgyad dam / / +char gse ba rnam pa sna tshogs du mar gzhal bar byed do // /
column6: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#137240#137251#TD4035E.TXT.r_2143;TD4035E.TXT.r_2144;TD4035E.TXT.r_2145# gzhal nas kyang de lta de lta bur gshegs shing 'jog la kun tu rab tu 'jog go // /
column7: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#137399#137400#TD4035E.TXT.r_2166;TD4035E.TXT.r_2167# gzhi de las yun ring por sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar 'gyur te / / +ji srid du sdig pa mi dge ba'i las thams cad kyi thams  cad du yongs su ma zad cing ma byang gi bar du ste / /
column8: 1.788#TD4035E.TXT.r#137466#137470#TD4035E.TXT.r_2176;TD4035E.TXT.r_2177;TD4035E.TXT.r_2178# gzhi de las yun ring por sdug bsngal nyams su myong  bar 'gyur te / / +ji srid du sdig pa mi dge ba'i las thams cad kyi thams cad du yongs su ma zad cing ma byang gi bar du ste / /
column9: 0.027#TD4035E.TXT.r#138365#138365#TD4035E.TXT.r_2321# gzhi de las yun ring por sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar 'gyur te / /

column3: ming la sems gnas pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba la / / +ming ni gzugs can ma yin pa'i phung po bzhi ste / /
column4: 0.027#TD4086E.TXT.r#1310984#1310984#TD4086E.TXT.r_3871# sems can dmyal ba chen po thig nag ces bya ba la ci'i phyir sems can dmyal ba chen po thig nag ces  bya zhe na / /

column3: de la spyi'i  rnam par gnas pa'i phyir ming la gnas pa yin no // / +rnam par mi rtog pa'i ya shes rnyed nas ming la gnas par 'gyur te / /

de'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams rnam par byang bar 'gyur ro // / +zhi gnas bsgom pa chu lta bus ni tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i rnam par rtog bdag gis  khengs par byas pa'i sems de gnyen por 'gyur ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#137280#137295#TD4035E.TXT.r_2149;TD4035E.TXT.r_2150# de na sems can de dag gang gi tshe phan tshun nas gcig tu 'dus shing tshogs par gyur pa de'i tshe / /

column3: lhag mthong pa sgom pa me long lta bus ni las dang po pa'i gnas skabs na lta ba ngan pa la sogs pas yon por gyur pa'i shes rab mda' yon po lta bu gang yin pa de mnyam par gzhag pa'i gnas skabs na lhag mthong goms    bas mda' mes bsros pa bzhin du drang por 'gyur ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#137296#137311#TD4035E.TXT.r_2150;TD4035E.TXT.r_2151;TD4035E.TXT.r_2152;TD4035E.TXT.r_2153# der gtogs pa'i mi gnod par  byed pa rnams kyis ra'i gdong lta bu'i lcags kyi ri chen pa gnyis kyi bar du 'tshang bar byed de / / +btsangs ma thag tu ri de gnyis kyis btsir ro // /
column5: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#137312#137325#TD4035E.TXT.r_2152;TD4035E.TXT.r_2153;TD4035E.TXT.r_2154# de dag btsir nas sgo thams cad du khrag gi klung 'bab cing rab tu 'bab bo // / +ra'i gdong lta bu gnyis ji lta ba bzhin du / /

column3: de'i phyir sems dang shes rab 'dod chags dang ma rig pa'i nyon mongs pa dag dang tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams las rnam par grol bar 'gyur zhing / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#137320#137325#TD4035E.TXT.r_2154# lug gi gdong lta bu gnyis  dang  rta'i gdong lta bu gnyis dang  glang po che'i gdong lta bu gnyis dang  seng ge'i gdong lta bu gnyis dang  stag gi gdong lta bu gnyis kyang de dang 'dra'o // /
column5: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#137326#137335#TD4035E.TXT.r_2154;TD4035E.TXT.r_2155;TD4035E.TXT.r_2156# lug gi gdong lta bu gnyis  dang  rta'i gdong lta bu gnyis dang  glang po che'i gdong lta bu gnyis dang  seng ge'i gdong lta bu gnyis dang  stag gi gdong lta bu gnyis kyang de dang 'dra'o // /

column3: gnas yongs su gyur pa la khengs pa dang yon po  nyid du byed pa'i rnam par rtog pa de dag nyid kyang gnyis su snang bar mi 'jug go // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#137334#137344#TD4035E.TXT.r_2155;TD4035E.TXT.r_2156;TD4035E.TXT.r_2157# yang 'dus par gyur nas lcags kyi 'khrul 'khor chen po'i nang du bcug nas / /

column3: rnam par rig pa tsam yongs su tshol ba zhes bya ba la / / +tsam zhes smos pa ni don dgag pa'i ched yin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#137345#137353#TD4035E.TXT.r_2156;TD4035E.TXT.r_2157;TD4035E.TXT.r_2158# dper na bu ram shing brdungs pa la bya ba bzhin  du btsir bar byed do // / +de dag der btsir ba na khrag gi klung 'bab cing rab tu 'bab bo // /

column3: sems 'ba' zhig gzung ba ni ma yin te / / +sems de yang 'dir mtshungs par  ldan pa dang bcas par blta bar bya'o zhes bya ba'i phyir 'dir ni sems las byung ba rnams kyang gzung ngo // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#137354#137376#TD4035E.TXT.r_2157;TD4035E.TXT.r_2158;TD4035E.TXT.r_2159;TD4035E.TXT.r_2160;TD4035E.TXT.r_2161;TD4035E.TXT.r_2162# de dag der btsir ba na khrag gi klung 'bab cing rab tu 'bab bo // / +yang 'dus par gyur nas / / +steng nas lcags kyi pha 'ong chen po ltung bar 'gyur te / /

column3: sems tsam po 'di gzung bar snang ba dang 'dzin par snang ba dang gnyis su snang bar 'dod de / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#137377#137387#TD4035E.TXT.r_2162;TD4035E.TXT.r_2163;TD4035E.TXT.r_2164# kun tu brdung zhing kun tu dmyal bar    byed do // / +de dag der kun tu gcod cing kun tu 'byed la / /

column3: zhes bya ba ni phyi rol gyi don med do zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // / +de bzhin du de bzhin nyid 'dod  chags la sogs pa nyon mongs pa snang ba'am dad pa la sogs pa nyon mongs pa snang ba'am dge ba'i chos su snang bar 'dod la zhes bya ba ni gang gi tshe 'dod chags la dmigs pa'am / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#137246#137255#TD4035E.TXT.r_2144;TD4035E.TXT.r_2145;TD4035E.TXT.r_2146# gzhi de las yun ring por sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar 'gyur te / /
column5: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#137388#137400#TD4035E.TXT.r_2164;TD4035E.TXT.r_2165;TD4035E.TXT.r_2166;TD4035E.TXT.r_2167# kun tu brdung zhing kun tu dmyal ba na / / +khrag gi klung 'bab cing rab tu 'bab bo // /
column6: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#137623#137626#TD4035E.TXT.r_2199;TD4035E.TXT.r_2200;TD4035E.TXT.r_2198# gzhi de las yun ring por sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar 'gyur te / / +ji srid du sdig pa mi dge ba'i las thams cad kyi thams cad du yongs su ma zad  cing ma byang gi bar du ste / /
column7: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#137626#137641#TD4035E.TXT.r_2199;TD4035E.TXT.r_2200;TD4035E.TXT.r_2201;TD4035E.TXT.r_2202;TD4035E.TXT.r_2203# gzhi de las yun ring por sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar 'gyur te / / +ji srid du sdig pa mi dge ba'i las thams cad kyi thams cad du yongs su ma zad  cing ma byang gi bar du ste / /
column8: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#137772#137773#TD4035E.TXT.r_2220;TD4035E.TXT.r_2221# gzhi de las yun ring por sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar 'gyur te / / +ji srid du sdig pa mi dge ba'i las    thams cad kyi thams cad du yongs su ma zad cing ma byang gi bar du ste / /
column9: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#137978#137985#TD4035E.TXT.r_2258;TD4035E.TXT.r_2259;TD4035E.TXT.r_2260# gzhi de las yun ring por sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar 'gyur te / / +ji srid du sdig pa mi dge ba'i las thams cad yongs su ma zad cing ma byang gi bar du ste / /
column10: 0.027#TD4035E.TXT.r#138365#138365#TD4035E.TXT.r_2321# gzhi de las yun ring por sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar 'gyur te / /

column3: dad pa la dmigs pa skye ba de'i tshe sems de nyid de ltar snang gi 'dod chags la sogs pa  dmigs pa nyid du yod pa ni ma yin la / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#137404#137417#TD4035E.TXT.r_2167;TD4035E.TXT.r_2168;TD4035E.TXT.r_2169# ji srid du sdig pa mi dge ba'i las thams cad kyi thams  cad du yongs su ma zad cing ma byang gi bar du ste / /

column3: sems la 'dod chags la sogs pa dang mtshungs par ldan par mi 'dod pa yang ma yin no // / +dper na gnyis su snang ba las gzhan pa gnyis kyi mtshan nyid med pa bzhin no zhes bya ba ni sems snang ba las ma gtogs pa mig  dang  gzugs la sogs pa gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i mtshan nyid kyi don dmigs pa nyid du med pa ltar 'dod chags la sogs pa yang de dang 'dra'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#137424#137432#TD4035E.TXT.r_2170;TD4035E.TXT.r_2171# gnod pa'i sdug bsngal 'di lta bu shas cher nyams su myong bar 'gyur te / / +de ni sems can de dag gnas tshol zhing  lcags kyi khang pa'i nang du 'jug par byed do // /
column5: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#137432#137449#TD4035E.TXT.r_2171;TD4035E.TXT.r_2172;TD4035E.TXT.r_2173;TD4035E.TXT.r_2174# de ni sems can de dag gnas tshol zhing  lcags kyi khang pa'i nang du 'jug par byed do // /
column6: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#137710#137713#TD4035E.TXT.r_2211;TD4035E.TXT.r_2212# yang lcags zangs chen po 'gyur byed bskol bas gang ba kun tu 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la / /
column7: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#137806#137809#TD4035E.TXT.r_2225;TD4035E.TXT.r_2226# sems can de  dag la shar phyogs na sa gzhi dpag tshad brgya phrag du ma yod pa kun tu 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la / /
column8: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#137881#137885#TD4035E.TXT.r_2240;TD4035E.TXT.r_2241# yang lcags kyi zhib ma'i nang du lcags kyi  me mdag me kun tu 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la / /
column9: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#137930#137933#TD4035E.TXT.r_2250;TD4035E.TXT.r_2251# lcags kyi thu lum kun tu 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la / /
column10: 0.012#TD4061E.TXT.r#1529354#1529355#TD4061E.TXT.r_2307# bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyang ring po nas shing gi sdong po chen po zhig 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la kun tu rab tu mched cing me lce gcig tu gyur te lam mer 'bar ba gzigs SO ZHES BYA BA NI MDO sde'i dum bu'o // /
column11: 0.013#TD4035E.TXT.r#136451#136453#TD4035E.TXT.r_2018# ngas sems can 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la kun tu mched cing rab tu 'bar te / /
column12: 0.013#TD4043E.TXT.r#373071#373073#TD4043E.TXT.r_2321# gnas brtan mood gal gyi bus ji skad ngas sems can  'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la kun tu rab tu mched cing 'bar te me lce gcig tu gyur pa mthong NGO ZHES BYA BA LA SOGS PA GSUNGS PA lta BU'O ZHES BYA BA NI rgyal po'i khab kyi nam mkha' la mthong ba'i phyir ro zhes khungs bstan pa'o // /
column13: 0.015#TD4035E.TXT.r#137141#137141#TD4035E.TXT.r_2127;TD4035E.TXT.r_2128# gnod pa'i sdug bsngal ni 'di lta bu shas cher nyams su myong bar 'gyur te / / +de la sems can de dag phan tshun 'dus nas las kyi dbang gis byung ba'i mtshon cha rnam pa sna tshogs rim gyis 'byung ba dag  gis / /
column14: 0.019#TD4086E.TXT.r#1312728#1312728#TD4086E.TXT.r_4070# sems can de dag der 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar  la kun tu rab tu 'bar te / /
column15: 0.019#TD4086E.TXT.r#1312485#1312487#TD4086E.TXT.r_4027# de nas sems can de dag 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la kun tu rab tu 'bar te 'bar ba gcig tu gyur nas ji ste shar phyogs su 'gro na yang me 'ba' zhig mthong ngo // /
column16: 0.019#TD4086E.TXT.r#1312929#1312931#TD4086E.TXT.r_4103# de nas  sems can de dag 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la kun tu rab tu 'bar te / /
column17: 0.022#TD4086E.TXT.r#1311169#1311169#TD4086E.TXT.r_3887# sems can de dag lcags kyi sa gzhi 'bar zhing rab tu  'bar la kun tu rab tu 'bar te / /
column18: 0.022#TD4086E.TXT.r#1311205#1311205#TD4086E.TXT.r_3890# sdig pa mi dge ba'i las de'i rnam par smin pas  sems can dmyal ba'i srung ma dag gis sems can de dag lcags kyi sa gzhi 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la kun tu rab tu 'bar te / /
column19: 0.025#TD4069E.TXT.r#655524#655524#TD4069E.TXT.r_4646# bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyang ring po nas  shing gi sdong po chen po zhig 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la kun du rab tu mched cing me lce gcig tu gyur te / /
column20: 0.027#TD4086E.TXT.r#1300315#1300315#TD4086E.TXT.r_2478;TD4086E.TXT.r_2480# me'i phung po chen po rab tu 'bar ba de bzhin du nyi ma bdun pa 'jig rten du byung bas sa chen po 'di dag ri'i rgyal po ri rab 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar     // / +kun tu rab tu 'bar nas me lce gcig tu gyur cing sreg go // /

column3: sems 'di nyid rnam grangs kyis 'dod chags su snang ba'am / / +zhes sdang du snang ba'am / / +de las gzhan pa'i chos su snang ba  sna tshogs su snang ba can du 'jug go zhes bya ba ni 'di skad du bshad pa yin te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#137448#137470#TD4035E.TXT.r_2173;TD4035E.TXT.r_2174;TD4035E.TXT.r_2175;TD4035E.TXT.r_2176;TD4035E.TXT.r_2177;TD4035E.TXT.r_2178# des de dag kun tu 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la / / +kun tu rab tu mched nas bsreg par 'gyur ro // /

column3: 'dod chags la sogs pa'i dmigs pas rnam grangs kyi 'dod chags la sogs par snang ba'i sems skye ba gang yin pa de ni sems nyid sems las byung ba rnams dang lhan cig skye ba yin gyi 'dod     // /
chags la sogs pa ni ma yin no ji ltar gzugs la sogs pa don gzhan du gyur pa dmigs pa nyid du yod pa ma yin pa ltar 'dod chags la sogs pa yang de dang 'dra ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#137478#137493#TD4035E.TXT.r_2178;TD4035E.TXT.r_2179;TD4035E.TXT.r_2180# de bas na sems can dmyal ba chen po du 'bod ces bya'o // / +de la sems can dmyal ba chen po du 'bod chen po na ni bye brag tu du 'bod kyi skabs su khang pa  bstan pa gang yin pa de / /

column3: ji skad du slob dpon gyi zhal snga nas kyis / / +rnam par rig pa tsam las sems kyang  sems gzhan gyis dmigs par yod pa ma yin no zhes bshad pa lta bu'o // /
column4: 0.010#TD4035E.TXT.r#137784#137788#TD4035E.TXT.r_2222;TD4035E.TXT.r_2223# de bas na sems can dmyal ba de rab tu tsha ba zhes bya'o // / +de la sems can dmyal ba chen po mnar med pa na ni / /
column5: 0.025#TD4035E.TXT.r#137136#137136#TD4035E.TXT.r_2126;TD4035E.TXT.r_2127# de la sems can dmyal ba chen po yang sos na ni / / +gnod pa'i sdug bsngal ni 'di lta bu shas cher nyams su myong bar 'gyur te / /
column6: 0.027#TD4035E.TXT.r#138567#138567#TD4035E.TXT.r_2351;TD4035E.TXT.r_2352# de bas na sems can dmyal ba de la / / +nyi tshe ba'i sems can dmyal ba zhes bya'o // /

column3: cig car dad pa dang brtson 'grus la sogs pa'i rnam pa ste / / +rnam pa sna tshogs can du 'jug go zhes bya ba ni 'di nyid kyis sems las byung ba dag yod kyi de dag sel ba ni ma yin no zhes bya bar shes te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#137510#137519#TD4035E.TXT.r_2183;TD4035E.TXT.r_2184# gnod pa'i sdug bsngal 'di lta bu shas cher nyams su myong  bar 'gyur te / /
column5: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#137520#137534#TD4035E.TXT.r_2184;TD4035E.TXT.r_2185# sems can de dag der gtogs pa'i mi gnod par byed pa rnams kyis lcags zangs dpag tshad du ma yod pa / /

column3: sems las byung ba dag yod na de dag gi rnam par skye bas rnam pa sna tshogs nyid srid kyi med par ni ma yin no // /
gal te sems kho na rnam grangs kyis skye bas na sems las byung ba zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhe na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#137535#137544#TD4035E.TXT.r_2185;TD4035E.TXT.r_2186;TD4035E.TXT.r_2187;TD4035E.TXT.r_2188# tsha zhing kun tu tsha la kun tu rab tu mched cing 'bar ba'i nang du bcug nas bskol zhing yongs su bskol te / / +'di lta ste / /

column3: sems las byung ba bdag med par gang zhig cig car sna tshogs kyi rnam pa  nyid du 'gyur ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#137543#137553#TD4035E.TXT.r_2187;TD4035E.TXT.r_2188;TD4035E.TXT.r_2189# dper na nya bzhin du sreg cing rab  tu sreg go // / +gzhan yang lcags kyi gsal shing kun tu 'bar zhing / /

column3: de lta bas na sems las byung ba dag ni yod do // / +nyon mongs pa dang dge ba'i gnas skabs kyi sems la snang ba yod pa dang  med pa zhes bya ba ni sems dang sems las byung bar snang ba nyid yod pas yod pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#137552#137561#TD4035E.TXT.r_2188;TD4035E.TXT.r_2189;TD4035E.TXT.r_2190# gzhan yang lcags kyi gsal shing kun tu 'bar zhing / / +rab tu 'bar la mas yar phug ste / /
column5: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#137561#137573#TD4035E.TXT.r_2190;TD4035E.TXT.r_2191;TD4035E.TXT.r_2192# gsal shing de yang kun tu zhugs nas spyi bor 'byung ngo // /

column3: de las ma gtogs pa gzhan gzung ba dang  'dzin par gyur pa'i chos dag med pas na med pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#137568#137577#TD4035E.TXT.r_2191;TD4035E.TXT.r_2192;TD4035E.TXT.r_2193# sems can de dag gi kha dang  mig gi 'bras bu gnyis dang  sna'i bu gu gnyis dang  rna ba'i bu gu gnyis dang      // /
column5: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#137677#137680#TD4035E.TXT.r_2207;TD4035E.TXT.r_2208# gzhi de las de dag gi kha nas kyang me lce 'bar ba 'byung la / / +mig gi 'bras bu gnyis dang  sna'i bu gu gnyis dang  rna ba'i bu gu gnyis dang  spu'i khung bu thams cad nas kyang me lce 'bar ba 'byung ngo // /

column3: gang dag sems las byung ba yod par mi 'dod pa de dag gi ltar na ni tshigs su bcad pa dag gis don go bar zad do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#137578#137588#TD4035E.TXT.r_2192;TD4035E.TXT.r_2193;TD4035E.TXT.r_2194# spu'i khung bu thams cad nas kyang / / +me lce 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar ba 'byung bar 'gyur ro // /

column3: mtshan gzhi ni mtshon par bya ba yin pas na mtshan gzhi'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#137588#137595#TD4035E.TXT.r_2194;TD4035E.TXT.r_2195# yang lcags kyis gzhi tsha zhing rab tu tshal kun tu rab tu mched cing 'bar ba la / /
column5: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#137691#137692#TD4035E.TXT.r_2209;TD4035E.TXT.r_2210# lcags  glegs pa tsha zhing rab tu tshal / / +kun tu rab tu mched cing 'bar ba dag gis kyang lus kun nas yongs su dkri bar byed do // /

column3: mtshan nyid ni ngo bo nyid gsum mo // / +de  bas na mtshan gzhi dang mtshan nyid 'di ni las lta bu yin la / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#137596#137606#TD4035E.TXT.r_2195;TD4035E.TXT.r_2196;TD4035E.TXT.r_2197;TD4035E.TXT.r_2198# gan rkyal lam kha bub tu gzhag ste / /

column3: mtshon pa ni byed pa po lta bu yin te / / +'di ltar des mtshan gzhi dang mtshan nyid de mtshon par byed do zhes 'chad par 'gyur ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#137605#137618#TD4035E.TXT.r_2197;TD4035E.TXT.r_2198;TD4035E.TXT.r_2199# dper na sha'i snag bu la bya  ba bzhin du / / +lcags kyi tho ba tsha zhing kun tu rab tu 'bar bdag gis brdung zhing kun tu brdung la dmyal zhing kun tu dmyal lo // /

column3: sems ni ltar bcas gang yin dang / / +zhes bya ba la / / +sems zhes smos pas ni  gnyis su snang ba'i sems gzung bar snang ba dang  'dzin par snang ba gzung ba ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#137188#137196#TD4035E.TXT.r_2134;TD4035E.TXT.r_2135;TD4035E.TXT.r_2136;TD4035E.TXT.r_2137# gzhi de     // / +las yun ring por sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar 'gyur te / /
column5: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#137772#137789#TD4035E.TXT.r_2220;TD4035E.TXT.r_2221;TD4035E.TXT.r_2222;TD4035E.TXT.r_2223;TD4035E.TXT.r_2224# gzhi de las yun ring por sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar 'gyur te / / +ji srid du sdig pa mi dge ba'i las    thams cad kyi thams cad du yongs su ma zad cing ma byang gi bar du ste / /
column6: 0.023#TD4035E.TXT.r#138365#138365#TD4035E.TXT.r_2321# gzhi de las yun ring por sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar 'gyur te / /

column3: de la sems ni rnam par shes pa dang gzugs sogs zhes bya bas so // / +lta ba ni sems las byung ba'i chos rnams so zhes bya ba ni gsal ba'i phyir thams cad lta ba yin par tha snyad gdags    so ; / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#137641#137650#TD4035E.TXT.r_2202;TD4035E.TXT.r_2203;TD4035E.TXT.r_2204# de la sems can dmyal ba chen po rab tu tsha ba na ni / / +bye brag tu lcags kyi gsal shing rtse gsum pa rkub tu bcug nas / /

column3: de'i rnam par rig pa rtag tu de bzhin du 'jug pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni nam mkha' la sogs pa'i rnam par rig pa la 'gyur ba med pas rtag pa'o // /

column3: bag chags de las kyang zhes bya ba ni bag chags la gnas pa'o phyir brjod pa de las kyang zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#137662#137671#TD4035E.TXT.r_2205;TD4035E.TXT.r_2206;TD4035E.TXT.r_2207# cig shos kyang phrag pa  ya gcig nas 'byung ngo // /

column3: tha snyad la mi mkhas pa rnams la don du snang ba gang yin pa'o // / +zhes bya ba ni pa chung ngu rnams la'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#137672#137679#TD4035E.TXT.r_2207;TD4035E.TXT.r_2208# gzhi de las de dag gi kha nas kyang me lce 'bar ba 'byung la / /

column3: brjod pa'i don gyi 'du shes med par zhes bya ba ni byis pa chung ngu la sogs pa la bum pa zhes bya ba'i sgras ni brjod par bya ba'i don lto yangs pa dang  mgrin pa phra ba  gang yin pa brjod do zhes bya bar bye brag tu rtogs pa de med de / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#137680#137691#TD4035E.TXT.r_2208;TD4035E.TXT.r_2209;TD4035E.TXT.r_2210# mig gi 'bras bu gnyis dang  sna'i bu gu gnyis dang  rna ba'i bu gu gnyis dang  spu'i khung bu thams cad nas kyang me lce 'bar ba 'byung ngo // /
column5: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#137691#137702#TD4035E.TXT.r_2209;TD4035E.TXT.r_2210;TD4035E.TXT.r_2211# lcags  glegs pa tsha zhing rab tu tshal / / +kun tu rab tu mched cing 'bar ba dag gis kyang lus kun nas yongs su dkri bar byed do // /

column3: brjod pa'i don gyi 'du shes med bzhin du ci zhig tu rnam par rtog par byed do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#137444#137447#TD4035E.TXT.r_2173;TD4035E.TXT.r_2174# des de dag kun tu 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la / /

column6: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#137806#137811#TD4035E.TXT.r_2225;TD4035E.TXT.r_2226# sems can de  dag la shar phyogs na sa gzhi dpag tshad brgya phrag du ma yod pa kun tu 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la / /
column7: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#137881#137886#TD4035E.TXT.r_2240;TD4035E.TXT.r_2239;TD4035E.TXT.r_2241# yang lcags kyi zhib ma'i nang du lcags kyi  me mdag me kun tu 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la / /

column9: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#137930#137933#TD4035E.TXT.r_2250;TD4035E.TXT.r_2251# lcags kyi thu lum kun tu 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la / /

column3: brjod pa ji lta ba bzhin du don du 'du shes pa zhes bya ba ni bum pa la sogs pa'i mngon par brjod pa ci 'dra ba de 'dra ba'i sems las byung ba  mtshan mar 'dzin pa'i bdag nyid ni 'du shes so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#137711#137724#TD4035E.TXT.r_2211;TD4035E.TXT.r_2212;TD4035E.TXT.r_2213# yang lcags zangs chen po 'gyur byed bskol bas gang ba kun tu 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la / / +kun tu rab tu mched cing 'bar ba'i nang du sems can de dag spyi'u  tshugs su 'jug go // /
column5: 0.015#TD4035E.TXT.r#136451#136453#TD4035E.TXT.r_2018# ngas sems can 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la kun tu mched cing rab tu 'bar te / /
column6: 0.015#TD4043E.TXT.r#373071#373073#TD4043E.TXT.r_2321# gnas brtan mood gal gyi bus ji skad ngas sems can  'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la kun tu rab tu mched cing 'bar te me lce gcig tu gyur pa mthong ngo zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa lta BU'O ZHES BYA BA NI rgyal po'i khab kyi nam mkha' la mthong ba'i phyir ro zhes khungs bstan pa'o // /
column7: 0.017#TD4061E.TXT.r#1529354#1529355#TD4061E.TXT.r_2307# bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyang ring po nas shing gi sdong po chen po zhig 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la kun tu rab tu mched cing me lce gcig tu gyur te lam mer 'bar ba gzigs SO ZHES BYA BA NI MDO sde'i dum bu'o // /

column3: sems las byung ba zhes smos pas ni lhas byin zhes bya ba lta bu ming bsal ba yin no // /

column3: 'du shes de'i dmigs pa sngon po dang ser po dang skyes pa dang bud med pa la sogs pa gang yin pa de ni rgyu mtshan yin te / /

column3: rgyu mtshan des  'du shes de 'jug go // / +de ltar na tha snyad la mkhas pa'am tha snyad la mi mkhas pas brtag par bya ba bum pa la sogs pa don gang yin pa dang rgyu la sogs pa don gang yin pa dang rgyu gang las yin pa zhes bya ba ni bag chags gang las yin pas te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#137742#137750#TD4035E.TXT.r_2215;TD4035E.TXT.r_2216;TD4035E.TXT.r_2217# gang gi tshe pags pa dang  sha dang  khrag rnams kun zhig nas / / +keng rus 'ba' zhig lus par gyur pa de'i tshe / /
column5: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#137751#137758#TD4035E.TXT.r_2217;TD4035E.TXT.r_2218# yang phyir phyung zhing phyung  zhing lcags kyi sa gzhi la 'grems so // /

column3: de dag ni kun brtags pa'i mtshan nyid yin bar rig par bya'o // / +gal te ming ji lta bar don du snang ngam zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni gang zhig don ming gi ngo bo nyid kho na yin pa'am / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#137188#137196#TD4035E.TXT.r_2134;TD4035E.TXT.r_2135;TD4035E.TXT.r_2136;TD4035E.TXT.r_2137# gzhi de     // / +las yun ring por sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar 'gyur te / /

column3: ming don gyi ngo bo nyid yin par kun rtog par byed pa ste / / +gang dag ming dang  don dag glo bur pa nyid yin pa bsam nas don ming gi rang bzhin yin pa'am / /

column5: 0.005#TD4043E.TXT.r#373071#373073#TD4043E.TXT.r_2321# gnas brtan mood gal gyi bus ji skad ngas sems can  'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la kun tu rab tu mched cing 'bar te me lce gcig tu gyur pa mthong ngo zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa lta bu'o zhes bya ba ni rgyal po'i khab kyi nam mkha' la mthong ba'i phyir ro zhes khungs bstan pa'o // /
column6: 0.015#TD4061E.TXT.r#1529354#1529355#TD4061E.TXT.r_2307# bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyang ring po nas shing gi sdong po chen po zhig 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la kun tu rab tu mched cing me lce gcig tu gyur te lam mer 'bar ba gzigs so zhes bya ba ni mdo sde'i dum bu'o // /
column7: 0.023#TD4086E.TXT.r#1311023#1311023#TD4086E.TXT.r_3873# sems can dmyal pa chen po thig nag tu sems can gang skyes pa dang kun tu skyes pa dang  byung ba dang  kun tu byung ba nas 'thon par gyur pa'i bar dag gi sdig pa mi dge ba'i las de'i rnam par smin pas sems can dmyal ba'i srung ma dag gis sems can  dag lcags kyis gzhi 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la kun tu rab tu 'bar ro // /
column8: 0.023#TD4086E.TXT.r#1311142#1311142#TD4086E.TXT.r_3883# 'bar ba gcig tu gyur pa la gan rkyal du bzhag nas lcags kyi thig gis btab ste lcags kyi sta re 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar    la kun tu rab tu 'bar ste / /
column9: 0.023#TD4086E.TXT.r#1311171#1311171#TD4086E.TXT.r_3887# sems can de dag lcags kyi sa gzhi 'bar zhing rab tu  'bar la kun tu rab tu 'bar te / /
column10: 0.023#TD4086E.TXT.r#1311207#1311207#TD4086E.TXT.r_3890# sdig pa mi dge ba'i las de'i rnam par smin pas  sems can dmyal ba'i srung ma dag gis sems can de dag lcags kyi sa gzhi 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la kun tu rab tu 'bar te / /
column11: 0.023#TD4086E.TXT.r#1311308#1311308#TD4086E.TXT.r_3899# gzhan yang sems can dmyal ba chen po thig nag tu sems can gang skyes pa dang  kun tu skyes pa dang  'thon par 'gyur ba'i bar dag gi sdig pa mi dge ba'i las de'i rnam bar smin  pas sems can dmyal ba'i srung ma dag gis sems can de dag lcags kyi rgyud 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la kun tu rab tu 'bar te 'bar ba gcig tu gyur pas mgo bo dkri bar byed do // /
column12: 0.023#TD4086E.TXT.r#1312487#1312488#TD4086E.TXT.r_4027# de nas sems can de dag 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la kun tu rab tu 'bar te 'bar ba gcig tu gyur nas ji ste shar phyogs su 'gro na yang me 'ba' zhig mthong ngo // /
column13: 0.023#TD4086E.TXT.r#1312730#1312730#TD4086E.TXT.r_4070# sems can de dag der 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar  la kun tu rab tu 'bar te / /
column14: 0.023#TD4086E.TXT.r#1313148#1313148#TD4086E.TXT.r_4132# sems can dmyal ba'i srung ma dag gis sems can de dag lcags kyi dong 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la kun tu rab tu 'bar te / /

column16: 0.023#TD4086E.TXT.r#1313443#1313443#TD4086E.TXT.r_4173# lcags kyi dong 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la kun tu rab tu 'bar te 'bar ba gcig tu gyur pa'i nang du sreg cing zlog par byed de /// /
column17: 0.029#TD4086E.TXT.r#1312931#1312931#TD4086E.TXT.r_4103# de nas  sems can de dag 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la kun tu rab tu 'bar te / /

column3: gnas su snang ba zhes bya ba ni sa la sogs par snang ba ste / / +kun gzhi rnam par shes pa gnas kyi rnam par rig pa la der snang ba nyid du ston to // /

column3: don du snang ba zhes bya ba ni     // / +gzugs la sogs pa yul rnams so // / +lus su snang ba ni mig la sogs pa dbang po rnams so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#137822#137833#TD4035E.TXT.r_2228;TD4035E.TXT.r_2229;TD4035E.TXT.r_2230;TD4035E.TXT.r_2231;TD4035E.TXT.r_2232;TD4035E.TXT.r_2233# des sems can de dag gi pags pa yang bshig / / +sha yang bshig / / +rgyus pa yang bshig / /

column3: yod pa dang med pa de dag tha mi dad pa'i phyir yod pa dang med pa mnyam pa nyid kyang yin no zhes bya ba ni de bzhin nyid ni sangs rgyas nyid yin pas ji skad  du sangs rgyas nyid la 'jug pa'i thabs kyi skabs nas / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#137834#137851#TD4035E.TXT.r_2232;TD4035E.TXT.r_2233;TD4035E.TXT.r_2234;TD4035E.TXT.r_2235;TD4035E.TXT.r_2236# rus pa dang rkang la thug par byed do / / +dper na mar me'i snying po bzhin du / / +lus thams cad me lce 'bar bas khyab par 'gyur ro // /
column5: 0.011#TD4086E.TXT.r#1315698#1315700#TD4086E.TXT.r_4435;TD4086E.TXT.r_4436# ro myags pa dang  phyi sa'i 'dam dang  lo ma ral gri lta bu'i tshal dang  lcags kyi shal ma li'i tshal dang  chu klung rnam par rgal ZHES BYA BA YOD DE / / +shar phyogs  ji lta ba bzhin du lho dang nub dang byang phyogs kyang de bzhin no // /
column6: 0.022#TD4094.2E.TXT.r#1906341#1906341#TD4094.2E.TXT.r_2861;TD4094.2E.TXT.r_2862# lus kyi stod nas chu grang mo'i rgyun 'byung zhing lus kyi smad nas 'bar ba dang  lus kyi smad nas chu grang mo'i rgyun  'byung zhing lus kyi stod nas 'bar bar byed de / / +shar phyogs ji lta ba bzhin du lho dang  de bzhin du nub dang  de bzhin du byang phyogs su yang ston par byed de / /
column7: 0.026#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1757431#1757431#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_7292;TD4094.1E.TXT.r_7293;TD4094.1E.TXT.r_7294# de dag yongs su zang cing gtugs shing gzhan nye bar len pa ma tshogs pas nye bar len pa med par shi bar 'gyur  te ; / +de shar phyogs su ma song / / +lho dang  nub dang  byang gi phyogs su ma song zhes lung bstan par bya'o // /
column8: 0.026#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1757493#1757493#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_7298;TD4094.1E.TXT.r_7299;TD4094.1E.TXT.r_7300# rtsa  ba bcad cing shing ta la mgo bcad pa ltar skal ba mnyam par phyis mi skye ba'i chos can du 'gyur te / / +shar phyogs su ma song / / +lho dang  nub dang  byang phyogs su ma song ba ste zab cing rgya che la tshad med cing bgrang du med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya'o // /
column9: 0.026#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2718885#2718885#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_2249# de la spyod yul gsum pa ni shar dang lho dang nub dang byang la sogs pa'i phyogs rnams yin par rig par bya'o // /
column10: 0.026#TD4039E.TXT.r#1882226#1882226#TD4039E.TXT.r_7910;TD4039E.TXT.r_7911# mi brtan pa dang  snying po med pa dang  sems rmongs par byed pa'i phyir te / / +shar dang  lho dang  nub dang  byang gi phyogs nas 'ongs pa'i khyogs dang  bzhon pa dang  shing rta dang  shing rta phal pa lta bu ni tshul  bzhin yid la byed pa ste lus la sogs pa bzhi la dmigs pa'i sgo nas / /
column11: 0.027#TD4037E.TXT.r#1376904#1376904#TD4037E.TXT.r_8038;TD4037E.TXT.r_8039# sems can gyi ris rnam pa sna tshogs 'di lta ste / / +shar phyogs rnams dang  lho phyogs rnams dang  byang phyogs rnams dang  nub phyogs rnams dang  ming dang  brda sna tshogs rnam par gzhag pa tha dad pa rnams kyis sngon 'das pa'i lus rnams la sngon gyi gnas rnam pa du ma rjes su     // /
column12: 0.027#TD4094.2E.TXT.r#1895528#1895528#TD4094.2E.TXT.r_1438# dge slong  dag khyed cag gis rigs kyi bu gnag tshogs can gyi lus la du ba 'thul zhing rab rib dang mun pa lta bur shar phyogs dang  lho dang  nub dang  byang phyogs su khyab cing 'phros pa dag mthong ngam / /
column13: 0.029#TD4086E.TXT.r#1314392#1314392#TD4086E.TXT.r_4294;TD4086E.TXT.r_4295# nam sems can dmyal ba nyams su myong bar 'gyur ba'i sdig pa mi dge ba'i las de gtan ma byang ma zad kyi bar du re zhig dus byed par mi 'gyur ro // / +lho dang nub dang byang phyogs su yang de bzhin du brjod par bya'o // /

column3: med pa gang yin de nyid ni // / +yod pa yi ni dam pa yin // / +zhes bshad pa lta bu ste / / +kun brtags pa'i mtshan nyid gnyis po med pa gang yin pa de nyid de bzhin nyid yod pa yin la / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#137852#137863#TD4035E.TXT.r_2236;TD4035E.TXT.r_2237;TD4035E.TXT.r_2238# sems can de dag kyang de'i  rgyus me nyid kyi phung po lta bur snang ste / /

column3: de bzhin nyid yod pa gang  yin pa de nyid kun brtags pa'i mtshan nyid med pa yin no // / +rnal 'byor gyi sa ni zhi gnas dang lhag mthong zung du 'brel ba'i lam ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#137864#137881#TD4035E.TXT.r_2237;TD4035E.TXT.r_2238;TD4035E.TXT.r_2239;TD4035E.TXT.r_2240# me'i phung po phyogs bzhi nas 'ongs pa der 'dres par gyur bas / / +de dag de na sdug bsngal myong ba la bar skabs med do // /

column3: de yang rnam pa lnga'o // / +me long lta bu ni sems kyi dbyings la gnas pa'i ting nge 'dzin te / /
column4: 0.017#TD4035E.TXT.r#136451#136453#TD4035E.TXT.r_2018# ngas sems can 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la kun tu mched cing rab tu 'bar te / /
column5: 0.017#TD4043E.TXT.r#373071#373073#TD4043E.TXT.r_2321# gnas brtan mood gal gyi bus ji skad ngas sems can  'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la kun tu rab tu mched cing 'bar te me lce gcig tu gyur pa mthong ngo zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa lta bu'o zhes bya ba ni rgyal po'i khab kyi nam mkha' la mthong ba'i phyir ro zhes khungs bstan pa'o // /
column6: 0.017#TD4086E.TXT.r#1311169#1311171#TD4086E.TXT.r_3887# sems can de dag lcags kyi sa gzhi 'bar zhing rab tu  'bar la kun tu rab tu 'bar te / /
column7: 0.017#TD4086E.TXT.r#1311205#1311207#TD4086E.TXT.r_3890# sdig pa mi dge ba'i las de'i rnam par smin pas  sems can dmyal ba'i srung ma dag gis sems can de dag lcags kyi sa gzhi 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la kun tu rab tu 'bar te / /
column8: 0.018#TD4061E.TXT.r#1529354#1529355#TD4061E.TXT.r_2307# bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyang ring po nas shing gi sdong po chen po zhig 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la kun tu rab tu mched cing me lce gcig tu gyur te lam mer 'bar ba gzigs so zhes bya ba ni mdo sde'i dum bu'o // /
column9: 0.023#TD4086E.TXT.r#1312487#1312488#TD4086E.TXT.r_4027# de nas sems can de dag 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la kun tu rab tu 'bar te 'bar ba gcig tu gyur nas ji ste shar phyogs su 'gro na yang me 'ba' zhig mthong ngo // /
column10: 0.024#TD4086E.TXT.r#1312931#1312931#TD4086E.TXT.r_4103# de nas  sems can de dag 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la kun tu rab tu 'bar te / /

column3: gong du ming la gnas par bshad pa gang  yin pa nyid do zhes bya ba gong du ji skad bshad ce na / /
column4: 0.005#TD4035E.TXT.r#136451#136453#TD4035E.TXT.r_2018# ngas sems can 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la kun tu mched cing rab tu 'bar te / /
column5: 0.005#TD4043E.TXT.r#373071#373073#TD4043E.TXT.r_2321# gnas brtan mood gal gyi bus ji skad ngas sems can  'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la kun tu rab tu mched cing 'bar te me lce gcig tu gyur pa mthong ngo zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa lta bu'o zhes bya ba ni rgyal po'i khab kyi nam mkha' la mthong ba'i phyir ro zhes khungs bstan pa'o // /
column6: 0.015#TD4061E.TXT.r#1529354#1529355#TD4061E.TXT.r_2307# bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyang ring po nas shing gi sdong po chen po zhig 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la kun tu rab tu mched cing me lce gcig tu gyur te lam mer 'bar ba gzigs SO ZHES BYA BA NI mdo sde'i dum bu'o // /
column7: 0.023#TD4086E.TXT.r#1311023#1311023#TD4086E.TXT.r_3873# sems can dmyal pa chen po thig nag tu sems can gang skyes pa dang kun tu skyes pa dang  byung ba dang  kun tu byung ba nas 'thon par gyur pa'i bar dag gi sdig pa mi dge ba'i las de'i rnam par smin pas sems can dmyal ba'i srung ma dag gis sems can  dag lcags kyis gzhi 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la kun tu rab tu 'bar ro // /
column8: 0.023#TD4086E.TXT.r#1311142#1311142#TD4086E.TXT.r_3883# 'bar ba gcig tu gyur pa la gan rkyal du bzhag nas lcags kyi thig gis btab ste lcags kyi sta re 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar    la kun tu rab tu 'bar ste / /
column9: 0.023#TD4086E.TXT.r#1311308#1311308#TD4086E.TXT.r_3899# gzhan yang sems can dmyal ba chen po thig nag tu sems can gang skyes pa dang  kun tu skyes pa dang  'thon par 'gyur ba'i bar dag gi sdig pa mi dge ba'i las de'i rnam bar smin  pas sems can dmyal ba'i srung ma dag gis sems can de dag lcags kyi rgyud 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la kun tu rab tu 'bar te 'bar ba gcig tu gyur pas mgo bo dkri bar byed do // /
column10: 0.023#TD4086E.TXT.r#1312730#1312730#TD4086E.TXT.r_4070# sems can de dag der 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar  la kun tu rab tu 'bar te / /
column11: 0.023#TD4086E.TXT.r#1313148#1313148#TD4086E.TXT.r_4132# sems can dmyal ba'i srung ma dag gis sems can de dag lcags kyi dong 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la kun tu rab tu 'bar te / /
column12: 0.023#TD4086E.TXT.r#1313211#1313211#TD4086E.TXT.r_4138# de dag sems can dmyal ba'i srung ma rnams kyis bzung nas lcags kyi mdung rtse gsum ba'i stan 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la kun tu rab tu 'bar te / /
column13: 0.023#TD4086E.TXT.r#1313443#1313443#TD4086E.TXT.r_4173# lcags kyi dong 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la kun tu rab tu 'bar te 'bar ba gcig tu gyur pa'i nang du sreg cing zlog par byed de /// /

column3: sems ming la gnas pa'i phyir bsgoms pa las byung ba'i shes pas de rnyed par rig par bya ste / /
gnyis mi dmigs pa rnyed pa las ji skad bshad pa lta bur gnyis mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro zhes bshad do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#137900#137910#TD4035E.TXT.r_2243;TD4035E.TXT.r_2244;TD4035E.TXT.r_2245;TD4035E.TXT.r_2246;TD4035E.TXT.r_2247# phyir yang 'bab tu 'jug go // / +yang kha nas lce phyung ste / /
column5: 1.192#TD4086E.TXT.r#1313967#1313969#TD4086E.TXT.r_4253;TD4086E.TXT.r_4254# 'bar ba gcig tu gyur pa la gan rkyal du bzhag nas kha nas lce phyung ste / /

column3: gzung  ba dang 'dzin pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // / +'di ni mthong ba'i lam gyi gnas skabs yin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#137911#137920#TD4035E.TXT.r_2246;TD4035E.TXT.r_2247;TD4035E.TXT.r_2248# dper na glang gi ko ba la bya ba bzhin du de thang bcad de / / +gnyer ma rangs shing kham khum med par byed do // /

column3: rten ni gnas gzhan du gyur pa'o zhes bya ba ni med na med pa yin pa'i phyir rten smos kyi / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#137921#137930#TD4035E.TXT.r_2247;TD4035E.TXT.r_2248;TD4035E.TXT.r_2249;TD4035E.TXT.r_2250# gnyer ma rangs shing kham khum med par byed do // / +yang lcags kyi sa gzhi de nyid la gan rkyal du bzhag nas / /
column5: 0.016#TD4086E.TXT.r#1315061#1315062#TD4086E.TXT.r_4372# lcags kyi skam pas lcags kyi thu lum 'bar zhing  rab tu 'bar la kun tu rab tu 'bar te 'bar ba gcig tu gyur pa dag khar 'dzud de / /
column6: 0.019#TD4035E.TXT.r#137444#137444#TD4035E.TXT.r_2173# des de dag kun tu 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la / /
column7: 0.021#TD4086E.TXT.r#1313953#1313954#TD4086E.TXT.r_4252# de dag sems can dmyal ba'i srung ma dag gis bzung nas lcags kyi sa gzhi 'bar zhing  rab tu 'bar la kun tu rab tu 'bar te / /
column8: 0.021#TD4086E.TXT.r#1314027#1314028#TD4086E.TXT.r_4257# gzhan yang sems can  dmyal ba chen po mnar med par sems can gang skyes pa dang  kun tu skyes pa de dag sems can dmyal ba'i srung ma dag gis bzung nas lcags kyi sa gzhi 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la kun tu rab tu 'bar te 'bar ba gcig tu gyur pa la spyi'u tshugs su bzhag nas glo gnyis  nas pags pa bshus te / /
column9: 0.021#TD4086E.TXT.r#1314154#1314155#TD4086E.TXT.r_4264# gzhan yang sems  can dmyal ba chen po mnar med par sems can gang dag skyes pa nas 'thon par gyur pa'i bar de dag sems can dmyal ba'i srung ma dag gis bzung nas lcags kyi sa gzhi 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la kun tu rab tu 'bar te 'bar ba gcig tu gyur pa la bzhag nas / /
column10: 0.021#TD4086E.TXT.r#1313519#1313521#TD4086E.TXT.r_4179;TD4086E.TXT.r_4180# sems can de dag gi sdig pa mi dge ba'i las de'i rnam par smin pas sems can dmyal ba'i srung ma rnams kyis sems  can de dag bzung nas lcags kyi mtshon gyis dum bu dum bur bcad de / / +lcags kyi sa gzhi 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la kun tu rab tu 'bar te 'bar ba gcig tu gyur pa la rab tu bsgre zhing shin tu rngo bar byed de / /
column11: 0.021#TD4086E.TXT.r#1315106#1315106#TD4086E.TXT.r_4374# gzhan yang sems can dmyal ba chen po'i srung ma de dag gis sems can de dag mchil pas nya dbyung ba bzhin du phyung nas lcags kyi sa gzhi 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la kun tu rab tu 'bar te 'bar ba gcig tu gyur pa la gan rkyal du bzhag nas / /
column12: 0.022#TD4086E.TXT.r#1312487#1312487#TD4086E.TXT.r_4027# de nas sems can de dag 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la kun tu rab tu 'bar te 'bar ba gcig tu gyur nas ji ste shar phyogs su 'gro na yang me 'ba' zhig mthong ngo // /
column13: 0.022#TD4086E.TXT.r#1312931#1312931#TD4086E.TXT.r_4103# de nas  sems can de dag 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la kun tu rab tu 'bar te / /
column14: 0.025#TD4086E.TXT.r#1315142#1315143#TD4086E.TXT.r_4380# 'on kyang bdag cag skom mo zhes nas de dag sems can dmyal ba'i srung ma dag gis lcags kyi spyad kyis kha phye nas  zangs bskol ba 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la kun tu rab tu 'bar te 'bar ba gcig tu gyur pa khar ldugs te / /
column15: 0.027#TD4086E.TXT.r#1300315#1300315#TD4086E.TXT.r_2478;TD4086E.TXT.r_2480# me'i phung po chen po rab tu 'bar ba de bzhin du nyi ma bdun pa 'jig rten du byung bas sa chen po 'di dag ri'i rgyal po ri rab 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar     // / +kun tu rab tu 'bar nas me lce gcig tu gyur cing sreg go // /
column16: 0.028#TD4035E.TXT.r#137710#137710#TD4035E.TXT.r_2211# yang lcags zangs chen po 'gyur byed bskol bas gang ba kun tu 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la / /
column17: 0.028#TD4086E.TXT.r#1314212#1314213#TD4086E.TXT.r_4268# de dag sems can dmyal ba'i srung ma dag gis bzung nas lcags kyi ri 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la kun tu rab tu 'bar te 'bar ba gcig tu gyur pa la 'dzeg tu 'jug cing phyir yang 'bab tu 'jug ste / /
column18: 0.028#TD4086E.TXT.r#1315881#1315881#TD4086E.TXT.r_4469# ZHES BYA BA NI SEMS can dmyal ba chen po mnar med pa dpag tshad mang po dang  dpag tshad brgya phrag mang po dang  dpag tshad stong phrag mang po dang  dpag tshad brgya stong phrag mang por lcags 'bar zhing rab tu 'bar la kun tu rab tu 'bar te 'bar ba gcig tu gyur  cing sreg pa'o // /

column3: tshigs su bcad pa las ni rten smos pa med de / / +rnal 'byor  gyi sa thob pa 'dis na mnyam pa nyid du 'gyur ba la sogs pa yin no // /

column3: rnal 'byor gyi sa des mtshan gzhi lnga dang mtshan nyid de mtshon par byed do // /

column3: mtshan gzhi de gang zhe na / / +gzugs dang  sems dang  sems las byung ba dang  sems dang ldan pa ma yin pa'i  'du byed dag dang  'dus ma byas zhes bya ba rnam pa lngas bshad pa gang yin pa'o // /

column3: mtshan nyid ni kun brtags pa dang  gzhan gyi dbang du yongs su grub pa'i mtshan nyid rnams so // / +mtshon bya ni rnam pa lnga yin pas gzhi dang skyed pa dang me long lta bu dang snang ba    dang rten gyi bye brag gis tha dad pa lam rnam pa lnga'i ngo bo nyid du rig par bya ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#137246#137255#TD4035E.TXT.r_2144;TD4035E.TXT.r_2145;TD4035E.TXT.r_2146# gzhi de las yun ring por sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar 'gyur te / /
