column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#140686#140699#TD4035E.TXT.r_2667;TD4035E.TXT.r_2668;TD4035E.TXT.r_2669;TD4035E.TXT.r_2670# sdug bsngal gyi sdug bsngal gyis sdug bsngal ba dang  sdug bsngal yang ma yin bde ba yang ma yin ba'i tshor ba ni  'du byed kyi sdug bsngal gyis sdug bsngal ba'o zhes gsungs so // /
column5: 0.021#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2713346#2713347#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_1465# de la tshor ba'i phung po'i spyi'i mtshan nyid ni bde ba'i tshor ba ni 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal nyid kyis sdug bsngal  ba dang  sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba ni sdug bsngal gyi sdug bsngal nyid kyis sdug bsngal ba dang  sdug bsngal yang ma yin bde ba yang ma yin pa'i tshor ba ni 'du byed kyi sdug bsngal nyid kyis sdug bsngal ba'i dbang du mdzad nas / /
column6: 0.022#TD4043E.TXT.r#374878#374878#TD4043E.TXT.r_2525;TD4043E.TXT.r_2526# mdo nyid las ji skad rgyas par 'byung ba bzhin du rig par bya'o ZHES BYA BA NI DGE slong gang zang zing dang bcas pa'i dga' ba yang yod / / +zang zing med pa'i dga' ba yang yod / /
column7: 0.028#TD4090.2E.TXT.r#1052552#1052552#TD4090.2E.TXT.r_104;TD4090.2E.TXT.r_105;TD4090.2E.TXT.r_106# gnas pa na yang sdug bsngal lo zhes gsungs so // / +bde ba yang ma    yin ; / +sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin ba'i tshor ba ni rkyen gyis mngon par 'du byed pa'i phyir 'du byed kho nas sdug bsngal ba nyid de / /

column3: longs spyod rnam pa sna tshogs kyang 'thob pa de rnam par smin pa las mi lta'o zhes bya ba 'di ni ngo mtshar che ba med do snyam pa yid la byed pa ni sbyin pa la sogs pas sems can thams cad la mnyam  pa nyid 'jug par mngon par 'du byed pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i sbyin pa la sogs pa'i bya ba la zhugs pa la ni 'di snyam du sems can 'di dag ni gnyen po la sogs pa ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#140699#140709#TD4035E.TXT.r_2669;TD4035E.TXT.r_2670# zang zing med pa'i dga' ba yang yod / / +zang zing med pa bas kyang ches zang zing med pa'i dga' ba yang yod DO ZHES BYA BA LA SOGS PA gsungs pa gang yin pa de yang mdo  nyid las ji skad rgyas par 'byung ba bzhin du rig par bya'o // /
column5: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#140710#140717#TD4035E.TXT.r_2670;TD4035E.TXT.r_2671# zang zing med pa bas kyang ches zang zing med pa'i dga' ba yang yod DO ZHES BYA BA LA SOGS PA gsungs pa gang yin pa de yang mdo  nyid las ji skad rgyas par 'byung ba bzhin du rig par bya'o // /
column6: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#140718#140733#TD4035E.TXT.r_2671;TD4035E.TXT.r_2672;TD4035E.TXT.r_2673;TD4035E.TXT.r_2674;TD4035E.TXT.r_2675# bcom ldan 'das kyis khams gnyis na yod pa'i 'du shes dang  tshor ba 'gog pa'i bde ba ni / /
column7: 0.014#TD4043E.TXT.r#374867#374868#TD4043E.TXT.r_2524;TD4043E.TXT.r_2525# de bzhin du legs 'byor gyi mdo las sems can ji lta bar bdud kyang de bzhin no zhes gsungs so // / +mdo nyid las ji skad rgyas par 'byung ba bzhin du rig par BYA'O ZHES BYA BA NI dge slong gang zang zing dang bcas pa'i dga' ba yang yod / /
column8: 0.025#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#2069861#2069862#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_13287# thams cad rgyas par mdo las ji skad  'byung ba bzhin khong du chud par bya'o // /

column3: bdag la byams pa yin pas 'di dag ni sbyin pa la sogs pa rab tu sbyin par bya'o // /
'di dag  ni gnyen pa ma yin te / / +byams pa ma yin pa 'di dag la ni rab tu sbyin par mi bya'o snyam du sems pa'i ma snyoms par 'gyur ba med do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#140734#140753#TD4035E.TXT.r_2673;TD4035E.TXT.r_2674;TD4035E.TXT.r_2675;TD4035E.TXT.r_2676# gnas pa'i bde ba las dgongs PA YIN GYI / / +tshor pa'i  bde ba ni MA YIN NO // / +bde ba gsum po 'dod chags dang bral ba dang  zhe sdang dang bral ba dang  gti mug dang bral ba zhes gsungs pa'i bde ba gsum po de dag ni zag pa med pa'i dbyings nyid la yod de / /

column3: 'o na ci zhe na / / +khyad par med par sems can thams cad la sbyin pa la sogs pa la 'jug go // / +bdag nyid chen po mthong ba yid la byed pa ni pha rol tu  phyin pa rnams la sems can la phan pa nyid du yang dag par mthong ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni sbyin pas ni sems can rnams dge ba bya ba'i snod nyid la 'god par byed do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#140753#140761#TD4035E.TXT.r_2676;TD4035E.TXT.r_2677;TD4035E.TXT.r_2678;TD4035E.TXT.r_2679# de bas na zag pa med pa'i dbyings ni bde ba gsum po de dag gis dus thams cad du    bde ba kho na yin no // /
column5: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#140762#140771#TD4035E.TXT.r_2677;TD4035E.TXT.r_2678;TD4035E.TXT.r_2679;TD4035E.TXT.r_2680;TD4035E.TXT.r_2681# de la zas kyi longs spyod ni 'di yin te / / +'di lta ste / / +khams gsum na spyod pa'i sems can skyes shing byung ba rnams ni / /

column3: 'di ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i phan pa nyid yin no // / +tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i phan pa nyid ni gzhan dag sdom  pa la sogs pa tshul khrims gsum la 'god pa yin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#140772#140784#TD4035E.TXT.r_2680;TD4035E.TXT.r_2681# zas rnam pa bzhi po rnams kyis tshe'i tshad ji tsam pa'i bar du gnas shing 'tsho ba'o // / +de la reg pa dang yid la sems pa dang rnam  par shes pa'i zas rnam pa gsum gyis ni khams gsum na spyod pa'i sems can rnams gnas shing 'tsho'o // /

column3: bzod pas phan pa nyid ni gnod pa byed pa la bzod pa yin no // / +brtson 'grus kyis ni don byed par 'gyur ba nyid yin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#140785#140792#TD4035E.TXT.r_2681;TD4035E.TXT.r_2682# de la reg pa dang yid la sems pa dang rnam  par shes pa'i zas rnam pa gsum gyis ni khams gsum na spyod pa'i sems can rnams gnas shing 'tsho'o // / +kham gyi zas kyis ni 'dod pa na spyod pa kho na'i sems can rnams gnas shing 'tsho'o // /

column3: bsam gtan gyis ni mthu'i khyad par dang ldan pa'i phyir dang bar byed pa yin no // / +shes rab kyis ni the tshom can     // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#140793#140801#TD4035E.TXT.r_2682;TD4035E.TXT.r_2683;TD4035E.TXT.r_2684# kham gyi zas kyis ni 'dod pa na spyod pa kho na'i sems can rnams gnas shing 'tsho'o // /

column3: rnams kyi the tshom gcod pa yin no // / +lan re yid la byed pa ni gzhan dag la sbyin pa la sogs pa'i yon tan la 'jug pas so zhes bya ba ni gal te gzhan dag la sbyin pa la sogs pa rab tu sbyor na de ltar na de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' la lan du phan btags par 'gyur  ro ; / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#140802#140812#TD4035E.TXT.r_2683;TD4035E.TXT.r_2684;TD4035E.TXT.r_2685;TD4035E.TXT.r_2686# de la sems can dmyal bar skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi khong na ni / / +rlung rgyu ba'i  kham gyi zas cha phra ba yod do // /
column5: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#140812#140823#TD4035E.TXT.r_2685;TD4035E.TXT.r_2686;TD4035E.TXT.r_2687;TD4035E.TXT.r_2688# des de dag gnas shing 'tsho'o // / +dud 'gro rnams dang  yi dags rnams dang  mi rnams kyi ni kham gyi zas rags pa yin te / /

column3: smon pa yid la byed pa ni sems can dag la pha rol tu phyin pa rnams gnas gsum du smon pa'i phyir te zhes bya ba ni / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#140824#140832#TD4035E.TXT.r_2688;TD4035E.TXT.r_2689# de yang mer mer por 'dug pa la sogs pa'i sems can rnams dang  'dod pa  na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyi ni cha phra ste / /

column3: rtag tu 'phel dang nyams pa dang / / +sems can rab tu smin pa dang / / +sa la khyad par 'gro ba dang / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#140833#140840#TD4035E.TXT.r_2688;TD4035E.TXT.r_2689;TD4035E.TXT.r_2690# de yang mer mer por 'dug pa la sogs pa'i sems can rnams dang  'dod pa  na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyi ni cha phra ste / / +'di ltar de dag gi ni kham gyi zas zos ba'i mdo la / /

column3: bla na med pa'i byang chub 'dod // / +ces 'byung ba lta bu  yin no // / +rgyun du yid la byed pa ni sbyin pa la sogs pas dus don yod par byed par mngon par 'du byed pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#140841#140854#TD4035E.TXT.r_2690;TD4035E.TXT.r_2691;TD4035E.TXT.r_2692;TD4035E.TXT.r_2693# lus kyi yan lag thams cad du song nas zhu par 'gyur te / /

column3: 'jigs spangs yang dag bskyed pa dang / / +the tshom dag ni gcod pa dang / / +zhes bya ba la sogs pa lta bus dus don yod par byed par mngon par 'du byed do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#140855#140866#TD4035E.TXT.r_2692;TD4035E.TXT.r_2693;TD4035E.TXT.r_2694;TD4035E.TXT.r_2695;TD4035E.TXT.r_2696# de la 'khrig pa'i longs spyod ni 'di yin te / / +sems can dmyal ba'i sems can rnams  la ni / / +thams cad kyi thams cad du med de / /
column5: 0.016#TD4035E.TXT.r#139142#139142#TD4035E.TXT.r_2436# gzugs dang gzugs  med pa na spyod pa'i sems can rnams la ni sdug bsngal de dag rnam pa thams cad du med do // /

column3: yang dag pa'i sbyor ba yid la byed pa ni phyin ci ma log par bsgrub pa yid la byed pa dang  tshu rol du mi gnas pa'i yid la byed pas de ston par byed de / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#140867#140876#TD4035E.TXT.r_2695;TD4035E.TXT.r_2696;TD4035E.TXT.r_2697# 'di ltar de dag sdug bsngal drag bo dang  rnam pa sna tshogs dang  yun ring ba dang  rgyun mi 'chad pa nyams su myong ba'i phyir te / / +de bas na de dag ni skyes pa rnams kyang bud med rnams la bud med kyi 'dun pa yang mi skye la / /

column3: ji skad du 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa'i mdo las / / +rnam par smin pa la re ba med pa'i sbyin pas zhes bya ba la sogs pas  ji srid kyis thob par bya ba'i don mthar phyin pa de srid du phyin ci ma log pa'i sbyor bas rab tu sbyor ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#140877#140887#TD4035E.TXT.r_2697;TD4035E.TXT.r_2698;TD4035E.TXT.r_2699# bud med  rnams kyang skyes pa rnams la skyes pa'i 'dun pa yang mi skye na phan tshun gnyis kyis gnyis sbyor ba lta ga la yod / /
column5: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#140888#140896#TD4035E.TXT.r_2698;TD4035E.TXT.r_2699;TD4035E.TXT.r_2700# dud 'gro rnams dang  yi dags rnams dang  mi rnams la ni lus kyi bde ba 'am / / +sdug bsngal 'dres par yod pas 'khrig pa'i sbyor ba yod de / /

column3: ji srid du thob par bya ba'i don de ma thob pa de srid du rnam pa gang gis kyang tshu rol du mi gnas so zhes 'byung ba lta bu ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#140897#140906#TD4035E.TXT.r_2700;TD4035E.TXT.r_2701;TD4035E.TXT.r_2702;TD4035E.TXT.r_2703# skyes pa dang bud med  de rnams phan tshun gnyis kyis gnyis sprod par byed de khu ba yang 'byung ngo // /

column3: yang dag pa'i sbyor ba yid la byed pa ni de lta bu yin par rig  par bya'o // / +ma dad pa zhes bya ba ni pha rol tu phyin pa ltar bcom pa la ma dad pa zhes bya bar sbyar ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#140907#140928#TD4035E.TXT.r_2701;TD4035E.TXT.r_2702;TD4035E.TXT.r_2703;TD4035E.TXT.r_2704;TD4035E.TXT.r_2705# 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha rnams la yang 'khrig pa'i sbyor ba ni yod la / / +khu ba 'byung ba ni med de / / +de dag ni 'byung ba'i tshe mtshan gyi sgo nas rlung nyi tshe 'byung ngo // /

column3: yang dag pa la ni dad pa ste / / +re ba med pa'i sbyin pa dang / / +yang srid mi 'dod tshul khrims dang / /
zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'byung ba lta bu yin no // / +dang du mi len pa  yid la byed pa zhes bya ba ji ltar na dang du len par mi byed ce na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#140929#140938#TD4035E.TXT.r_2705;TD4035E.TXT.r_2706;TD4035E.TXT.r_2707;TD4035E.TXT.r_2708# sprad pas gdung ba med par 'gyur ro // / +rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyis ji lta ba bzhin du / /
column5: 0.024#TD4086E.TXT.r#1281827#1281827#TD4086E.TXT.r_294# rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams ji lta ba bzhin du sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang  'thab bral ba rnams dang  dga' ldan pa rnams dang  'phrul    dga' ba rnams dang  gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyang de bzhin no // /
column6: 0.024#TD4086E.TXT.r#1283290#1283290#TD4086E.TXT.r_481# rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams ji lta ba bzhin du sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang  'thab bral ba rnams dang  dga' ldan pa rnams dang  'phrul dga' ba rnams dang  gzhan    'phrul dbang byed pa rnams la yang de bzhin no // /
column7: 0.024#TD4086E.TXT.r#1283360#1283360#TD4086E.TXT.r_488# rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams ji lta ba bzhin du sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang  'thab bral ba rnams dang  dga' ldan ba rnams dang  'phrul dga' ba rnams dang  gzhan 'phrul  dbang byed pa rnams la yang de bzhin no // /
column8: 0.027#TD4086E.TXT.r#1281773#1281773#TD4086E.TXT.r_288# ji ltar 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams la bkres pa dang  skom pa yod pa bzhin du shar gyi lus 'phags po rnams dang  nub kyi ba  lang spyod pa rnams dang  byang gi sgra mi snyan pa rnams dang  rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang  sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang  'thab bral ba rnams dang  dga' ldan pa rnams dang  'phrul dga' ba rnams dang  gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams la yang yod do // /
column9: 0.028#TD4067E.TXT.r#1094131#1094131#TD4067E.TXT.r_1290# 'dod pa'i khams su skyes pa'i lha drug la rgyal chen bzhi'i ris rnams dang  sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams dang  'thab bral rnams dang  dga' ldan rnams dang  'phrul dga' rnams dang  gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams te / /

column3: 'di ltar ser sna la sogs pa mi mthun pa'i phyogs 'dul bar mngon par 'du byed pas te / / +mi mthun pa'i phyogs de dag ci nas kyang yang mi 'byung ba de ltar 'dul bar byed do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#140939#140951#TD4035E.TXT.r_2707;TD4035E.TXT.r_2708;TD4035E.TXT.r_2709# sum cu rtsa gsum pa rnams kyang de dang 'dra'o // / +'thab bral ba rnams ni gcig la gcig 'khyud pa tsam gyis gdung ba med par 'gyur ro // /

column3: dga' ba yid la byed pa ni    rnam pa gnyis te / / +pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa lung bstan pa thob par dga' ba yid la byed pa dang zhes bya ba ni / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#140952#140962#TD4035E.TXT.r_2709;TD4035E.TXT.r_2710# dga' ldan pa rnams ni gcig la  gcig lag pa nas 'dzin ba tsam gyis gdung ba med par 'gyur ro // /

column3: gang zag dus kyi bri brag gis // / +blo ldan lung bstan rnam pa gnyis // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#140963#140971#TD4035E.TXT.r_2710;TD4035E.TXT.r_2711# 'phrul dga' ba rnams ni gcig la gcig bgad pa tsam gyis gdung ba med par 'gyur ro // /

column3: byang chub dang ni lung bstan par // / +zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'byung ba lta bu  yin no // / +dga' ba yid la byed pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa lung bstan pa thob par bya ba'i ched du ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#140972#140986#TD4035E.TXT.r_2711;TD4035E.TXT.r_2712# gzhan 'phrul dbang byed ba rnams kyi ni phan tshun mig gis mig tshugs su bltas pa tsam gyis gdung ba med par 'gyur ro // /
column5: 0.028#TD4091E.TXT.r#707698#707698#TD4091E.TXT.r_2446;TD4091E.TXT.r_2447# yang sos dang  thig nag dang  bsdus gzhom dang   ngu 'bod dang  ngu 'bod chen po dang  tsha ba dang  rab tu tsha ba dang  mnar med pa'o // / +gling bzhi ste 'dzam bu'i gling dang  shar gyi lus 'phags dang  nub gyi kyi ba lang spyod dang  byang gi sgra mi snyan dang  bshad ma thag pa'i lha'i ris drug ste / /

column3: dus 'di srid cig na pha rol tu phyin pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro zhes de ltar lung ston pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#140987#141002#TD4035E.TXT.r_2712;TD4035E.TXT.r_2713;TD4035E.TXT.r_2714;TD4035E.TXT.r_2715;TD4035E.TXT.r_2716# de la 'dzam bu'i gling dang shar gyi lus 'phags dang  nub kyi ba lang spyod kyi gling gsum na ni / / +chung ma 'chang ba dang  bag ma gtong ba dang  bag ma len pa yod do // /

column3: byang chub sems dpa' la ni lung ston pa de  lta bu la dga' ba yid la byed pa 'byung ngo // / +pha rol tu phyin pa nges pa'i sa la gnas pa 'thob par dga' ba yid la byed pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#141003#141015#TD4035E.TXT.r_2716;TD4035E.TXT.r_2717;TD4035E.TXT.r_2718# sems can de dag  la ni chung ma 'chang ba dang  bag ma gtong ba dang  bag ma len pa med do // / +gling gsum po ji lta ba bzhin du / /

column3: zhes bya ba ni bdag nam zhig pha rol tu phyin pa rnams nges pa'i sa la gnas pa 'thob par 'gyur ba gang yin pa der 'gyur snyam du de ltar dga' ba yid  la byed pa bskyed pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#141015#141026#TD4035E.TXT.r_2718;TD4035E.TXT.r_2719# yi dags rdzu 'phrul che ba dang  'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha rnams la 'phrul dga' ba dang  gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams ma gtogs pa dag kyang de dang 'dra'o // /
column5: 0.028#TD4054E.TXT.r#1011569#1011569#TD4054E.TXT.r_3452# zla ba stong dang  nyi ma stong dang  ri'i  rgyal po ri rab stong dang  shar gyi lus 'phags stong dang  lho'i 'dzam bu gling stong dang  nub kyi ba gang spyod stong dang  byang gi sgra mi snyan stong dang  rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha dang  sum cu rtsa gsum dang  'thab bral dang  dga' ldan dang  'phrul dga' dang  gzhan 'phrul dbang    byed kyi lha rnams kyi gnas gzhan stong dang  tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi gnas gzhan stong po 'di ni / /

column3: pha rol tu phyin pa rnams nges pa'i sa la gnas 'thob pa ni sa thob pa'i dus nas bzung ste / / +blo ldan rnam pa thams cad du // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#141027#141036#TD4035E.TXT.r_2719;TD4035E.TXT.r_2720;TD4035E.TXT.r_2721# 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i ris thams cad ni lha'i bu mo rnams la mngal gyi gnas med do // / +rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi ni pha dang ma'i phrag pa 'am / /

column3: phun sum tshogs dang skye ba nges // / +zhes bya ba la sogs pa nges par 'gyur ba rnam pa drug 'chad par 'gyur ba lta bu yin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#141037#141049#TD4035E.TXT.r_2720;TD4035E.TXT.r_2721;TD4035E.TXT.r_2722# rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi ni pha dang ma'i phrag pa 'am / / +bang par byis pa lo lnga lon pa lta bu rdzus te 'byung bar 'gyur ro // /
column5: 0.025#TD4043E.TXT.r#374971#374972#TD4043E.TXT.r_2539# rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyis ni pha dang ma'i phrag pa'am pang par byis pa lo lnga lon pa lta bu rdzus te 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba la / /

column3: phun sum tshogs pa nges par gyur pa ni rtag tu longs spyod phun sum tshogs pa rgya chen po thob pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#141050#141062#TD4035E.TXT.r_2722;TD4035E.TXT.r_2723;TD4035E.TXT.r_2724;TD4035E.TXT.r_2725;TD4035E.TXT.r_2726# sum cu rtsa gsum ba rnams kyi ni lo drug lon pa lta bu'o // / +'thab bral pa rnams kyi ni lo bdun lon pa lta bu'o // /

column3: de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sogs pa'i'o // / +skye ba la sogs pa nges par 'gyur ba ni ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du skye ba yongs su 'dzin pa la sogs  pa yin par rig par bya'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#141062#141072#TD4035E.TXT.r_2724;TD4035E.TXT.r_2725;TD4035E.TXT.r_2726# dga' ldan pa rnams kyi ni lo brgyad lon pa lta bu'o // / +'phrul dga' ba rnams kyi ni lo dgu lon pa lta bu'o // / +gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams kyi ni byis pa lo bcu lon pa lta bu phrag pa 'am pang par rdzus te 'byung bar 'gyur ro // /
column5: 0.022#TD4086E.TXT.r#1283587#1283588#TD4086E.TXT.r_516;TD4086E.TXT.r_517;TD4086E.TXT.r_518# dga' ldan    ldan ba rnams kyi ni lo brgyad lon pa ji tsam pa bzhin no // / +'phrul dga' ba rnams kyi ni lo dgu lon pa ji tsam pa bzhin no // /

column3: tshe phyi ma la mthong ba'i phyir 'jug pa yid la byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa' yin phan chad 'gro ba gang du son yang sbyin pa la sogs pa gdon mi za bar bya dgos so snyam du mngon par 'du byed pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i  rigs la gnas pa pa ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' ni nam yang rung ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#141073#141081#TD4035E.TXT.r_2726;TD4035E.TXT.r_2727;TD4035E.TXT.r_2728;TD4035E.TXT.r_2729# gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa rnams kyi ni byis pa lo bcu lon pa lta bu phrag pa 'am pang par rdzus te 'byung bar 'gyur ro // /
column5: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#141081#141089#TD4035E.TXT.r_2727;TD4035E.TXT.r_2728;TD4035E.TXT.r_2729;TD4035E.TXT.r_2730;TD4035E.TXT.r_2731# de la skye bar 'dogs pa rnam par gzhag pa ni 'di yin te / / +'di lta ste / / +'dod pa skye ba rnam pa gsum po rnams te / /
column6: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#141090#141098#TD4035E.TXT.r_2730;TD4035E.TXT.r_2731;TD4035E.TXT.r_2732;TD4035E.TXT.r_2733;TD4035E.TXT.r_2734;TD4035E.TXT.r_2735# sems can gang dag 'dod pa nye bar gnas par gyur la / / +'dod pa nye bar gnas par gyur pa dag gis / /

column3: gdon mi za bar pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la gnas par bya dgos so // / +'di dag la mi gnas phan chad byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyang ma yin no zhes de ltar lta ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#141099#141110#TD4035E.TXT.r_2733;TD4035E.TXT.r_2734;TD4035E.TXT.r_2735;TD4035E.TXT.r_2736;TD4035E.TXT.r_2737# de dag kyang gang    zhe na / / +'di lta ste / / +mi thams cad dang  rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams nas bzung ste / /

column3: mchod bslab yang dag blang ba dang      // / +snying rje dge ba bsgom pa dang / / +zhes bya ba la sogs 'byung ba lta bu yin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#141111#141121#TD4035E.TXT.r_2736;TD4035E.TXT.r_2737;TD4035E.TXT.r_2738# dga' ldan la thug pa de ni 'dod pa skye ba dang po'o // / +sems can 'dod pa sprul la sprul pa de dag sprul zhing dbang phyug la dbang byed pa dag kyang yod de / /

column3: mnyam pa nyid du lta ba yid la byed pa ni de las gzhan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams bdag dang lhan cig pha rol tu phyin pa rtag tu bya bar mos pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni bdag gang yin  pa de nyid byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag kyang yin no zhes mnyam pa nyid du lta ba'i phyir te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#141120#141140#TD4035E.TXT.r_2737;TD4035E.TXT.r_2738;TD4035E.TXT.r_2739;TD4035E.TXT.r_2740;TD4035E.TXT.r_2741;TD4035E.TXT.r_2742;TD4035E.TXT.r_2743# sems can 'dod pa sprul la sprul pa de dag sprul zhing dbang phyug la dbang byed pa dag kyang yod de / / +de dag kyang gang zhe na / /

column3: de dag pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la kun tu spyod pa gang yin pa de bdag gi yang yin la / / +bdag la bdag pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la sbyor ba byed pa gang yin pa de la gzhan dag kyang sbyor ba yin  no zhes de ltar mos pa'i phyir rtag tu byed pa nyid du 'gyur te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#141141#141153#TD4035E.TXT.r_2743;TD4035E.TXT.r_2744;TD4035E.TXT.r_2745;TD4035E.TXT.r_2746# de bas na de dag ni bdag nyid kyis 'dod pa sprul pa rnams kho nas dbang phyug la dbang byed de / /
column5: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#141153#141161#TD4035E.TXT.r_2745;TD4035E.TXT.r_2746;TD4035E.TXT.r_2747;TD4035E.TXT.r_2748;TD4035E.TXT.r_2749# sems can 'dod pa gzhan gyis sprul la / / +'dod pa gzhan gyis sprul PA DE DAG GIS KYANG / /
column6: 0.0#TD4090.1E.TXT.r#1638948#1638962#TD4090.1E.TXT.r_7234;TD4090.1E.TXT.r_7235;TD4090.1E.TXT.r_7236;TD4090.1E.TXT.r_7237# dper na 'phrul dga'i lha rnams  lta bu'o // / +sems can 'dod pa gzhan gyis sprul pa rnams 'dod pa gzhan gyis sprul pa dag la dbang phyug gis dbang byed pa dag kyang yod de / /
column7: 5.960#TD4091E.TXT.r#714990#714999#TD4091E.TXT.r_3741;TD4091E.TXT.r_3742;TD4091E.TXT.r_3743# sems can 'dod pa gzhan gyis sprul te / / +gzhan gyis sprul pa'i 'dod pa la dbang phyug gi dbang byed pa dag kyang yod de / /
column8: 0.009#TD4086E.TXT.r#1280424#1280431#TD4086E.TXT.r_102;TD4086E.TXT.r_103;TD4086E.TXT.r_104;TD4086E.TXT.r_105# sems can 'dod pa'i sprul pa gzhan dag yod de // / +gang dag 'dod pa gzhan gyis sprul pa rnams la dbang phyug  gis dbang byed pa dag ste / /

column3: 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag na byang chub sems dpa' rnams skad cig re re rtag tu gus par byas te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#141160#141169#TD4035E.TXT.r_2746;TD4035E.TXT.r_2747;TD4035E.TXT.r_2748;TD4035E.TXT.r_2749;TD4035E.TXT.r_2750# 'dod pa gzhan gyis sprul pa de dag gis kyang / / +dbang phyug la dbang byed pa dag kyang yod de / / +'di lta ste / / +gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams te / /

column3: sbyor bas pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la rab tu sbyor ro // / +bdag nyid mchog tu nges  par 'dzin pa yid la byed pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa mchog gis chos la zhugs pas bdag nyid gtso bo'i ngo bor yang dag par mthong ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' gang gi tshe pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la 'jug pa de'i tshe pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la sbyor ba ni 'jig rten gyi chos dag  pas mchog gtso bo dam pa yin no zhes pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor ba mchog nyid du 'dzin to // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#141170#141177#TD4035E.TXT.r_2750;TD4035E.TXT.r_2751# 'di ltar lha de dag ni bdag nyid kyi phyir dang  gzhan gyi phyir yang sprul pa 'grub  ste / /
column5: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#141177#141198#TD4035E.TXT.r_2750;TD4035E.TXT.r_2751;TD4035E.TXT.r_2752;TD4035E.TXT.r_2753;TD4035E.TXT.r_2754;TD4035E.TXT.r_2755# 'di ltar lha de dag ni bdag nyid kyi phyir dang  gzhan gyi phyir yang sprul pa 'grub  ste / / +de bas na de dag ni bdag nyid kyi sprul pa la / /
column6: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#141198#141216#TD4035E.TXT.r_2754;TD4035E.TXT.r_2755;TD4035E.TXT.r_2756;TD4035E.TXT.r_2757;TD4035E.TXT.r_2758;TD4035E.TXT.r_2759# des na de dag la gzhan 'phrul dbang byed ces bya'i / / +de dag gzhan gyis 'dod pa sprul pa kho na la brten pa ni ma yin te / /
column7: 0.025#TD4090.1E.TXT.r#1621441#1621441#TD4090.1E.TXT.r_4456# rgyu rnams las gzhan gyis byed pa mi snang ba'i phyir ro // /
column8: 0.029#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2384754#2384754#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_8812# 'di nyid kyi 'grel pa las gzhan  gyis bdag la yon tan dang ldan par yid ches par bya ba'i phyir de'i mtshan ma ston pa ste / /

column3: yang na pha rol tu phyin pa rnam pa gsum po dag la chos kyi sbyin pa dang  zang zing dang mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa rnams kyi nang na ni chos kyi sbyin pa gtso bo yin la / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#141210#141225#TD4035E.TXT.r_2756;TD4035E.TXT.r_2757;TD4035E.TXT.r_2758;TD4035E.TXT.r_2759;TD4035E.TXT.r_2760;TD4035E.TXT.r_2761;TD4035E.TXT.r_2762;TD4035E.TXT.r_2763# bdag  nyid kyi sprul pa la yang brten pa de ni / / +'dod pa skye ba gsum pa'o // / +bde ba skye ba NI RNAM PA GSUM PO 'DI dag yin te / /
column5: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#141232#141246#TD4035E.TXT.r_2763;TD4035E.TXT.r_2764;TD4035E.TXT.r_2765;TD4035E.TXT.r_2762;TD4035E.TXT.r_2766;TD4035E.TXT.r_2759;TD4035E.TXT.r_2761;TD4035E.TXT.r_2767;TD4035E.TXT.r_2768;TD4035E.TXT.r_2769# sems can gang dag ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang  bde bas lus brlan pa dag yod de / /

column3: tshul khrims rnam pa gsum  la ni zlog pa'i tshul khrims gtso bo yin no zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs par ro // /
pha rol phyin bcu'i rgyus byung ba // / +dge ba yid byed 'di dag ni // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#141217#141221#TD4035E.TXT.r_2759;TD4035E.TXT.r_2760;TD4035E.TXT.r_2761;TD4035E.TXT.r_2762# sems can gang dag dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde bas lus brlan pa dag kyang yod de / /
column5: 0.029#TD4086E.TXT.r#1280530#1280530#TD4086E.TXT.r_117# de dag lus 'di nyid la ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang  bde bas brlan par byas shing yongs su brlan par  byas te / /

column3: zhes bya ba ni pha rol tu phyin pa bcu dang ldan pa'i phyir rgyu las byung ba zhes bya'o // / +rtag tu byang chub sems dpa' yi // /
khams ni brtas par byed pa yin // / +zhes bya ba ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i rigs brtas par byed pa yin no zhes bya ba'i don to // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#141247#141254#TD4035E.TXT.r_2767;TD4035E.TXT.r_2768;TD4035E.TXT.r_2769;TD4035E.TXT.r_2770;TD4035E.TXT.r_2771# sems can gang dag dga' ba med pa'i bde bas lus brlan  pa dag kyang yod de / / +'di lta ste / / +bsam gtan gsum pa'i sa pa'i lha rnams te / /

column3: chos yongs su tshol ba'i rab tu dbye ba la tshigs su bcad pa gnyis te / / +zhes bya ba ni chos yongs su tshol ba'i rab tu dbye ba gang dag yin pa de dag gi    dbang du byas te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#141255#141265#TD4035E.TXT.r_2770;TD4035E.TXT.r_2771;TD4035E.TXT.r_2772;TD4035E.TXT.r_2773;TD4035E.TXT.r_2774# de ni bde ba skye ba gsum pa'o // / +ci'i phyir 'dod pa skye ba gsum pa dang  bde ba skye ba gsum du rnam par gzhag ce na / /

column3: tshigs su bcad pa gnyis so // / +thos pa la mos pa rgyas pas so zhes bya ba ni las dang po'i gnas skabs na theg pa chen po la mos pa skye ba gang yin pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#141264#141277#TD4035E.TXT.r_2772;TD4035E.TXT.r_2773;TD4035E.TXT.r_2774;TD4035E.TXT.r_2775# smras pa gsum po 'di dag ni tshol ba yin te / / +'dod pa tshol ba dang  srid pa tshol     // /

column3: lhag pa'i bsam pa ni chos kyi sgo'i rgyun gyis so zhes bya ba la / / +bsam pa lhag pa ni lhag  pa'i bsam pas te sa dang po thob pa'i dus kyi na'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#141278#141289#TD4035E.TXT.r_2775;TD4035E.TXT.r_2776;TD4035E.TXT.r_2777;TD4035E.TXT.r_2778# de la dge sbyong ngam bram ze 'dod pa tshol ba la 'jug pa gang su yang rung ba de dag thams cad ni 'dod pa skye ba gsum po dag gi phyir te / /

column3: lhag pa'i bsam pa de ni chos kyi rgyun gyis 'thob ste / / +'di ltar chos kyi rgyun gyi ting nge 'dzin ni mos pas spyod pa'i sa'i rtser phyin pa las 'byung la de'i mjug thogs su ni sa thob po // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#141290#141299#TD4035E.TXT.r_2778;TD4035E.TXT.r_2779;TD4035E.TXT.r_2780# dge sbyong ngam bram ze bde ba'i  rgyur srid pa tshol ba gang su yang rung ba de dag thams cad ni / /
column5: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#141300#141307#TD4035E.TXT.r_2779;TD4035E.TXT.r_2780;TD4035E.TXT.r_2781# shas cher bde ba 'dod pas / / +bde ba skye ba rnam pa gsum gyi phyir ro // /

column3: de nyid kyi phyir spang ba med pa ni gnyis pa'o zhes  'chad par 'gyur ro // / +chen po ni dbang 'byor pa thob pa rnams kyi'o zhes bya ba la / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#141306#141318#TD4035E.TXT.r_2781;TD4035E.TXT.r_2782;TD4035E.TXT.r_2783# gang dag sdug bsngal yang ma yin bde ba yang ma yin pa zhi ba'i skye ba'i don du tshol ba la 'jug pa de dag ni / /

column3: dbang 'byor pa ni brgyad pa la sogs pas chen po la zhugs pa rnams kyi yin no // / +sku dang bcas pa ni mos pas spyod pa ni bsgoms pa las byung ba'o zhes bya ba ni mos pas spyod pa'i gnas  skabs na'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#141319#141340#TD4035E.TXT.r_2782;TD4035E.TXT.r_2783;TD4035E.TXT.r_2784;TD4035E.TXT.r_2785;TD4035E.TXT.r_2786# 'jig rten na nyung ba bas kyang ches nyung  ngo // / +de bas na de'i gong du skye ba rnam bar mi gzhag go // /

column3: sa dang po ma thob par ji ltar sku dang bcas pa yin zhe na / / +gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i don 'jig pas cung zad cig thob pa'i phyir sku dang bcas pa yin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#141341#141348#TD4035E.TXT.r_2785;TD4035E.TXT.r_2786# yang kha cig ni log pa'i rnam par thar pa yongs su brtags pa / / +mi gyo ba'i don dang   nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang  'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi don du log pa'i tshangs par spyod pa tshol ba la 'jug ste / /
column5: 0.014#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3100689#3100692#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_1380# tshangs ris kyi dngos po dang  'og min gyi bar gyi dngos po dang  nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi dngos po dang  'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi bar gyi dngos po dang  dad pas rjes su 'brang ba'i dngos po dang  chos kyis rjes  su 'brang ba'i dngos po dang  nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i dngos po dang  mthong ba'i lam gyi dngos po dang  bsgom pa'i lam gyi dngos po dang  rgyud du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i dngos po dang  dgra bcom pa nyid kyi bar gyi dngos po dang  rang byang  chub kyi dngos po dang  yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi dngos po dang  'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa'i dngos po dang  pha rol tu phyin pa'i dngos po dang  dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i dngos po dang  lam gyi yan lag gi bar gyi dngos po dang  bsam gtan dang   tshad med pa dang  gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i dngos po dang  'du shes bsgom pa'i dngos po dang  rjes su dran pa bsgom pa'i dngos po dang  rnam par thar pa dang  zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched dang  zad par gyi skye mched bsgom pa'i dngos po dang   stobs dang  mi 'jigs pa dang  smon nas shes pa dang  bsrungs pa med pa dang  dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang  thugs rje chen po dang  bag chags yang dag par bcom pa dang  mtshan dang  dpe bya dang  rnam pa thams cad dang  mchog mkhyen pa dang   sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa thams cad kyi dngos po ste / /
column6: 0.022#TD4035E.TXT.r#148798#148800#TD4035E.TXT.r_4177# 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha    dang  gzugs na spyod pa'i lha dang  gzugs med pa nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba dang  'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba'i bar du yang de dang 'dra ste / /
column7: 0.022#TD4035E.TXT.r#148938#148940#TD4035E.TXT.r_4206# yongs su gdung ba dang bcas pa dang  'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha dang  gzugs na spyod pa'i lha dang  gzugs med pa nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba dang  'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba'i  bar zhes byar mi rung ngo // /

column3: sa dang po la sogs pa la ni mthong ba'i lam gyis spang bar bya ba 'jig tshogs la lta ba la sogs pa spangs pa'i phyir  dang gnyis su 'dzin pa dang bral ba'i phyir sku thob pa zhes bya'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#141347#141364#TD4035E.TXT.r_2786;TD4035E.TXT.r_2787;TD4035E.TXT.r_2788# mi gyo ba'i don dang   nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang  'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi don du log pa'i tshangs par spyod pa tshol ba la 'jug ste / /
column5: 0.012#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2351435#2351435#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4690;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4691# 'du shes med pa'i mtshan ma yang med pa'i phyir / / +'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched  ces bya'o // /
column6: 0.012#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2351471#2351471#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4694;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_4695# sa 'di'i 'du shes mi gsal zhing rtul  ba dang  zhen cing gsal ba med pa dang nges pa med pa'i phyir / / +'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched ces bya'o zhes 'byung ste / /
column7: 0.012#TD4035E.TXT.r#181677#181677#TD4035E.TXT.r_9832;TD4035E.TXT.r_9833# 'du shes med pa'i sems can rnams ni de na gcig tu nges par rnam par shes  pa kun du 'byung ba med pa'i phyir na ma yin no // / +'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched ni kun du rgyu ba dang  kun du rgyu ba med pa gcig tu nges pa med pa'i phyir ro // /
column8: 0.012#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2707941#2707943#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_778;TD4038.1E.TXT.r_779# kha cig  gi tshe ni nyin zhag gnyis dang  gsum dang bcu'i bar du snang ba'i phyir ro // / +'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched du skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi tshe ni bskal pa chen po brgyad khri thub pas yun ring po yin no // /
column9: 0.012#TD4039E.TXT.r#1868660#1868660#TD4039E.TXT.r_6232# 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched ni 'du shes cha phra ba'i phyir srid pa'i nang na zhi ba 'di dag ni mchog yin no snyam pas mos pa ni  mtshan ma med pa yid la byed pas snyoms par 'jug ste / /
column10: 0.012#TD4049E.TXT.r#2308414#2308414#TD4049E.TXT.r_3548# 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa la sgrib pa las rnam par thar par bya ba'i phyir 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi rnam par thar pa la brten te / /
column11: 0.012#TD4054E.TXT.r#1041248#1041248#TD4054E.TXT.r_8014;TD4054E.TXT.r_8015# 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa'i sgrib pa las rnam par thar par bya ba'i phyir / / +'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi rnam par thar pa la brten te zhi ba'i rnam thar la gnas pa las yang dag par 'das nas thar pa dang mthun par gnas pa yang dag par 'byor ba'i  gang sems dang sems byung gi chos rnams 'gog pa'o // /
column12: 0.012#TD4091E.TXT.r#753313#753316#TD4091E.TXT.r_10559;TD4091E.TXT.r_10560# 'du shes dman pa'i phyir 'du shes med / / +'du shes med min skye mched ces bya ba ste / /
column13: 0.012#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#1481784#1481784#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_9547# 'du shes gzhan pa 'byung ba'i phyir 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched ces bya'o // /
column14: 0.012#TD4092.2E.TXT.r#2635957#2635957#TD4092.2E.TXT.r_12496# de bas na de skad du yongs su 'dri bas brgal bas ni 'du shes rnams chung ba'i phyir    'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched ces bya'o zhes bya ba 'di gdon mi za bar brjod dgos pas de nyid bshad do // /
column15: 0.012#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#786617#786618#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_3295;TD4093.1E.TXT.r_3296# gzugs kyi khams su gtogs pa'i phyir de na dri dang ro med pa'i phyir dang  'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba'i dus dag na yid kyi skye mched yod pa'i phyir ro // / +'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba ni yid dang chos kyi skye mched dag gis bsdus so zhes bya ba la / /
column16: 0.012#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#826277#826277#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_9932;TD4093.1E.TXT.r_9933# shing ljon pa dang 'dra bar srid pa'i mthar thug pa yin pa'i phyir / / +'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched ni srid pa'i rtse mo zhes bya'o // /
column17: 0.012#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#2076116#2076116#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_14191# rgyu ba mi gsal ba'i phyir 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched yin te 'du shes med pa lta bur de gnas so // /
column18: 0.013#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2727092#2727092#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_3726# bcom ldan 'das kyis mdo sde las zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched brgyad dang  de bzhin du rgyas par zad par gyi skye mched bcu dang  de bzhin du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la sogs pa'i skye mched bzhi dang   de bzhin du skye mched gnyis po 'du shes med pa'i skye mched dang 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched dang  de dag la sogs pa skye mched kyi sgrar bstan pa'i chos gang dag gsungs pa de dag kyang skye mched bcu gnyis po dag gis mtshan nyid ji skad smos pas ci rigs par bsdu bar rig par bya'o // /
column19: 0.013#TD4091E.TXT.r#707830#707833#TD4091E.TXT.r_2474# nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang  rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang  ci yang med pa'i skye mched  dang  'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched dang  de dag yul gyi bye brag tu byas nas bla 'og tu yod pa ni ma yin gyi / /
column20: 0.015#TD4054E.TXT.r#1041172#1041175#TD4054E.TXT.r_8004# nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi rnam thar gyi lta bar rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang  ci yang med pa'i skye mched dang  'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi rnam thar kyang de bzhin     // /
column21: 0.015#TD4035E.TXT.r#197187#197187#TD4035E.TXT.r_12648# 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched thob pa'o // /
column22: 0.015#TD4035E.TXT.r#162517#162519#TD4035E.TXT.r_6572# nam mkha' mtha' yas skye  mched dang  rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang  ci yang med pa'i skye mched dang  'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched dang  'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa lus kyis mngon sum du byas te / /
column23: 0.015#TD4036E.TXT.r#17568#17569#TD4036E.TXT.r_2548;TD4036E.TXT.r_2549# bsam gtan dang po dang  gnyis pa dang  gsum pa dang  bzhi pa dang  nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang  rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched  dang ; / +ci yang med pa'i skye mched dang  'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched dang  byams pa dang  snying rje dang  dga' ba dang  btang snyoms dang  rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang  lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang  phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang   rdzu 'phrul gyi yul shes pa dang  sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa dang  lha'i rna ba dang  'chi 'pho ba dang  skye ba shes ba dang  sems kyi rnam grangs shes pa dang  rnam par thang ba brgyad bsgom pa'i dgra bcom pa nyid kyang thob bar 'gyur la / /
column24: 0.015#TD4036E.TXT.r#24162#24164#TD4036E.TXT.r_3649# gang zag lus kyis mngon du byed pa rnam par thar pa brgyad po gzugs can gzugs rnams la lta ba dang  nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs    rnams la lta ba dang  sdug pa'i rnam par thar pa lus kyis mngon sum du byas nas bsgrubs te gnas pa dang  nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang  rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang  ci yang med pa'i skye mched dang  'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched dang  'du  shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa dag lus kyi mngon sum du byas nas bsgrubs te gnas shing / /
column25: 0.015#TD4036E.TXT.r#24794#24796#TD4036E.TXT.r_3774;TD4036E.TXT.r_3775# nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang  rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched  dang ; / +ci yang med pa'i skye mched dang  'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa de thob pa'i de'i spyod yul gyi shes bya'i dngos po de nyid la rnam par rtog pa med pa'i ye shes dang  mthong ba mngon sum du 'byung bar 'gyur te / /
column26: 0.015#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3093710#3093713#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_104# gzugs rgyu mtshan dang  sems rgyu mtshan dang  sems las byung ba rgyu  mtshan dang  sems dang ldan pa ma yin pa rgyu mtshan dang  'dus ma byas rgyu mtshan dang  'dus byas rgyu mtshan dang  phung po rgyu mtshan dang  skye mched rgyu mtshan dang  khams rgyu mtshan dang  rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rgyu mtshan dang  gnas dang gnas ma yin pa rgyu  mtshan dang  dbang po rgyu mtshan dang  bden pa rgyu mtshan dang  dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rgyu mtshan dang  yang dag pa'i spong ba dang  rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang  dbang po dang  stobs dang  byang chub kyi yan lag dang  lam gyi yan lag rgyu mtshan dang  lam rgyu    mtshan dang  chos kyi gzhi rgyu mtshan dang  zhi gnas rgyu mtshan dang  lhag mthong rgyu mtshan dang  rab tu 'dzin pa rgyu mtshan dang  btang snyoms rgyu mtshan dang  rkyen rgyu mtshan dang  ston pa rgyu mtshan dang  sa rgyu mtshan dang  chu rgyu mtshan dang  me rgyu mtshan dang  rlung  rgyu mtshan dang  nam mkha' rgyu mtshan dang  rnam par shes pa rgyu mtshan dang  'jig rten 'di rgyu mtshan dang  'jig rten pha rol rgyu mtshan dang  nyi ma rgyu mtshan dang  zla ba rgyu mtshan dang  sems can dmyal ba rgyu mtshan dang  dud 'gro dang  yi dvags dang  lha dang   mi rgyu mtshan dang  rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i rgyu mtshan dang  sum cu rtsa gsum dang  'thab bral dang  dga' ldan dang  'phrul dga' dang  gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rgyu mtshan dang  bsam gtan dang po rgyu mtshan dang  bsam gtan gnyis pa dang  gsum pa dang  bzhi pa rgyu mtshan dang  nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched rgyu mtshan dang  rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang  ci yang med pa'i skye mched dang  'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched rgyu mtshan dang  'byung ba rgyu mtshan dang  'jig pa rgyu  mtshan dang  dngos po rgyu mtshan dang  dngos po med pa rgyu mtshan dang  kun nas nyon mongs pa rgyu mtshan dang  rnam par byang ba rgyu mtshan dang  mthong ba dang  thos pa dang  bye brag phyed pa dang  rnam par shes pa dang  thos pa dang  yongs su btsal ba rgyu mtshan  dang ; /
column27: 0.015#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3114480#3114482#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_3285# bsam gtan dang po dang  gnyis pa dang   gsum pa dang  bsam gtan bzhi pa dang  nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang  rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang  ci yang med pa'i skye mched dang  'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched pa'o // /
column28: 0.015#TD4049E.TXT.r#2296316#2296316#TD4049E.TXT.r_1609# mi che ba dang  mi gsung ba dang  gya nom snang dang  shin tu mthong dang  'og min dang  nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang  rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang  ci yang med pa'i skye mched dang  'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched rnams su  sems can skye ba'o // /
column29: 0.015#TD4049E.TXT.r#2302867#2302868#TD4049E.TXT.r_2661# 'jig rten pa'i bsam gtan dang po dang  gnyis pa dang  gsum pa dang  bsam gtan bzhi pa dang  nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang  rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang  ci yang med pa'i skye mched dang  'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched de / /
column30: 0.015#TD4049E.TXT.r#2308381#2308382#TD4049E.TXT.r_3544# nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi rnam par thar pa ji lta bar    rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang  ci yang med pa'i skye mched dang  'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi rnam par thar pa yang de bzhin du blta bar bya ste / /
column31: 0.015#TD4090.1E.TXT.r#1623479#1623479#TD4090.1E.TXT.r_4812# nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang  rnam shes mtha'  yas skye mched dang  ci yang med pa'i skye mched dang  'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi skye mched do // /
column32: 0.015#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1711471#1711471#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_1794# bdag gi tshor ba dang btang snyoms 'di ltar yongs su dag cing byang bas rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang  ci yang med pa'i skye mched dang  'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs shing gnas te / /
column33: 0.015#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1711602#1711604#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_1810# bas rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang  ci yang med pa'i skye mched dang  'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la nye bar gnas te / /
column34: 0.015#TD4095E.TXT.r#73613#73616#TD4095E.TXT.r_2115# nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang  rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang  ci yang med pa'i skye mched dang  'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched do // /
column35: 0.015#TD4098E.TXT.r#1393579#1393582#TD4098E.TXT.r_584# nam mkha' mtha' yas skye  mched dang  rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang  ci yang med pa'i skye mched dang  'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched do // /
column36: 0.015#TD4039E.TXT.r#1876291#1876291#TD4039E.TXT.r_7138# de la 'phags pa nyan thos ni 'dod pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa spang par bya ba'i phyir brtson pa na mthar gyis mi gyo bar 'gro ba dang  ci yang med pa'i skye mched du 'gro ba dang   'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched du 'gro ba'i lam gsum la brten nas mi gyo ba dang  ci yang med pa dang  'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la snyoms par 'jug ste / /
column37: 0.015#TD4039E.TXT.r#1876499#1876499#TD4039E.TXT.r_7158# ci yang med pa'i skye mched du 'gro ba dang  'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched du 'gro ba dang  tshe 'di la mya ngan las 'da' ba dang  'phags pa'i rnam par grol ba'o // /
column38: 0.016#TD4035E.TXT.r#134594#134594#TD4035E.TXT.r_1673# 'dod pa dang ldan pa dang  bsam gtan dang po dang  gnyis pa dang  gsum pa dang  bzhi pa dang ldan pa dang  nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang  rnam shes mtha' yas skye  mched dang  ci yang med pa'i skye mched dang  'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched dang ldan pa dang  zag pa med par bsdus pa'o // /
column39: 0.016#TD4086E.TXT.r#1282122#1282122#TD4086E.TXT.r_338# nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang  rnam shes mtha' yas skye    skye mched dang  ci yang med pa'i skye mched dang  'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la ni kha dog med do // /
column40: 0.017#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3095219#3095220#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_463;TD4038.2E.TXT.r_464# ci yang med pa'i skye mched kyi bar du yang de bzhin du ci rigs par rig par bya'o // / +'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la ni nges par 'jig rten pa kho nas so // /
column41: 0.017#TD4052E.TXT.r#2862379#2862379#TD4052E.TXT.r_2398;TD4052E.TXT.r_2399# de'i phyir sa gsum dang mi mthun pas 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched logs shig tu dpyad par / / +'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched ces BYA BA LA SOGS PA SMOS so // /
column42: 0.017#TD4036E.TXT.r#56230#56230#TD4036E.TXT.r_8386;TD4036E.TXT.r_8387# de la 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched thob pa'i 'phags pa mchog tu zhi ba'i gnas pas gnas par 'dod pa / / +'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched las sems bskyod par byed  cing ; /
column43: 0.017#TD4036E.TXT.r#56218#56218#TD4036E.TXT.r_8386# de la 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched thob pa'i 'phags pa mchog tu zhi ba'i gnas pas gnas par 'dod pa / /
column44: 0.017#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#826258#826258#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_9930;TD4093.1E.TXT.r_9931# de yid la byed pa gang la sngon du 'gro ba yod pa de ni nges par 'byin pa'i 'du shes sngon du  btang ba'o // / +'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched du skye ba 'phen par byed pa'i las ni thams cad pas mchog yin pa'i phyir ram / /
column45: 0.018#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1785573#1785573#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_10750# 'di ni 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba'i las bstan pa'o // /
column46: 0.018#TD4094.2E.TXT.r#1910366#1910366#TD4094.2E.TXT.r_3359# 'di ni gya nom pa'o zhes de 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lam bsgoms nas 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams  dang skal ba mnyam par skyes so // /
column47: 0.018#TD4035E.TXT.r#181655#181655#TD4035E.TXT.r_9830# ngan song rnams dang  'du shes med pa'i  sems can rnams dang  'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched ni ma gtogs te / /
column48: 0.019#TD4037E.TXT.r#1324080#1324080#TD4037E.TXT.r_1181# chu dang  me dang  rlung dang  nam mkha' dang  rnam shes dang  ci yang med pa'i skye mched dang  'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched dang  'jig rten 'di dang  'jig rten pha rol dang  nyi ma dang  zla ba 'di gnyis dang  mthong ba dang   thos pa dang  bye brag phyed pa dang  rnam par shes pa dang  rnyed pa dang  bcal ba dang  yid kyis rjes su brtags pa dang  rjes su dpyad pa de dag thams cad la brten cing bsam gtan mi byed do // /
column49: 0.019#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#830210#830211#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_10547# 'dir mtha' ni 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched do // /
column50: 0.019#TD4054E.TXT.r#1041277#1041277#TD4054E.TXT.r_8016# 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa'i gnas ni 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched do // /
column51: 0.019#TD4049E.TXT.r#2303200#2303200#TD4049E.TXT.r_2710;TD4049E.TXT.r_2711# chos shes pa dang  rjes su rtogs pa shes pa'i phyogs dang  de dag dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang  bsam gtan dang po nas ci yang med pa'i skye mched kyi bar du'o // / +'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched ni 'du shes  kyi rgyu ba yongs su mi gsal ba'i phyir 'jig rten pa nyid de / /

column3: rgyu nyid kyi chos yongs su tshol ba la tshigs su bcad pa zhes bya ba ni 'di ltar chos yongs su btsal na mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po la sogs pa'i rgyur 'gyur bas so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#141363#141380#TD4035E.TXT.r_2787;TD4035E.TXT.r_2788;TD4035E.TXT.r_2789;TD4035E.TXT.r_2790;TD4035E.TXT.r_2791;TD4035E.TXT.r_2792# de ni tshangs par spyod pa tshol ba bla na yod pa yin par rig par bya'o // / +bla na med pa ni zag pa med pa'i dbyings kyi phyir ro // /

column3: chos ni gzugs la ni mtshan gyi rgyu'o zhes bya ba ni  gzugs kyi phung po la mtshan rnams gsal gyi tshor ba la sogs pa gzugs can ma yin pa la ni ma yin pas / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#141376#141391#TD4035E.TXT.r_2791;TD4035E.TXT.r_2792;TD4035E.TXT.r_2793;TD4035E.TXT.r_2794;TD4035E.TXT.r_2795# khams gsum na sems can rnams kyi lus thob pa rnam pa bzhi yod de / / +lus thob pa gang bdag nyid kyi sems kyis 'pho bar 'gyur la / /
column5: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#141465#141469#TD4035E.TXT.r_2809;TD4035E.TXT.r_2808;TD4035E.TXT.r_2810# lus thob pa gang bdag nyid kyi sems kyis kyang 'pho bar 'gyur la / /
column6: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#141482#141491#TD4035E.TXT.r_2813;TD4035E.TXT.r_2814;TD4035E.TXT.r_2812;TD4035E.TXT.r_2815;TD4035E.TXT.r_2816# lus 'thob  pa gang bdag nyid kyi sems kyis kyang 'pho bar mi 'gyur la / /
column7: 5.960#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1752625#1752626#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_6843# dge slong 'dod pa'i khams na lha rtsed mos myos pa zhes bya ba yod de / /

column3: de'i phyir chos ni gzugs la ni mtshan gyi rgyu'o zhes bshad do // / +gzugs can ma yin pa la ni nad med pa'i rgyu zhes bya ba la chos gzugs can ma yin pa la ni  sems dang sems las byung rnams te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#141389#141413#TD4035E.TXT.r_2793;TD4035E.TXT.r_2795;TD4035E.TXT.r_2794;TD4035E.TXT.r_2796;TD4035E.TXT.r_2797;TD4035E.TXT.r_2798# gzhan gyi sems kyis ma yin pa yang yod de / / +'dod pa'i khams na lha rtsed mos myos pa  zhes bya ba dag yod de / /
column5: 0.011#TD4039E.TXT.r#1864334#1864335#TD4039E.TXT.r_5694;TD4039E.TXT.r_5695;TD4039E.TXT.r_5696# de ltar lam bsgom pa la bag yod pa'i sgo nas mi 'dre bar gnas pa ni / / +dran pas legs par gnas par 'gyur ro // /
column6: 0.019#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1724622#1724623#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_3552# dge slong dag 'dod pa'i khams na lha rtsed mos myos pa pa zhes bya ba yod de / /
column7: 0.022#TD4044E.TXT.r#390361#390362#TD4044E.TXT.r_1572;TD4044E.TXT.r_1573;TD4044E.TXT.r_1574;TD4044E.TXT.r_1575# chung ngu dang chen po'o // / +chung ngus ni 'jug par 'gyur la / / +chen pos dga' bar 'dzin pa'o // /
column8: 0.023#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1752676#1752676#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_6847# snga ma bzhin du ji ltar sems mnyam par gzhag pa na bdag nyid kyi sngon gyi dngos po so sor nyams su myong  zhing dran nas de 'di snyam du gang de dag 'dod pa'i khams kyi lha rtsed mos myos pa zhes bya ba shin tu rtse zhing dga' ba dang ldan PA MA YIN PA DE dag ni rtag pa / /
column9: 0.025#TD4010E.TXT.r#2274839#2274839#TD4010E.TXT.r_5651# grong la sogs par gnas nas sems can rnams phyir mi ldog par 'gyur bar de ltar chos bstan par bya'o ZHES BYA BA LA SOGS pa la / /
column10: 0.026#TD4037E.TXT.r#1358877#1358877#TD4037E.TXT.r_5708;TD4037E.TXT.r_5709# myur ba myur bar byang chub sems dpa' de ltar 'khyig cing sdod pa'i dga' mgur 'jug par mi byed pa de dag la ni byang chub sems dpa' ji skad brjod pa'i dngos po rnams 'dod pa dag la phan par 'dod pa'i phyir dngos po de dag sbyin par mi byed de / / +sbyin par mi 'dod pa'i bsam pas  ni ma yin no // /
column11: 0.027#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#2087314#2087314#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_15851;TD4093.2E.TXT.r_15852# de'i phyir ji skad bshad pa'i bsam pas / / +gal te de ltar yin na yid kyi dbang pos yang 'khrul pa med par 'gyur te zhes bya ba'i nyes pa med  do ; / /
column12: 0.028#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#833341#833341#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_11060;TD4093.1E.TXT.r_11061;TD4093.1E.TXT.r_11062# de'i phyir de ltar na dus gcig tu skye ba dang  gnas pa dang  zhig par 'gyur ro // / +de lta ma yin te / / +bya ba'i dus tha dad pa'i phyir ro // /
column13: 0.028#TD4035E.TXT.r#206309#206309#TD4035E.TXT.r_14141;TD4035E.TXT.r_14142# dan pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la shin tu gnas pa'i sems kyis gnas na mthar phyin par bya ba'i phyir / / +lam ji ltar thob pa nyid kyi rjes su 'gro bar 'gyur te / /
column14: 0.028#TD4040E.TXT.r#2191776#2191776#TD4040E.TXT.r_524;TD4040E.TXT.r_525# dge slong gi gnas kun nas nyon mongs pa CAN MA YIN PAR NI JI srid 'tsho'i bar du brtags te tha na 'tsho ba tsam gyi phyir yang gnas par bya'o / / +de ltar dogs par 'gyur ba dang  rtog par 'gyur ba med pa'i gnas pa dag tu ni dge slong de gnas na tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa mkhas pa rnams dogs pa dang rtog par mi 'gyur ro // /
column15: 0.029#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#2016940#2016940#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_5684;TD4093.2E.TXT.r_5685# de'i phyir de dag gi yul can gyi phra rgyas rnams ni de la gnas pa ma yin pas rgyas par mi 'gyur ro ZHES BRJOD DO // / +gal te sred pas bdag gir ma byas na ji ltar 'di na gnas pas de don du gnyer bar byed ce na / /
column16: 0.029#TD4039E.TXT.r#1848054#1848055#TD4039E.TXT.r_3941# de nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal tsam zhig lus la cung zad srid pa dang ldan pa lhag par btang snyoms su byas pas bag med par gnas pa 'di ni kun du chags pa'i gnas bzhi ba'o // /
column17: 0.029#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2792189#2792189#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_12672;TD4038.1E.TXT.r_12673# dge ba yang dag par blang ba la 'jug par 'gyur te / / +de ltar de ni de las gzhan pa'i sems can rnams la phan 'dogs par byed pa yin no // /
column18: 0.029#TD4037E.TXT.r#1366857#1366857#TD4037E.TXT.r_6916;TD4037E.TXT.r_6917# de ma thag tu rab tu dga' ba'i gnas pa la yang 'thob pa'i tshul gyis 'jug par  rig par bya'o // / +rab tu dga' ba'i gnas pa la gnas pa de la ni mos pas spyod pa la gnas pas gnas pa la yod par bstan pa gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad kyi thams cad du med do // /
column19: 0.029#TD4044E.TXT.r#393823#393824#TD4044E.TXT.r_2225;TD4044E.TXT.r_2226# sgrub pa dman pa ni log par sgrub pa'o // / +de la gnas  pa ni log par sgrub pa la gnas pa ste / /

column3: 'dod chags la sogs pa kun nas nyon mongs pa gang gis sems kun nas nyon mongs par byed pa de dag nye bar zhi bar byed pas de'i phyir chos ni nad med pa'i rgyur bshad do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#141412#141421#TD4035E.TXT.r_2798;TD4035E.TXT.r_2799;TD4035E.TXT.r_2800;TD4035E.TXT.r_2801# dran pa brjed par gyur pas sems can de dag gnas de nas 'chi 'pho bar 'gyur ro // /
column5: 0.014#TD4086E.TXT.r#1310904#1310904#TD4086E.TXT.r_3855;TD4086E.TXT.r_3856# de nas yang sems can de dag gi sdig pa  mi dge ba'i las de'i rnam par smin pas lcags kyi tho ba dag lag tu 'ong bar 'gyur ro // / +sems can de dag kyang sems can gcig gis gcig mthong ba dang  shi bar gyur pas na phyogs gcig tu 'du ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin no // /
column6: 0.015#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2792189#2792189#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_12672;TD4038.1E.TXT.r_12673# dge ba yang dag par blang ba la 'jug par 'gyur te / / +de ltar de ni de las gzhan pa'i sems can rnams la phan 'dogs par byed pa yin no // /
column7: 0.017#TD4035E.TXT.r#138395#138396#TD4035E.TXT.r_2324;TD4035E.TXT.r_2325# de la spu gri'i sos gtams pa'i lam gang yin pa dang  nags tshal ral gri'i lo ma can gang yin pa dang  lcags kyi shing shal ma li'i tshal gang yin pa de lhag pa gcig tu bsdus pas na  lhag pa bzhir 'gyur ro // / +de la grang ba'i sems can dmyal bar skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi ni / /
column8: 0.017#TD4054E.TXT.r#1034119#1034119#TD4054E.TXT.r_7025;TD4054E.TXT.r_7026# rnam pa 'di lta bu'i bsam pa gang yin pas de ni  sbyin pa la byang chub sems dpa'i dga' ba'i bsam pa'o // / +gang dag la de ltar sbyin pas phan 'dogs pa'i sems can de dag ni bdag la shin tu phan 'dogs par byang chub sems dpa' mthong gi bdag gis ni ma yin te / /
column9: 0.018#TD4035E.TXT.r#141436#141438#TD4035E.TXT.r_2803;TD4035E.TXT.r_2804# gcig la gcig yid 'khrug par byed de / / +yid 'khrug pas sems can de dag gnas de nas 'chi 'pho bar 'gyur ro // /
column10: 0.020#TD4035E.TXT.r#137215#137215#TD4035E.TXT.r_2138;TD4035E.TXT.r_2139# de la sems can dmyal ba  chen po thig nag na ni gnod pa'i sdug bsngal 'di lta bu cher nyams su myong bar 'gyur te / / +de nas sems can de dag der gtogs pa'i mi gnod par byed pa dag gis thig nag pos bcal te / /
column11: 0.020#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1752781#1752782#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_6858# yid rab tu sdang bas sems can de dag gnas de nas 'chi 'pho bar 'gyur te / /
column12: 0.022#TD4065E.TXT.r#429384#429384#TD4065E.TXT.r_368# de'i tshe dud 'gro dang yi dags kyi bye brag yi dags dang dud 'gro'i 'gro bas bsdus pa de dag sems can dmyal ba'i 'gro bar 'byung bar ga la 'gyur / /
column13: 0.022#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#897042#897044#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1003;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_1004# ye shes kyi tshogs ni zab pa'i chos so // / +de la rgya che ba'i chos bstan pas ni sems can yongs su smin par 'gyur te / /
column14: 0.023#TD4032E.TXT.r#1925255#1925255#TD4032E.TXT.r_899;TD4032E.TXT.r_900# zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos thams cad der 'bras bu'i dngos por sbyor ba dang  de yang de dag la rgyu'i dngos por sbyor bas kun gzhi'o // / +sems can dang snod kyi 'jig rten de ltar snang bas rnam par rig par byed pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa'o // /
column15: 0.023#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2324603#2324603#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_1666# theg pa chen po la skur ba 'debs pa'i sems can mi dge ba'i grogs pos yongs su bzung ba'i phyir de la mos par mi 'gyur te / /
column16: 0.024#TD4037E.TXT.r#1358900#1358900#TD4037E.TXT.r_5711;TD4037E.TXT.r_5712;TD4037E.TXT.r_5713# yal bar 'dod pa'i bsam  pa dang ; / +yongs su bskyab par mi bya ba'i bsam pas ni ma yin no // / +sems can de dag kyang de ltar byang chub sems dpa' las drag po la 'jug la / /
column17: 0.024#TD4032E.TXT.r#1962275#1962275#TD4032E.TXT.r_6664;TD4032E.TXT.r_6665# dge ba'i rtsa ba 'grub pa ni dge ba'i rtsa ba 'phel ba'o // / +des sems can yongs su smin par byed nus par 'gyur te / /
column18: 0.024#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2323963#2323963#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_1595# rigs kyi sa'i  byang chub sems dpa' mnar med pa'i sems can dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur zhes gsungs pa'i don de ji lta bu yin zhes dris pa dang / /
column19: 0.024#TD4037E.TXT.r#1361734#1361734#TD4037E.TXT.r_6142;TD4037E.TXT.r_6143# nyan thos dang mthun par 'gyur ba'o // / +byang chub sems dpa' sems can rnams la don bya ba'i sbyor ba ni rnams la don bya ba'i sbyor ba ni rnam pa lngas 'bras bu yod par 'gyur te / /
column20: 0.024#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1756561#1756561#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_7196# kun du rmongs par gyur pa'i sems can de dag sems par ma la rnam par shes pa gnas par 'gyur te / /
column21: 0.025#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2877728#2877729#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_1423# bdag gis sems can 'di dag la bzod par byas nas bdag la phan 'dogs par 'gyur ro zhes  bzod par bya ba ma yin te / /
column22: 0.025#TD4043E.TXT.r#366537#366537#TD4043E.TXT.r_1425# de'i 'og tu sems can  dmyal ba'i srung ma rnams ni sprul pa lta bur 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni sems can ma yin par sems can dag lta bur snang ba la bya'o // /
column23: 0.026#TD4029E.TXT.r#2149487#2149487#TD4029E.TXT.r_3777# snying rjes yongs su bzung ba'i rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes ni mi zad par 'gyur ro // /
column24: 0.026#TD4035E.TXT.r#145318#145318#TD4035E.TXT.r_3559# sems can yang sems can ma yin par 'gyur zhing de las gzhan pa'i sems can yang de las gzhan pa'i  sems can du 'gyur bas mi rung ngo // /
column25: 0.027#TD4010E.TXT.r#2249706#2249707#TD4010E.TXT.r_2402;TD4010E.TXT.r_2403# lhun gyis grub pa yin / / +sems can ma lus pa'i don byed par nus par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'o // /
column26: 0.027#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#848226#848226#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_13421;TD4093.1E.TXT.r_13422# de lta na ni 'o na dbang po'i 'byung ba chen po rgyas pa bsam gtan gyi khyad par la snyoms par zhugs pa'i rgyu can yang lung du ma bstan pa'i phyis 'byung ba yin pa'i  phyir dang  ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa yin pa'i phyir dang  sems can du brjod pa'i phyir rnam par smin par 'gyur la / / +de lta na rgyas pa las byung ba dang  rnam par smin pa'i rnam par gzhag pa 'dres par 'gyur ro zhe na / /
column27: 0.028#TD4048E.TXT.r#1692665#1692667#TD4048E.TXT.r_1255# phan 'dogs pa'i rgyu 'di dag gis sems can rnams yongs su smin par bya ba'i las su rung bar 'gyur ro // /
column28: 0.028#TD4047E.TXT.r#1214103#1214103#TD4047E.TXT.r_13216;TD4047E.TXT.r_13217# SEMS KUN NAS NYON MONGS PAS  sems can RNAMS KUN NAS NYON MONGS PAR 'GYUR la / / +sems rnam par dag pas rnam par byang bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i mdo'i tshig gis so // /
column29: 0.028#TD4047E.TXT.r#1147393#1147393#TD4047E.TXT.r_3828# gal  te dbang po rnams sprul par gyur na ni sngon med pa'i sems can 'byung bar thal bar 'gyur na sngon med pa'i sems can 'byung ba ni med do // /
column30: 0.028#TD4019E.TXT.r#2518913#2518913#TD4019E.TXT.r_14760;TD4019E.TXT.r_14761# zhes pa ni skyes bu'i rtsol ba dang  gtsub shing la sogs pas mi rnams kyi nye bar spyod pa'i me 'byung bar 'gyur na / / +de dang 'dra ba'i sems can rnams gang gis 'byung zhes 'dri ba'o // /
column31: 0.029#TD4010E.TXT.r#2274839#2274839#TD4010E.TXT.r_5651# grong la sogs par gnas nas sems can rnams phyir mi ldog par 'gyur bar de ltar chos bstan par bya'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa la / /
column32: 0.029#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2930258#2930258#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_8658# des bcings par 'gyur gyi thar par mi 'gyur bas na sems can thar par bya ba'i phyir / /

column3: de dag zad mi shes pa nyid kyi rgyu yin pa'i phyir mya ngan las     // / +'das par 'du shes zhes bya ba la / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#141422#141434#TD4035E.TXT.r_2800;TD4035E.TXT.r_2801;TD4035E.TXT.r_2802;TD4035E.TXT.r_2803;TD4035E.TXT.r_2804# lha'i yid 'khrug par byed pa zhes bya ba dag yod de / / +de dag gang gi tshe gcig la gcig mig tshugs su rtog par byed de / /

column3: de dag ces bya ba'i sgras ni mngon par shes pa la sogs pa'i nor bzung ste / / +sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mya ngan las 'das pa la ni rnam pa gang gis kyang zad pa med pas de'i phyir mya ngan las  'das pa bzhin du mngon par shes pa la sogs pa'i nor yang yongs su zad par mi 'gyur ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#141434#141460#TD4035E.TXT.r_2802;TD4035E.TXT.r_2803;TD4035E.TXT.r_2804;TD4035E.TXT.r_2805;TD4035E.TXT.r_2806;TD4035E.TXT.r_2807;TD4035E.TXT.r_2808;TD4035E.TXT.r_2809# de dag de ltar rtog pa na / / +gcig la gcig yid 'khrug par byed de / / +yid 'khrug pas sems can de dag gnas de nas 'chi 'pho bar 'gyur ro // /
column5: 0.023#TD4086E.TXT.r#1312479#1312479#TD4086E.TXT.r_4025;TD4086E.TXT.r_4026# nags tshal rab tu 'bar bar byas nas / / +sems can de dag rab tu 'bar bar byed do // /
column6: 0.023#TD4086E.TXT.r#1312922#1312923#TD4086E.TXT.r_4102# khyim rab tu 'bar bar byas nas sems can de dag rab tu 'bar bar byed do // /
column7: 0.023#TD4047E.TXT.r#1220739#1220739#TD4047E.TXT.r_14086;TD4047E.TXT.r_14087# bdag nyid rgyal por gyur nas gnod pa de dag nye bar zhi bar byed do // / +chos dang ldan par gyur nas sems can rnams la phan pa dang bde ba'i bsam  pas snying brtse ba can yin no // /
column8: 0.023#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1772021#1772021#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_9220;TD4094.1E.TXT.r_9221# s'a lu de dag ris su cad cing ris su gnas par gyur te / / +de nas sems can de dag 'dus shing tshogs nas smre sngags 'don par byed de / /
column9: 0.024#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1752781#1752782#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_6858# yid rab tu sdang bas sems can de dag gnas de nas 'chi 'pho bar 'gyur te / /

column3: 'jig rten ni nor zad pas 'jigs par 'gyur na / / +sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mngon par shes pa la sogs pa'i nor la ni zad pa med pas de'i phyir 'jigs  pa med do // /
rnam par rtog pa ni dang po med pa dang yod par rnam par rtog pa de dag ni gang zag la bdag med pa'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs su gyur pa yin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#141470#141479#TD4035E.TXT.r_2809;TD4035E.TXT.r_2810;TD4035E.TXT.r_2811;TD4035E.TXT.r_2812;TD4035E.TXT.r_2813# lus thob pa gang bdag nyid kyi sems kyis kyang 'pho bar 'gyur la / / +gzhan gyi sems kyis kyang 'pho bar 'gyur ba'ang yod de / / +'di lta ste / /

column3: gnyis pa dag ni chos la bdag med pa'i mi mthun pa'i phyogs su gyur pa yin no // / +gzugs nyid stong pa nyid ces bya ba ni chos  dang chos can gzhan ma yin pa'i phyir te / /

stong pa nyid gzugs so zhes bya ba yang de dang 'dra'o // / +thabs kyi che ba nyid ni brtson 'grus drag po nyid kyi phyir zhes bya ba ni brtson 'grus mi dman pa dang mi 'khrug pa dang chog par mi 'dzin pas te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#141492#141499#TD4035E.TXT.r_2814;TD4035E.TXT.r_2815;TD4035E.TXT.r_2816# gzhan gyi sems kyis kyang 'pho bar mi 'gyur bdag kyang yod de / / +'di lta ste / / +gzugs dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i lha rnams dang  sems can dmyal ba thams cad dang  sems can dmyal bar skyes pa rnams ji  lta ba bzhin du / /
column5: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#141500#141507#TD4035E.TXT.r_2816;TD4035E.TXT.r_2817# gzugs dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i lha rnams dang  sems can dmyal ba thams cad dang  sems can dmyal bar skyes pa rnams ji  lta ba bzhin du / /

column3: brtson 'grus drag po de yang thabs kyis  yongs su zin pa yin gyi / / +gzu lums kyi brtson 'grus kyis ni ma yin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#141508#141518#TD4035E.TXT.r_2817;TD4035E.TXT.r_2818# yi dgas rnams kyang de dang 'dra ba dang  de bzhin gshegs pa'i pho nya dang  srid pa tha ma dang  byams pa la snyoms par zhugs pa dang  'gog pa la snyoms par zhugs pa dang  nyon mongs pa med pa la snyoms par zhugs pa dang  bar ma do'i srid pa pa dang   de lta bu dang mthun pa'i sems can rnams so // /

column3: de bzhin nyid bcas gnyis kyi chos nyid yongs btsal ba // / +zhes bya ba ni kun rdzob kyi bden pa'i chos nyid dang  don dam pa'i bden pa'i chos nyid do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#141519#141529#TD4035E.TXT.r_2817;TD4035E.TXT.r_2818;TD4035E.TXT.r_2819;TD4035E.TXT.r_2820# yi dgas rnams kyang de dang 'dra ba dang  de bzhin gshegs pa'i pho nya dang  srid pa tha ma dang  byams pa la snyoms par zhugs pa dang  'gog pa la snyoms par zhugs pa dang  nyon mongs pa med pa la snyoms par zhugs pa dang  bar ma do'i srid pa pa dang   de lta bu dang mthun pa'i sems can rnams so // / +de la rgyu dang rkyen dang 'bras bu rnam par gzhag pa ni rnam pa bzhir rig par bya ste / /

column3: de yongs su tshol ba ni gnyis kyis yongs su  tshol ba ste / / +'di skad du kun rdzob kyi bden pa'i chos la mkhas pa dang  don dam pa'i bden pa'i chos la mkhas pa zhes bshad pa yin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#141530#141541#TD4035E.TXT.r_2819;TD4035E.TXT.r_2820;TD4035E.TXT.r_2821;TD4035E.TXT.r_2822;TD4035E.TXT.r_2823# mtshan nyid dang  gnas dang  rab tu dbye ba dang  rnam par gzhag pa'o // / +de la rgyu'i mtshan nyid gang zhe na / /
column5: 0.0#TD4043E.TXT.r#375079#375082#TD4043E.TXT.r_2554;TD4043E.TXT.r_2555;TD4043E.TXT.r_2556# bstan bcos la btags pa'i yong pa dang   don dam par yod pa'i rgyu rnam par gzhag pa gcig tu bsdus nas rgyu rnam pa bcu ston par 'gyur bas na / / +de la rgyu'i mtshan nyid gang zhe na / /

column3: chos yongs su tshol ba'i skabs rdzogs so //// / +chos yongs su tshol ba'i skabs kyi 'og tu chos ston pa'i skabs te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#141542#141553#TD4035E.TXT.r_2821;TD4035E.TXT.r_2822;TD4035E.TXT.r_2823;TD4035E.TXT.r_2824;TD4035E.TXT.r_2825;TD4035E.TXT.r_2826;TD4035E.TXT.r_2827# snga na yod pa gang yin pa gang la  brten nas / / +gang dang phrad na / / +chos gang skye ba 'am / /

column3: 'di'i 'brel pa gang yin zhe na / / +gong du rnam pa gang dag gi de'i sbyor ba'i sa la slob pa de dag ni slob pa'i rnam pa'i khyad par yin te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#141554#141566#TD4035E.TXT.r_2825;TD4035E.TXT.r_2826;TD4035E.TXT.r_2827;TD4035E.TXT.r_2828;TD4035E.TXT.r_2829;TD4035E.TXT.r_2830# 'grub pa 'am / / +gnas pa'am / / +byed par 'gyur ba de ni de'i rgyu zhes bya ste / /
column5: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#141682#141685#TD4035E.TXT.r_2850;TD4035E.TXT.r_2851;TD4035E.TXT.r_2852# de la snga na yod pa ci zhig ci la brten nas / / +ci dang phrad na / /
column6: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#141710#141713#TD4035E.TXT.r_2854;TD4035E.TXT.r_2855;TD4035E.TXT.r_2856;TD4035E.TXT.r_2853# phyir rgol ba dang  mi mthun pa med pa'i 'khor dang phrad na bsgrub par bya ba'i don grub par 'gyur ro // / +snga na yod pa ci zhig ci la brten nas / / +ci dang phrad na chos ci zhig 'grub ce na / /
column7: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#141735#141742#TD4035E.TXT.r_2860;TD4035E.TXT.r_2861;TD4035E.TXT.r_2862;TD4035E.TXT.r_2863# bzo'i las kyi gnas de dang de dag 'grub par 'gyur ro // / +snga na yod pa ci zhig ci la brten nas / / +ci dang phrad na chos ci zhig gnas par 'gyur zhe na / /
column8: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#141760#141770#TD4035E.TXT.r_2867;TD4035E.TXT.r_2868;TD4035E.TXT.r_2869;TD4035E.TXT.r_2870;TD4035E.TXT.r_2871# 'tshol brtas par 'gyur ro // / +snga na yod pa ci zhig la brten nas / / +ci dang phrad na chos ci zhig byed par 'gyur zhe na / /

column3: de dag kyang bsam pa'i khyad par la sogs pa'o zhes bshad pa la bsam pa dang sbyor ba'i khyad par dag ni mos pa yongs su tshol ba'i skabs su bshad    zin to // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#141565#141577#TD4035E.TXT.r_2828;TD4035E.TXT.r_2829;TD4035E.TXT.r_2830;TD4035E.TXT.r_2831;TD4035E.TXT.r_2832;TD4035E.TXT.r_2833;TD4035E.TXT.r_2834# snga na yod pa ci zhig ci la brten nas ci dang phrad na / / +chos ci zhig skye bar 'gyur zhe na / / +rang gi sa bon ni  snga na yod pa ste / /
column5: 5.960#TD4043E.TXT.r#375288#375289#TD4043E.TXT.r_2584;TD4043E.TXT.r_2585# chos ci zhig byed par 'gyur zhe na / / +rang gi sa bon ni snga na yod pa ste zhes bya ba  la ; /

column3: da ni gzhan la phan pa bsgrub pa'i khyad par gyi skabs la bab pas de brjod do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#141578#141586#TD4035E.TXT.r_2832;TD4035E.TXT.r_2833;TD4035E.TXT.r_2834;TD4035E.TXT.r_2835;TD4035E.TXT.r_2836;TD4035E.TXT.r_2837# de las gzhan pa'i gnas gzugs can nam / / +gzugs can ma yin pa la yang brten la / / +las la yang brten nas / / +grogs dang  dmigs pa dang yang phrad na / /

column3: ji ltar na gzhan la phan pa sgrub pa yin zhe na / / +gzhan dag la dam pa'i chos yang dag par rab tu ston pa'i phyir te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#141585#141599#TD4035E.TXT.r_2835;TD4035E.TXT.r_2836;TD4035E.TXT.r_2837;TD4035E.TXT.r_2838;TD4035E.TXT.r_2839;TD4035E.TXT.r_2840# grogs dang  dmigs pa dang yang phrad na / / +'dod pa dang ldan pa rnams dang  gzugs dang ldan     // / +pa rnams dang  gzugs med pa dang ldan pa rnams dang ldan pa ma yin pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyur te / /

column3: de bas na chos yongs su tshol ba'i skabs kyi 'og tu chos ston pa'i skabs  yin no // / +chos ston pa la ser sna dgag pa'i tshigs su bcad pa zhe bya ba ni ji ltar na chos ston pa la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ser sna skabs nyid med pa de ston par byed pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#141596#141614#TD4035E.TXT.r_2838;TD4035E.TXT.r_2839;TD4035E.TXT.r_2840;TD4035E.TXT.r_2841;TD4035E.TXT.r_2842# de yang ci rigs par sbyar ro // / +snga na yod pa ci zhig ci la brten nas / / +ci dang phrad na chos ci zhig 'thob par 'gyur zhe na / /
column5: 1.192#TD4035E.TXT.r#141710#141711#TD4035E.TXT.r_2854;TD4035E.TXT.r_2855;TD4035E.TXT.r_2856# phyir rgol ba dang  mi mthun pa med pa'i 'khor dang phrad na bsgrub par bya ba'i don grub par 'gyur ro // / +snga na yod pa ci zhig ci la brten nas / / +ci dang phrad na chos ci zhig 'grub ce na / /

column3: byang chub sems dpa' rnam pa ni snying rjes srog dang longs spyod tshegs chen pos rnyed cang zad par 'gyur  bas snying po med pa dag kyang sems can sdug bsngal bar gyur pa rnams la sbyin par byed pa na zhes bya ba ni yo byad zad na'ang sdug bsngal bar 'gyur la / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#141615#141628#TD4035E.TXT.r_2842;TD4035E.TXT.r_2843;TD4035E.TXT.r_2844;TD4035E.TXT.r_2845;TD4035E.TXT.r_2846# nang gi yan lag gi stobs la brten nas phyi rol gyi yan lag gi stobs dang phrad na / /
column5: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#141629#141636#TD4035E.TXT.r_2844;TD4035E.TXT.r_2845;TD4035E.TXT.r_2846# de la nang gi yan lag gi stobs ni 'di yin te / / +'di lta ste / / +tshul bzhin yid la byed pa dang  'dod pa chung ba la sogs pa nang gi dge ba'i chos rnams dang  de bzhin du mir 'gyur ba dang  'phags pa'i gnas su skye ba dang  dbang po rnams ma nyams pa dang  las kyi mtha' ma log pa dang  gnas la dar bar gyur pa de lta bu dang mthun  pa'i chos rnams ni nang gi yan lag gi stobs zhes bya'o // /

column3: srog zad na yang 'chi bar 'gyur bas gang zhig zad par 'gyur ba de ni sbyin par mi nus kyi / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#141637#141645#TD4035E.TXT.r_2846# tshul bzhin yid la byed pa dang  'dod pa chung ba la sogs pa nang gi dge ba'i chos rnams dang  de bzhin du mir 'gyur ba dang  'phags pa'i gnas su skye ba dang  dbang po rnams ma nyams pa dang  las kyi mtha' ma log pa dang  gnas la dar bar gyur pa de lta bu dang mthun  pa'i chos rnams ni nang gi yan lag gi stobs zhes bya'o // /

column3: gang zhig sbyin yang zad pa med pa de la ni  sems zhum par mi 'gyur ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#141646#141654#TD4035E.TXT.r_2846;TD4035E.TXT.r_2847# tshul bzhin yid la byed pa dang  'dod pa chung ba la sogs pa nang gi dge ba'i chos rnams dang  de bzhin du mir 'gyur ba dang  'phags pa'i gnas su skye ba dang  dbang po rnams ma nyams pa dang  las kyi mtha' ma log pa dang  gnas la dar bar gyur pa de lta bu dang mthun  pa'i chos rnams ni nang gi yan lag gi stobs zhes bya'o // /

column3: chos ni byin yang zad par mi 'gyur gyi / / +mar me las mar gyi me spar ba de bzhin du 'phel bar 'gyur ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#141653#141666#TD4035E.TXT.r_2846;TD4035E.TXT.r_2847;TD4035E.TXT.r_2848;TD4035E.TXT.r_2849# tshul bzhin yid la byed pa dang  'dod pa chung ba la sogs pa nang gi dge ba'i chos rnams dang  de bzhin du mir 'gyur ba dang  'phags pa'i gnas su skye ba dang  dbang po rnams ma nyams pa dang  las kyi mtha' ma log pa dang  gnas la dar bar gyur pa de lta bu dang mthun  pa'i chos rnams ni nang gi yan lag gi stobs zhes bya'o // / +de la phyi rol gyi yan lag gi stobs ni 'di yin te / /

column3: longs spyod kyang tshegs chen pos bsgrub par bya ba yin la / / +mi nyid kyang yid la smon pa brgya phrag mang pos 'thob ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#141667#141677#TD4035E.TXT.r_2849;TD4035E.TXT.r_2850# sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang  dam pa'i chos bstan pa dang  chos bstan pa rnams gnas par bya ba dang  gnas par gyur pa rnams kyi rjes su 'jug  par byas pa dang  gzhan dag snying brtse ba dang  de lta bu dang mthun pa'i chos rnams ni phyi rol gyi yan lag gi stobs zhes bya'o // /

column3: gang zhig de  ltar tshegs chen pos rnyed pa'i lus dang longs spyod de dag kyang yongs su gtong ba de ji ltar tshegs chen pos rnyed pa ma yin pa chos yongs su gtong bar mi byed / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#141678#141694#TD4035E.TXT.r_2849;TD4035E.TXT.r_2850;TD4035E.TXT.r_2851;TD4035E.TXT.r_2852;TD4035E.TXT.r_2853# sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang  dam pa'i chos bstan pa dang  chos bstan pa rnams gnas par bya ba dang  gnas par gyur pa rnams kyi rjes su 'jug  par byas pa dang  gzhan dag snying brtse ba dang  de lta bu dang mthun pa'i chos rnams ni phyi rol gyi yan lag gi stobs zhes bya'o // / +de la snga na yod pa ci zhig ci la brten nas / /
column5: 0.020#TD4035E.TXT.r#141560#141561#TD4035E.TXT.r_2827;TD4035E.TXT.r_2828;TD4035E.TXT.r_2829# byed par 'gyur ba de ni de'i rgyu zhes bya ste / / +snga na yod pa ci zhig ci la brten nas ci dang phrad na / /

column3: chos ni srog dang longs spyod dag pas kyang chos shin tu rnyed par dka' bas tshigs su bcad pa phyed tsam gyi phyir yang byang chub  sems dpa' bdag nyid yongs su btang ste / /
column4: 0.024#TD4035E.TXT.r#141560#141561#TD4035E.TXT.r_2827;TD4035E.TXT.r_2828;TD4035E.TXT.r_2829# byed par 'gyur ba de ni de'i rgyu zhes bya ste / / +snga na yod pa ci zhig ci la brten nas ci dang phrad na / /

column3: ji skad du / / +legs gsungs tshigs bcad phyed tsam yang // / +nyid kyi sku yi drin gyis bsgrubs // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#141712#141723#TD4035E.TXT.r_2855;TD4035E.TXT.r_2856;TD4035E.TXT.r_2857;TD4035E.TXT.r_2858;TD4035E.TXT.r_2859# snga na yod pa ci zhig ci la brten nas / / +ci dang phrad na chos ci zhig 'grub ce na / /

column3: zhes bya ba la sogs pa bshad pa lta bu dang  ji skad du bdag ni tshigs bcad gcig gi phyir yang bdag nyid tshangs pa'i 'jig rten  nas me'i 'obs su 'dor bar spro'o zhes gsungs pa lta bu'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#141724#141734#TD4035E.TXT.r_2858;TD4035E.TXT.r_2859;TD4035E.TXT.r_2860;TD4035E.TXT.r_2861# de dang mthun  pa'i brtson pa la brten nas / / +bzo'i las kyi gnas lta bu'i cha spyad yo byad dang phrad na / /
column5: 0.024#TD4035E.TXT.r#141560#141561#TD4035E.TXT.r_2827;TD4035E.TXT.r_2828;TD4035E.TXT.r_2829# byed par 'gyur ba de ni de'i rgyu zhes bya ste / / +snga na yod pa ci zhig ci la brten nas ci dang phrad na / /

column3: de lta bas na gang zhig de ltar rnyed dka' ba de la 'di skad du / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#141743#141750#TD4035E.TXT.r_2862;TD4035E.TXT.r_2863;TD4035E.TXT.r_2864;TD4035E.TXT.r_2865;TD4035E.TXT.r_2866# ci dang phrad na chos ci zhig gnas par 'gyur zhe na / / +sred pa ni snga na yod pa ste / /

column3: rnyed par sla ba zhes ji skad du brjod ce na / / +de ni de ltar mi gzung gi / / +sangs rgyas byung ba nas bzung ste // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#141751#141759#TD4035E.TXT.r_2864;TD4035E.TXT.r_2865;TD4035E.TXT.r_2866;TD4035E.TXT.r_2867;TD4035E.TXT.r_2868# zas la brten pa'i    lus la brten nas / / +zas rnam pa bzhi dang phrad na / / +sems can byung ba rnams gnas shing / /
column5: 0.029#TD4035E.TXT.r#141709#141709#TD4035E.TXT.r_2854;TD4035E.TXT.r_2855# phyir rgol ba dang  mi mthun pa med pa'i 'khor dang phrad na bsgrub par bya ba'i don grub par 'gyur ro // / +snga na yod pa ci zhig ci la brten nas / /
column6: 0.029#TD4035E.TXT.r#141734#141734#TD4035E.TXT.r_2860;TD4035E.TXT.r_2861# bzo'i las kyi gnas de dang de dag 'grub par 'gyur ro // / +snga na yod pa ci zhig ci la brten nas / /

column3: ji srid du bstan pa gnas pa de'i bar du ni dam pa'i     // / +chos tshegs chen pos rnyed pa ma yin te / /
'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gdul ba'i skye bo'i thad du gshegs shing gshegs nas yul dang dus la sogs pa la ltos te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#141768#141781#TD4035E.TXT.r_2869;TD4035E.TXT.r_2870;TD4035E.TXT.r_2871;TD4035E.TXT.r_2872;TD4035E.TXT.r_2873;TD4035E.TXT.r_2874# ci dang phrad na chos ci zhig byed par 'gyur zhe na / / +rang gi sa bon ni snga na yod pa ste / /

column3: sems can dag la ni mi 'dod pa bzhin du yang ston par mdzad pas de'i  phyir tshegs chen pos rnyed pa ma yin pa zhes bya'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#141782#141793#TD4035E.TXT.r_2872;TD4035E.TXT.r_2873;TD4035E.TXT.r_2874;TD4035E.TXT.r_2875;TD4035E.TXT.r_2876;TD4035E.TXT.r_2877# rang rang gi chos kyi rang gi byed pa yod cing / / +rang gi las byed de / / +'di lta ste / / +mig gi las ni lta ba'o // /

column3: chos yangs pa ni theg pa chen po'i chos so // / +gang phyir rang rig chos pas bcom ldan 'das kyis ma bstan zhes bya ba ni gang gi phyir chos ni so so rang gis rig par bya ba yin pas / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#141792#141811#TD4035E.TXT.r_2876;TD4035E.TXT.r_2877;TD4035E.TXT.r_2878;TD4035E.TXT.r_2879;TD4035E.TXT.r_2880;TD4035E.TXT.r_2881# de bzhin du dbang po lhag ma rnams kyang rang rang gi las byed par rig par bya'o // / +de bzhin dus ni rton par byed chu ni rlan par byed / /
column5: 0.015#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2772759#2772760#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_10011;TD4038.1E.TXT.r_10012;TD4038.1E.TXT.r_10013# rang bzhin gyi    mtshan ma khyi'us khyi'u dbyung ba'i tshul gyis mngon par 'byin par byed / / +mngon par sel bar byed / /
column6: 0.015#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2779281#2779283#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_10879;TD4038.1E.TXT.r_10880;TD4038.1E.TXT.r_10881# chen po  bstan pa yang yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes shing snying por sems par byed / / +bstan par sems par byed / /
column7: 0.015#TD4047E.TXT.r#1195869#1195870#TD4047E.TXT.r_10645# dgod par byed na yang ran par dgod par byed kyi ma 'os par dgod par mi byed pa'o // /
column8: 0.015#TD4079E.TXT.r#765609#765611#TD4079E.TXT.r_1536;TD4079E.TXT.r_1537;TD4079E.TXT.r_1538# de bzhin nyid kyi skye gnas can gyi ting nge 'dzin yang dag pa'i sbyor bas kun tu bsten pas rjes su 'gro bar byed // / +bsgom pas rjes su 'gro bar byed // /
column9: 0.015#TD4091E.TXT.r#704782#704787#TD4091E.TXT.r_1894;TD4091E.TXT.r_1895;TD4091E.TXT.r_1896;TD4091E.TXT.r_1897# de la skye bas ni chos de skyed par byed do // / +gnas pas ni gnas par byed do // /
column10: 0.016#TD4036E.TXT.r#12511#12512#TD4036E.TXT.r_1818;TD4036E.TXT.r_1819;TD4036E.TXT.r_1820# chags pa dang zhen pa dang  'chums pa dang mdud pa por bas yongs su longs spyod par byed do // / +de la zas ran par yongs su longs spyod par byed cing / /
column11: 0.018#TD4009E.TXT.r#332260#332261#TD4009E.TXT.r_1646;TD4009E.TXT.r_1647# de bzhin du smon par byed smon pa med par mi byed / / +mtshan ma med pas mtshan ma med par mi byed / /
column12: 0.018#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2342304#2342306#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_3644;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_3645# shes bya'i dngos po dang mthun pa'i gzugs brnyan la mnyam par gzhag pa'i sa pa'i lhag mthong gi rnam pa dag gis lta bar byed cing / /
