column27: 0.023#TD4026E.TXT.r#308502#308502#TD4026E.TXT.r_6122;TD4026E.TXT.r_6123# bsgom pa yongs su grub pa rnams 'dres pa nye bar 'dres pa lhun gyis grub par bsgom pa'i phyir ro // / +bsgoms pas ji lta bu zhe na / /
column28: 0.023#TD4054E.TXT.r#1008364#1008364#TD4054E.TXT.r_2912;TD4054E.TXT.r_2913;TD4054E.TXT.r_2914# sangs rgyas dang BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' RNAMS kyi dmigs pa'o // / +gzhag pas ji lta bu zhe na / / +de bzhin du rnam par gzhag pa'i dmigs pas yongs su ma grub pas so // /
column29: 0.024#TD4037E.TXT.r#1328932#1328932#TD4037E.TXT.r_1797;TD4037E.TXT.r_1798# khams brtas pa dang  da ltar gyi rkyen nye bar sgrub pa dang  'jug pa dang  dga' bar 'dzin pa dang  dang po 'jug pa dang  dang po 'jug pa ma yin pa dang  rnam par dag pa  thag ring ba dang  rnam par dag pa thag nye ba dang  sbyor ba dang  bsam pa dang  zang zing nye bar sgrub pa dang  chos nye bar sgrub pa dang  rdzu 'phrul gyis 'dun par byed pa dang  chos ston pa dang  gsang ste chos brjod pa dang  rnam par phye ste chos brjod pa dang  sbyor ba chung ngu dang  sbyor ba  'bring dang  sbyor ba chen po dang  thos pa dang  sems pa dang  bsgom pa dang  sdud pa dang  tshar gcod pa dang bdag nyid kyis byed pa dang  gzhan la bcol ba dang  de gnyi ga'o // / +de la khams brtas pa gang zhe na / /
column30: 0.024#TD4037E.TXT.r#1372740#1372740#TD4037E.TXT.r_7522;TD4037E.TXT.r_7523# skye gnas de dang de dag tu skye bar rig par bya'o // / +de la byang chub sems dpa'i bdag por skye ba gang zhe na / /
column31: 0.025#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3093097#3093097#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_4;TD4038.2E.TXT.r_5;TD4038.2E.TXT.r_6# gzhan ma yin par brjod par bya zhe na / / +smras dd  pa ; / +gnyi gar yang brjod par mi bya'o // /
column32: 0.027#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2793316#2793316#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_12864;TD4038.1E.TXT.r_12865;TD4038.1E.TXT.r_12866# btags pa'i yod par brjod par bya zhe na / / +smras pa / / +btags pa'i yod par brjod par bya ste / /
column33: 0.027#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2793349#2793350#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_12873;TD4038.1E.TXT.r_12874;TD4038.1E.TXT.r_12875# btags pa'i yod par brjod par bya zhe na / / +smras pa / / +rdzas su yod par brjod par bya ste / /
column34: 0.027#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2793365#2793365#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_12878;TD4038.1E.TXT.r_12879;TD4038.1E.TXT.r_12880# btags pa'i yod par brjod par bya zhe na / / +smras pa / / +gnyi gar brjod par bya ste / /
column35: 0.027#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3100280#3100280#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_1309;TD4038.2E.TXT.r_1310;TD4038.2E.TXT.r_1311# rags par brjod par bya zhe na / / +smras pa / / +rags par brjod par bya ste / /
column36: 0.027#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3095117#3095117#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_447;TD4038.2E.TXT.r_448# mi spong bar brjod par bya bya'am / / +mi spong bar brjod par bya zhe na / /
column37: 0.029#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3104600#3104600#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_1848;TD4038.2E.TXT.r_1849# bsdams pa ma yin par brjod par bya zhe na / / +bsdams pa ma yin par brjod par bya'o // /
column38: 0.029#TD4051E.TXT.r#1251910#1251911#TD4051E.TXT.r_2776;TD4051E.TXT.r_2777# thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye SHES THOB PAR BYA BA'I PHYIR ro zhes brjod pa'i rigs pa las de'i go rims smos pa ni byang bar bya ba'i phyir te / / +ji ltar bstan pa bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o zhes  gdul ba'i tshogs skal ba yod pa la phan 'dogs pa'o // /

column3: so sor 'chad par byed pa'i rtogs pa ni rags pa'o zhes bya ba ni thos pa'i gnas skabs na bshad  pa'i chos kyis rjes su 'brangs te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#161811#161825#TD4035E.TXT.r_6459;TD4035E.TXT.r_6460;TD4035E.TXT.r_6461;TD4035E.TXT.r_6462# bcom ldan 'das kyis ji ltar gzhag pa dang  bstan pa de bzhin du shes par bya'o // / +de kho na shes pas ji ltar shes par bya zhe na / /
column5: 0.013#TD4035E.TXT.r#182690#182690#TD4035E.TXT.r_9971;TD4035E.TXT.r_9972;TD4035E.TXT.r_9973# mkhas pa 'di dag gi rnam par dbye ba ni  mdo las ji skad 'byung ba kho na bzhin du rig par bya'o // / +gtan tshigs kyi rig pa gang zhe na / / +brtag pa'i don du yod pa'i dang po gang yin pa ste / /
column6: 0.021#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#880600#880600#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_18311# kham gyi zas kyi bdag nyid ma yin zhing lung du ma bstan pa go ji ltar srid pa tshol bar byed pa rnams la phan 'dogs par byed par brjod par bya zhe na / /
column7: 0.023#TD4069E.TXT.r#624418#624418#TD4069E.TXT.r_309# ji ltar yongs su shes par bya zhe na mi rtag par RO ZHES BYA BA NI / /
column8: 0.023#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#1983398#1983398#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_664;TD4093.2E.TXT.r_665# 'das pa  dang ma 'ongs pa dag ni zin pa ma yin no zhes 'byung ba'i phyir ro // / +ji ltar du sa gsum pa'i sems pas yin zhe na / /
column9: 0.025#TD4035E.TXT.r#173162#173162#TD4035E.TXT.r_8500;TD4035E.TXT.r_8501# ji ltar phyin ci ma log par yongs su shes par bya zhe na / / +'di na la la bsam gtan dang po'i snyoms par 'jug pas chog par 'dzin te / /
column10: 0.025#TD4061E.TXT.r#1515542#1515543#TD4061E.TXT.r_226;TD4061E.TXT.r_227# gzugs la sogs pa  sdug bsngal gyi bden pas bsdus pa'o // / +ji ltar yongs su shes par bya zhe na / /
column11: 0.026#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#989766#989766#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_12849;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_12850;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_12851# byang chub sems dpa' de sems grol ba zhes kyang bya ste / / +ji ltar zhe na / / +bdag gi rgyud la yod pa'i mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i nyon mongs pas bcings pa rnams mthong ba'i lam  gyis spangs pas na grol ba mchog gis grol ba zhes bya'o // /
column12: 0.028#TD4031E.TXT.r#2958862#2958862#TD4031E.TXT.r_50;TD4031E.TXT.r_51# gang la bslab par bya ba'i yul  yongs su rdzogs pa'i don bstan pa'o // / +de la ji ltar bslab par bya zhe na / /
column13: 0.029#TD4049E.TXT.r#2301169#2301169#TD4049E.TXT.r_2365;TD4049E.TXT.r_2366# yang mi gnas par sbyin pa dang  rgya cher sbyin pa dang  dga' bas sbyin pa dang  phyir zhing sbyin pa dang  snod la sbyin pa dang  'khor dang glo bur  du 'ongs pa la legs par bgos te sbyin pas sbyin pa phun sum tshogs par rig par bya'o // / +ji ltar na sbyin par bya ba phun sum tshogs par rig par ba zhe na / /

column3: rtogs pa gang yin pa'o // / +yon tan gyi skabs rdzogs so //// / +yang byang chub sems dpa' yon tan de lta bu dang ldan pa de dag gi ming yang dag pa'i don dang mthun pa'i phyir rab tu rnam par dbye bas de dag la bstod pa bsgrags  pas de ltar rnam par 'phel ba'i yon tan rgya chen po sna tshogs dang  bsam pa bzang po dang  spyod pa'i bsam pa'i rnam pa dag gis byang chub sems dpa' rnams yin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#267220#267234#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6695;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6696;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6697;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6698;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6699;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6700# 'jig rten du ma byung yang rung ste / / +chos nyid dang  chos gnas pa  dang ; / +chos kyi dbyings 'di ni gnas pa nyid do zhes gang gsungs pa la chos nyid ni gang / /
column5: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#161826#161839#TD4035E.TXT.r_6462;TD4035E.TXT.r_6463;TD4035E.TXT.r_6464;TD4035E.TXT.r_6465# rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ni ngas byas pa yang ma yin / / +gzhan dag gis byas pa yang ma yin te / /
column6: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#161839#161847#TD4035E.TXT.r_6465;TD4035E.TXT.r_6466;TD4035E.TXT.r_6467;TD4035E.TXT.r_6468# chos nyid dang  chos gnas pa dang  chos kyi dbyings 'di ni gnas pa nyid do zhes gang gsungs pa la / /
column7: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#161848#161859#TD4035E.TXT.r_6466;TD4035E.TXT.r_6467;TD4035E.TXT.r_6468;TD4035E.TXT.r_6469;TD4035E.TXT.r_6470# chos nyid ni gang chos gnas pa ni gang / / +chos kyi dbyings ni gang zhe na / / +thog ma med pa'i dus nas grags pa gang  yin pa de ni chos nyid do / /
column8: 0.017#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#521928#521929#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9408;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_9409# de'i phyir rnam 'byor spyod pa'i sa las rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba de dag thog ma med pa'i dus nas grags pa'i RIGS PA GANG YIN PA  de ni chos nyid do // / +ji ltar grags pa de phyin ci ma log pa'i rigs pa'i tshig dang yi ge rnams kyi rnam par gzhag pa de ni chos gnas pa'o // /
column9: 0.022#TD4090.1E.TXT.r#1630603#1630603#TD4090.1E.TXT.r_5911;TD4090.1E.TXT.r_5912# de sde pa gzhan dag na re / / +de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung ma byung yang rung chos nyid 'di dag ni gnas pa     // /
column10: 0.028#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#267207#267207#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6692;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6693# rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba ni ngas byas pa'ang ma yin / / +gzhan dag gis byas pa yang ma yin te / /

column3: zhes bya bar yongs su gcod pa de rab tu dbye ba'i phyir yon tan gyi skabs kyi 'og tu brtags te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.3E.TXT.r#267249#267252#TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6701;TD4016.3E.TXT.r_6702# ji ltar grags pa de rigs pa'i tshig dang  yi ge rnams kyi  rnam par gzhag pa de ni chos gnas pa zhes bya'o // / +gnas pa de'i rgyu chos nyid de yin pas na de'i phyir dbyings zhes bya'o zhes 'byung ngo // /
column5: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#161858#161868#TD4035E.TXT.r_6469;TD4035E.TXT.r_6470;TD4035E.TXT.r_6471;TD4035E.TXT.r_6472# ji ltar grags pa de rigs pa'i tshig dang yi ge rnams kyis rnam par gzhag pa ni chos gnas pa'o // /

column3: gang gis na byang chub sems dpa' rnams su mngon par byed cing mtshon par byed pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#161869#161877#TD4035E.TXT.r_6471;TD4035E.TXT.r_6472;TD4035E.TXT.r_6473;TD4035E.TXT.r_6474# de'i phyir dbyings zhes bya'o // / +gal te skye ba med du zin na / /

column3: brtse ba ni byang chub tu sems kyis sems can yongs su gzung ba'i phyir ro // / +zhes bya ba ni sems can yongs su gzung ba'i ched du ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#161878#161894#TD4035E.TXT.r_6473;TD4035E.TXT.r_6474;TD4035E.TXT.r_6475;TD4035E.TXT.r_6476# su yang gang du yang skye bar 'gyur ram / / +yang na rnam pa thams cad du skye ba med kyang skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi yod dam zhes gang gsungs pa la / /

column3: sems can yongs su gzung  ba'i phyir / / +sems can rnams 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las bsgral bar bya'o zhes byang chub tu sems skyed par byed do // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#161894#161902#TD4035E.TXT.r_6475;TD4035E.TXT.r_6476;TD4035E.TXT.r_6477# ci'i phyir 'dir ngo bo nyid kyi rkyen du ngo bo nyid gsungs she na / / +'bras bu'i skye ba sa bon dang bcas pa'i dbang du byas pa'i phyir te / /
column5: 0.017#TD4043E.TXT.r#364608#364609#TD4043E.TXT.r_1203;TD4043E.TXT.r_1204# gang de'i rgyur gyur pa des ni de'i snga rol du 'byung ba'i tshe na 'bras bu spyad zin te / / +rnam par smin par gyur pa'i sa bon bskyed par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro // /
column6: 0.018#TD4052E.TXT.r#2863392#2863392#TD4052E.TXT.r_2506# de la tshul bzhin yid la byed pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i 'jig rten  pa'i sems chos kyi mchog ces bya ba de ni sa bon yongs su 'dzin par mi rung bas 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sems kyi bag chags ma bsgos pa'i phyir de'i sa bon ma yin pas 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sems kyi sa bon med pa'i phyir rgyu'i rkyen med do // /
column7: 0.019#TD4051E.TXT.r#1240451#1240451#TD4051E.TXT.r_1101;TD4051E.TXT.r_1102# de la thos pa'i bag chags ni de'i sa bon yongs su 'dzin par mi rigs pa'i phyir ro // / +zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sa bon  yongs su 'dzin par mi 'thad pa'i phyir te / /
column8: 0.020#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#880914#880914#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_18355;TD4093.1E.TXT.r_18356# rgyu de skye ba dang mthun par gnas par byed pa'i phyir ro // / +las kyis yongs su bsgos pa'i rnam par shes pa'i sa bon las zhes bya ba la sogs pa la / /
column9: 0.021#TD4052E.TXT.r#2846104#2846105#TD4052E.TXT.r_526# yang na kun nas nyon mongs pa'i sa bon rgyu'i rkyen yin pa'i phyir dang  rnam par byang ba'i sa bon yang rnam par byang ba'i rgyu'i rkyen yin pa'i phyir go rims bzhin du sbyar ba nyid du / /
column10: 0.022#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#847294#847294#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_13266;TD4093.1E.TXT.r_13267# 'di ltar de ni des spang bar  bya ba'i nyon mongs pa'i sa bon dang rjes su 'brel ba'i rten skye ba dang 'gal bas / / +de'i mjug thogs su nyon mongs pa'i sa bon rtog pa'i rten skye bar 'gyur te / /
column11: 0.022#TD4034.2E.TXT.r#2921918#2921921#TD4034.2E.TXT.r_7498;TD4034.2E.TXT.r_7499# don de nyid zhib tu bstan pa'i phyir / / +sa bon dang sa bon med pa'i dngos por skye ba skad cig ma ni gnas par mi rung ba'i phyir te zhes smos te / /
column12: 0.022#TD4052E.TXT.r#2855310#2855310#TD4052E.TXT.r_1720# de'i rgyun  yin pa'i phyir skad cig snga mas bsdus pa'i sa bon ni sa bon phyi ma'i rgyu'i rkyen du 'gyur ro // /
column13: 0.028#TD4052E.TXT.r#2857809#2857810#TD4052E.TXT.r_1995;TD4052E.TXT.r_1996# 'dun pa'i 'dod chags kyis  yongs su gsos pa bsod nams la sogs pa'i sa bon gang yin pa de ni srid pa'o // / +'bras bur gyur pa rnam par shes pa la sogs pa tshor ba la thug pa'i sa bon yin te / /
column14: 0.028#TD4032E.TXT.r#1926337#1926337#TD4032E.TXT.r_1056;TD4032E.TXT.r_1057# 'du byed rnams kyis yang srid pa'i sa bon rnam par shes pa la gso ba'i phyir btab pa / / +yang srid par 'gyur ba'i sa bon chu dang 'dra ba'i sred pa / /

column3: brtan pa nyid kyi rtags don gang la yin pa bstan pa'i phyir / / +dka' ba spyod pa la sogs pas mi skyo ba'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#161901#161912#TD4035E.TXT.r_6476;TD4035E.TXT.r_6477;TD4035E.TXT.r_6478;TD4035E.TXT.r_6479# 'bras bu'i skye ba sa bon dang bcas pa'i dbang du byas pa'i phyir te / / +skye ba'i sa bon ni rnam par shes pa la  sogs pa tshor ba la thug pa'i yan lag rnams yin pas na / /
column5: 0.028#TD4052E.TXT.r#2857809#2857810#TD4052E.TXT.r_1995;TD4052E.TXT.r_1996# 'dun pa'i 'dod chags kyis  yongs su gsos pa bsod nams la sogs pa'i sa bon gang yin pa de ni srid pa'o // / +'bras bur gyur pa rnam par shes pa la sogs pa tshor ba la thug pa'i sa bon yin te / /

column3: yongs su gzung ba la sogs pa ni  brtse ba la sogs pa'i las dang mdor bsdu ba yin no // / +brtse ba ni bsam pa'i sgo nas rig par bya'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#161912#161923#TD4035E.TXT.r_6478;TD4035E.TXT.r_6479;TD4035E.TXT.r_6480# de yang don gyis skye BA YIN TE / / +de yong na phis de dag nyid 'bras bur gyur pa la srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba zhes bya'o // /

column3: lhag ma ni sbyor ba'i sgo nas so zhes bya ba ni / / +bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa la mos pa thob pa la sogs par bya ba'i phyir snyan par smra ba la sogs pas rab tu sbyor     // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#161924#161939#TD4035E.TXT.r_6479;TD4035E.TXT.r_6480;TD4035E.TXT.r_6481;TD4035E.TXT.r_6482;TD4035E.TXT.r_6483# de yong na phis de dag nyid 'bras bur gyur pa la srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba zhes bya'o // / +de bzhin du yan lag lhag ma ji skad bstan pa rnams kyang ci rigs su blta bar bya'o // /

column3: brtse ba ni bsam pa'i sgo kho na nas yin gyi / / +sbyor ba'i sgo nas ni ma yin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#161940#161951#TD4035E.TXT.r_6483;TD4035E.TXT.r_6484# ci'i phyir ming dang gzugs dang  rnam par shes pa gcig gi rkyen gcig yin par rnam par gzhag ce na / /

column3: rtags de yang khyim pa dang  dge sbyong la brten nas 'jug ste / / +de'i phyir de'i 'og tu de'i rten rab tu rnam par dbye ba'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#161948#161960#TD4035E.TXT.r_6484;TD4035E.TXT.r_6485;TD4035E.TXT.r_6486# ming dang gzugs ni tshe 'di la rnam par shes pa'i rkyen du 'gyur la rnam par  shes pa ni tshe phyi ma la ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen du gyur pa'i phyir te / /

column3: yang dag par len pas thob pa'i rab tu byung  ba ni slob ma dang  slob dpon du 'brel ba'i gsol ba dang bzhi'i las kyis kyang gang yin pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#161961#161969#TD4035E.TXT.r_6485;TD4035E.TXT.r_6486# 'di ltar ma'i mngal du nyid mtshams sbyor ba'i tshe / / +gcig gi rkyen du gcig 'gyur ba'i phyir rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ma'i mngal du khu chu dang khrag gi gzugs ming gis yongs su zin pa mer mer  por 'dres par 'gyur la / /

column3: chos nyid kyis thob pa ni rtog pa'i dus na mi byed pa'i sdom pa thob pa'i phyir te / / +de kho na nyid rtogs pa gang zhig 'di snyam du bdag gi dmyal ba yang zad / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#161970#161991#TD4035E.TXT.r_6486;TD4035E.TXT.r_6487;TD4035E.TXT.r_6488;TD4035E.TXT.r_6489# gcig gi rkyen du gcig 'gyur ba'i phyir rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ma'i mngal du khu chu dang khrag gi gzugs ming gis yongs su zin pa mer mer  por 'dres par 'gyur la / /

column3: dud 'gro yang zad / / +yi  dvags kyang zad de / / +de bdag ni yang sdig pa'i las byas nas / / +ngan song rnams su rnam par smin pa mngon par 'grub pa'i skal pa can ma yin no snyam du sems pa yin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#161992#161999#TD4035E.TXT.r_6488;TD4035E.TXT.r_6489;TD4035E.TXT.r_6490# ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' nag po'i phyogs la rnam par lta ba na / / +rnam par shes pa las yid phyir ldog par 'gyur la / /

column3: de ltar phyogs gnyis la bslab pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa na dka' ba spyod pa la bsam pa brtan po  'thob par 'gyur bas / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#162000#162010#TD4035E.TXT.r_6489;TD4035E.TXT.r_6490;TD4035E.TXT.r_6491;TD4035E.TXT.r_6492# rnam par shes pa las yid phyir ldog par 'gyur la / / +yan lag gzhan  dag las ma yin zhe na / / +'di ltar de gnyis ni gcig gi rkyen gcig yin pas na / /

column3: de'i phyir de'i 'og tu bsam pa'i khyad par te / / +bsam pa'i stobs can ni gzhan gyi don la zhum par mi 'gyur ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#162009#162018#TD4035E.TXT.r_6491;TD4035E.TXT.r_6492;TD4035E.TXT.r_6493;TD4035E.TXT.r_6494# 'di ltar de gnyis ni gcig gi rkyen gcig yin pas na / / +rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs ji lta ba bzhin du / /
column5: 0.009#TD4039E.TXT.r#1854103#1854106#TD4039E.TXT.r_4577# de ltar na rnam  par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa ste / /
column6: 0.011#TD4036E.TXT.r#30049#30052#TD4036E.TXT.r_4606;TD4036E.TXT.r_4607;TD4036E.TXT.r_4608# 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa / / +rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs / /
column7: 0.011#TD4050E.TXT.r#1102295#1102297#TD4050E.TXT.r_750;TD4050E.TXT.r_751# ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs / / +ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis kyang rnam par shes pa zhes gsungs pa de la / /
column8: 0.011#TD4088E.TXT.r#2839423#2839426#TD4088E.TXT.r_2903;TD4088E.TXT.r_2904;TD4088E.TXT.r_2905# 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa / / +rnam par shes pa'i  rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs / /
column9: 0.011#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1749997#1749999#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_6558;TD4094.1E.TXT.r_6559;TD4094.1E.TXT.r_6560# 'di ltar ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du  byed dang  'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa / / +rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs / /
column10: 0.013#TD4043E.TXT.r#360421#360423#TD4043E.TXT.r_661;TD4043E.TXT.r_662;TD4043E.TXT.r_663# 'di lta ste / / +rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs so // / +ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa'o zhes gsungs so // /
column11: 0.014#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1748469#1748470#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_6274;TD4094.1E.TXT.r_6275;TD4094.1E.TXT.r_6276# 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par  shes pa ; / +rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs / /
column12: 0.016#TD4094.2E.TXT.r#1909712#1909713#TD4094.2E.TXT.r_3291;TD4094.2E.TXT.r_3292# rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs yin zhing / / +ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa yin no // /
column13: 0.017#TD4035E.TXT.r#156464#156465#TD4035E.TXT.r_5464;TD4035E.TXT.r_5465# de ltar na rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs zhes kyang bya la / / +ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa zhes kyang bya ste / /
column14: 0.019#TD4068E.TXT.r#599032#599032#TD4068E.TXT.r_3350# de'i tshe na ming dang gzugs kyang yod pas mtshams sbyor ba'i tshe na 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa nyid ces bya ba'i 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs zhes mi bya ba la rigs pa ci  yod de rigs pa med do // /
column15: 0.019#TD4068E.TXT.r#599054#599054#TD4068E.TXT.r_3351# de bas na mtshams sbyor ba'i tshe rnam par shes pa 'ba' zhig tu ma zad de ming dang gzugs kyang yod pas na 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs zhes bya ba'i 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa zhes ni mi bya'o // /
column16: 0.021#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2749394#2749394#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_6807;TD4038.1E.TXT.r_6808;TD4038.1E.TXT.r_6809# 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba ni 'phen pa'i go rims yin no // / +de  la rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs / / +ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug ces bya ba ni mngon par 'grub pa'i go rims yin no // /
column17: 0.022#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1748915#1748915#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_6365;TD4094.1E.TXT.r_6366# rnam par shes  pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs zhes bya'o // / +rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs zhes ngas ji skad du bstan pa de rgyas par rab tu bshad do // /

column3: mya ngan las 'das par 'dod pa ni de gnyi ga'i lhag pa'i bsam pa kho na yin pas zhes bya ba ni phan pa dang bde ba'i lhag pa'i bsam pa ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#162019#162027#TD4035E.TXT.r_6493;TD4035E.TXT.r_6494;TD4035E.TXT.r_6495# ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa yang de dang 'dra ba la rnam par lta ba na / / +rnam par shes pa las de'i  yid phyir ldog par 'gyur la / /

column3: sems can phung po'i lhag ma dang bcas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa thob pa rnams ni nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas 'di nyid la phan pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#162028#162039#TD4035E.TXT.r_6495;TD4035E.TXT.r_6496# de las gzhan pa yan lag rnams las de ltar phyir ldog par ma gyur te / /

column3: phung po lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa 'thob pa rnams ni phyi ma la skye ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal dang bral  bas bde bar 'gyur ba'i phyir / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#162040#162053#TD4035E.TXT.r_6496;TD4035E.TXT.r_6497;TD4035E.TXT.r_6498;TD4035E.TXT.r_6499# de la 'ga' zhig la gcig gi rkyen du gcig 'gyur pa mthong bas na de'i phyir ldog pa zhes brjod do // / +ldog pa'i phyogs la ming dang gzugs ni yang srid pa pa'i rnam  par shes pa ldog pa'i rgyu ma yin te / /

column3: mya ngan las 'das par 'dod pa ni de gnyi ga'i lhag pa'i bsam pa yin zhes bya'o // / +gzhan dag na re bdag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa ni mthong ba'i chos la bde ba la sbyor ba'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#162052#162067#TD4035E.TXT.r_6498;TD4035E.TXT.r_6499;TD4035E.TXT.r_6500;TD4035E.TXT.r_6501;TD4035E.TXT.r_6502;TD4035E.TXT.r_6503# des na gzhan yin par brtags pa'i phyir ro // / +ci'i phyir yan lag rnams bdag nyid kyis byas pa yang ma yin / /

column3: phan pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa ni tshe phyi ma la bde ba la sbyor ba'i  phyir ro zhes zer ro // / +phyir mi ldog pa'i sa ni mi gyo ba la sogs pa gsum ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#162065#162076#TD4035E.TXT.r_6502;TD4035E.TXT.r_6503;TD4035E.TXT.r_6504# rgyu med pa las skyes pa yang ma yin par  brjod ce na / / +skyed pa po med pa dang  rkyen la gyo ba med pa dang  rkyen la nus pa yod pa'i phyir ro // /
column5: 1.192#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#536501#536502#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11341;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11342# bstan bcos rnal 'byor spyod pa'i sa las kyang / / +rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba las gang ni sdug bsngal gyi myu gu lta bu yin / /
column6: 0.008#TD4041E.TXT.r#1277080#1277082#TD4041E.TXT.r_1253# gnag cing rnam par smin pa gnag pa rnams dang dkar zhing rnam par smin pa dkar ba rnams so sor dbye ba dang bcas pa  rnams ni dkar ba dang  gnag pa gang dag rnam par smin pa dkar ba dang gnag pa de dag thams cad ni rgyu dang rkyen las byung ba'i phyir na rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zhes bya bar de dag mi shes pa'o // /
column7: 0.011#TD4090.1E.TXT.r#1630274#1630280#TD4090.1E.TXT.r_5862;TD4090.1E.TXT.r_5863;TD4090.1E.TXT.r_5864# rgyur gyur pa'i yan lag ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yin te / / +'di  las 'byung ba'i phyir ro // /
column8: 0.011#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#1494048#1494051#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_10906;TD4092.1E.TXT.r_10907;TD4092.1E.TXT.r_10908# mu dang po ni chos ma 'ongs pa rnams so zhes bya ba ni chos gzhan gyi rgyu yin pa'i phyir rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yin te / / +'di  las 'byung ba'i phyir ro // /
column9: 0.025#TD4097E.TXT.r#2228647#2228649#TD4097E.TXT.r_3637;TD4097E.TXT.r_3638# 'dus byas ni mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i phyir ro // / +rten cing 'brel bar  'byung ba ni rgyu dang  rkyen las byung ba'i phyir ro // /
column10: 0.028#TD4047E.TXT.r#1156614#1156614#TD4047E.TXT.r_5214;TD4047E.TXT.r_5215# sems can thams cad kyi rten las shin tu 'das pa'i phyir sku dam pa'o // / +yang de ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rten du rig par bya'o // /

column3: mngon par 'du byed pa med pa'i lam las mi ldog pa'i phyir ro // / +de ltar lhag pa'i bsam pa'i stobs dang ldan pa ni gzhan gyi don la zhum par mi 'gyur bas de'i 'og tu sems can nye bar len    pa ste ; /
column4: 0.0#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#536503#536520#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11342;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11343;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11344;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11345;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11346# rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba las gang ni sdug bsngal gyi myu gu lta bu yin / /
column5: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#162077#162084#TD4035E.TXT.r_6504;TD4035E.TXT.r_6505# rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba las gang ni sdug bsngal gyi myu gu lta bu yin / /
column6: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#162084#162092#TD4035E.TXT.r_6505;TD4035E.TXT.r_6506# gang ni sdug bsngal gyi myu gu yongs su bsrung ba lta bu yin gang ni sdug bsngal gyi shing lta bu yin    zhe na / /

column3: sems can yongs su 'dzin pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // / +bdag pos yongs su 'dzin pa ni rje bor gyur pa ni 'di gang dag gi rje bo yin pa'o zhes bya ba ni 'khor los sgyur ba la sogs pa rje bor gyur pa gling bzhi pa'i dbang phyug nyid yin pas gling bzhi pa la sogs pa'i  sems can yongs su 'dzin pa yin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#162091#162102#TD4035E.TXT.r_6505;TD4035E.TXT.r_6506;TD4035E.TXT.r_6507# gang ni sdug bsngal gyi myu gu yongs su bsrung ba lta bu yin gang ni sdug bsngal gyi shing lta bu yin    zhe na / / +ma rig pa dang 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa la sogs pa tshor ba la thug pa rnams ni myu gu lta bu'o // /
column5: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#162103#162115#TD4035E.TXT.r_6507;TD4035E.TXT.r_6508# sred pa la sogs pa tshor ba'i rkyen las byung ba srid pa la thug pa rnams ni yongs su bsrung ba lta bur blta bar bya'o // /
column6: 5.960#TD4016.1E.TXT.r#536540#536544#TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11348;TD4016.1E.TXT.r_11349# srid  pa las thug pa rnams ni sdug bsngal gyi myu gu yongs su srung ba lta bur blta bar bya'o // / +skye ba dang rga shi ni sdug bsngal gyi shing lta bur blta bar bya'o zhes 'byung ngo // /
column7: 0.029#TD4035E.TXT.r#160694#160694#TD4035E.TXT.r_6237;TD4035E.TXT.r_6238# srid pa spong ba gang yin pa'o // / +tshor ba'i rkyen las byung ba sred pa ma yin pa ni / /

column3: de ltar smon lam la sogs kyis yongs su bzung bas mi gtang ba'i bsam pa yongs su 'dzin pa rnams kyang tshe gcig pa'i lus re zhig pas 'di dag gi don bsgrub par mi nus pas / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#162116#162135#TD4035E.TXT.r_6508;TD4035E.TXT.r_6509;TD4035E.TXT.r_6510;TD4035E.TXT.r_6511;TD4035E.TXT.r_6512# skye ba dang rga shi ni sdug bsngal gyi  shing lta bur blta bar bya'o // /

column3: de'i phyir de'i 'og tu srid par skye ba'i khyad  par te ; / +las kyi dbang gis 'dod pa'i gnas su skye ba zhes bya ba ni mos pas spyod pa'i sa la las dkar po yongs su gzung ba'i dbang gis so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#162135#162151#TD4035E.TXT.r_6511;TD4035E.TXT.r_6512;TD4035E.TXT.r_6513;TD4035E.TXT.r_6514;TD4035E.TXT.r_6515# yan lag rnams las mar lta bur lta ba du zhe na / / +ma rig pa dang  'du byed rnams dang  sred pa dang   len pa dang  srid pa'o // /

column3: sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir dud 'gro la sogs pa'i gnas dman par yang skye zhes bya ba ni rtogs pa'i dus na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#162147#162160#TD4035E.TXT.r_6513;TD4035E.TXT.r_6514;TD4035E.TXT.r_6515;TD4035E.TXT.r_6516# yan lag rnams las me lce 'bar ba lta bur lta ba du zhe na / / +skye ba dang rga shi'o // / +ci'i phyir nag po'i phyogs bstan pas rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la 'phel ba zhes bya zhe na / /
column5: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#162174#162180#TD4035E.TXT.r_6517;TD4035E.TXT.r_6518# ci'i phyir dkar po'i phyogs bstan pas rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la 'grib pa zhes bya zhe na / /

column3: byang chub sems dpa'i ngan 'gro rnams ldog ste / / +log kyang smon lam gyi stobs kyis ngan 'gror skye'o // / +ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang gis ni bsam gtan rnams bzlog nas 'dod pa'i khams su skye ba gang yin pa'o zhes bya ba ni / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#162159#162173#TD4035E.TXT.r_6516;TD4035E.TXT.r_6517# tha mar 'bras bu sdug bsngal gyi phung po 'ba' zhig por  'gyur ba dang  yan lag thams cad rkyen du gyur cing de las gzhan pa'i yan lag ni de las gzhan pa'i yan lag rnams kyi rjes su 'gro ba'i phyir ro // /
column5: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#162248#162250#TD4035E.TXT.r_6530;TD4035E.TXT.r_6531;TD4035E.TXT.r_6529# 'di nyid du tshor ba thams cad med par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //// / +ci'i phyir rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la brten nas shes pa bdun cu rtsa bdun rnam par gzhag ce na / /
column6: 0.015#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2401652#2401652#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10791;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10792# rgyu dang rkyen des yan lag de yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ba'o // / +yan lag de yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir 'bad de bsgoms pas de yang 'thob bo // /
column7: 0.015#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2402621#2402621#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10915;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10916# stong pa nyid kyi thogs pa med pa'i shes pa dam pa dang  mthong ba dam pa thob par mi nus pas rgyu dang rkyen des yan lag de yongs su ma rdzogs par gyur pa'o // / +yan lag de yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir 'bad de bsgoms pas de yang 'thob ste / /
column8: 0.020#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2401195#2401195#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10734;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10735;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10736# rkyen rnam pa gsum po des na / / +yan lag de yongs su rdzogs par mi 'gyur ba'o // / +yan lag de yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir 'bad de bsgoms pas de yang 'thob bo // /
column9: 0.024#TD4091E.TXT.r#711153#711154#TD4091E.TXT.r_3056;TD4091E.TXT.r_3057# 'bras bur  gyur pa'i yan lag ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ste / / +de lta na rgyu dang 'bras bur gyur pa'i phyir yan lag thams cad la yang gnyi gar grub bo // /
column10: 0.025#TD4016.2E.TXT.r#2401451#2401451#TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10764;TD4016.2E.TXT.r_10765# 'di ltar sa drug pa'i BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' RTEN cing 'brel bar 'byung ba mthong ba'i phyir / / +yan lag de yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba'o // /

column3: mdo sde dag las byang chub sems dpa' rnams  kyi bsam gtan bzlog pa la mkhas pa 'byung na / / +bsam gtan ldog pa ci bsam gtan yongs su gtong ba yin nam zhe na / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#162181#162188#TD4035E.TXT.r_6517;TD4035E.TXT.r_6518;TD4035E.TXT.r_6519# ci'i phyir dkar po'i phyogs bstan pas rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la 'grib pa zhes bya zhe na / / +phyi ma phyi ma  spangs pas yongs su 'bri bar 'gyur ba dang  yan lag thams cad sdug bsngal gyi phung po 'ba' zhig po 'grib pa'i rgyur gyur pa'i phyir ro // /

column3: smras pa / / +bsam gtan gyi 'bras bu ldog pa ni bsam gtan bzlog pa ste / / +bsam gtan gyi 'bras bu gzugs kyi khams su skye ba de  bzlog nas / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#162185#162196#TD4035E.TXT.r_6518;TD4035E.TXT.r_6519;TD4035E.TXT.r_6520;TD4035E.TXT.r_6521# phyi ma phyi ma  spangs pas yongs su 'bri bar 'gyur ba dang  yan lag thams cad sdug bsngal gyi phung po 'ba' zhig po 'grib pa'i rgyur gyur pa'i phyir ro // /

column3: 'dod pa'i khams su skye ba yin no // / +'phags pa rnams kyi skye ba bshad ma thag pa de yang skyes pa'i rabs kyi dbye bas mtha' yas te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#162193#162206#TD4035E.TXT.r_6519;TD4035E.TXT.r_6520;TD4035E.TXT.r_6521;TD4035E.TXT.r_6522;TD4035E.TXT.r_6523# yan lag rnams las du ni rgyu dang bcas pa'i chos rnams zhes bya zhe na / /

column3: sems can rnam par dag pas che chung gi rnam pa gang dag la rnam par gzhag pa brjod dgos pas de'i phyir de'i 'og tu rnam par dag  pa'i gnas skabs kyi sa bcu'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#162207#162219#TD4035E.TXT.r_6521;TD4035E.TXT.r_6522;TD4035E.TXT.r_6523;TD4035E.TXT.r_6524;TD4035E.TXT.r_6525;TD4035E.TXT.r_6526# yan lag rnams las du ni rgyu  dang bcas pa'i sdug bsngal zhes bya zhe na / / +de las gzhan pa lnga'o // / +yan lag rnams las du 'gags na zag pa zad pas rab tu phye ba yin zhe na / /

column3: bzhi pa ni byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pas mang du gnas kyang / / +byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa rnams 'khor bar yongs su bsngo ba yin no zhes bya ba ni byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa'i chos rnams ni gcig tu 'khor ba la sdud pa yin na /// /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#162220#162236#TD4035E.TXT.r_6525;TD4035E.TXT.r_6526;TD4035E.TXT.r_6527;TD4035E.TXT.r_6528;TD4035E.TXT.r_6529# yan lag rnams las du 'gags na rkyen zad pas rab tu phye ba yin zhe na / / +gsum po de dag nyid de de  las gzhan pa'i yan lag gi rkyen du gyur pa'i phyir ro // /

column3: byang chub sems dpa' thabs la mkhas pas byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa sgom pa snying rje chen pos yongs su zin pa'i phyir ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#162235#162244#TD4035E.TXT.r_6527;TD4035E.TXT.r_6528;TD4035E.TXT.r_6529;TD4035E.TXT.r_6530# yan lag rnams las du 'gags na tshor ba zad pas rab tu phye bar 'gyur zhe na / / +gcig ste / / +nyon mongs pa rnams spangs nas phung po 'gag pa'i dus na / /

column3: de ni 'gro ba la 'khyud nas 'dug pa lta bu yin pas snying rje chen pos yongs su zin pa'i phyir 'khor bar yongs su bsngos pa rna bas  sems can la phan par byed kyi gtan du 'khor ba la rgyab kyis phyogs te 'dug pa ni ma yin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#162251#162270#TD4035E.TXT.r_6530;TD4035E.TXT.r_6531;TD4035E.TXT.r_6532# 'di nyid du tshor ba thams cad med par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //// / +ci'i phyir rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la brten nas shes pa bdun cu rtsa bdun rnam par gzhag ce na / /
column5: 0.015#TD4052E.TXT.r#2857617#2857617#TD4052E.TXT.r_1979;TD4052E.TXT.r_1980# sngar phan tshun rkyen yin par bsgrubs pa'i phyir dang chos mngon par las kyang tshigs su bcad de bstan pa'i phyir grub par byas nas / / +gal te rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang po la rnam par shes pa de dag phan  tshun du rgyu'i rkyen yin na zhes bya ba smos so // /
column6: 0.016#TD4001E.TXT.r#1974798#1974798#TD4001E.TXT.r_315;TD4001E.TXT.r_316;TD4001E.TXT.r_317# bdag med pa kho na la rtag par pha rol dag  gis brtags pa'i phyir te / / +de bas na de bdag dang 'dra bar mi 'gyur bar dgongs pa'o // / +rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba 'di don dam pa'i tshul du bdag bzhin du rtag par yongs su brtags pa ma yin par bstan pa'i phyir / /
column7: 0.019#TD4041E.TXT.r#1277082#1277082#TD4041E.TXT.r_1253# gnag cing rnam par smin pa gnag pa rnams dang dkar zhing rnam par smin pa dkar ba rnams so sor dbye ba dang bcas pa  rnams ni dkar ba dang  gnag pa gang dag rnam par smin pa dkar ba dang gnag pa de dag thams cad ni rgyu dang rkyen las byung ba'i phyir na rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zhes bya bar de dag mi shes pa'o // /
column8: 0.022#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#870905#870905#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_16875;TD4093.1E.TXT.r_16876# ma skyes pa'i phyir na rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ma yin la / / +gzhan dag gi rgyur gyur pa'i phyir na rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'o // /
column9: 0.025#TD4090.2E.TXT.r#1081819#1081819#TD4090.2E.TXT.r_4915;TD4090.2E.TXT.r_4916# des srog ces bya ba phung po'i rgyun gang yin pa de yang med par go bar gyur na log par lta bar ltung bar 'gyur te / / +rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba mi shes pa'i phyir ro // /

column11: 0.025#TD4035E.TXT.r#162170#162171#TD4035E.TXT.r_6516;TD4035E.TXT.r_6517# tha mar 'bras bu sdug bsngal gyi phung po 'ba' zhig por  'gyur ba dang  yan lag thams cad rkyen du gyur cing de las gzhan pa'i yan lag ni de las gzhan pa'i yan lag rnams kyi rjes su 'gro ba'i phyir ro // / +ci'i phyir dkar po'i phyogs bstan pas rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la 'grib pa zhes bya zhe na / /
column12: 0.027#TD4019E.TXT.r#2468266#2468266#TD4019E.TXT.r_8013# 'byung ba rnams kyang phan tshun rgyu dang 'bras bur gyur ba rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba nyid kyi phyir don dam par 'byung ba med pa'i stong pa nyid ces bya'o // /

column3: lnga pa ni 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhis mang du gnas pas kun nas nyon mongs par mi 'gyur ro // / +des na sems la kun nas nyon mongs pa med pas sems can rnams yongs su  smin par byed de / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#162271#162278#TD4035E.TXT.r_6532# rgyu dang BCAS PA'I KUN NAS NYON MONGS PA SHES PAS brjod ba'i don dang  rang gi rgyud la rang gis BYAS PA'I KUN NAS NYON MONGS PA BRJOD pa'i don  dang  sngon gyi mtha' las yan lag rnams kyi thog ma med par brjod pa'i don dang  sngon gyi mtha' las yan lag rnams KYIS KUN NAS NYON MONGS PA'I GO skabs brjod pa'i don dang  phyi ma'i mtha' las yan lag rnams KYIS KUN NAS NYON MONGS PA LDOG pa'i go  skabs brjod pa'i don dang  yan lag du bsdus pa ma yin pa zag pa dang bcas pa'i shes rab yongs su shes par brjod pa'i don de rgyu 'di dag gi dbang du byas nas yan lag re re la yang bdun bdun yod pas na / /

column3: 'di ni sa lnga ba'i mtshan nyid yin no // / +der kun nas nyon mongs pa rjes su sgrub pa yin no zhes bya ba ni 'di'i ched du bsams nas srid par skye ba gang yin pa der rten cing 'brel par 'byung bas lan mang du gnas pa nyid kyis kun nas nyon mongs par mi 'gyur ba yin  no ; / /

column11: 0.0#TD4036E.TXT.r#24140#24149#TD4036E.TXT.r_3649# gang zag lus kyis mngon DU BYED PA RNAM PAR THAR PA brgyad po gzugs can gzugs rnams la lta ba dang  nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs    rnams la lta ba dang  sdug pa'i rnam par thar pa lus kyis mngon sum du byas nas bsgrubs te gnas pa dang  nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang  rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang  ci yang med pa'i skye mched dang  'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched dang  'du  shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa dag lus kyi mngon sum du byas nas bsgrubs te gnas shing / /

column14: 0.0#TD4037E.TXT.r#1324079#1324080#TD4037E.TXT.r_1181# chu dang  me dang  rlung dang  nam mkha' dang  rnam shes dang  ci yang med pa'i skye mched dang  'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched dang  'jig rten 'di dang  'jig rten pha rol dang  nyi ma dang  zla ba 'di gnyis dang  mthong ba dang   thos pa dang  bye brag phyed pa dang  rnam par shes pa dang  rnyed pa dang  bcal ba dang  yid kyis rjes su brtags pa dang  rjes su dpyad pa de dag thams cad la brten cing bsam gtan mi byed do // /
column15: 0.0#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2727091#2727092#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_3726# bcom ldan 'das kyis mdo sde las zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched brgyad dang  de bzhin du rgyas par zad par gyi skye mched bcu dang  de bzhin du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la sogs pa'i skye mched bzhi dang   de bzhin du skye mched gnyis po 'du shes med pa'i skye mched dang 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched dang  de dag la sogs pa skye mched kyi sgrar bstan pa'i chos gang dag gsungs pa de dag kyang skye mched bcu gnyis po dag gis mtshan nyid ji skad smos pas ci rigs par bsdu bar rig par bya'o // /
column16: 0.0#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3093707#3093713#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_104# gzugs rgyu mtshan dang  sems rgyu mtshan dang  sems las byung ba rgyu  mtshan dang  sems dang LDAN PA MA YIN PA rgyu mtshan dang  'dus ma byas rgyu mtshan dang  'dus byas rgyu mtshan dang  phung po rgyu mtshan dang  skye mched rgyu mtshan dang  khams rgyu mtshan dang  rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rgyu mtshan dang  gnas DANG GNAS MA YIN PA rgyu  mtshan dang  dbang po rgyu mtshan dang  bden pa rgyu mtshan dang  dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rgyu mtshan dang  yang dag pa'i spong ba dang  rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang  dbang po dang  stobs dang  byang chub kyi yan lag dang  lam gyi yan lag rgyu mtshan dang  lam rgyu    mtshan dang  chos kyi gzhi rgyu mtshan dang  zhi gnas rgyu mtshan dang  lhag mthong rgyu mtshan dang  rab tu 'dzin pa rgyu mtshan dang  btang snyoms rgyu mtshan dang  rkyen rgyu mtshan dang  ston pa rgyu mtshan dang  sa rgyu mtshan dang  chu rgyu mtshan dang  me rgyu mtshan dang  rlung  rgyu mtshan dang  nam mkha' rgyu mtshan dang  rnam par shes pa rgyu mtshan dang  'jig rten 'di rgyu mtshan dang  'jig rten pha rol rgyu mtshan dang  nyi ma rgyu mtshan dang  zla ba rgyu mtshan dang  sems can dmyal ba rgyu mtshan dang  dud 'gro dang  yi dvags dang  lha dang   mi rgyu mtshan dang  rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i rgyu mtshan dang  sum cu rtsa gsum dang  'thab bral dang  dga' ldan dang  'phrul dga' dang  gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rgyu mtshan dang  bsam gtan dang po rgyu mtshan dang  bsam gtan gnyis pa dang  gsum pa dang  bzhi pa rgyu mtshan dang  nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched rgyu mtshan dang  rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang  ci yang med pa'i skye mched dang  'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched rgyu mtshan dang  'byung ba rgyu mtshan dang  'jig pa rgyu  mtshan dang  dngos po rgyu mtshan dang  dngos po med pa rgyu mtshan dang  kun nas nyon mongs pa rgyu mtshan dang  rnam par byang ba rgyu mtshan dang  mthong ba dang  thos pa dang  bye brag phyed pa dang  rnam par shes pa dang  thos pa dang  yongs su btsal ba rgyu mtshan  dang ; /

column26: 0.0#TD4092.2E.TXT.r#2638979#2638979#TD4092.2E.TXT.r_12896# bsam gtan dang po'i sa pa rnams ni bsam gtan gnyis pa'i nyer bsdogs kyis spong ba nas de bzhin du ci yang med pa'i skye mched pa rnams ni 'du shes med  'du shes med min skye mched kyi nyer bsngogs kyis spong ba'i bar du'o // /
column27: 0.0#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1711467#1711472#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_1794# bdag gi tshor ba dang btang snyoms 'di ltar yongs su dag cing byang bas rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang  ci yang med pa'i skye mched dang  'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs shing gnas te / /

column34: 5.960#TD4092.2E.TXT.r#2642113#2642114#TD4092.2E.TXT.r_13249# gnyis ni gnyis  pa bzhin no zhes bya ba ni ji ltar rnam par thar pa gnyis pa'i mtshan nyid nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs rnams la lta ba zhes bya ba de lta bu yin pa ltar zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched gsum pa dang  bzhi pa dag kyang de dang mtshan nyid de dang 'dra ste / /

column37: 1.192#TD4054E.TXT.r#1011431#1011435#TD4054E.TXT.r_3446# rnams dang  sum chu rtsa gsum dang  'thab bral dang  dga' ldan dang  'phrul dga' dang  gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang  tshangs ris dang  tshangs ba mdun na 'dong dang  tshangs chen dang  'od chung dang  tshad med 'od dang  'od gsal dang  dge chung dang  tshad  med dge dang  dge rgyas dang  sprin med dang  bsod nams skyes dang  'bras bu che dang  'du shes med pa'i sems can dang  mi che ba dang  mi gdung ba dang  gya nom snang ba dang  shin tu mthong ba dang  'og min dang  nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang  rnam shes mtha' yas skye  mched dang  ci yang med pa'i skye mched dang  'du shes med 'du shes med min rnams su'o // /
column38: 1.192#TD4054E.TXT.r#1024648#1024651#TD4054E.TXT.r_5578# 'jig rten pa'i bsam gtan dang po dang  gnyis pa dang  gsum pa dang  bsam gtan bzhi pa dang  nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang  rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang  ci yang med pa'i skye    mched dang  'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched de / /
column39: 1.192#TD4090.2E.TXT.r#1060835#1060835#TD4090.2E.TXT.r_1372# nam mkha' dang rnam shes mtha' yas dang ci yang med pa'i skye  mched kyis bsdus pa rnams ni grangs bzhin du nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang nyi shu rtsa bzhi dang nyi shu yin te / /
column40: 1.788#TD4044E.TXT.r#389855#389855#TD4044E.TXT.r_1483# gzugs kyi 'du shes dang  nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi nam mkha'i 'du shes dang  rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so snyam pa'i 'du shes dang  ci  yang med pa'i skye mched kyi ci yang med do zhes bya ba'i 'du shes so // /
column41: 1.788#TD4099E.TXT.r#116899#116902#TD4099E.TXT.r_2419;TD4099E.TXT.r_2420;TD4099E.TXT.r_2421# nam mkha'  mtha' yas skye mched la ma yin / / +rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la ma yin / /
column42: 0.010#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2760274#2760275#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_8433;TD4038.1E.TXT.r_8434# de ma thob pas bsam gtan dang po dang ldan pa'i sems ni mi skye ba de lta bu dang  'di ltar 'di na la las bsam gtan dang po dang bsam gtan gnyis pa dang  gsum pa dang  bzhi pa dang  nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang  rnam shes     // / +mtha' yas skye mched dang  ci yang med pa'i skye mched la rags par yid la byed cing bsam gtan gnyis pa nas bzung ste / /
column43: 0.013#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1785935#1785935#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_10799# mthong ba'i chos kyi 'dod pa'i 'du shes gang yin pa dang  pha rol gyi 'dod pa'i 'du shes gang yin pa dang  mthong ba'i chos kyi gzugs kyi 'du shes gang yin pa dang  pha rol gyi gzugs kyi 'du shes gang yin pa dang  ci yang med pa'i skye mched gang yin pa dang  'du shes  med 'du shes med min skye mched gang yin pa 'di tsam ni 'jig tshogs te / /
column44: 0.013#TD4038.2E.TXT.r#3100692#3100692#TD4038.2E.TXT.r_1380# tshangs ris kyi dngos po dang  'og min gyi bar gyi dngos po dang  nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi dngos po dang  'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi bar gyi dngos po dang  dad pas rjes su 'brang ba'i dngos po dang  chos kyis rjes  su 'brang ba'i dngos po dang  nges par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i dngos po dang  mthong ba'i lam gyi dngos po dang  bsgom pa'i lam gyi dngos po dang  rgyud du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'i dngos po dang  dgra bcom pa nyid kyi bar gyi dngos po dang  rang byang  chub kyi dngos po dang  yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi dngos po dang  'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa'i dngos po dang  pha rol tu phyin pa'i dngos po dang  dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i dngos po dang  lam gyi yan lag gi bar gyi dngos po dang  bsam gtan dang   tshad med pa dang  gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i dngos po dang  'du shes bsgom pa'i dngos po dang  rjes su dran pa bsgom pa'i dngos po dang  rnam par thar pa dang  zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched dang  zad par gyi skye mched bsgom pa'i dngos po dang   stobs dang  mi 'jigs pa dang  smon nas shes pa dang  bsrungs pa med pa dang  dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang  thugs rje chen po dang  bag chags yang dag par bcom pa dang  mtshan dang  dpe bya dang  rnam pa thams cad dang  mchog mkhyen pa dang   SANGS RGYAS KYI CHOS MA 'dres pa thams cad kyi dngos po ste / /
column45: 0.014#TD4039E.TXT.r#1836305#1836305#TD4039E.TXT.r_2635# 'phags pa nyan thos ci yang med pa'i skye mched kyi 'dod chags dang bral ba ni 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched 'du byed kyi lhag ma srid pa'i rtse mo bsgrubs te gnas nas de ma thag tu zag pa rnams zad pa thob par 'gyur ro // /
column46: 0.014#TD4039E.TXT.r#1876291#1876291#TD4039E.TXT.r_7138# de la 'phags pa nyan thos ni 'dod pa'i kun nas nyon mongs pa spang par bya ba'i phyir brtson pa na mthar gyis mi gyo bar 'gro ba dang  ci yang med pa'i skye mched du 'gro ba dang   'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched du 'gro ba'i lam gsum la brten nas mi gyo ba dang  ci yang med pa dang  'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la snyoms par 'jug ste / /
column47: 0.014#TD4039E.TXT.r#1876499#1876499#TD4039E.TXT.r_7158# ci yang med pa'i skye mched du 'gro ba dang  'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched du 'gro ba dang  tshe 'di la mya ngan las 'da' ba dang  'phags pa'i rnam par grol ba'o // /
column48: 0.015#TD4035E.TXT.r#141349#141349#TD4035E.TXT.r_2786# mi gyo ba'i don dang   nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang  'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi don du log pa'i tshangs par spyod pa tshol ba la 'jug ste / /
column49: 0.015#TD4035E.TXT.r#148801#148801#TD4035E.TXT.r_4177# 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha    dang  gzugs na spyod pa'i lha dang  gzugs med pa nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba dang  'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba'i bar du yang de dang 'dra ste / /
column50: 0.015#TD4035E.TXT.r#148941#148941#TD4035E.TXT.r_4206# yongs su gdung ba dang bcas pa dang  'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha dang  gzugs na spyod pa'i lha dang  gzugs med pa nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba dang  'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba'i  bar zhes byar mi rung ngo // /
column51: 0.015#TD4067E.TXT.r#1094211#1094211#TD4067E.TXT.r_1300# nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba dang  rnam shes  mtha' yas skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba dang  ci yang med pa'i skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba dang  'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba 'di ni gzugs med pa'i khams te / /

column54: 0.018#TD4049E.TXT.r#2303200#2303200#TD4049E.TXT.r_2710;TD4049E.TXT.r_2711# chos shes pa dang  rjes su rtogs pa shes pa'i phyogs dang  de dag dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang  bsam gtan dang po nas ci yang med pa'i skye mched kyi bar du'o // / +'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched ni 'du shes  kyi rgyu ba yongs su mi gsal ba'i phyir 'jig rten pa nyid de / /
column55: 0.019#TD4092.2E.TXT.r#2640954#2640959#TD4092.2E.TXT.r_13140;TD4092.2E.TXT.r_13141# nad gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs rnams la lta ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa  gnyis pa'o // /

column60: 0.022#TD4054E.TXT.r#1042140#1042142#TD4054E.TXT.r_8154# zad par sa dang  zad par chu dang  zad par med  dang  zad par rlung dang  zad par sngon po dang  zad par ser po dang  zad par dmar po dang  zad par dkar po dang  zad par nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang  zad par rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched do // /

column79: 0.026#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1706543#1706543#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_1184# yul w'a r'a na s'i'i ras phan sum tshogs pa sngon po kha dog sngon po sngon po lta bur ston pa 'od sngon po 'byung ba de bzhin du nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs sngon po kha dog sngon po lta bur ston pa 'od sngon po 'byung ba rnams la lta ba 'di ni zil gyis  gnon pa'i skye mched lnga pa'o // /
column80: 0.026#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1706602#1706602#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_1187# yul w'a r'a na s'i'i ras phun sum tshogs pa ser po kha dog ser po ser po lta bur ston pa 'od  ser po 'byung ba de bzhin du nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs ser po kha dog ser po ser po lta bur ston pa 'od ser po 'byung ba rnams la lta ba 'di ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched drug pa'o // /
column81: 0.026#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1706660#1706660#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_1190# yul w'a r'a na s'i'i ras phun sum tshogs pa dmar po kha dog dmar po dmar po lta bur ston pa 'od dmar po 'byung ba de bzhin du nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol  gyi gzugs dmar po kha dog dmar po dmar po lta bur ston pa 'od dmar po 'byung ba rnams la lta ba 'di ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched bdun pa'o // /
column82: 0.026#TD4094.1E.TXT.r#1706715#1706715#TD4094.1E.TXT.r_1193# yul w'a r'a na s'i'i ras phun sum tshogs pa dkar po kha dog dkar po dkar po lta bur ston pa 'od dkar po 'byung ba de bzhin du nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs dkar po kha dog  dkar po dkar po lta bur ston pa 'od dkar po 'byung ba rnams la lta ba 'di ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched brgyad pa'o zhes bka' stsal to / /
column83: 0.028#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#920058#920058#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3765;TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3766# bzang po'i rnam par thar pa lus kyi mngon sum du byas nas gnas te rnam par thar ba gsum pa'o // / +nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang   rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang  cung zad med pa'i skye mched dang  cung zad med min skye mched dang  'gog ba'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang brgyad de / /

column85: 0.028#TD4092.1E.TXT.r#1416463#1416463#TD4092.1E.TXT.r_1873# dgu pa dang bcu pa zad par nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dag ni 'og nas 'chad par     // /
column86: 0.029#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2702192#2702192#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_126# gzugs med pa'i khams na nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang  rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched na ni rgyu tshad med pa'i dmigs pa can no // /

column3: sems dang bsam pa rnam par dag pa mnyam pa nyid bcu po 'di dag gis sa lnga pa la 'jug ste / /

column5: 0.017#TD4093.1E.TXT.r#850504#850505#TD4093.1E.TXT.r_13780;TD4093.1E.TXT.r_13781# ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa ni bcu gnyis so // / +rtog pa dang bcas pa dang dpyod pa dang bcas  pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni bsam gtan dang po'o // /

column3: byang chub sems dpa' sa lnga pa thob pas ji ltar 'das pa la sogs pa'i     // / +sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi chos rnam par dag pa de kho na bzhin du bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang ring po mi thogs par rnam par dag par 'gyur ro snyam pa de lta bu'i bsam pa thob par 'gyur ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#162551#162566#TD4035E.TXT.r_6578;TD4035E.TXT.r_6579;TD4035E.TXT.r_6580;TD4035E.TXT.r_6581;TD4035E.TXT.r_6582;TD4035E.TXT.r_6583# rtog pa dang bcas dpyod pa dang bcas pa dang  rtog pa med la dpyod pa tsam dang  rtog pa med cing dpyod pa med pa'o // /
column5: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#174869#174871#TD4035E.TXT.r_8826# rnam par shes pa lnga dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i sa dang  yid kyi  sa dang  rtog pa dang bcas dpyod pa dang bcas pa dang  rtog pa med la dpyod pa tsam gyi sa rnams ni gcig tu nges par sems yod pa'o // /
column6: 0.0#TD4039E.TXT.r#1847035#1847040#TD4039E.TXT.r_3850;TD4039E.TXT.r_3851# de la snyoms par 'jug pa la brten pa'i bye brag ni 'di lta ste / / +rtog pa dang bcas dpyod pa dang  bcas pa dang  rtog pa med la dpyod pa tsam dang  rtog pa yang med dpyod pa yang med pa dang  dga' ba dang ldan pa dang  bde ba dang ldan pa dang  btang snyoms dang ldan pa dang  nyams par 'gyur ba dang  gnas pa dang  khyad par du 'gro ba dang  nges    par 'byed pa'i cha dang mthun pa ste / /
column7: 0.0#TD4090.1E.TXT.r#1600113#1600118#TD4090.1E.TXT.r_947;TD4090.1E.TXT.r_948;TD4090.1E.TXT.r_949;TD4090.1E.TXT.r_950# lhag ma khams bco lnga  po de dag ni gcig tu zag pa dang bcas pa yin no // / +rtog pa dang bcas dpyod pa dang bcas pa rnams ni du / / +rtog pa med la dpyod pa tsam dag ni du / /
column8: 1.192#TD4026E.TXT.r#296721#296726#TD4026E.TXT.r_3821# rtog pa dang bcas shing dpyod pa dang bcas pa dang  rtog pa med la dpyod pa tsam dang  rtog pa yang med dpyod pa yang med pa dang  zhi gnas yid la byed pa dang  lhag mthong yid la byed pa dang  zung du 'brel pa yid la byed pa dang  rab tu  'dzin pa'i rgyu mtshan yid la byed pa dang  zhi gnas kyi rgyu mtshan yid la byed pa dang  btang snyoms kyi rgyu mtshan yid la byed pa dang  rtag tu sbyor ba yid la byed pa dang  gus par bya ba yid la byed pa'o // /
column9: 1.192#TD4090.1E.TXT.r#1600251#1600252#TD4090.1E.TXT.r_968;TD4090.1E.TXT.r_969# rtog pa med cing dpyod pa tsam dag ni rtog pa'o // / +rtog pa yang med dpyod pa yang med pa dag ni mtshungs par ldan pa ma yin pa rnams so // /
column10: 1.192#TD4090.2E.TXT.r#1077245#1077245#TD4090.2E.TXT.r_4139# mdo las rtog pa dang bcas shing dpyod pa dang bcas  pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang  rtog pa med la dpyod pa tsam dang  rtog pa yang med la dpyod pa yang med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang ting nge 'dzin gsum du bka' stsal te / /

column13: 0.021#TD4090.1E.TXT.r#1600231#1600231#TD4090.1E.TXT.r_965;TD4090.1E.TXT.r_966# dpyod pa gnyis pa med pa'i phyir dang  rtog pa dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i phyir dpyod pa med cing rtog pa tsam yin no // / +de nyid kyi phyir rtog pa dang bcas dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i sa na chos rnam pa bzhi yod de / /
column14: 0.021#TD4043E.TXT.r#372811#372811#TD4043E.TXT.r_2285# dper na 'dod pa'i khams kyis ni rtog pa dang bcas shing dpyod pa dang bcas pa nyid yin yang rtog pa med cing dpyod pa yang med par 'gyur ro zhes bya BA BZHIN DU RANG GI sa pa nyid yin yang nyes pa med do // /

column3: rten cing 'brel par 'byung  ba'i de bzhin nyid de ni rang bzhin kho nas rnam par dag pa ste / / +de la ma rig pa'i rkyen can la sogs pa kun nas nyon mongs pa'i rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba glo bur bas dri ma can du gyur pa gang yin pa'am / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#162564#162574#TD4035E.TXT.r_6582;TD4035E.TXT.r_6583;TD4035E.TXT.r_6584# dga' ba ldan pa dang  bde ba dang ldan pa dang  btang snyoms dang ldan pa'o // / +yang cha gcig bsgoms pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang  gnyis ka'i cha bsgoms pa'i ting nge 'dzin to // /
column5: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#162575#162584#TD4035E.TXT.r_6584# yang  ting nge 'dzin bzhi bsgoms pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang  yang 'phags pa'i shes pa lnga dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang  yang yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang  yang 'phags pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin rgyu dang bcas shing yo byad dang bcas pa dang  yang  rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin dang  yang slob pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang  mi slob pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang  slob pa yang ma yin mi slob pa yang ma yin pa'i ting nge 'dzin to // /

column3: ma rig pa 'gags pa la sogs pa dkar po'i phyogs kyi rten cing 'brel  par 'byung bas rnam par dag pa gang yin pa 'di ni de'i ngo bo nyid ma yin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#162585#162604#TD4035E.TXT.r_6584;TD4035E.TXT.r_6585;TD4035E.TXT.r_6586# yang  ting nge 'dzin bzhi bsgoms pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang  yang 'phags pa'i shes pa lnga dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang  yang yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang  yang 'phags pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin rgyu dang bcas shing yo byad dang bcas pa dang  yang  rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin dang  yang slob pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang  mi slob pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang  slob pa yang ma yin mi slob pa yang ma yin pa'i ting nge 'dzin to // /

column3: de bas na nag po dang dkar po'i phyogs dag gis / / +de bzhin nyid la kun nas nyon mongs pa dang  rnam par byang bar mi lta ba'i phyir rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i de bzhin nyid kyis mang du gnas pas kun nas  nyon mongs pa dang  rnam par byang ba tha dad pa'i nga rgyal dang 'brel bar 'gyur te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#162605#162618#TD4035E.TXT.r_6585;TD4035E.TXT.r_6586# snyoms par 'jug pa gang zhe na / / +mthong ba'i snyoms par 'jug pa lnga dang  zil gyis gnon  pa'i skye mched brgyad kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dang  zad par gyi skye mched bcu'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang  gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang  'du shes med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang  'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'o // /

column3: sa bdun pa 'di  nyid la sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kun nas slong bas / / +skad cig skad cig la lhag par byang chub kyi yan lag thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#162633#162644#TD4035E.TXT.r_6588;TD4035E.TXT.r_6589;TD4035E.TXT.r_6590# ci'i phyir de kho na la mnyam par gzhag pa'i sa zhes bya la / / +gang 'dod pa'i khams kyi sems rtse gcig pa nyid ni ma yin zhe na / /

column3: dgu pa la ni sems can yongs su smin par byed pa la mkhas pa ste / / +snga ma bzhin no zhes bya ba ni so so yang  dag par rig pa shin tu rnam par dag pa thob pas sems can yongs su smin par 'grub pa ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#162645#162661#TD4035E.TXT.r_6590;TD4035E.TXT.r_6591;TD4035E.TXT.r_6592;TD4035E.TXT.r_6593# 'di ltar ting nge 'dzin de ni 'gyod pa med pa dang  mchog tu dga' ba dang  dga' ba dang  shin tu  sbyangs pa dang  bde bas mngon par bsgrubs pa yin la / /

column3: rnam pa thams cad du sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthu rnyed pa'i phyir ro // / +sa bcu po dag la bslab pa gsum rnam par gzhag ste / /

column3: de rnam par dag par ni sa gnyis pa la 'gyur ro // / +gang gi phyir rmi lam na yang kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa'i lam la mi 'jug pas de la    bslab pa de rnam par dag par 'gyur ba de'i phyir gnyis pa la lhag pa'i tshul khrims la slob po zhes bya'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#162686#162693#TD4035E.TXT.r_6597;TD4035E.TXT.r_6598;TD4035E.TXT.r_6599;TD4035E.TXT.r_6600# 'dod pa dang ldan pa'i yid bde ba dang  'dod pa dang ldan pa'i yid mi bde ba dang  mi dge ba dang ldan pa'i yid bde ba dang  mi dge ba dang ldan pa'i yid mi bde ba dang  mi dge ba dang  ldan pa'i btang snyoms so // / +chos lnga bsgoms pa yang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te / /

column6: 0.028#TD4092.2E.TXT.r#2636671#2636671#TD4092.2E.TXT.r_12610# chos lnga po nang rab tu dang ba dang  dga' ba dang shin tu sbyangs pa dang  bde ba dang ting nge 'dzin  ni bsgoms pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro zhes 'byung ngo // /

column3: gsum pa la ni lhag pa'i sems kyi bslab pa mnyam par gzhag go // / +bzhi pa la ni byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa bsgoms pas lhag pa'i shes rab kyi bslab pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#162702#162715#TD4035E.TXT.r_6601;TD4035E.TXT.r_6602;TD4035E.TXT.r_6603# 'dod pa lnga'i yon tan dag  'thob pa'i tshe dang  thob par gyur pa dang  nye bar spyod pa dang  mthong ba dang  thos pa dang  myong ba la brten nas de dag nyid rjes su dran pa'i yid bde ba gang yin pa'o // /

column3: shes rab de yang spyod yul gnyis pa can de zhes bya ba ni dmigs pa gnyis pa can zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go // /

column3: de mi shes pa dang shes pa la sogs pa'i 'jug pa rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba lugs dang mthun pa dang  lugs dang mi mthun pa'o zhes bya ba la / /

column3: de zhes bya ba'i sgras  ni ; / +bden pa bzhi bzung ste / / +ma rig pa'i rkyen can la sogs pa'i rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba ni de mi shes pa la sogs pa'i ngo bo nyid yin no // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#162739#162761#TD4035E.TXT.r_6607;TD4035E.TXT.r_6608;TD4035E.TXT.r_6609;TD4035E.TXT.r_6610# 'di ltar 'di na kha cig bde ba dang bcas shing yid bde ba dang  bcas bzhin pas / /
column5: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#162762#162771#TD4035E.TXT.r_6610;TD4035E.TXT.r_6611;TD4035E.TXT.r_6612# 'di ltar 'di na kha cig sdug bsngal ba dang bcas shing yid mi bde ba dang bcas bzhin pas srog gcod pa nas log par lta ba'i bar du 'gyur ba'o // /

column3: rig pa la sogs pa ni shes pa la sogs pa'i ngo bo nyid yin te / / +de lta bas na sa gnyis ka la yang chos kyi de kho na nyid dang   de mi shes pa dang shes pa la dmigs pa nyid kyis lhag pa'i shes rab kyi bslab pa rnam par gzhag go // /
bslab pa rnams dang bslab pa bsgoms pa'i 'bras bu bzhi ni sa ring du song ba la sogs pa bzhi la rnam par gzhag ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#162768#162779#TD4035E.TXT.r_6610;TD4035E.TXT.r_6611;TD4035E.TXT.r_6612;TD4035E.TXT.r_6613;TD4035E.TXT.r_6614;TD4035E.TXT.r_6615;TD4035E.TXT.r_6616# 'di ltar 'di na kha cig sdug bsngal ba dang bcas shing yid mi bde ba dang bcas bzhin pas srog gcod pa nas log par lta ba'i bar du 'gyur ba'o // / +mi dge ba dang ldan pa'i btang snyoms gang zhe na / /

column3: de ltar na bslab pa gsum po 'di dag rgyu dang 'bras  bur bcas te sa bcu la rnam par gzhag go // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#162777#162790#TD4035E.TXT.r_6612;TD4035E.TXT.r_6614;TD4035E.TXT.r_6615;TD4035E.TXT.r_6613;TD4035E.TXT.r_6616;TD4035E.TXT.r_6617;TD4035E.TXT.r_6618# 'di ltar 'di na rgyal po'am / / +gang gi bdag po yang rung ba'am / / +bla ma'am / /

column3: 'di man chad ni zag pa med pa'i phung po sa bcu la ji ltar rnam par gzhag pa de bsam par bya ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#162788#162798#TD4035E.TXT.r_6617;TD4035E.TXT.r_6618;TD4035E.TXT.r_6619;TD4035E.TXT.r_6620# de bdag nyid srog gcod pa'i sdig pa byed mi 'dod la / / +bsgo ba bsgrub pa'i mi rnams byed na yang yal  bar 'jog ste / /
column5: 0.014#TD4037E.TXT.r#1333983#1333986#TD4037E.TXT.r_2484;TD4037E.TXT.r_2485;TD4037E.TXT.r_2486# ci'i phyir khyod kyis gzhan dag de la yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug  par byed la / / +des skul bar byed cing dran par byas nas / /
column6: 0.026#TD4036E.TXT.r#19805#19806#TD4036E.TXT.r_2898;TD4036E.TXT.r_2899# nyes par bsam pa sems pa dang  nyes par smra ba brjod pa dang  nyes par bya ba'i las byed cing / / +chos brtan par sems par mi byed / /
column7: 0.028#TD4038.1E.TXT.r#2769200#2769200#TD4038.1E.TXT.r_9573# 'di ltar dri dang ro dang reg bya rnams legs par zhu bas ni 'phel bar byed la mi mthun par zhu bas ni 'grib par byed kyi / /

column3: sa dang po la chos nyid rab tu rtogs nas gnyis pa la tshul khrims kyi phung po sbyong ngo // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#162797#162806#TD4035E.TXT.r_6619;TD4035E.TXT.r_6620;TD4035E.TXT.r_6621;TD4035E.TXT.r_6622# bzlog par mi byed cing 'dul ba la 'god par mi byed la / / +de yal bar 'dor bas las de byed par 'gyur zhing / /
column5: 0.026#TD4019E.TXT.r#2447792#2447792#TD4019E.TXT.r_5342# gzhan yang 'gro ba gang zhig dbang phyug mnyes pa'i las byed pa dang  de la gnod par 'gyur  zhing ma dad pa'i las byed pa'i las de dag dbang phyug la rag las na ni / /
column6: 0.027#TD4093.2E.TXT.r#2075477#2075482#TD4093.2E.TXT.r_14100;TD4093.2E.TXT.r_14101;TD4093.2E.TXT.r_14102# der gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das par mi 'gyur zhing // / +de    dag gzugs rnams las nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing / /

column3: sa dang po la yang chos kyi dbyings  rtogs pa na tshul khrims kyi phung po thob pa yod mod kyi / / +yongs su dag pa ni ma yin te / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#162805#162821#TD4035E.TXT.r_6620;TD4035E.TXT.r_6621;TD4035E.TXT.r_6622;TD4035E.TXT.r_6623# de yal bar 'dor bas las de byed par 'gyur zhing / / +des kyang las de myong bar 'gyur te / / +lkog tu mi 'gyur ba dang  btang snyoms gang mi dge bar rjes su rtog cing rjes su dpyod bzhin du de     // /

column3: gnyis pa la de yongs su dag par 'gyur ro // / +ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po ni sa gsum pa la rnam pa dag go // /
shes rab kyi phung po ni sa bzhi pa la byang chub kyi phyogs dang mthun pa bsgoms  pas rnam par dag go // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#162822#162829#TD4035E.TXT.r_6623;TD4035E.TXT.r_6624;TD4035E.TXT.r_6625# mi spong bar yal bar 'dor ba dang ldan pa dang  mi dge ba la spyod ba na sdug bsngal yang ma yin bde ba yang ma yin pa'i tshor ba gang yin pa'o // /
column5: 0.022#TD4035E.TXT.r#158061#158061#TD4035E.TXT.r_5750;TD4035E.TXT.r_5751# sdug bsngal yang ma yin bde ba yang ma yin pa'i tshor ba gang zhe na / / +sdug bsngal yang ma yin / /

column3: lnga pa la bden pa bsgoms pas so // / +drug pa la rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba lugs dang mthun pa dang lugs dang mi mthun pa bsgoms pas so // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#162830#162842#TD4035E.TXT.r_6624;TD4035E.TXT.r_6625;TD4035E.TXT.r_6626;TD4035E.TXT.r_6627# mchog tu dga' ba gang zhe na / / +tshogs kyi sa yongs su dag pa la rnam bar lta ba na / /
column5: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#162851#162859#TD4035E.TXT.r_6629;TD4035E.TXT.r_6630;TD4035E.TXT.r_6626;TD4035E.TXT.r_6627;TD4035E.TXT.r_6628;TD4035E.TXT.r_6631;TD4035E.TXT.r_6632# yang dag pa'i sbyor ba sngon du 'gro ba'i dga' ba gang yin pa ni dga' ba ste / / +yid bde zhing sems nyams bde ba'o // /

column3: rnam par grol ba dang rnam par grol ba'i ye shes kyi phung po gnyis ni sa bdun pa nas bzung ste /// /
de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa'i bar la rnam par dag go // / +rnam par grol ba de yang 'bras bu rnam pa bzhi'i sgrib pa la rig par bya'o // /
sangs rgyas kyi sa la ni thogs pa'i sgrib pa las te zhes bya ba la / / +'bras bu rnam pa bzhi ni bshad ma thag pa ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#162858#162869#TD4035E.TXT.r_6630;TD4035E.TXT.r_6631;TD4035E.TXT.r_6632;TD4035E.TXT.r_6633;TD4035E.TXT.r_6634# yid bde zhing sems nyams bde ba'o // / +shin tu  sbyangs ba gang zhe na / /

column3: mtshan  ma med pa 'du byed dang bcas pa ni sa bdun pa'i 'bras bu'o // / +'bras bu gnyis pa de nyid mngon par 'du byed pa med pa dang  sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa ni sa brgyad pa'o // /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#162865#162882#TD4035E.TXT.r_6632;TD4035E.TXT.r_6633;TD4035E.TXT.r_6634;TD4035E.TXT.r_6635# gnas ngan len dang bral bas lus dang sems las su rung ba nyid gang yin pa'o // / +bde ba gang zhe na / /
column5: 0.023#TD4034.1E.TXT.r#916110#916110#TD4034.1E.TXT.r_3261# thag par shes par gyur pa na lus bde ba dang   sems bde ba thob par 'gyur ro // /

column3: 'bras bu gsum pa sems can rnams yongs su smin pa 'grub pa ni sa dgu pa'i'o // / +'bras bu  bzhi pa ting nge 'dzin dang gzungs 'grub pa ni sa bcu pa'i ste / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#162880#162894#TD4035E.TXT.r_6634;TD4035E.TXT.r_6635;TD4035E.TXT.r_6636;TD4035E.TXT.r_6637;TD4035E.TXT.r_6638# de ltar lus dang sems las su rung ba'i lus dang sems la gnod pa med pa'i bde ba gang yin pa dang  rnam par grol ba'i bde ba ste / / +phyogs  gang gi gnas ngan len de dang bral bas nye ba'i nyon mongs pa de dag las rnam par grol ba'o // /
column5: 0.021#TD4035E.TXT.r#169648#169648#TD4035E.TXT.r_7882;TD4035E.TXT.r_7883# dad pa dang 'dun pa dang  mos pa mtha'  yas mu med pa'i phyir ni ma yin no // / +tshad med PA'I TING NGE 'DZIN GANG zhe na / /
column6: 0.021#TD4059E.TXT.r#413370#413370#TD4059E.TXT.r_90;TD4059E.TXT.r_91;TD4059E.TXT.r_92# ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na / / +brtag pa'i     // / +dngos po la sems rtse gcig pa nyid do // /

column8: 0.028#TD4066E.TXT.r#2107324#2107324#TD4066E.TXT.r_746;TD4066E.TXT.r_747# ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na / / +brtag pa'i dngos po la sems rtse gcig pa nyid do zhes bya ba la / /
column9: 0.029#TD4047E.TXT.r#1183823#1183824#TD4047E.TXT.r_8979# byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod thos pa dang bsam pa sngon du 'gro ba'i zhes bya ba ni theg pa chen po'i mdo sde shin tu rgyas pa thos  pa dang  de'i don bsam pa sngon du 'gro bar byas nas bsgom pa dang ldan pas bskyed pa'i sems rtse gcig pa gang yin pa de ni dmigs pa zhes bya bar rnam par gzhag par bya ste / /

column3: 'bras bu rnam pa bzhi po 'di'i sgrib pa mtshan ma dang  mngon par 'du byed pa la sogs pa dang bral ba'i phyir / /
column4: 0.0#TD4035E.TXT.r#162895#162903#TD4035E.TXT.r_6637;TD4035E.TXT.r_6638;TD4035E.TXT.r_6639;TD4035E.TXT.r_6640;TD4035E.TXT.r_6641# dmigs pa la yang dag par sems pa'i sems rtse gcig pa gang yin pa ste / / +bcom ldan 'das kyis zag pa med pa'i sbyor ba la / /
